Summary: I stayed for a business trip with some co-workers and we all loved the hotel. From the moment I called with questions, they were friendly and quick to respond and address all of my concerns. The front desk ladies were very kind. Our rooms were clean, cozy and comfortable. It was nice to get away from the convention center and avoid all the traffic(10 minute drive),  it was a convenient location. The complimentary coffee, cupcakes and fruit was a great way to start the day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful review. We are so happy that you and all your co-workers enjoyed the staff and cozy rooms.  We so appreciate your feedback. We hope business brings you back our way again soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel visit as part of a California road trip
Summary: Fantastic our room was ready early and we were able to check in and use the pool for a swim before heading out for a baseball game 20 mins away.  There was a supermarket across the road and various eating establishments.  The room was huge and colourful in a pleasant spanish/mexican style. Fridge and kitchen so useful to us.  Breakfast choice great for me as I love pastries but not so for hubby who doesn’t eat cake…I enjoyed the coffee too!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback and helpful tips! We hope your travels bring you back our way!

Summary: First time staying here but definitely won’t be the last! Adorable property and nice big spacious and clean room. Staff was soo nice and welcoming 💕 loved the little market, super convenient! And a close drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thank you for the great review. We can't wait to see you again.

Summary: My stay at the Pepper Tree Hotel was absolutely amazing. My boyfriend and I stayed one night for Valentines Day and they made sure to make it so special. I asked the front desk if they had any suggestions for dinner and she gave us wonderful ideas of Mexican food around and we enjoyed a nice dinner. Thank you so much Pepper Tree for having us and spoiling us on our Valentines day!<3
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much for the review. We are always honored to be apart of our guests special occasions.  We are so happy that you loved the hotel and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My husband and I have stayed here twice this is a great place for disney stays. its about an 8.00 uber to the parks drops you right to the front of the park. the rooms are huge with a kitchen in them love this place..
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel for your Disneyland trip! We do always recommend a Uber to Disney - so easy, fast, and cheaper than parking! Come back again soon.

Summary: I loved my stay, there was very kind staff and the room itself was wonderful. I wish there were more breakfast items in the morning, like a pancake maker or a cooked breakfast but it was still very nice overall. I am glad I spent my mini vacation here!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you loved your stay! Thank you for the helpful feedback abut our To-G coffee bar. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Service and a Clean Room
Summary: This hotel has large rooms and is very clean. The service is very nice. I liked the location, it is not to fare from the Convention Center - easy access with Uber. I booked via Booking.com and everything worked perfect.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you liked our large rooms and convenient location. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Nice ambiance, could use a lil tlc
Summary: Loved that there was a patio for fresh air. Most hotels can't even open the window! Great budget option right across from grocery store and close to a bunch of restaurants. Loved that some of the floor was Tuscan looking tile and not all carpet. Workers were pleasant. Towels could be replaced and were scratchy. Sink drained slowly and toilet flushed poorly. Shower curtain tattered and shortened, but somewhat clean. A few hairs on the toiletries in the shower that were not ours. The bed had a plastic waterproof cover on the mattress, which you could hear when moving. Could definitely use new towels and a new curtain but overall still good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for the very helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the private patios and convenient locations. We will make sure to inspect your room for the slow drains and bathroom issues. Thank you again for the review. We will use your comments to better our service.

Summary: Booked this hotel as a little weekend getaway with my best friend. We love the aesthetic of the hotel, super cute like studio apartments. The service was great super friendly front desk staff and very helpful. Parking is a bit hard since there’s a restaurant in front that seems popular. Overall amazing stay!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and our friendly staff! Thank you so much for your review. We are sorry that the parking seemed a bit tight - you can always check our back parking lot area too. Our front desk can help you out if the parking it getting tight on a busy weekend. Thanks again for your helpful feedback.

Summary: The damage deposit was way too much, it was more than what I spent to book a room for one night. Insane! Other than that room was clean, and front desk was friendly. I was able to extend my check out time for an extra hour after a long night out which was great.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and our staff. We are sorry that you were disappointed with the deposit. We are actually working on making some adjustments in this area - we appreciate your helpful feedback and will use it to improve our guest experience. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I booked this hotel for a Disneyland trip, I normally stay across the street from the gates but because of the valentines parties the prices were way too much. I booked this room because it had good reviews from other people and found it at a great price. The drive was only about 10 minutes each way, the room was far beyond what I expected! It was a beautiful hotel. I will be staying here again as this was a one night trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! We are so happy that you will be back again and that you enjoyed our beautiful property! Thank you again for the great feedback. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: I am shocked that this hotel gets good reviews at all. Arrived on a Thursday after a very long and tiresome trip. We walked into the room to discover FOUR DEAD HUGE COCKROACHES and one alive. The receptionist came and collected the dead roaches and we killed the fourth one. We wanted to change rooms and asked for the ground floor. She showed us the only room available which was designed for disabled people and the bed was too low( we thought that in a lower bed we would be easier prey to the crowlers). We were so exhausted and with a small child that we just decided to stay since we were too tired to find another hotel at that time. The next morning we left to Disneyland ver early. We never heard a single word from management or any apology from anyone. On the contrary, the
Manager Response: We are very sorry for the issues you experienced at our hotel and have refunded your entire stay. We are sorry that the water bugs did make it into your room. We do regularly treat the grounds and patios for pests but unfortunately cannot control everything. We did tried to reach you the next morning after a room came available to move you, but you did not return our calls. We had another room ready for you, but you did not speak with us until the following day. You still did choose to extend your stay with us for an additional night. Unfortunately, we did refuse to extend your stay with us because of your treatment to our front desk agents. We do not tolerate guests yelling or threatening our staff. We are sorry that you did have issues with your room, but we did try our best to resolve the situation immediately.

Summary: For the price, this place is absolutely fantastic. Beautiful rooms, a full little kitchen WITH pans and dinnerware provided, a patio with furniture, a nice couch. An absolutely lovely place to stay for a few days! Would come again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and patio. We would be thrilled to have you back.

Summary: This hotel is super cute with a great aesthetic! The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. There is a super market conveniently across the street and a couple of cute places to grab a bite to eat near by. My only minor complaint, and it is minor, is that the you can definitely hear noise through the walls, this is not really an issue during the day but can be a little hard for sleep at night. With a little bit of white noise playing in the background you can drown it out though, so as I said, minor complaint. I would definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and our amazing staff. Thank you so much for your helpful and honest feedback. We do understand the noise issue you mentioned and are always working our hardest to minimize any issues for our guests. Thanks again for the recommendations and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Staff was nice and friendly. Room was not clean. Nasty stains on the carpet. The tub was broken and had a pubic hair showing the tub was NOT cleaned. The TV did not work. The location was horrible, we don’t feel safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are looking into your situation immediately and are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We wish that you would have spoken with us during your stay so that we could help resolve your issues.

Summary: Stayed here for our visit to Disneyland, which was about a 20 minute drive away. Nice place, huge room and cute little first floor patio, very private.  I wish they had a toaster in the kitchen.  Bed was comfy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the comfy bed and private patio. There should have been a toaster in the room - we are sorry that it was missing. We hope to see you again soon .

Summary: This place is a hidden gem. The rooms are clean, and really nice. We were on the first floor and had a private patio. The deposit advertised was $50, but it is actually $200 deposit, $15 resort fee and $10 parking for more than one vehicle
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the private patio and our great customer service. We are sorry that the third party you booked through had the incorrect info. We will try to see if they can update their information. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We loved our stay at Pepper Tree. The kitchen studio was very well presented. It's location and proximity to Disneyland was super handy. Having a supermarket just across the street was super convenient too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you loved your stay! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: A really nice, friendly, and comfortable hotel.  Large rooms.  This was my second stay.  I wish that they had dining and bar facilities on site. BTW: Requiring two hundred characters for a review is a bit much!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear from our repeat guests. Sorry about the word count! We will try to fix it.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Stay at the PT hotel!
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the PT Hotel for a week.  The hotel was fantastic! Clean, comfortable bed, great location!  Staff were amazing! They offer complimentary coffee and a light breakfast every morning until 10 am. Supermarket across the street was very handy. The room provided everything you need to cook simple meals.  Great restaurant “Scratch” was just a short walk.  Make sure your hungry!  Great food and very generous portions.  We will definitely be returning to the PT next year!
Manager Response: We will be so happy to have you back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: The rooms are spacious and CLEAN. The bed was super comfy and the sheets clean and crisp. The kitchen was a bonus with a stove, large fridge, plates, glasses, utensils AND a coffee maker. With the convenience of a supermarket directly across the street you're all set!  My balcony was big and private and the staff awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your helpful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and clean rooms. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The room is very nice and spacious. Like staying in a studio apartment. The decor is unique and gives the room a cozy vibe. The only complaint would be the shower that would not stay hot and the gap on our front door, which led light into the room and the noise from the hallway. other than that, the stay was very nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy that you enjoyed the spacious room and decor. We are sorry about the shower issue and will take a look at that immediately. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree had very pleasant staff. The accommodations were clean and had a great overall vibe. The curation and style made it feel more like an apartment than a typical hotel room. Great boutique hotel!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back and that you and enjoyed our boutique charm. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We loved our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree! Spacious accommodations, comfortable beds, delicious coffee!! We would definitely plan to stay here again if we were in the area in the future. Especially loved the decor of the hotel.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you loved the decor, comfy beds, and our To-Go Coffee Bar. We are excited to have you back. Thanks for the kind review.

Summary: We arrived at the hotel late after some crazy traveling and flight disruptions. I had booked this through an online travel site and was overly annoyed with a payment issue from the company to the hotel. However Sandra (the assistant manager) was the most helpful and understanding employee. She tried to make a few phone calls, and after a hour of trying to resolve the issue we decided it was better to solve the issue on the morning.  Sandra was wonderful and all other employees were also friendly and helpful.  The room was perfect! We had every convenience  we needed. Housekeeping runs every 3/4 days of your stay, but the front desk is very accommodating for anything you need. Parking is your choice of gated or not. The pool was small but perfect for our 10 year  old. The only
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review! We are sorry about the issues you experienced but are glad that in the end it was all figured out. We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and our staff. We do hope you come again, and we will help you get that pool view!

Summary: The room was very dirty and stains on the sheets. There was hair in the tub and mold along the shower. There was looked like blood on the floor of the entrance of the room on the tile. The room was very noisy. Mattress was not only noisy but so uncomfortable.
Manager Response: We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. Our housekeeping staff is looking into the issues you experienced which are not normal to most of our guests. Most of our guests also enjoy our beds, and we are sorry that you did not find them comfortable. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Spent our anniversary trip there and can’t be happier
Summary: We booked a 4-night stay at Hotel Pepper Tree for our anniversary trip to Disneyland. The staff were warm and friendly. We were surprised by a little anniversary present left by the staff, it was really thoughtful.  The hotel room itself was kept clean, the decorations had a New Mexico vibe. There is a small plaza across the street with a Mexican market, a Chinese and a Persian restaurant right there. Super convenient. Disneyland is about 10-15 mins by car, it gives you the ability to come back to the hotel if you need to rest and go back later in the day. With the location being so close to the park, it’s surprisingly quiet. We had no trouble falling asleep.  Overall the hotel and staff left a really great impression. We would definitely book again. :) thanks Hotel Pepper Tree!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review! We were honored to be apart of you anniversary celebrations. We will be happy to have you back. Thank you again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Very nice hotel with very nice people. Balcony or patio with every room. I stayed for 18 nights. No real breakfast, but I was aware and that was o.k. for me for during the week, since the room had a kitchen. Supermarkt is across the street - very convenient. On the weekends I went to the "Scratch room" around the corner for breakfast and there's also a very nice Persian restaurant in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: We are so happy to be a home away from home for you during your business trip. Thank you for the review!! We hope you can come back again for a leisure trip.

Summary: It took us awhile to find something close to where my son lives. Living in PA and not much for traveling all we knew was the big hotel chains and the prices that come with them. As luck will have it, my son only lives a few blocks from there and was able to check it out for us. He reported that it was just as you see on the website. It almost reminded you of staying at the Ponderosa on Bonanza. The beds were very comfortable, you had a little kitchen, and it was very clean. The staff was wonderful and very helpful with local shopping, restaurants and attractions. I wish their breakfast was more of a continental breakfast but there was a place directly across the street called Scratch that took up their slack. Our stay was brief, six nights, but I do recommend it. We had a great
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and recommendations! We are so happy that you will be back on your next Anaheim visit.

Summary: Comfortable stay for the family. Lots of sound travels through the door. Neighbors coming in/out late at night sounded very loud. Kitchen had all necessary utensils for small meals for kids. Complimentary coffee and tea was a bonus.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and our To-Go Coffee Bar. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: My husband and I went to a concert. We drove in from three hours away and needed a hotel for the night. We could not have been happier with this hotel. We will definitely stay at this hotel again the next time our travels bring us to Orange County.
Manager Response: We will are so excited that you will be back! Thank you so much for the great review.

Summary Heading: Probably the best Value you'll find in Anaheim
Summary: I've stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree before and I always have a great stay.  The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable and the staff attentive and very friendly.  The lobby was beautifully decorated for Christmas.  I also enjoyed the free coffee and muffin offering in the morning.  I look forward to my next stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest! We value your feedback and are so happy to hear that your second stay was great. We look forward to having you back again.

Summary: We had several rooms for our group and every detail was absolutely perfect! Our stay was comfortable and accommodating to all of our requests. The morning coffee bar was a life saver and the staff was very helpful. We will be returning to this fabulous hotel the next time we head to Disneyland!
Manager Response: We will be so happy to have you back! Thank you so much for your kind words.

Summary: I recomment Hotel Pepper Tree and I intend to visit again.  I appreciated the accessibility, friendly and professional staff, cleanliness, design, and I liked my room.  Everything smelled fresh and clean.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel! We are excited to have you back. Thanks for the review.

Summary: This is the 4th time I have stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree.  I love this hotel, the staff are so friendly and helpful. Perfect place to bring your pet, rooms are so nice with kitchen. Everything you need.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us 4 times! We so appreciate our repeat guests. We will see you again soon!

Summary: We've stayed at this hotel a few times now. It has become our go to place to stay when visiting Knott's or Disneyland. The rooms are always clean and a good size for our family of 4. The kitchenette is especially nice for preparing dinner even when we're just serving up some take-out.
Manager Response: Thank so much the kind and helpful review. We are so thankful for the several times you have stayed with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for Disneyland trip and it was a 10 minute drive. Spacious for 2 people and 2nd floor pool balcony view was nice. We got a gated parking space behind the hotel which made parking feel safer. Overall would definitely recommend for getting your moneys worth!
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! Come again.

Summary Heading: Perfect Location for our Disney Vacation
Summary: The hotel is perfectly located near Disneyland so it was very convenient for our trip. The staff was also very friendly during check in and check out. They even gave my 7 year old son a surprise when they found out we were there celebrating his birthday. Thanks so much for the hospitality!
Manager Response: Thank  you so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our location and friendly staff. We hope to see you again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: Everything was perfect on our trip to Disneyland. The hotel was minutes away from the locale and made it very easy. The room was just as expected. I would say the only down fall was that the pool didn’t open until 10am and our daughter wanted to swim. So we just went to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for our review. We are so happy that your trip was perfect. We will make sure to let our management team see your comments about the pool hours. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Overall, a good stay. Very cute theme venue. Only downfall i would say was that the towels were dirty and it looked like they were recently used. We didn't use them due to us carrying our own but when we reached over to use them as a hair towels, that is when we notice them. Would come again tho! The location is nice and its away from the main streets that get crowded during rush hour.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back. We are glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm and location. We are very sorry about the towel issue you experienced and will notify our housekeeping team immediately! Again, thanks so much for the helpful feedback.

Summary: I gave it at three because I continuously had key issues I was only there for two days and we had to revise our key issues like four times besides that everything else was good . I did enjoy the coffee and the sweets in the morning with the fruit. The staff was really friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are sorry about the key issues and will make sure to inspect the lock and are unsure why your keys kept demagnetizing. We are happy that you enjoyed the staff and our To-Go Coffee Bar. We hope to see you again. Sorry again for the inconvenience of the keys.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at this hotel. Cozy hacienda feel and quite spacious. Staff was courteous and called to confirm the reservation. They asked if it was a special occasion, which in fact it was the day of my birthday. However, no little surprise was left but overall liked the hotel.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We are sorry that we missed the opportunity to celebrate your birthday. We do our best to make note of special occasions and somehow missed yours. We do hope that you visit again. Thanks again for the kind review.

Summary: We went to Disneyland and were planning to stay elsewhere, but the other hotel was booked. I gave it a chance thinking it seemed decent enough, but would not stay again. I think the hotel is somewhat trying, but it’s just really dated. The staff were friendly, but for the price which was the same or more than the newly renovated larger chains I’ve stayed at, it doesn’t compare. There were things that I can’t overlook and I did not take pics, as I really just tried to enjoy our trip for a few days. The negatives was that there was old carpet. One of the seams where the carpet connects near the kitchen area was coming apart and you can see the staples. I could see this specifically being a safety issue for those with young children. Mine are older, but have likely complained if I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that you did not receive our best room but happy that you found our staff friendly and location convenient. We are currently making renovations and replacing carpets throughout the hotel. The room you stayed in is now closed and going through the renovation process.   Again, we are sorry that did not enjoy your stay. We do hope that you would give us another try in the future.

Summary: What a hidden gem!! Beautiful property, excellent customer service, spacious and comfortable rooms! My husband and I traveled mid week for a quick little Disney trip and stumbled upon Peppertree, we decided to give it a try and were pleasantly surprised. The customer service was top notch, our king size room was spacious, clean, and very comfortable. We enjoyed secure parking, a private patio and beautiful grounds. Disney is just minutes away and cost about $8 to UBER each way for two of us.  We look forward to staying here again on our next Mom & Dad getaway!! ❤️
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our property and staff. We can't wait to have you back for a special getaway.

Summary Heading: Average Hotel, Very good Location for Disney
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Pepper Tree, but did find the rooms to be very dark.  2 bed room with small kitchen.  One bed was comfy whereas other bed wasn't in the best of conditions/  Pillows weren't very comfy which probably could've been rectified with a trip to the front desk but we didn't bother so not hotels fault at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for our helpful feedback. We will make sure to inspect your bed and pillows immediately. We are sorry that they were not the best. We hope to see you again and are always happy to help you during your stay.

Summary: The hotel was in the perfect spot. It was clean. Front desk staff was nice and helpful. The security guard was rude and not friendly at all. We loved the balcony and the Spanish theme of the hotel. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you loved the boutique feel and private balcony. We are sorry about the security guard and will work with our security company to help improve the customer service. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Good service, nice and clean room. Great location. 10 minutes to Disney. Stores near hotel. There’s no breakfast included but everything was good. I recommend this place. Also I can stay here for my next road trip.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! We would be happy to have you back. We do not have a hot breakfast but do offer our To-Go Coffee Bar with fruits and pastries every morning.

Summary: Friendly staff ... beautiful rooms and perfect location. I have a little one and having a kitchen was perfect for us! Perfect hotel for families. Looking forward to staying there again on our future Disney vacations.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that your whole family enjoyed the stay. We are excited to be able to see you again!

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: Our stay was extremely relaxing. The entire room was clean, and it was replenished with everything we could need from clean towels to dishes for the kitchen. Plus, the entire staff was kind and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words. We are so happy that you were able to relax. Come back soon!

Summary: After 54 years living in Sweden we returnera to California to visit old friends and relatives and get to know new relatives. Since we lived in Long Beach back inte 50 and sixties we staten there for 4 weeks,”but the last two weeks at hotel pepper tree were just the best of our visit . Ok
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us!! Thank you for the great review. Safe travels!

Summary: Just a great to place stay.  Great customer service. Recommend Hotel Pepper to anyone wanting a nice place with kitchen , nice patio, pool, comfortable beds. Close to Disneyland, Grocery store across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendations! We hope that you can come back soon.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our time at the hotel. The staff was super nice and helpful. We will visit again. The snack bar area had plenty to choose from. And continental breakfast was just what we needed.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the review and tips.

Summary Heading: Very nice place to stay after long day at Disneyland
Summary: Coming from San Diego for a day trip to Disneyland, I wanted a decent, reasonably priced placed to stay for the night. Most of the places right around the park seemed a bit pricey for a 1 night stay. I was very pleased to find the Pepper Tree Hotel. Overall the hotel was very nice and I would not hesitate to stay again even for more that one night. I'm not sure if they have a shuttle to the parks which might be an issue for a longer stay as the parking at Disneyland is $30. My only other issue was the blankets were scratchy.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that our place was a great option for your Disneyland trip. We do recommend taking and Uber/Lyft to the parks because it is cheaper than parking each day. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice, very comfortable, affordable, accommodations. My wife & I stayed for one week in a King studio suite and were very happy with our experience. The bed was very comfortable and so was the suite. A very nice place to come back to each day and a great place to start each day.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you found the room and bed comfortable. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very happy with the accomodation.  From the pool, to the spacious  room, to the amenities within, our stay couldn't have been better. The staff was knowledgeable and friendly. The grocery store across the street allowed us to fill our refrigerator and was very helpful in keeping our spending down. I would recommend to anyone that wants a great accommodation at a fair price.
Manager Response: Wow! We are so happy that you stay couldn't have been better. Thank you for the recommendations. Come again!

Summary: Thank you for an amazing stay. The hotel is beautiful, loved the decor. Very cozy & homey. The bed was super comfortable. Everything you need to feel right at home. Very grateful for the bottle refill station on the main floor.   The staff was incredible. Thank you to Michael & Johanna for making our stay memorable. And of course, the new bear in the lobby. Love him!   Can’t wait to be back.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the kind words about the staff. We love being a home away from home.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree was comfortable and clean. Front desk staff was awesome-friendly    The only downside is hallway carries noise, just due to how it is constructed-  There is a protected parking lot in the back which I was not aware of and would liked to have known that at check-in
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed a clean room and our friendly staff. We do have a secured lot in the back - please ask about it on your next visit. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We checked in on Sept. 24 and checked out on Oct. 1, 2022.  We spent a whole week staying at this hotel for our 25th Wedding Anniversary trip.  Our King room was on the main floor so we had a nice big and private veranda. On the other side of our veranda was the pool, but because of the wall, it helped so we did not hear the people using the pool. The room was clean and I even brought my own sheets to use while staying, but the sheets on the bed were crisp and clean, so we just left them instead.  Loved having a full size refrigerator.  Though we did not use the stove or oven,  it was nice that we could have if we had chosen too.  There was plenty of parking and we felt safe parking our car in the lot. The only thing that was slightly annoying was the water temperature and
Manager Response: We were honored to be a part of your anniversary celebrations! Thank you for the great review and helpful tips. We are so happy to now be your go-to hotel. Come back soon!

Summary: Very nice friendly staff would definitely stay again. Big clean rooms, good for family on vacation. Has amenities to cook a big refrigerator nice patio with privacy beautiful outside trees plants beautiful place.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and our large rooms. Thanks for the review!

Summary: We stayed for five days. I was very impressed with the room, front desk staff and location. The staff was very helpful and friendly. Our room was large and had all of the amenities that we needed. Located so close to everything! We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Although it was just a one night stay, it was a most pleasant stay. The room had great amenities and plenty of space for our family where I feel a couple nights stay would be just fine. And most importantly, clean. Will be staying here again in the future when visiting the area.
Manager Response: We can't wait to see you again. Thanks for the review and we hope that you can stay longer next time!

Summary: I was in town too celebrate my son who passed away 12 weeks ago and would have celebrated his 40th birthday on September 22 with a visit to see the Dodgers on his birthday and continued the celebration of him at Disneyland the next day
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review. We were happy to help you celebrate your son's life. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We loved our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. We loved the Spanish/ Mexican interior design. The hotel was very clean and the staff were very friendly and helpful. They had free coffee and snacks in the morning. Location was great and price was reasonable.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm. Come again soon.

Summary: Stayed with my daughter.  Nice room with enough space for us.  It would be nice if instructions for the air conditioner are available in the room.  Also a better breakfast offering would be appealing. Comfortable stay.  Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm. Your room should have had AC instructions listed but we will check. Thanks for the recommendations.

Summary: Stayed many times and will continue to stay anytime we’re in Anaheim. Minutes away from Disneyland. Spacious rooms with full kitchens are great.  Only wish they had the rear parking open like they used to.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thank you for always coming back. Let us know the next time if you prefer to park in the back - we should be able to accommodate you.

Summary Heading: Recent stay at Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: We have stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree a number of times over the past several years and always found it to be an excellent place to stay.  We use it because of its close proximity to Disneyland.  The rooms are always clean and the staff is always courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! We can't wait to see you again.

Summary: Amazing place. Clean, friendly staff, and really nice rooms. Only minor complaint was that my room was right by the lobby and a good bit of noise from people walking down the tile halls could be heard. If the door could be sealed better from sound, that would be welcome. But this was not a big deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and feedback! We are so happy that you enjoyed the rooms and our friendly staff. We will use your comments to improve our property.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My wife and I loved this hotel! We 100% recommend. We only stayed one night, but we wish we stayed longer!!! The place has great character and atmosphere. It didn't break the bank either. We intend to stay here again if we ever need to grab a room!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendations! Hopefully next time you will be able to stay longer.

Summary: We were very happy with our stay during our family vacation. Rooms were very clean. The hotel staff was great. I think if I could critique anything it would be that the bed we slept in was not the best. It was quite stiff, but I was still able to sleep through the night. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kid review. We are so happy that you family enjoyed the room and our staff.  We will be excited to have you back!

Summary: The front desk staff was friendly and accommodating. The location itself is a quick drive to stores, theme parks, etc. They offer complimentary coffee and pastries in the morning from a dedicated time. I would stay at this location again in the future.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: A nice weekend with old friends and a comfortable place to stay.
Summary: Everything was wonderful. I enjoyed the southwestern styling throughout the establishment. Extra cookware was made available to me by the front desk staff when I inquired about it. The patio made for a great spot to watch the rain.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and our boutique vibe. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This was our 4th or 5th time staying at the Pepper Tree.  Over the year I have sent many Safeway Employees to you as a place to stay close to Disneyland and Knotts Berry farm.  a  I am retired now and have told others in the Track and Field community , I have been a track official for 34 years
Manager Response: We love our repeat guests!!! Thank you so much for your loyalty and many recommendations. We can't wait to have you back with us again.

Summary: Such a pretty hotel with kitchenettes and great service, my second time staying here. They offer cute courtyards or balconies depending on the floor. The free coffee in the morning is yummy and they have flavored ones!  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and recommendations! We love to hear from our repeat guests. We hope to see you for a 3rd visit soon.

Summary: This is nice if your family is going ti a theme park nearby and u wanna plan on bringing your own food. Kitchen has everything you’re gonna need. Basics. There is balcony as well so you can chill after a long day
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and balcony. Come back soon.

Summary: Very clean hotel and very charming. Staff is the most wonderful!  The only thing missing was an in room safe.  Although the front staff accommodated our need it would have been a good to have!  Close to Disneyland with easy access!  Felt very safe and loved the spacious patio and pool!  Beds were very comfortable and room a/c worked the best we have ever seen in a hotel room.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great and helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed our staff and hotel. We hope you travel back to us soon!

Summary: I loved my stay at Pepper Tree.  The best part was the sliding door to the balcony allowing fresh air and breeze into the room. The night view from the room was also pretty with lighting on the palm trees. The pool was clean and pleasant. The room was spotless and the kitchen added such an element of comfort with stove and refrigerator, tea kettle, etc.  The room was large with great decor. Also, service was great.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our home away from home feel and our large balconies! We hope you come back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a girls weekend get-away to celebrate my birthday. Room was great size with full kitchenette, enclosed patio, and a light up mirror and vanity big enough for 2-3 of us to use at the same time. Pool was perfect temperature! We had the pool to ourselves for a few hours on Saturday afternoon.  Only complaint we had is that our key cards kept not working, but the front desk was nearby and resolved the issue quickly!
Manager Response: We were happy to be apart of your celebration! Thanks for the great review and hope you can visit us again.

Summary Heading: Very nice for a visit at Disneyland, but you need an uber!
Summary: The staff is very friendly and helpful concerning distances, taxis, Uber… Thanks a lot!! Some more seats wood be good at the pool area! Nice, little and clean pool. Perfect for a trip with my 11 year old son. We‘ll come back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and the helpful tips. We are so happy that you enjoyed the pool. We are happy that you will be back.

Summary: Located in Anaheim, near Disney. It's a comfortable place to go to sleep. Complimentary breakfast. Good beds, room quite basic and small though. Good reception service in English and Spanish. Good pool.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed the location and our amenities. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very charming, quiet and clean place to stay.  We enjoyed this much more than recent stays at the mega chain hotels.  Much more relaxed. Thanks Only down side is that you request a 200 character review.  Please change this as it is very irritating.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and clean rooms. We appreciate your review and hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Not how it used to be.
Summary: My husband and I have been coming here at least once a year for the past 5 years. This year it was twice. This last trip was very disappointing, compared to our past visits here. Customer service was like average. We found a cricket in our bedroom one day, and we have never opened the patio/balcony door. We usually get a big dresser either outside or in the closest but we didn’t have one in our room this time. And after covid, the bottom floor is now for long term residence. And the back gated parking area is also reserved for them only. Since that change it’s not been the same. :(
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments as a repeat guest, and we are sorry that your stay was not as good as the past. We are sorry that the room was missing a big dresser and will inspect your room immediately to make sure it is meeting our standards. Since covid, we do have a few extended stay guests but they are not on the bottom floor and the back gated parking is not reserved for them only. Guests who book with us direct have the option for the gated parking area. Again, we are very sorry that we missed the mark this last stay and would hope that you would stay with us again. If you want more information, please reach out to us directly.

Summary: The rooms are very spacious, clean and the hotel is well located. Unfortunately it has the worst service I have seen in a very long time, nobody wants to help and employees have very bad attitude! I wanted to stay for an additional day, they ensured me that my room was reserved, to return in the morning just to pay for the extra day, but the next morning at 7am they told me that I had to leave, that I had no reservation!
Manager Response: We are very sorry about the mistake that was made. A new employee thought there was a room available when you requested it late that evening but in fact we did not have you room type available for the next day due to the busy weekend. We are very sorry. We will continue to work with our staff to improve their service but do receive many comments on their friendliness. Again, we are sorry about our mistake.

Summary: Great conveniently located hotel at a reasonable price. Staff are super friendly and helpful. The rooms have kitchens which are a must when family traveling. Would definitely recommend and come back some day.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay! Thank you for the kind review and recommendations. We will be happy to have you back!

Summary: We transferred from a Motel 6 that was horrid to this place and I felt like I was in a sweet little bungalow in Mexico. Some had stated the hotel was outdated, I felt like it was perfect just the way it was. Our room was exceptionally clean, having the kitchen made it super convenient and the bed and pillows were amazing. I slept like a baby here. The huge patio was nice too. Each staff person we encountered was amazing and friendly. All in all it was an excellent experience.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you found us and enjoyed our boutique charm! Thank you for the review and kind words. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This stay has been the most plecent stay I've had at a hotel yet! The workers were so kind and the whole place was neat and clean! The floor wasn't cold like I thought it'd be and the beds were superb! Not to mention that the amenities in our rooms were all great and the fridge was a great size! I'll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for the review. We are so honored to be the best hotel stay you have had yet. Come back soon!

Summary: Love the full kitchen, nice enclosed patio, pool was nice. Staff was friendly. Across the street from a groshery store. Parking is limited but there plenty of street parking near by. Check in and out was easy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the room, staff, and pool. We hope that you stay with us again.

Summary: Booked a King suite for my birthday weekend with my husband. Was called that night that our room had maintenance issues and needed to be moved to two queens (seemed like fulls). Hubs and I slept in separate beds. Lol  The bathtub felt like it was going to cave in and fall through the floor at any time.   Not the nicest place to stay on a romantic weekend away.  On a busy street so the balcony is nice but super noisy.
Manager Response: Again, we are so sorry for the inconvenience. We did give you a partial refund for the night to compensate you for not getting the room type that you booked.  We had no idea it was a special birthday weekend and would have loved to help you celebrate. We will make sure to check the bathroom in your room. We do apologize again for not getting our best.

Summary: The room was clean and nicely decorated. However, the walls were paper thin. The room next door was as loud as could be. There were screaming kids and banging kitchenette cabinets. Bed sheets were bad
Manager Response: We are happy that you enjoyed the style and cleanliness of the room. We are very sorry for the noisy neighbors. We do hope that you spoke with our front desk staff so they could help resolve the issue. We do appreciate your feedback and will use it to better our property.

Summary: I’ve stayed here previously and was very happy with the service, room and atmosphere.  I would recommend it to anyone traveling who is looking for a clean and inexpensive place.  The staff was friendly and helpful, especially Michael who was awesome!
Manager Response: Thank you being a repeat guest and for your recommendations. We love Michael too and will make sure that he sees your comments. We hope to have back again soon.

Summary: Photos and description didn't match the actual. Rooms need updated. Towels were stained and old. The front desk staff were friendly. No real food options nearby except subway and an Indian food restaurant.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay. Our management team will make sure to inspect your room immediately to ensure it is meeting our standards. We do apologize for not meeting your expectations.

Summary: Lovely hotel room! Very cozy and I will come back if I’m the area! One of my favorite hotel stays to this day. There’s something about a quaint little hotel that just warms my heart. So happy I chose to stay here.
Manager Response: We are honored to be one of your favorite hotels! Thank you!!  We are happy that you chose to stay with us too.

Summary: Hotel is rustic but that's what we loved about it! It was easy to find as well. Bed was very comfortable. Rooms were spacious and well equipped. Staff was very friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We will definitely be booking here again. Staff was friendly, property and room were clean. Anything we needed the staff was more than willing to help. The coffee bar in the morning was a great way to start the day.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the staff, room. and coffee bar. We hope your travels lead you back to us soon.

Summary: This hotel was the absolute best! It had everything we needed for our week long stay. The staff was professional and a pleasure to deal with. We will stay here again if we decide to vacation in the area.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the week with us. We would love to have you back.

Summary: I absolutely loved Pepper Tree! I wasn’t expecting the laundry (referred to in amenities) to be the laundromat across the street and the shower water pressure was fairly weak, but everything else was wonderful! If I’m ever back in Anaheim this will be my first choice.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so happy to be your #1 choice in Anaheim. We will make sure to check your shower immediately.

Summary: Was called a week to make sure we didn't need anything to make our stay more comfortable. Very nice lady checked us in. Very nice man brought our towels/supplies a few minutes after we called. The hotel is quiet and the rooms are a nice size. The pool was also clean and very nice. Recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed the rooms and our staff.  We would be thrilled to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Living it up at the Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: Second time me and my Hubby stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree and we had a great time. The staff goes above and beyond and were accommodating.Definitely recommending our friends and Family. Much love from Canada!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and recommendations! We love to hear from our repeat guests! We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: They charged me for a cover that was stained with "oil" but I assured them it was jello. They would have known if they washed it but waited till we left. No proof shown that it did but never again staying here.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you are upset about the extra fee charged for the stained bedspread which you told us was medicine. We only  add an extra fee when absolutely necessary and your group did ruin two bedspreads.  Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay. We do care about your comments and will inspect your rooms to make sure they are up to our hotel standards.

Summary: My family and I loved this hotel! So quaint and centrally located. Just minutes from Disney, Knotts, and Medieval Times.Owners have done a fantastic job with decor and the general vibe of the hotel. So much charm !!! We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique vibe and our convenient location. We can't wait to see you again.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree promotes themselves as a great Quality Hotel however this is not true at all. Their rooms smell terribly and their customer service is the worst, they constantly miscommunicate and deliver the incorrect information and don’t clean the rooms every day as promised. The restrooms are not clean, the room has a foul smell in the air conditioning is terrible. my family and I went on A trip to Disney and Decided that hotel Peppertree looked beautiful however upon our arrival things took a turn for the worst.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you feel this way about our hotel and staff. We do wish that you would have told us about the issues that you experienced. We would have done our best to resolve them and will inspect your room to make sure it is meeting our standards.  You did tell us that would leave a bad review about the security deposit taking longer to go back on your card than you thought. We did refund the whole amount the same day that you checked out, but it does depend on your bank on how long it is until you see the funds.  Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay.

Summary: This is our second time staying at hotel pepper tree. Great location. Good vibes. Disney land is 10 min away. Love the retro look it has as well. Great prices. Comfy bed, cold AC.  We didn’t catch breakfast this time but last time we did it was good. I would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a repeat guest!!! We love hearing from you and are so happy that you enjoyed your 2nd trip with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The Hotel was very welcoming and clean. The staff is wonderful and very helpful. The kitchens in the room are nice to have for a quick snack or meal. The pool was nice and not very busy.  Nice location, close to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and your helpful stay. We hope you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Had a good time with family on vacation it was a great stay here my family and I loved it here definitely will be coming back for our next trips to Orange County stay was a 5 star , loved the pool & cleanness to the hotel .
Manager Response: We are so happy that your family enjoyed our hotel and pool! We can't wait to see you again. Thank you for the review!

Summary: The location is very good, but there is no strainer in the sink and no garbage disposal. Water goes through the shower head weak. Hang the sign please clean up the room but nobody did for 3 days. The room smelled stink on the first day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location. Our new housekeeping schedule should have been explained to you upon check-in, and we do ask for you to contact the front desk so we can arrange any needed housekeeping. We will make sure to check the sink and shower. Again, thank you for the helpful feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay.  Loved the charm of the hotel and having a kitchen was so great!   The staff was very helpful and friendly.  I needed some more blankets and towels and they responded right away. We will definitely being staying here again.   Carrie ☺️
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words, Carrie! We can't wait to have you and your family back again.

Summary: The rooms are large and spacious. I had a standard queen room and it comes with a full Kitchen and enough space that there is a couch to lounge on. My room had a balcony with a fabulous view of the pool. Tons of restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our large rooms and balcony. Thanks for the review and helpful tip!

Summary: The hotel was clean and I appreciated the work taken in maintaining that level. BUT…the $200 deposit should have been disclosed up front. I have never stayed ANYWHERE with this sort of deposit on top of the total of about $353 per night for a regular double Queen room. This hotel is NOT that caliber. I would not have stayed there had I been aware.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful review. We are happy that you enjoyed our property, but we are also sorry that booking.com did not make our hotel policies more clear for you prior to your arrival. We also note the deposit on the hotel confirmation email we sent to you. We do take a deposit (just like an incidental hold on a credit card) due to our strict non-smoking policy and fully stocked kitchens. Again, we are thankful for your feedback and will talk with our management team regarding your comments. Please let us know if you need anything else or have any further questions.

Summary: Great little hotel in the middle of Anaheim that was perfect for us to visit the Disney parks and get up to L.A. easily with family. Coffee and breakfast bar was a nice touch and the pool was good for the kids.
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind and helpful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our location and amenities. We hope to see you again someday.

Summary: Beautiful stay will 100 percent return for next stay. Everything was really clean, super comfortable bed, loved that there was a kitchen already there so if you do choose to cook its an option. For the price it was totally worth it!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back!! It is so encouraging to hear about all the amenities that you enjoyed and that you found our property as a good value. We will see you again.

Summary: Close to everything in Orange County. Quiet neighborhood. Very friendly staff. Beautiful decor, hacienda style.  Spacy rooms. Great beds. Kitchen in room. Good Mexican supermarked across the street. Nice and secluded pool. I would not stay anywhere else in Southern California.
Manager Response: We don't want you to stay anywhere else either!! :) Thanks for the great review and helpful tips.

Summary: I’m a satisfied repeat customer at the Pepper Tree, where I stay when visiting my son who lives in Fullerton. Though lacking some of the amenities of the large chains, I prize its early-California ambience and decor, its friendly, helpful staff, its large, comfortable rooms, and especially its kitchenettes. Everything (Wi-Fi, A/C, hot water, appliances) works, it’s quiet, and there’s an excellent supermarket across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty! We love and appreciate our repeat guests. We will see you again soon.

Summary: Great hotel. The full kitchen is a huge plus for us when going on Disneyland trips because we bring food and water and have no problem keeping it cold. Also free Parking is huge since we do have to commute to the park it's nice to park free.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel and it made your Disneyland days easier. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Loved our stay here at the Hotel Pepper Tree, from the Spanish tiles to the beautiful flowers that grew alongside of the hotel. Customer service was a plus, checking in was no problem. Overall I would come back and stay here again!
Manager Response: We are always honored to be considered a home away from home! Thanks for the wonderful review.

Summary: Very clean, decor was very quaint and tasteful. Office staff was absolutely accommodating, more than any other hotel I’ve ever stayed at. The rooms were very quiet. The coffee bar-to-go was not bad. It had a machine that makes all kinds of coffees including lattes and cappuccinos. I would definitely stay again. 😊
Manager Response: We will be happy to have you back. Thanks for the helpful review and comments.

Summary: The rooms and hotel are lovely the only thing I would change is the sound proofing. You can hear everything from the rooms around you. The beds were comfy a little soft for my back. Also the water pressure sucked in the showers
Manager Response: Thank you!!  We are so happy to be you favorite hotel. We appreciate your helpful comments and will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: Came with my fiance to celebrate our engagement. The location was perfect for us. The room was very nice. We weren't expecting a private little outdoor area. We loved having a kitchen. Took advantage of the free coffee every morning. The staff were always helpful. We would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will stay again. Thanks for the review and congrats on the engagement!

Summary: The staff were all courteous and called me ahead of time to review the details of my stay. The hotel looked and smelled clean. Appropriate Covid-19 protocols were in place. The room itself was charming, clean, and smelled fresh. We were given a 1st floor room, so it had a private patio, which was really nice. The bed was firm, but comfortable. The pool was a good size. At night, it was really quiet and we got a great night’s sleep every night.  The taco stand across the street was recommended by the front desk and it was amazing.  I was genuinely sad leaving this place. It truly felt like a home away from home tucked in a little corner of Anaheim.  We will return again soon.
Manager Response: We love being a home away from home! Thanks for the great review and helpful tips. We would love to have you stay with us again someday.

Summary: I will definitely be coming back again and SOON. The staff was the best part of it. Mitsy, Destiny, Rick, and Tim (I forgot his name) they all were so helpful and knowledgeable. They were so much of a pleasure. the rooms were clean and convenient. The view was amazing and the pool was refreshing. Everything is locally very close. I am very pleased!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy that you will come back. See you soon!

Summary: Rooms were nice and clean. Bathroom was a little strange on where the door and sink were located but, whatever. Beds were probably the most comfortable hotel bed I have slept in. No complaints. Would stay here again. Also, at night there is a full fledged Taco making mobile setup across the street. They were excellent tacos.
Manager Response: We are so happy to surpass your expectations! We can't take credit for the amazing tacos but are so happy that you enjoyed the beds and clean room. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Loved everything about our lovely King room with roll away. My 18 year old said roll away was super comfy. The neighborhood is welcoming and made being away from home so.comfortable.  Loved the decor, the kitchen was great. Morning coffee bar was a treat.  Try Vallarta market and taco vendor across the street. Excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent and helpful review! We are so happy that you all enjoyed your stay and the local amenities. Come again soon.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay as it was close to Disney & the price was good!  The kitchenette was nice along with the couch to sit on. Could of used a wash cloth & another hand towel to do the dishes but we would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback! We will work with our management team regarding the additional kitchen supplies. We are so happy that you will come back.

Summary: Nice rooms, clean comfortable, great front desk people, friendly, helpful, close to the theme parks.  EI have stayed at Pepper Tree for business as well as pleasure.  I think my first stay was about twelve years ago!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are so happy and thankful to have your loyal business for 12 years!! We will see you again soon.

Summary: Staff are very friendly and helpful. The location is amazing, very close to everything. I am hoping that the entrance door will be close at all times especially like us who travel with kids, for safety reasons. But over all we will definitely come back and stay
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our stay and location! Thanks for your helpful comments. We would love to have you back.

Summary Heading: Convenient location, clean room, moderate price
Summary: I didn't have occasion to use the kitchen though the hotel is across the street from a Mexican grocery store. I ended up eating at the restaurants next door. The hotel wasn't too far from Disneyland, where I was meeting family but not wishing to tour the park as well as not far from shopping. My only objection to the hotel was the smell of the deodorizing cleaner which reeked of ammonia and the carpet (I personally prefer laminate or wood floors and tiles which feel more sanitary to me)
Manager Response: Thank you for you helpful feedback. We are sorry that the cleaning smell bothered you. We will make sure our housekeeping staff notes your comments. We are in the process of updating our flooring throughout the hotel. We hope you come back in the future.

Summary Heading: Highly recommended place to stay while visiting Anaheim
Summary: The hotel staff team is super friendly and helpful, as is often recommended by reviewers. The hotel is in a nice and convenient location, with a supermarket right across the street and a couple of restaurants within walking distance. Easy to get on the highway too!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful tips and great recommendations! Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We had a great stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. The decor was really cool. The kitchenette was very convenient. Our balcony was shady and spacious. The flowering trees and bushes were gorgeous. There are several great restaurants very close including Scratch Room (for breakfast or lunch), a Persian spot and a 24-7 halal fried chicken spot! The room was clean. Bed comfortable. Black out curtains worked. The bathroom was a little small. If you like a big bathroom or a fancy shower I would not stay here but that wasn't really important to us. I would stay here again if I were in Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back. Thank you for the great review and helpful tips. We are so happy that you enjoyed  our property and the local amenities.

Summary: The staff was incredible, the room was so clean, everything was literally perfect. The pool was also the nicest I’ve ever been in. Staying here to get to Disneyland was such a good place with distance and the staff genuinely care about safety and concerns guests may have.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are so happy that your stay was perfect. Come back soon.

Summary: Cozy property. Loved the balcony, kitchen was great use. A little older building, decoration is old world, but it felt nice. The bathroom could have been a little cleaner, I would rate this very good. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest and helpful feedback. We will be thrilled to have you back.  We will use your comments to better our service and property.

Summary Heading: A lovely "home away from home" personal retreat
Summary: From the moment you enter past the outdoor fountain and into the Spanish tiled lobby, you will feel the quiet and the welcome.  Every room is a mini-suite for much less than you would spend elsewhere!  Spacious rooms with Fully equipped kitchen,  separate dressing table area, large sofa, lamps.  You can request a garden floor with a lovely walled-in patio, trees, small outdoor fountain or a room with a balcony on the 2nd floor.  Very private.  Polite and friendly staff.  Free parking!  Excellent Persian restaurant with plentiful food next door.  Across the street is a full grocery store to stock up your refrigerator. I've been coming to this hotel since 2015.  It's the only hotel I use when going to Disney Resort or Anaheim Convention Center.  Far from the hectic busyness of the
Manager Response: We are thrilled to be your "home away from home"! That is truly our goal for each guests that enters. Thank you for the kind review and helpful tips. We miss you too! Come back soon.

Summary: Our stay was perfect. Everyone was so kind as soon as we got there, location was so close to everything as well. Room was clean, no issues there. Checking out was easy as well. Just waiting for the security fee to be refunded :)
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and hotel location. We are sorry for the delay on the refund - it all depends on your bank. We do hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We’ve stayed at this hotel a couple of times and the high quality of service and attention to detail remains . Staff is amazing and the rooms have been comfortable. I would for sure recommend this hotel .
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendations! We are so happy that we have being able to consistently provide you with great service. We will see you again!

Summary Heading: Nice old school feel and vibe
Summary: Kids loved the layout and as well as wife and I. Great experience. Room was big, had stove, microwave, couch, and a pretty big fridge. Most definitely will visit again for my next Orange County.  visit
Manager Response: We would love to have you back! We are happy that the whole family enjoyed your room. Come back soon.

Summary: We stayed here for our Disneyland honeymoon in Early 2020 and have come back 3 more times since. This definitely our favorite place when we are in town. Close to Disney, Knotts and just a 30 min drive to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back so often and thanks for the kind review! We love hearing from our repeat guests. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is my second time staying here and I love it! I feel at home with the way the room is set up. There is a grocery store across the street and I bought a few things and took advantage of using the stove to cook dinner. I wish I could stay longer!
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks for the helpful comments and tips. Come back soon and stay longer!!

Summary: For some reason whenever my partner and I go to a hotel and pay for late checkout there is always a problem. I mentioned this when I first booked and then again the morning of and still had no access to my room after “original checkout” my medication was in there and I had to take extra time to go back down and argue with someone about how I paid for late checkout.
Manager Response: We are so happy  that you enjoyed your stay. We are sorry about the issues and inconvenience with a later check-out. The keys could have not been extended for the few hours. We will work with our front desk staff regarding this. We do hope to have you back again in the future. Thank you for your helpful feedback.

Summary: We chose Hotel Pepper Tree because we needed something close to Disney Land. It was only a quick 10 minute drive. Staff were friendly and helpful with quick check in and out. Room was clean with a nice kitchenette.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that our hotel was a good fit for your Disneyland trip. We hope you can come back again soon.

Summary: Loved my stay.  Room was spacious and comfortable.  Check in and out were quick.  Staff was helpful and friendly . Deposit was refunded quickly.  I’ll definitely stay here again when I’m in the area. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the large rooms and our our friendly staff. Come back soon!

Summary: The room was nice and very sanitary inside. I typically stay at airbnbs and I've had some issues with mites a couple of times recently, even in upscale locations. There was nothing like that here. The kitchen area was perfect and the front desk was very accommodating. Next time I stay near Disney, I will stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy to have you back on your next Disney trip. Thanks for the kind review!

Summary: We loved our visit to Hotel Pepper Tree. We found the property very relaxing and quiet. We slept great  which was such a relief because there's often a small adjustment period whenever we sleep somewhere away from home.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you were able to sleep well and relax. We hope to see you again.

Summary: I initially had to travel  the first week when covid started and the stay was amazing. I had a return visit recently April 2022.  The Grab and Go Breakfast is not a grab and go breakfast, you get a cool coffee machine and tea to choose from but the breakfast part was a small cookie that did absolutely nothing to satiate hunger. For as much as it costs to stay here with so many fees, additional parking fee after one car " resort" fee.  Considering the neighborhood,  I would hope that the grab and go breakfast improves for future guests, and myself as I would like to return. Ive never seen security here and they are definitely needed, in the parking lot, lobby any public space as noisiness from guests/ groups  seemed to be unavoidable during my stay.. Also be wary that the
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback! We love to hear from our repeat guests. We have changed our breakfast option to a To-Go Coffee Bar but are going to add more items to our selection - your comments helped us. We are also increasing our housekeepings services. We do have security at the hotel every evening and security cameras throughout the property. We try our best to keep the noise levels down to a minimum and do remove problematic guests. Again, thank you again for your review. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: My wife decided to spend a night here for our anniversary because of the location. I informed the hotel of the occasion and they were SO nice to surprise us with balloons and a little hand-written card. Overall, the hotel was clean, safe, and hotel staff was friendly. I would definitely return.
Manager Response: We were honored to be a part of your anniversary celebrations! We would love to have you back again. Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Between the barking dog, permanent tenants slamming doors at all hours, and patrons singing at 2am... we didnt get much sleep. Breakfast bar was good on the first day and then they switched to cheap mexican pastries for the remaining week. All this coupled with no room service during our stay led to me thinking I way over-paid for this visit.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you were no satisfied. We are making updates to our To-Go Coffee Bar and increasing our housekeeping services. We are so sorry for the noise issues you experienced. We do our best to control the noise from the guests - we are sorry when we cannot reduce all of it. Thank you for your comments - we will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: Absolutely loved our stay. It was like our own little private apartment. Only complaint was the person above us stomping around all night the last night of our stay. And a few cigarette butts and dog poop on the patio. But, I don't blame the hotel for that. It wasn't that big of a deal overall. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thank for you feedback. We will make sure to look into your patio and work with our staff on these areas. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: We booked another hotel prior to staying here. It was not what we expected and HPT immediately got us set up, at the previous hotel we requested a pack'n'play...we showed up to extra blankets to make a bed on the floor for our 9 month old daughter. When we asked for one from HPT they personally messaged us to let us know they had placed on in there so it was ready when we showed up. The staff was super friendly, the whole hotel vibe gave off the feeling of vacation..and everyone around the hotel was super helpful and polite!
Manager Response: We were so happy to help you out on your trip to Anaheim! Thanks for the great review. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Had to go to San Pedro for a business visit but also visited family in Garden Grove. It was a good in between location for us. We really only slept here. But it was nice to have a kitchenette. Great place for the price.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad you enjoyed the room and the price.

Summary Heading: Exactly what we were looking for
Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree was perfect for our needs, which is my wife and two kids. The area is nice, the location is perfect for Knotts, Disneyland, or the beach, and the rooms are clean. The staff was also very friendly and accommodating. There was also plenty of parking. Would recommend to any friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendations! We are so happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay. Felt at Home!
Summary: My first impression when walking into the room was it felt very dated (felt like I stepped back into the 90s) and some of the furniture, mainly the couch and the chairs weren’t very comfortable to sit on for longer periods of time. However having said that, I actually really felt at home here. Love the fully functional kitchen and generally they provided lots of good amenities. The internet was hit and miss so that’s something to be mindful of. Staff was so kind and helpful and didn’t hesitate to do whatever was needs to ensure I had a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We are so happy that you felt at home during your stay and the that our staff was helpful. We will make sure that our management team sees your comments about the Wifi and looks for ways to improve our service. Thanks again for your comments. We will use them to better our property.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree at the bare minimum is an ok budget location if you are looking for a place to stay that's near Disneyland.  The room we were in was a good size, but some of the COVID-19 protocols, such as no housekeeping, should be reviewed for a better guest experience. As others have noted, walls here are paper thin.  You hear everything happening in the rooms next to you as well as any time people walk down the hall.  I called the front desk regarding a party in the next room that was blasting music at 2 a.m., but the noise didn't settle for at least 2 more hours.  The staff were friendly but communication is lacking.  When we arrived home after midnight, there was no parking remaining in the front lot.  We attempted to park in the back, but the gate was not open.  After
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry for the issues that you experienced during your stay and that we were unable to communicate with you directly during your visit. The front desk and management staff were in contact with the fire department during this incident to ensure the safety of our guests. Because the fire was located on the neighboring property and did not represent any danger to our hotel or our guests, the front desk did not initiate any of our emergency protocols.
