Most guests were asleep throughout the entire situation. We also apologize for the prior noise issue you experienced. We do our best to eliminate noise during quiet hours. We do appreciate your comments and will use them to better our hotel and staff. Again, we are sorry that your stay was not the best it could have been.

Summary: The Pepper Tree Anaheim was an okay hotel for my stay. I did not like the fact that the light on the patio did not turn off at night. The light came through the curtains and made it difficult to sleep. The bed was positioned directly across from the door, which also let in a lot of light. The room was not nearly dark enough to get a good night's sleep. The foot traffic in the hall was noisy at all times of the night. It was nice having a kitchen set up in the room. The water pressure in the shower was great. The bathroom itself was on the small side. There was a table with a make up mirror and closet in the hall just outside the bathroom that provided more than enough space for toiletries, clothes, & suitcase storage. The complimentary coffee bar in the morning was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough review and helpful feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed the full kitchen in your room and our friendly staff. We are sorry about the light issues in your room and will see inspect your room to see what we can do to resolve this. Thanks again for the comments. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Hotel has an older feel, but room was very clean. Balcony/ patio area was nice. Good to have the kitchen. Only issue was the faucet in the shower was loose and water would not go on. Front desk gave us a screw driver to tighten and then it worked fine. Would go back next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy enjoyed the private patio and full kitchen. We are sorry about the faucet and glad that the issue was resolved quickly. We would love to have you back in the future!

Summary: Although great room size and location, you could hear everything in the hallway and when someone’s door closed down the hallway it made ours rattle, waking us up each time this occurred. We slept with the TV on trying to block the noise and even tried stuffing towels under the door. Again, great room, not a great night sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed the room and our convenient location. We are sorry  for the noise issues you experienced and that you did not get the best sleep. We do have some areas that can be noisier than others. We hope that you will stay with us again, and we can give you a better experience. Thank you again for your helpful comments. We will use them to better our property.

Summary: This was a cute little hacienda style hotel. It had a nice rustic vibe. The downfalls however, were the location, the not so clean carpet, and the smoky smell throughout (even though smoking is supposedly prohibited...)
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest and helpful feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed our charm and style. We are sorry that you had issues with dirty carpets in your rooms. We will make sure to inspect and clean them immediately. We are in the process of switching our carpets throughout the property.  We are also sorry that there was a smoke smell near your room. We do prohibit smoking in the rooms and fight this problem aggressively. Again, we appreciate your comments and will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: Very nice room with kitchen; full size refrigerator and well stock kitchenette, small stove-oven, full size microwave. Comfortable and clean bed, large flat screen tv, a nice private patio. Could ask for better accommodations
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the kitchen in your room and the private patio. Come again soon.

Summary: We have stayed at many ‘boutique’ hotels.  This is not one.  This is a bland hotel that was refurbished to the best of its ability.  For $400 a night not worth the price. It is a step up from an entry level motel.  I will say it was very clean, but the old smell lingered.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations but happy that you found your room clean. You did stay with us when the prices are at their highest in Anaheim due to the Natural Products Expo. We are rarely priced at $400 per night but were still priced at a value compared to the other prices around the area. Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay. We wish that you would have spoken to us during your visit. If you would still want to speak with us, please call the hotel directly - we will be happy to help.

Summary: This is the best hidden gem I have found in Anaheim! I got way more than I was paying for, definitely amazing price! There is also a super cute smoke section that I really appreciated being there(: AND there is a delicious Al pastor stand across the street which made my night! I’m using this place for every stay in Orange County!
Manager Response: We are so honored to be a hidden gem. We are so happy to be our place in Orange County!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times over the last 8 years. In terms of value for money, comfort and an easy access location, you need look no further. The staff are friendly, helpful and very welcoming.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We love having our repeat guests keep coming back every year! Thank you for your loyalty. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This place was a awesome studio  clean, friendly, convenient to stores  restaurants ,one of the best places  that I’ve stayed at. Wroth the price per night reasonable. I rate it a 10 would go back for sure .
Manager Response: We would love to have you back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: ac/heater not working. asked to fix, nothing was done. not extra blankets offered for the cold nights.  floors are tittle and walls are stucco so it makes the room supper cold.   if you walk without shoes and socks you could see how dirty floors are.
Manager Response: We are sorry for the issues that you experienced during your stay. Our maintenance staff did inspect your ac/heater, and it was working correctly. We are sorry if you continued to have issues that we did know about. We did think everything was going well  with your stay because you did extend your reservation for an extra night.  We will make sure to inspect the floors in your room immediately and are sorry for the dirty floors. Again, we are sorry that your stay was not better. We will use your comments to better our property.

Summary: Very quick apartment style rooms. We had a first floor patio and we ate breakfast out there every morning it was awesome. The 24 hour self-service Mini Mart is a plus also! Would definitely recommend to my friends and family very close proximity to Disney
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recommendations and tips! We love those private patios too. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing Stay at Pepper Tree Hotel
Summary: My partner and I had a lovely stay at Pepper Tree Hotel, the room was BEAUTIFUL and spacious and the location is perfect for accessing major freeways and nearby attractions. 10/10! Had a great stay and would recommend for other couples or leisurely trips.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and our convenient location! Thank you so much for the 10 out of 10!! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Loved my stay. Downstairs with private patio. Staff so friendly and helpful. Would  highly recommend .  Room was clean and nice with kitchen.  Good location , close to everything. Worth staying at when traveling.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review! We love our private patio rooms too! Come back again soon.

Summary: Can’t be better, Rick and all staff was super friendly and hospitality was above and beyond!!! I stayed there for 7 months. Great location and great service  Thanks guys, can’t wait to come back for another long stay.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoy your extended stay visit with us! We are thankful to have guests like you. See you again!

Summary: place is clean and has a nice set up, does not look like a cheap hotel at all..  room is big and clean, lots of towels and a nice little sofa to watch tv from! the ONLY thing i have an issue with is the tv menu not working and the lack of PPV content ..
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful feedback. We will look into the tv menu issues immediately. We would love to have you back again soon!

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree was a great option for our family trip- we appreciated having the full kitchen, the private patio with the fountain, and the heated pool.  The staff was very kind, and the on-site snack shop had a good selection and was very convenient.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hallways had dog urine stains all over , I was harassed in the parking lot by a crazy man. Was not what I expected when I saw the ad for this hotel. My fiancé was terrified to sleep here that night
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the situation that happened in the parking lot on New Year's Eve.  Our security team did their best to diffuse the situation quickly, and we also gave you a full refund of your two night stay. Again, we are sorry that your stayed was upset by that random individual in the parking lot.

Summary: I was never told that the room had to be cleaned in order to receive security deposit back. They stated that the security deposit was only if the room was.destroyed or things were missing. Nothing was destroyed or missing and they still kept $60 of security deposit. So what do they have maids for and a kitchen. If they want it clean when u leave.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you feel this about your stay. We  did need to keep an extra cleaning fee because it took our housekeeping staff an extra 2 hours to clean your room after your one night stay. We will be happy to talk with you again or show pictures about this situation if needed.

Summary Heading: Happy with the place, but it needs some attentions.
Summary: Pros: I have been at this Hotel many times while I visit California. Very Happy with it. Good things are so many to count. But a few minor downsides of room 209 got me upset during my whole visit this December 2021.  Cons: Only a few negative true data which needs to be looked into:  1. Air con is running, but has no warm air while I stayed this December. Due to this covid time, I did not ask Hotel to repair it while I stayed there to avoid getting virus. Team need to look into it before new guests visit Room 209. Most likely freon is low. It is a obvious indication.  2. Room 209: Kitchen's countertop and cabinets(they) are too old(like 20 yr old items) and is not UPGRADED like other rooms like room 226. ThEY are completely out sync with the rest of new items like Fridge,
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We truly appreciate the comments from our repeat guests. We do wish that you would have told us about the heating/cooling unit. We will look into it immediately but it could not have been switched to the heat setting during you visit. We will make sure to inspect your room. Thank again for your comments. We will  use them to better our hotel. We do hope to see you again.

Summary: Stayed here for my 50th/daughter’s sweet 16 after our day out. Super cute place. Michael at the front desk was very Sweet and was excellent as a host. He even brought us cards, balloons and pastries to our room for our birthdays. It made us feel special, as though we were at home with family. Very clean and quiet. Close enough to Disneyland and Knotts. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We were so honored to be apart of your birthday celebrations! Thank you for the great review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay! Amazing staff and so accommodating!
Summary: I am a night shift travel nurse and I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Pepper Tree. The staff are amazing so very kind and so accumulating to my backward schedule. I cannot speak more highly of this location and the people that work there! I will definitely be staying here again! Thank you again to the staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for the sweet review. We were so happy to have you stay with us and sad to see you go. Come back and visit us again - but not for work! :)

Summary: We stayed here because we needed a kitchen to make our own food to accommodate a food allergy while traveling. Unfortunately, the stove in our room did not work. Staff was quick to help resolve but the stove still didn’t work during our stay. Otherwise, the stay would have been perfect. The pool was not as heated as we expected but it was nice. Staff are very friendly.
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the issue with your stove. We will look into why the situation wasn't fully resolved. Thank you for this helpful feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay regardless but are again sorry for the inconvenience.

Summary: This hotel has been our go to spot since 2017 and we always have an excellent stay. Great location not too far from places you want to visit especially Disneyland. Will continue to stay here whenever we plan a family vacation
Manager Response: We are always thrilled to hear from our repeat guests. Thanks for the review and your loyalty! Come again soon!

Summary: This place was so cute and very spacious! My family loved it.  Our only complaint would be that the sound from other people in the hallway was a little loud. There seemed to be a grab under the door where sound traveled under. Other than that it was excellent.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are so excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We will make sure to inspect the door to your room for any gaps.

Summary: The hotel was clean and the staff was so friendly.  The patio was perfect for our little pooch and our daughters loved the complimentary coffee bar. We also loved the Persian restaurant and the Vallarta grocery story across the street.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your entire family enjoyed their stay.  Thanks for the great tips.

Summary: Absolutely loved everything about the hotel! Loved the entrance with the fountains and fish. The doggie loved the patio! Comfortable bed. Cute kitchen. Great location and plenty of parking. Close to everything.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review! We can't wait to have you stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for our Anniversary. It was perfect with everything we needed to prepare small meals. A grocery store right across the street, hotel had free coffee bar on main floor and cute little patio! Only about an 11 min drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind and helpful review! We were honored to be apart of your anniversary celebrations! Come again.

Summary: Very spacious king room. Bed was good (and we are picky). Very friendly staff. Beautiful decor. Wish coffee started at 6am instead of 7, and that's the probably the only "negative" thing I can say. Great secure smoking area - very clean. We stayed 3 days and will come back. Check out The Scratch Room across the street for awesome breakfast from scratch.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and our friendly staff. We will make sure our management team sees your comments about the coffee bar. Thanks again for the helpful feedback and tips! We hope to have you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel before and had to come back. The area is wonderful and is right in the middle of everything. Wouldn’t have changed anything for our stay other than staying for a little longer!
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us again!! We hope you can stay longer next time. Thanks for the great review.

Summary: This place should be called the Pepper Palace because it is that awesome! Very large, comfortable room and beautiful/clean hotel. We enjoyed coffee from their to-go bar every morning on our balcony. Loved the decor and fountains throughout. Easy parking. Deep pool too! 🧜🏻‍♀️
Manager Response: Thanks for the fabulous review! We are happy that you so thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Come back soon!!

Summary: I visit family in Anaheim and prefer to stay away from the hubbub of the crowds and parks. This place is in a good location, clean, quiet, and safe. Free parking, free internet, friendly unobtrusive staff, a great Persian restaurant in the parking lot. I’ve stayed here multiple times over the years and recommend it to anyone who has a vehicle at their disposal and appreciates a good night’s sleep.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks for being so loyal and  for the recommendations. We will see you again soon.

Summary: Everything was very clean and very comfy not to far from the theme park! I would definitely stay again! We were supplied with everything we needed from towels to ice in freezer very nice staff and had no problems and good communication!
Manager Response: We would love to have you back! Thanks for the review and great feedback.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in Anaheim, will definitely be staying again soon
Summary: We stayed one night, but it was definitely the best night we had experienced in a while. I've been to many hotels but this one is my favorite so far. We plan too stay with Hotel Pepper Tree very soon.
Manager Response: We are so honored to be your favorite!!! Thanks so much for the amazing review. Come again soon!

Summary: This place is clean. The staff are very friendly. And it’s easy access to food and Disneyland. We love this little gem that is in the perfect location for everything Anaheim and Disneyland. Thank you for a great stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you loved your stay. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Had previously loved this place...will not be returning
Summary: I had stayed here previously and so have others in my family and always had a good experience....until this trip.   We stayed on the first floor the bed was so worn out it gave me a migraine.  Additionally, I tried to extend my stay one night (Sunday night) and they wanted me to check out, move to another room and charge me >$200 just for one night.  Needless to say I found another place to stay Sunday night. The pool hours state it opens at 9am, the concierge saw us ready and stated it doesn't open till 10am and would not budge.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review - we greatly appreciate hearing from our repeat guests. We are so sorry that you did not enjoy your stay. We wish that you would have spoken with us directly about the bed - we would have been happy to switch rooms. We are also sorry that we were not able to keep you in the same room. Because you booked your stay in our Accessible Room, we needed to honor the incoming reservation to that special room type. We are also sorry about the pool. Due to covid and staff changes, we did delay our pool hours. We will make sure all the signs are updated accordingly. Again, we are really disappointed that you will not be staying with us again. If you have any other questions, please let us know.

Summary: Yes  We really like this property. Parking and location great. No breakfast just coffee was disappointing when stayed in the past a great breakfast was provided. Rooms spacious. Night security present in parking area which is very nice
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and for being a repeat guest! We are so happy that you enjoyed our property and location. We did modify our breakfast due to covid. We do hope that you visit us again!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 days in October and enjoyed our stay. The service was great as everyone was very friendly and I had no issues. They offer complementary coffee in the mornings with delicious pastries.  My only complaint is that the bed was not that comfy and their pillows sucked too, but the rooms overall are nice for the price and the location is really great if you're looking to do Disney.
Manager Response: Thank so much for the review and helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the location and service. We are so sorry about the pillows - we wish you told us so we could give you better pillows during your stay. We will make sure to check the room for the things you mentioned.

Summary: Myself, my wife, and our five year old enjoyed our stay at the Hotel pepper Tree. The location was a short 10 minutes to Disneyland, had clean rooms, a nice pool, and friendly staff. The price was a little cheaper being farther from Disneyland but the neighborhood was safe and had good food choices close by. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for choosing our hotel for your Disneyland vacation! We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, price and rooms. We will be so happy to have you back again. Thanks for the review.

Summary: Absolutely marvelous! Everyone was so kind and helpful and the room was adorable and very well furnished! The view from the second floor was great we had a perfect look at the pool as well as our patio being very serene
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the kind review. We are so happy that you had a wonderful weekend and enjoyed our boutique charm. Come back soon.

Summary Heading: I always enjoy my stay here it's clean, friendly, quiet and peaceful.
Summary: Hotel staff is always very kind, helpful and friendly. I have been staying here for the past 10 years when i visit Socal and I never regret it. It's a great place to take my family and the cultural aspects depicted in the art and Spanish style architecture are just an added bonus. I reccomend all friends and strangers check this place out if you like clean affordable hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for being such a loyal guest! We truly appreciate your business over the years. Thanks for the review, and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: I found this hotel on Trip Adviser and am so happy I did.  We were meeting another couple that flew in from out of state and needed a place to stay in Anaheim.  We loved our stay.  The hotel is super clean, has a kitchenette with everything you need to make meals including pots/pans, dishes, silverware, etc.  The fridge/freezer was spotless.  Very large closet.  Bathroom was spotless as well.  Two large mirrors outside of the bathroom that can be used to put on make-up while someone else is showering in the bathroom.  Check in and check out was fast and easy and the people that helped us each time were very nice.   I highly recommend staying here.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you found us too! Thanks so much for the recommendations and helpful review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The only missing thing is that no one asked for any change of towels , linen and so. Maybe we should have put a request, but anyway the stay was good, we felt like home. Balcony is a great advantage.  Since marijuana is free in California, everywhere smells that unfortunately, not much we can do about it. The room is well organized , utensils and every piece of item has been thought , we had coffee, a nice fridge, electric stove, microwave, very comfy bed , and bathroom was also big enough
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. We appreciate the helpful feedback and love that you felt at home. We are currently suspending our housekeeping service due to Covid but will hopefully resume full service again in the future. We are also sorry about the marijuana smell - all of our rooms are non-smoking, and we try our best to minimize this issue. Thanks again for the review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It's nice to stay somewhere other than the generic chains, much more homey.  It was awesome having the little kitchen and large bath after long days at Disney, the beach, or whatever you get up to.  The pantry was OK, probably do to COVID that it felt a bit less magical than advertised but health and safety should always come first.
Manager Response: Thanks for the sweet review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our home-away-from-home feel. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will use it to better our property.

Summary: My husband and I were on a 3200 mile road trip. We have stayed at The Pepper Tree 3 other times and love that the employees are always nice and helpful, the location is perfect for what ever you want to do and the rooms are spacious and always clean.
Manager Response: We love hearing from repeat guests!! Thanks for the great review and helpful tips.

Summary: Quiet. Clean. Pleasant Staff. My room/kitchenette were the perfect size. Enjoyed the solitude this property provided. I Recommend this hotel. Also check in was easy. The Staff was helpful and pleasant.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that found the room to be perfect. Please come again!

Summary: Good location with beautiful surroundings. Very clean and tidy room, with classical furniture. Kitchen provided with all guests may need. Front desk staff were very friendly, cooperative did their best to make guests feel at home.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and home away from home feel. Thank so much for the review!

Summary: Better bed spread/cover would be nice. AC blowing directly over bed is not great design. Door not well insulated from corridor noise. Kitchen had all the right supplies. Like the shower soaps right on the wall.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback! We will make sure that our management team sees your suggestions. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: A beautiful place with great staff
Summary: The room was beautiful, the patio i had was beautiful. I would definitet come back and stay longer. I loved the kitcheb too I was able to cook instead of ordering out food. Would def recommend for a quiet get away
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and recommendations! We love or patios too. Thanks again!

Summary: We were looking for a clean hotel that had a bit more leg room than the average stay. We were there for 3 nights and this hotel held to our expectations.  Very clean rooms, comfy beds and pillows, convenient kitchenette, small full sized fridge, microwave and stove, as well as a HUGE closet. The only negative thing I can report is that the hall echos outside the door. It can be very loud if you have other guests unaware of how the sound carries. The hotel can remedy this by adding stripping to and around the door frames of each room. The restaurants within walking distance are absolutely fantastic. We will definitely be staying again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that we met your expectations. Thanks for the helpful feedback - we will use it to better our hotel. We are that we will see you again!

Summary: Hotel itself is quaint   Nice that it has the kitchen facilities. It has tile floor so VERY slippery when wet. Advice: wear slippers after showering. Bf fell coming out of bathroom  when front desk was told via chat…no apology given. Check your bank account as I was charged for incidentals and instead of not completing the transaction after our stay they went ahead and processed the amount. Peter had to refund the amount. Now need to wait 3-7 business days to get refund back in my bank.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and full kitchens. We are sorry for the slippery floor and that our front desk staff was not more accommodating.  We will work with our staff's communication. The refund time for incidentals is always 3-7 days (depending on the bank). We wish the process was faster - but it is out of our control. Thanks again for staying with us. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Service is great! I miss the previous look which looked more old-school in the rooms from previous stays. My only reason for the 4 versus 5 is probably a bit unfair as COVID-19 probably impacts this..but breakfast seemed to not be available whenever we came down for some around 9:30 am. Perhaps it ends after 9 am instead of 10? Another minor complaint, seems the TV guide in the room doesn't show the information about each channel. I recommend to friends to stay here each time, and look forward to coming back again in the future!
Manager Response: We look forward for you to return again soon! Thank you for your helpful review - we truly value the feedback from our repeat guests. We are immediately looking into the TV guide issue and should have it corrected shortly. We do have our To-Go Coffee Bar available each morning until 10am - due to all the changes over the past year+ we currently do not offer a full breakfast. Thanks again for your comments. We will use them to better our service. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The only issue we had was the mosquitoes when walking down the hallways. We were eaten up quite a bit. Everything else was good. Room was spacious with kitchenette. It was a quiet hotel. Parking was sufficient.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the spacious and quiet atmosphere. We are working diligently on the mosquito issue and are sorry for the inconvenience. We are constantly working on new was to reduce them and have made great improvements over the last week. Thanks again for the review - We hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Overall everything was good and I would definitely go back I’ve been there twice. With my job I travel to That area atleast once a month sometimes twice. I would like to talk to someone about working out a flat rate so that I could stay here once or twice a month for the right price.. So that at least I have a great place to stay and one less thing I have to worry about when traveling  Thank you
Manager Response: Thank for being such a great repeat guest! We would love to talk to you about a business rate - please give us a call before your next arrival. We are happy to work with our business travelers. Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: It was clean and staff were accommodating. My only concern is that both of the rooms we booked had mosquitoes in them, and half of my family is allergic to them(not deathly but have terrible reactions). So I wish Each room had some sort of bug zapper. And the AC control was hard to figure out so our room got really cold, but I’m sure if we asked that the staff would have helped figure it out.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review! We are very sorry about the mosquito issues. It is a problem for the entire area and we are working with county officials to help reduce the mosquitoes. We think we have found a new resource to reduce their population. We do hope that you visit us again to see the improvements.

Summary: We have stayed here once before and we certainly appreciated the care for our stay.   We like the Amenities the Hotel offers with the Eat in Kitchen and pool as well.. The location offers lots of access to lots of things / attractions nearby and the Staff is very friendly and helpful(Thank You Sandra). We hope to visit again soon
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us be a part of your anniversary celebration! We do hope to see you again soon. Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We enjoyed are staying at hotel pepper tree. I loved the building and all the flowers and small fountains in the front. We went to Disney land it isn’t far, but too far to walk (over 3 miles) and not a super cheap Uber ride. My only complaint is I felt as if they advertised complementary breakfast but they only offered drinks like coffee and tea and a small baked good. Thankfully the hotel felt safe and I never saw anything outside that looked sketch
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and are sorry about the confusion over out Coffee Bar. We do not offer or advertise a breakfast but will double check our information on various websites. Again, thanks for the review and your honest comments. We will use this to better our hotel.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel the night before going to Disneyland. The staff are super friendly and helpful, and the heated outdoor pool is really really lovely. The rooms are large and comfortable with nice couches for watching TV or relaxing. The little kitchen had a full oven/stove, fridge, kettle, coffee maker, a couple pans, some dishes and cutlery, as well as coffee and tea. I was sad that we only booked this hotel for one night because I'd like to stay here for longer. If you're looking for a cute and charming place to stay, I truly can not recommend this place enough.
Manager Response: We would love for you to stay longer! Thanks for the wonderful review and helpful tips.

Summary: The location was excellent, the people were pleasant and stay was comfortable with family. The location near the park with reasonable price tag makes this hotel a very good place to stay with family and kids where you prefer to have a kitchen ! Excellent reception as well.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you found the room comfortable and the kitchen useful. Come again soon!

Summary: The location was great and uixk access to a variety of places from dining, groceries, and tourist locations It was very peaceful and will visit again. My wife and I loved the kitchen the pool area was ok. We didnt get to eat any breakfast but there was a place across the street from hotel
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will visit again! We are glad that you enjoyed the kitchen.

Summary: We loved the look of the place, the Saltillo tile, the lush plants. The kitchen was great. We were able to make breakfast and sit out in the private patio to eat it. The bed was comfortable. Service was attentive but not intrusive. The only downside is the location. We thought it was within walking distance of Knott’s and, while it is, 2.5 miles is really long on a hot day. Also, there wasn’t really anything to see and do within walking distance. The food options were hole-in-the-wall strip mall ethnic restaurants, so if you are not familiar with very specific Asian fare, or you want ambiance, you will need to drive to another neighborhood. All-in-all, we had a restful, very comfortable, lovely visit!
Manager Response: Thanks fro the great review! We are so happy that you had a restful visit and were able to use the full kitchen each day! We appreciate your helpful comments and hope they help other potential guests. Come back again!

Summary Heading: Great stay for the whole family and the dog too!
Summary: A very quaint hotel, dog friendly too. Max spent more time in the room than the rest  of the family. Excellent air conditioner. Made our stay even better. Room was centrally located for all of our needs.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback! We are so glad that we were the right fight for your whole family!

Summary: I am the person that likes to take weekend getaways and stay at the no big name or brand hotels.   You seem to experience a different vibe, different ambience, a different je ne said qoi.  I have seen Hotel Pepper Tree on hotel  booking websites but, I never thought of going through the hotel website to see the pictures of the lobby, the rooms, and other amenities.   I would always go to the one hotels I had stayed in the past.  One of then been the Lemon Tree Hotel in Anaheim.   That hotel and the Hotel Pepoper Tree fall in the same category , they are boutique hotels and off something else to their guests.   My friend Manuel and I have not seen each other in a while in person due to the Corona Virus.   With the pandemics coming to and end, or as it looks,  We chose the city of
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and helpful feedback! We love those you venture out of the name brand hotels and are glad that you found better than you expected.  We would love for you to come back.

Summary: I traveled with my dog and needed a quiet, safe place for one night. This place was great: quiet, private outdoor patio, clean, comfortable bed. 5 stars. It’s hard to all of these in a pet friendly hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel.

Summary: The staff was really accommodating, we asked to extend our stay while we were there and they made it happen. The rooms were clean and you could opt into having the staff clean your rooms or opt out for COVID reasons.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and our helpful stay.

Summary: Everything about this hotel and stay was so nice, I highly recommend!! The location is great because everything is so close to you, the rooms are immaculate, and I love the little kitchens in the rooms!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and recommendations! We are so happy that you found the rooms to be immaculate. Come back again!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times. The rooms are always clean and the staff has always been extremely helpful and friendly.  We were there for 4 days and I enjoyed the amenities. The pool was lovely and the water temperature was great.
Manager Response: Thanks for being so loyal and the great review! We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Excellent stay as always.  Everything was clean and we received clean towels from the front desk as needed.  We always enjoy staying here when we visit our grandchildren.  Front desk is always friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We are so happy to help you visit your grandkids! Thanks for being such great repeat guests. See you again soon!

Summary: After reading some reviews I was hesitant on staying here - but I’m so glad we went anyway. The hotel is older, but I was immediately greeted by friendly staff and the room was much bigger than I expected! Having the full kitchen and pots/pans/utensils made for a very convenient stay where we were able to save money by making our meals before heading to Knotts. Beds were comfortable and we had a small balcony. Kids loved the heated pool and overall we will absolutely stay here from now on for our Anaheim trips! Place was quiet and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thanks Hotel Pepper Tree!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you chose to stay with us! Thanks for the great review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay but parking could be better.
Summary: My stay was great. The room was clean, the receptionist was exceptional and it was overall a smooth process. The only issue was parking. I booked for 4 guests total but was issued only one parking pass for my vehicle. We had 3 cars total so they had to park on the street which isn’t typical for a hotel. Also the hotel shares a parking lot with a restaurant which takes up most of the parking. Other than that, it was phenomenal
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the room and our staff. We are sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with the parking. There are times of the day when the parking will be busier than other times.  We do always allow one car per hotel room but may not be able to accommodate 4 cars for one room. Thanks again for your comments. We will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: First when I when I arrived. This weird guy was standing outside that kept walking back and forth to the entrance door looking very suspicious. Also when walking towards the entrance I noticed that the property needs lots of maintenance. When I arrived it didn't look that bad at the reception area but once I was checked in and started to headed towards my room. I started noticing things. The elevator was a bit scary and in bad condition. Once out of the elevator walking down the hallway I noticed the floors were very dirty. The carpet was lifted where the tile floor and carpet started. Not sure how the property management let's this go it looks very terrible. Once in the room at a glance looked clean but then I noticed the bathroom was ditty it had hair in the shower the sink
Manager Response: We are sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. We are always quick to refund anyone that decides our hotel is not right for them. We are aware in and the process of updating our carpet throughout the property - we are currently waiting for the right materials to make the switch. We are again sorry that we were not the right hotel for you.

Summary: It was a great stay! Met our needs and we booked early enough to get a great rate too. The building is older but has a lot of Spanish rustic charm. The one thing that would put it over the edge is if they had a breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your long stay with us and appreciated our boutique charm. We will resume our Coffee Bar soon. Come back again!

Summary Heading: Okay hotel that’s good if you have a dog
Summary: Overall it was a decent hotel. When I needed to talk to the service desk they were pleasant, however, there was a mix of adherence to the mask policy. The mask policy was posted and not enforced unfortunately. The room provided a small sponge and dish soap to wash your dishes.   A star was removed as the floor was absolutely disgusting. I understand it’s a pet hotel and people wear their shoes inside but if you walk barefoot in your room, your feet will get incredibly dirty. One night I forgot to put socks on as I walked around the room before a shower and the soles of my feet were black. It stained the tub. Gross. Please consider providing slippers.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review. We are sorry for the floor and will look into your room immediately. We wish that you would have notified us during your stay so we could resolve the issue. We are in the process of updating the flooring/carpeting in our rooms. Again, thank you for your feedback - we will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: We always stay at this property since my kid was 1 and now she is 6 yrs old:  friendly service, clean, close to every theme parks, close to shopping areas and very safe location.  Free parking and Wi-Fi which is a great plus before this place also offers grab and go breakfast but the COVID pandemic occurred and change of plan but it's understandable and we're okay with it. It would of been cool if they have firmer mattress/beds as option. Beside that it's a great service resort than those Vegas hotels back home!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for being such loyal guests! We appreciate your feedback and helpful tips. We will soon have our Coffee Bar up and running soon. We hope to see you again this summer!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay!!! Great room with terrace, great cafeteria and goddies. Excelent service at front Desk.
Summary: Excelent service, great location, wonderfull bed and kitchen. Very nice decorations.abd great en trance to the hotel with fountains And Fishes. Thank you for your service. I Will defenetly come back!!!
Manager Response: We would love to have you back! Thanks for the review.

Summary: Staff was very professional and courteous. Room #104 king size bed with kitchen was clean and very private. Parking could use some improvement based on number of spots available . I would stay at this location again and recommend others as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recommendations and helpful tips. Please come again soon!

Summary: We always stay at The Pepper Tree Hotel when we visit Anaheim. It always has the sweetest employees and they never fail to make our trips easy and painless. We always recommend family and friends to this hotel as well!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty and many recommendations! Our business has benefited from guests like you during this past year!! We are happy to have you back again and in the future.

Summary: It was nice and clean. AC worked perfectly fine! All amenities worked good as well. The parking lot is spacious for all guest to park their cars in the lot. I will definitely be staying here again, we loved it!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We would love to have you back!!

Summary: This was a great location and the room was so comfortable! Close to lots of local restaurants and the pool was quiet and relaxing. Loved having a full kitchen for our stay. Great for families! Will come back again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and relaxing pool. Come back soon!

Summary: The room was nice, very homey. The front check in lady was super nice and helpful, but besides that the stay was ok. The bed was uncomfortable but hey we just needed a place to sleep. The real thing that freaked me out was the rats running all over the balcony. Anytime we went out on the balcony a rat ran across the railing scaring me, pretty big rats too. Thats the city I guess but it wasnt very fun. Besides that we had a good time. For the price and how close it was to neighboring towns it was a good place to stay for a night.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your room and our front desk staff. We are very sorry for the rat issue. Construction for nearby has caused the issue but we are working extremely hard to eliminate them from our property. We do hope you try our hotel again in the future.

Summary Heading: Not the Best, Not the Worst
Summary: The aesthetic of the hotel is nice and the kitchen provided is also pretty neat. However, the service seemed almost nonexistent at times and rooms themselves also had their fair share of problems. Doors wouldn't close automatically behind you and they would also easily slam into walls if you weren't careful. The TVs also displayed no information for the channels provided and the fact that I had to go back to the Home for the TV every single time I wanted to change the channel proved to be more cumbersome than anything.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are looking into the TV issue immediately and should be able to resolve it quickly - we are sorry there was an error during your stay. We also look into the other issues you mention. Thank you for bringing these items to our attention. We are sorry for the inconvenience during your stay.

Summary: I loved the pet friendly option. Thanks to hotel peppertree we were able to take our fur baby with us on vacation. Despite it being pet friendly, it was still very clean. The atmosphere and look of the hotel was great!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback! We are so happy that your entire family could enjoy being together during your trip. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My partner and I really enjoyed staying at this hotel. The service was fast and friendly! Whatever we needed, whenever we needed it, the employees ensured they did the best they could to make it happen!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that our staff was friendly and helpful! Come again!

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree in between long-term living situations. We were hotel hopping for a long time around the area, but it wasn’t until we stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree that we found a place we loved, and a place that we could see ourselves being happy in for several months. This place has all of the amenities you could possibly need for easy living - including a fully-stocked kitchen, a sofa, coffee table and desk in the room, month-to-month and fully furnished rentals, a beautiful pool, a snack room, etc.. The hotel itself is very charming and is kept immaculately clean, which was more important to us than ever as we were there during the pandemic.  The management and staff takes pride in accommodating guests.  Rick, Sandra, and Misty all made us feel
Manager Response: We were so happy to have you both stay with us! Thank you so much for the wonderful and helpful review. We  so appreciate your recommendations and look forward to seeing you or your family in the future.

Summary: I always enjoy staying here. So when I had to book a family trip for my birthday, without hesitation I booked HPT. Service for check-in/out was fast and easy. Rooms were both cleaned and easy to locate!
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests!! Thanks for the wonderful review. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay at with minor cons
Summary: The room is pretty big with a yard and kitchen. The floor is half carpeted, and the other half paved with block tile? Overall is clean, but the duvet ( actually a blanket) is not clean enough. I was allergic to it. The area for makeup is quite big with a huge mirror, but it’s not fully lit up. The bathroom is tiny with a small tub, so I feel that their space arrangement is a bit confusing. The worst thing is their WiFi signal is really really really bad! I did a zoom meeting and the internet cut me in and out every 3 minutes!  Everything else is good. They allow dogs and that’s the best point.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback.  We are glad that you enjoyed the private patio and full kitchen. Our rooms do have carpet and saltillo tiles. We are so sorry about the WiFi issue that you experienced and hope that you contacted our customer service hotline to deal with the issues. Thank you again for the helpful comments. We will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: second stay at Pepper Tree  Love it! Very affordable and  walking distance from restaurants and convenient stores. Short drive to beach! My husband and I enjoyed the stay Very clean and friendly!  Thank you 😊
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests!! Thanks so much for the great review. We hope to see you again for a third stay.

Summary: If you've ever stayed at an Extended Stay Hotel, this is almost exactly like that in terms of quality and amenities. It's definitely serviceable; having a kitchen with the full fridge, microwave, and stovetop is always helpful, especially during Covid-19 restrictions where breakfast couldn't be made available. Front desk service was friendly and pleasant. I guess the only things made this hotel feel a little "budget" were the hard mattress/squishy pillow combo and the low water-pressure shower. I did like the environmentally responsible shampoo and conditioner dispensers in the shower. If they updated the beds and shower heads my stay would have been even better, but it still was a good experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback.  We are glad that you enjoyed the full kitchen and friendly staff. We will make sure to inspect your bed situation to ensure that is up to our standards. We do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: I have to say a zero worst hotel ever I woke up to a dead rat disgusting 🤮
Summary: I would post the picture of the dead rat but I can’t upload pictures don’t recommend this nasty “motel” and I didn’t even spend a night they only returned me 29 $ cheap as motel & very dirty never seen something like that before
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the dear rat that was found your outdoor patio. Due to some construction next door, it seems to have moved pests that are not normal  in our direction. We have since increased our pest control services. Again, we are sorry for the issue that was outside your room.

Summary Heading: A real Gem - large, well equipped rooms and Amazing Hospitality
Summary: Our room was clean and spacious, and equipped with everything we needed during our stay.  The front desk was super helpful and very friendly.   Overall I would rate this hotel as being exceptional value, and would not hesitate staying here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you will be back! See you soon!

Summary: Me and my boyfriend thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Everyone was extremely nice! I was able to switch rooms with no problem and I really enjoyed the scenery. The hotel is in great distance of beaches, malls and attractions. Will definitely return when I come back to long beach.
Manager Response: We are honored to be apart of your birthday celebrations and would love to have you back again. Thanks for the review!

Summary: Hotel is great & the staff was very friendly. We didn’t get very much sleep though because the people below us had music blasting till 3am all 3 nights we were there :/ Maybe a curfew and security????
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and staff. But, we are so sorry for the noisy neighbors you experienced. Our night staff and security do usually respond to noise issues, and we do not allow parties at the property.  We wish that you would have notified us of the noise that you experienced so we could stop it immediately. Again, we are sorry the inconveniences that you experienced but do hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is a cute hotel with a retro vibe. Super friendly staff and everything is amazingly clean. I really enjoyed the pool, too. I was on the first floor and had a nice, very private, patio.   The one thing I think could be improved is the comfort of the mattress and the hallway noise. It wasn't bad but could have been better, in that respect.  However,  I would stay here again. Very nice place.
Manager Response: We would love to have you back! Thanks for the review and helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and friendly staff. See you soon!

Summary: I've been to Hotel Pepper Tree a couple times. Usually I would stay here because it's close to Disneyland. However, the park had been closed since the pandemic, but even though I wasn't going there I still decided to stay here. Other than the Disneyland parks, I come down to socal often to visit family and friends. Even though it's a little farther away from the people I know, I still chose Hotel Pepper Tree because this place is really reliable in service and a great experience. This place is really nice as far as what you pay for. Honestly, you can't any other hotel that has rooms as big as these and with all the amenities in your room alone for the price. As amazing as the rooms are, what honestly keeps me coming back here is their customer service. The workers here have
Manager Response: Thank you for being such a loyal guest! We  love to hear the feedback from our repeat guests. We are so happy that you love our customer service! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The room was had everything you needed for an extended stay.  It was was very nice.  However, the carpet needs cleaning and there was construction happening in the room next to mine...hence the average to very good rating.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are happy o hear that you found the room suited for your stay. We will make sure to check your carpet immediately. Sorry about the construction. We are doing as much as we can to property during this down time. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is such a nice place to stay.  Only there one night but how nice to have the "little apartment" (really just a king room).  available.  Full refrigerator, ice trays, stove, dishes, ....everything!  The management was great...called me before my visit, super helpful when I was there and rec'd my "deposit" back into my bank account within 2 days........also btw, bed was super comfortable.....Thanks.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and will be back!! Thanks for the helpful tips.

Summary: Everything was good. The location was okay but everyone was nice and friendly. The pool was cool and relaxing. Iy was nice that only a few people at a time at the pool. The room was clean and spacious.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and our friendly staff. Come again soon!

Summary: The hotel room had everything we needed to get away and just relax.  It's not in the best or worst neighborhood and the hotel feels a bit dated but we enjoyed ourselves.  There are less expensive options in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. I liked that there was a full kitchen in the room to cook on the stove. Bring a baking dish if you plan to bake, but other than that everything was provided to cook a home cooked meal. The bed was not comfortable at all to me but they said the mattresses were purchased last year, and they were doing some construction so there was some hammering noises during the day. I ended up checking out earlier than anticipated and went to a more comfortable bed in a hotel nearby to get some rest. The decor had an old Spanish home feel which was interesting and I hear they have great margueritas. The restaurant is not inside the hotel, they are on the same lot but have separate parking spaces. Bathroom and kitchen are narrow and bedroom area is pretty big.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff and large rooms with kitchens. We will check your bed again and are sorry that it was not your preference. We will make sure to use our comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Walking in it is such a cute place, but when it came down to the experience id say it was less than average. My boyfriend and I both stepped on little shards of glass at separate times and the shower knobs are falling apart. If you are a light sleeper be warned now that the walls are so thin you can hear anything any everything that anyone is doing. There were also strange colored stains on the curtains and other parts of the room. Each of these issues were documented with pictures aswell besides the noise issues. Its an okay place to crash for a night i guess.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are sorry that you did not receive our best during your stay. We did take care of the issues in your room immediately and are sorry for the issues you experienced.  We also gave you a refund because you were not fully satisfied.  Thank you again for your feedback - we will use it to better our staff and property.

Summary: I loved staying here. The rooms are very spacious and the kitchenette has everything you need to cook. And it's very close to disneyland and there is a grocery store across the street. I will definitely be staying here again when I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the large room and full kitchens. We would love to have you back soon!

Summary: Upon checking into the hotel there was no one at the service desk.  I waited about 2 minutes in complete silence before feeling something was wrong.  There was no bell to ring which made it even more awkward.  There was no sign from management saying the desk attendant would return in a moment -- nothing.  I was checking in at night so it compounded the inconvenience of it all.  I finally had to call out, 'hellllo???' Before some voice on the second floor said they were 'coming'.  A young man emerged from the elevator out of uniform, in a regular sweatshirt and jeans and asked how can i help you.  Strange and creepy!  My first reaction was that he did not work for the hotel, and to get out of there! He took a long time to check me in and then didn't even apologize for the wait.
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We are sorry for the delay in service that you experienced late at night. Due to Covid, our staff is limited. We will make sure to remind our staff to put a sign at the front desk when they are off helping guests elsewhere on the property. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and would still be happy to talk with you regarding your experience. Please contact us directly so we can help resolve your frustrations. We will use your comments to better train our night staff.

Summary: Has everything you need to get away from the normal everyday life. I really enjoyed this hotel/studio and was very impressed. The staff was extremely nice and attentive to our needs. This is my new favorite hotel in the Orange County area
Manager Response: We are so happy to be your favorite!!! Thanks for the great review. We will be so happy to have you back.

Summary: When ever we come to California  this is one of the places we always stay. Convince. Near Grocery  Store,food,gas..Always friendly staff.I really enjoyed  the courtyard room view..on previous  stay we had the balcony  room.But I prefer this view much better
Manager Response: Thank you for being such loyal repeat guests! We are so glad that you enjoyed the courtyards - they are our favorites too! We will see you again soon.

Summary: Beautiful rooms and good location... I had a problem with double booking by mistake and they were kind enough to cooperate....unfortunately they don’t allow smoking on their beautiful balconies! These hotels miss the purpose of balconies... don’t get it! Some of the front desks employees are nice but some are dry!  Overall it is a nice hotel and still has its authentic style and spirit... would stay there again for sure!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back. Thanks for the helpful feedback. We do not allow smoking on the balconies for the comfort and safety of all our guests. Again, thank you for your review and comments. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: The Hotel it’s self is super cute. I LOVE the balcony especially from the room I had because it overlooked the pool and the Main Street instead of an ugly apt building and parking lot on the back side. The room, well I like the studio style but the floor wasnt vacuumed thoroughly and the bed had bed bugs and wasn’t made properly. Walking barefoot in the room led to dirty bath mat before even getting in the shower and then dirty water once you step in the tub with the water running..gross. Also feel more could of done with the bathroom and that little hall way with the closet and dresser. Bathroom could have been bigger and a nicer shower and the ventilation in there is pretty bad. I take hot showers and it’s like I couldn’t breath. Decor could be a lot better. I see a lot of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the private balcony and our boutique charm. We are sorry that you experienced some issues with your room. We wish that you would have told us during your stay, so we could resolve the issues. We will make sure to work with our housekeeping team. Thank you again for your feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: staff was super helpful and friendly. loved everything about my stay from the decor and layout of my room. Overall i was very comfortable and happy, I will be staying here again soon. Also i loved my balcony space and kitchen everything worked great and i felt safe.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy that you will be back. Come again soon!

Summary: This was my second time staying at Hotel Pepper Tree. I love the convenient location and the amenities the rooms offer. Both stays I've booked a courtyard 2-queen suite and enjoy being able to open the patio door and sit outside. The kitchen area is perfect since I travel with my senior dachshund and he eats homemade food which requires refrigeration. The fridge is large enough to also keep my leftovers and plenty of bottled water cold. The rooms are large, the beds and pillows are comfortable, and the hotel is charming. Will be back next month!
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks for the kind words and helpful tips. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Went 30 miles out of LA for a fun little staycation. Glad I decided to come here. The place is as cute as the pictures. Didn't have any issues with anything. Just loved the balcony and the little kitchenette! Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: We would love to have you back soon! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: I stayed here for 3 months working nearby and it was a smooth stay. Concierge services were always available helping out. All utilities are included and there is a kitchen if you need to cook. Parking is pretty easy on the premise as well. It is beneficial also that you are not locked into a long term lease. I highly recommend this.
Manager Response: We were so happy to have you stay with us. Thanks for the recommendations.

Summary: Pictures from website as well as pictures on hotels.com are very outdated. Hotel no longer looks that way and is a little messy in the front of the hotel. Also there were bugs in our room that made the stay feel a little less clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We are sorry that you did not feel that the pictures represented our property. We are sorry for the mosquitos - we are working on this issues that is prevalent in Anaheim.

Summary: It was great stay, as usual.  Room was clean and staff was very kind.  I can use kettle in the kitchen, but i didn't see it for last a couple of stays.  There is not much more i can expect from Hotel Pepper Tree.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great stay! We love hearing from our repeat guests. We will make sure to take with our management team about the kettles. Thanks again for staying with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: New flooring, blankets and wall and cabinet paint would go a long way in making this place more pleasant to stay at. I liked the cultural vibe it had, only needs some updating. Since it has full kitchens there's cooking smells around which can be off-putting, so better ventilation would be another good thing to update.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are happy that you enjoy the cultural charm of our hotel. We will look into the other items that you mentioned. Thanks again the comments and suggestions.

Summary: The premises was outdated. Did not look like the pictures. The lobby was hot and smelled like B.O. There was a bug zapper behind the check in desk. The AC wasn’t working well in the lobby and I got bit 4 times by mosquitos in 7 minutes while waiting to be checked in. When we went to our room, the AC wasn’t working. I was told that all AC units were like that. The bedding was old and gross. We ended up getting a refund and leaving.
Manager Response: We are sorry that the property did not meet your expectations and that you did not stay at the property. We were happy to refund your stay immediately.

Summary: Everything was wonderful ! check in was simple and the employee checking us in was very sweet. the room was perfect , it was very clean , cozy , and felt more like staying at a home than a hotel . would definitely stay here again and would recommend to others
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We absolutely love being a home away from home. We hope to see you again and are so thankful for your recommendations!

Summary: Ac works great a place that u can probably  call home rooms are huge with patio theres also a nice smoking section and plenty of parking i forgot theres also a big space closet to store your bags this place is the shhh
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so glad that you enjoyed our large rooms and private patios. We love being a home away from home to our guests.

Summary: My girlfriend and I rented a room here for (what was supposed to be) 30 days. The room was very nice, the kitchen had a stove a fridge pretty much all you need out of a kitchen and i can only speak for the bottom floor but the porch was nice to relax on while being private with a big wall around it. That being said, our third day there an employee called our room and told us we would need to be out by noon (it was 10am and we had been sleeping in, so we were awoken by this call) when i asked why I was told there would be an inspection. When i went up to the front desk to inquire why there would be an inspection, a different employee corrected what the previous employee had said by saying they needed to come into the room to clean. I was told we could not be there during this
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the room, full kitchen, and private patio, but we are sorry that you were disappointed during your stay. According to the third party with which you booked, your stay was only 24 nights. We did not kick you out or ask you to leave early. You were only asked to leave on the predetermined check-out date. We are sorry for the confusion but happy to show you the reservation confirmation from booking.com. You can also find the information regarding our resort fee on your confirmation email that you received when you booked the room. Due to our updated COVID-19 housekeeping and safety procedures, we do service the room only ever 4th day of your stay (not 3rd). If you do not wish to have the room serviced, we will still inspect the room to ensure that everything is still safe and sanitary. We did mention the exposed needles in the trash can because we are extremely cautious about these situations and work hard to ensure the safest possible environment for our cleaning staff. Again, we are sorry for your confusion about your reservation. We have tried to speak with you to clarify and resolve this situation. Please feel free to contact us or booking.com again if you still have questions.

Summary: I used to go there with my sons. My son suffers from PTSD and has a legal letter from his psychiatrist and a ADA animal support registration card. The hotel refused to honor my son's disability and insisted that our animal was not a service dog. I explained that my son's anxiety is decreased when he holds his dog and comforts it (he then becomes focused and calm).  I was asked to pay an animal service fee. I paid the fee, but expressed my concern for lack of support for mental health treatment and aids. I felt discriminated!  WE decided to stay away from the hotel for a year. I booked the hotel and on the day of check in was told that we were banned from staying at the hotel.  Not only were we discriminated last time, but marginalized with a permanent ban from the hotel. My sons
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that you are upset by our policies. According to Title II and Title III of ADA, support animals are not considered service dogs. Because of this, all support animals still need to pay the nightly pet fee. In addition to this issue, we have had issues with you in the past with credit card dispute claims. Because of this, we did not choose to rent to you at this time. Again, we are sorry for the inconvenience.

Summary Heading: Very good overall but had some concerns
Summary: The stay was overall very good however my significant other and I were bit up every day and we didn’t leave the room. So I’m wondering if it was mosquitos or spiders. I also caught a glimpse of a mouse on our patio thankfully we kept the sliding doors closed as it was hot but it was a little worrisome.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and are sorry for the mosquito issue. We are working with our pest control team to stop them due to their huge prevalence in Anaheim right now. We will make sure inspect your room and immediately. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: Great service, easy to check in and out. Easy covid-19 disclaimer to understand. I love staying here no matter how long the stay. It is close to everything we need for a trip, can not wait to return!!
Manager Response: We would love to have you back again! Thanks for the review.

Summary: I loved the room we did stay in. Fridge and oven and sink with the amenities that came with it was excellent. Little glitches however but to be honest, nothing to complain about or couldn't be fixed. However I did reserve a King room but I imagine due to the very late check in we did after midnight, I understood why we got 2 queen room instead. Would love to try a King next time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. Due to our Covid policies and vacating our rooms for 24hrs, we do sometimes have to switch room types. We are sorry for the inconvenience. We hope we can see you back at the hotel again.

Summary: This was the first time staying at Hotel Pepper Tree and it most certainly will not be our last.  My husband and our 2 children (8 & 16 year olds) were very impressed with how spacious the kitchen studio room was.  We are so used to staying at hotels that have the bathroom directly adjacent to the entrance door of our room.  Imagine our surprise when we saw a hallway leading to the bathroom!  The hallway to the bathroom with a full size closet and dressers are a great touch and feels more like home than a hotel.  We absolutely loved the patio and since we were taking a break from Arizona heat, we really enjoyed being able to relax in the cool weather out on the patio night and/or day during our stay.  Staff from the beginning to the end of our stay were friendly, professional
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review!! We are so happy that you will be back.

Summary: The rooms are gorgeous and it has everything all the cook wear and pots full set of dishes the design of the entire place is so lovely and the patio i love so much it had its own water fall the furniture very stunning
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and private patio. We hope you come back again soon!

Summary: we enjoyed our stay. a little disappointed that we couldn't use the pool or the bbq facilities due to the covid 19 but that was understandable. we would definitely would stay again next time we travel to California.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We are sorry that the pool is closed too and hope things can reopen soon. We would love to have you back again!

Summary Heading: Floor dirty, WiFi slow, and a roach in the kitchen
Summary: I loved staying here and getting away for the weekend but this place let themselves go with cleanliness.There was some trash under the bed as well. I would think since we are in a pandemic cleaning the rooms would be top priority but I guess it's not.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We really appreciate comments from our repeat guests. We are sorry that this stay was not as good as you other stays. The safety of our guests and the cleanliness of our rooms is and always has been the top priority of our hotel. We are looking into you room immediately and working with our staff. Again we are sorry that you did not receive our best service.

Summary: when i arrived to the hotel i was checked into a room where there was water leaking from the ceiling through a light fixture and on to the carpet, which is not only terrible but also extremely dangerous. i got moved into different room a few doors down i had to request new sheets on the bed because there were stains on them. i thought it was just one or two gnats/flies in my room but upon looking on the cieling there were upwards of 10-15 gnats just living in the room, which once i washed dishes they all gravitated toward the water in the sink. no maid cleaned my room not even once all week which is ridiculous, i got no new towels either. i thought maybe the maids only clean every other day or maybe they only clean rooms with the "come in" tag left on the doorknob, turns out
Manager Response: We are very sorry for the poor experience you had at our hotel and the leak caused by the guest above you. We are working with our management team about the issues you experienced during your stay. Our housekeeping staff is not currently servicing rooms due to COVID. We have notified all of our guests before arrival and during check-in about the modifications that have been made during this unique season. You were told to contact the front desk if you needed more towels, trash, etc. There is no sitting water around the hotel but here are fountains that are maintained and treated for mosquitos. Again, we are sorry for the issues you experienced. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Hotel Pepper tree is my go to when i am visiting Anaheim. I love the feel of the room and its a very cozy  stay. The pool is also great! Everything was very sterile for the COVID-19 as well. This wont be my last stay either.  Thanks again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you will be back with us again!

Summary: Second visit to this facility. Wonderfully attentive, friendly and acommodating staff. Great and very comfortable room plus quite convenient for pet owners. Love the first floor rooms, which afford the convenience of providing enclosed patios which allows pets access in a safe surrounding.
Manager Response: We love hearing from repeat guests! Thanks for the amazing review. We love the Courtyard Studios the best too!

Summary: Hotel staff not nice nor professional!  The pool was supposedly was closed due to Cove19 , no notes placed anywhere our key has opened the gate for the pool about 10 mins later about 5 hotel staff came in as if we where in trouble asked us rudely for out room key and number and questioned how we entered the pool ! Definitely not fair also made a remark “no smoking “ when no one was smoking
Manager Response: We are sorry for the confusion that you experienced during your visit. Our staff was in the middle of updating the locks and notices on the pool due to the  COVID regulations when you entered the pool. We are sorry for the surprised and confused responses from our staff. We do hope that you will give us a second chance and come visit us again.

Summary Heading: The outside could use a lot of work
Summary: The parking lot is occupied by a long out of business stand alone restaurant that has been vandalized. The fountain in front is atrocious.  The front service woman was excellent. The room was clean. The patio could use some work in maintenance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed the room and our staff. The restaurant out front did just close due to the crisis we are in the middle of but has not been vandalized. We are confused why you think the fountains out front are atrocious. We will make sure to inspect the things you mentioned but are not sure that your comments accurately portray our property.

Summary: Honestly better than my expectations. It's a little studio but once inside very spacious. Everything was provided for us. A cute little balcony outside as well. It was a very relaxing stay. I will definitely be back again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your recent stay was even better that you expected! We can't wait to have you back. Thanks for the great review.

Summary: The staff was extremely helpful & accommodating. I have stayed at several hotels in the area this is by far my favorite one. Located near good restaurants within walking distance.
