Nice quite area. The rooms were very clean and just as they should be. I will definitely be staying here again. Would recommend to my friends & family for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review and recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: A comfortable stay with a clean kitchen
Summary: Speaking as a member of a food allergy family, it’s nice to be able to stay at A location that has its own small little kitchen that you can cook with. The hotel does provide utensils, pots, and pans for the electric stove / oven that’s in your room, but you’re more than welcome to bring your own items with you if you’re concerned about cross contamination or allergen-residue.   The staff has always been hospitable and would help you however they are able to at a moments notice.   The room looks a little dated but overall, no real complaints except for a little dust here and there, but the staff is more than willing to resolve that issue.   Location wise, it’s convenient to many of the touristy destinations in the area (if they aren’t closed because of COVID-19). But, when they
Manager Response: Thank you so  much for the helpful tips and review. We are so happy that you were able to use the kitchen and that it was helpful for the need of your family. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I love my stay there! 2nd time most likely coming back for a third!! The staff is wonderful and friendly!! The environment is nice safe and quiet i almost felt bad because I watch TV kinda loud, due to my hearing. Lol. I'm unsure of her name but the lady who has helped me in the front desk, both times and also with checking out is so friendly and I thank her for being so kind with me. I thank all of your staff for putting up with me the past two weeks. See you guys soon =]
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests and can't wait to have you back again. Thanks for the great review. We will see you soon!

Summary: This clean little hotel is darling and the staff is friendly(Cameron was particularly helpful!). Very good location, as it has everything nearby.  The kitchenettes are conveniently stocked with cookware and utensils. Perfect for families or small get aways. Will be returning in the future.
Manager Response: We will be happy to have you back! Thanks for the great and helpful review.

Summary: It was a lovely stay! Everything was perfect! Will return soon...Lived  the location, staff was amazing.  The grounds were clean bright & beautiful. My room was simply perfect bright clean and spacious. I had everything I needed. I will return very soon.
Manager Response: We are honored to be apart of your birthday celebration and would love to see you again soon. Thanks for the great review!!

Summary: The hotel was so beautiful. The rooms are very cute, so many places to eat around the hotel (even a restuarant on the property.) It was quiet and the beds were comfortable. The staff is amazing. Very friendly and approachable. I enjoyed my stay, I have referred this place to so many friends, family and co worker. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the wonderful review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay, the staff, and convenient location. We would love to have you back again soon!

Summary: Family travel. I found this place after searching for a decent hotel that had a good kitchen and wasn't overpriced. So happy I did they walked me through changing my reservation to booking with the hotel directly which saved me more money. Beautiful room enclosed patio the courtyard room I highly reccomend. The staff is very attentive and kind
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words and recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen and private patios. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I found this hotel online and went with it because I wanted to be able to have a kitchen and cook instead of dining out. Room was nice and clean. All the things I needed to make small meals were available.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us!  We are so glad that you enjoyed the full kitchen. We  hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I was in town for one evening and needed an affordable stay in Anaheim.  I placed my trust in the Hotels.com review and selected the Hotel Pepper Tree and was impressed with the accommodations.  The neighbourhood is so so, but it is close to the major attractions, so if you're a family with kids this is a great option.  The rooms are large, clean and come with comfortably equipped kitchens so a long stay is perfect for this place. The staff is friendly and helpful and I would definitely consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review and feedback! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to have you again in the future!

Summary: We like a lot that we had a kitchen and the room was very spacious, but as good as everything was, we had a hard time at night, there was guest going in and out and we heard everything. Every time they opened or closed their doors it sounded like if it was our own door, specially when they slammed their door, so most of the time. Overall, it didn't matter how good the rooms were. We hardly will be going back
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the large rooms and full kitchens. We are sorry for the noise issues that you experienced.  We hope that you were able to speak with the front desk so we could help resolve any issues or move you to a different area of the hotel. Thanks for your comments. We will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: This place was perfect for us. We were celebrating my daughter's 16th birthday with a trip to Disneyland. The hotel was tucked away from everything busy, but close enough to not be inconvenient. It was clean. The room was spacious. It was great to have the kitchen amenities available. The staff was kind and responsive. Best part... I had put a note in our reservation that we were celebrating my daughter's birthday. They had a "happy birthday" balloon, treat, and a card signed by the staff waiting for her in the room. She was thrilled!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We were so honored to be apart of your birthday celebrations. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: This is an interesting hotel. A bit tired but cared for. Front desk staff are pleasant and helpful. Coffee was very good in the morning. Awesome nearby restaurants. Try the Thai place a block away. Bed was comfortable. It was nice to have a kitchen and balcony. Very comfortable. Bathroom was a bit worn. Price was great. There is free parking and easy access to amusement parks.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and helpful feedback! We are so glad that you enjoyed your room. our To-Go Breakfast, and our convenient location.  Thanks again for your helpful comments - we will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: The hotel location is convenient, there is a super market nearby & a restaurant. It is very cozy and the rooms are clean and spacious. You feel that you are at home. There is a small kitchen in the room which make the life easier.
Manager Response: Thanks for the nice review. We are so glad that you felt at home during your stay. We hope that you come back again!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay. Staff was friendly. Room was clean , spacious and comfortable. The price was great and same for the location. If you’re looking for a nice place to stay. This is the place for you. I’ll be back
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Great stay for our family of 3 plus dog
Summary: This place was perfect for our family to stay while we geared up for an out of state move. The kitchen allowed us to make dinners, the free coffee breakfast bar helped, and the 24/7 convenience store inside the hotel was great for picking up quick snacks for my four year old.  We were given a nice downstairs unit right next to the doggie relieving area and at the end of a hallway which is good for my sometimes noisy 4 year old.     We had trouble with out bathtub stopper and they came right over and fixed it so my daughter could take a bubble bath during our stay.  And good price. I found it cheaper to book directly on their site than anywhere else!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your helpful review and tips. We are so glad that you had an easy transition during your move. We always do recommend booking direct to get the best deal! Best wishes on your move into a new state!

Summary: There is a clear difference between pictures and reality.  it should have been even cleaner.  a mosquito net is a must.  can not sleep comfortably in human.  breakfast is very very weak, it seems to exist but not like.  staff is good.  but as I mentioned, there is a difference between what is seen in the photos and the truth.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will look into your comments and make sure to use them to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: You didn't make me feel weird about my mountain bike and there was ice in the ice trays
Summary: recently I had a birthday and I treated myself to a nice little room over at a hotel that has been near my home for sometime, boy was I surprised I booked the room and was treated well from the moment I got on the phone with a representative at the hotel till the moment I left the premises and the gardener wave goodbye to me I can't say too many good things about this experience
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your staycation! Thanks for the great review. We hope that you can visit again.

Summary: The Pepper Tree Hotel has a fantastic staff and well maintained facility.  The service and hospitality kept our family coming back time and again.  The other benefits of the Pepper Tree are the full kitchen and convenience to local shopping.  It is a wonderful place for families to stay within a 10 minute drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a great, repeat guest! Thanks for the helpful tips and review.

Summary: Great small hotels. The room with the kitchenette and balcony was nice, with some nice view. Breakfast is more like a coffee bar (no real breakfast). The beds were comfy, the furniture is ok. It has some nice rustic feel with Native Americans theme wrapped around it. Recommended for your travels to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm. We do just offer our To-Go Breakfast  every morning and each room has a full kitchen with which you can make a full breakfast. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Cute hotel perfect for Disneyland trip
Summary: We stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree in February while we went to Disneyland for 3 days. The hotel was perfect for our stay. The room was large enough for my husband, son and I and all our luggage and souvenirs from Disneyland. The reviews that the beds and pillows are comfortable are completely true. We all slept well (and needed good sleep!) after spending hours in the parks. The room was clean and cozy. The reviews that the doors are thin and you can hear people in the hallway is true - especially the cleaning cart thudding on the tiled hallway - but the noise from people walking up and down the hallway was minimal and people were respectful. We got a really good rate and we would stay there again. We did a combination of taking Uber and driving to the parks. Uber was about $10
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback and tips. We are so glad that you enjoyed your large rooms and comfy beds. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: From the reviews online until the moment we checked in, this was the perfect hotel for us. What we didn't enjoy was the sound of any movement outside our room seemed amplified and disrupted our sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed our customer service. We are sorry that there was noise issues during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: The studio was a good size. But the light from the hallway seeped through under the door, which was a huge disturbance. I had to put a towel there to block the light.  Additionally, I got breakfast and the pastries didn’t have an expiration date, but tasted super old. The milk did have a future expiration date, but it was already bad, probably because it wasn’t refrigerated all the time. In summary, breakfast really disappointed me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed the size of our rooms. We will make sure to look into the crack under the door. We are also sorry that you had issues with our ToGo Breakfast. We are looking into this immediately and cannot currently see any expired items. We will continue to work with our breakfast staff to ensure all items are fresh.

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Pepper tree for 6 days 5 nights. We enjoyed our stay. The staff is nice and accommodating. Enjoyed the spacious rooms and small kitchenette. It could use a small Table so that you could eat comfortably. The one thing I wish They had was a shuttle to Disneyland it would make traveling soooo much easier and much more convenient. It’s 8 min drive to Disneyland and you could get the tram if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and our friendly staff. Thank you for the helpful suggestions. We always suggest using Uber/Lyft to get around the resort area.  The local shuttles take too long and have inconvenient pickup/drop off times. Hope this info helps! We would love to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel - a few tweaks needed
Summary: I love this hotel and it is my home away from home when travelling on business. The front desk staff are great and very helpful. A couple of things I would like to see improvement in, however. Several times I have noticed that my room was not cleaned thoroughly. For example, on my last visit, there was hair on the shower wall from a previous guest, which albeit, was difficult to see with the mottled tiles, however IF the bathroom had been cleaned thoroughly, that would not have been there. Secondly, the hotel internet service is HORRIBLE. I guess it is fine if you are only jumping on it to google something, but for business internet to work, it's a non-starter. Please fix this guys! The hotel is too good otherwise for things like this to drag you down.

I love the model of the hotel. Tons of space and comfortable beds. Although I found 2 hairs in the bathtub i would stay here again. The kitchens are well equipped and the couch is super comfortable to watch a movie
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful comments. We are so glad that you enjoyed the kitchen and comfort of the room. We will make sure to talk to our housekeeping staff about the issues you found in the bathroom. We would love to see you again soon.

Summary: the staff was very helpful and friendly. I appreciated the phone call after I made the reservation online. She confirmed details and made sure the right room was reserved for my family. Though I wish there was self service laundry on the premises. The room and grounds are well maintained and inviting.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the helpful feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Booked here for our Disney trip. When we arrived we check in and the staff were all friendly and helpful. The room was nicer than expected with lots of room and plenty of light. Not to far from Disneyland. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: My kids just want to go back
Summary: Loved being away from the craziness of Disney. Good neighborhood. Phenomenal, caring staff. Comfiest hotel bed I've ever slept on. My kids call it "our hotel" and would love nothing more than to go back!
Manager Response: We are honored to be "your hotel"!! That is the best compliment we can get. Thank you so much! We are excited to see you all again soon.

Summary: It was a good stay, food was very close to the hotel and good. A little noisy because of kids but that is expected  due to Disney. Rustic look was new to me but it was ok and clean. Will come back again if I have to the area again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and helpful feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and will use your comments to better our hotel. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Second time staying at Pepper Tree (for 9 evenings in a row) was also great! I will stay there again and again. Rick (the manager) keeps up the property very well, the service employees are friendly and helpful, they communicate very well with their guests, and it's (in general) quiet ... however that depends on your neighbors. Nightly prices are very reasonable and I'd recommend calling the hotel directly for pricing and discounts. It's located close enough to Disney and Knott's Berry Farm but far enough away to have a quieter environment.  The kitchenettes are a huge $$ saver, clean, newer, and stocked with basic things a kitchen needs. Overall, LOVE it!
Manager Response: This is the best compliment we could ever get! We love being a home away from home!! Thanks for the review and helpful feedback. Come back soon!!

Summary: Beautiful tile and wood accents, fountains, lush landscaping.  Friendly staff.  Unique room layout allows for a sitting area, bedroom and kitchen.  Balcony room overlooked heated pool.  My only complaint was that the walls are thin and one noisy neighbor disturbed our sleep by loudly talking in the hallway and then in their room next door. Otherwise it was a lovely stay and we will certainly return.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for noticing all the boutique charm around the hotel. We are sorry about the noise issue you experienced. We would be happy to help with those situations on your next visit. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: My fiance and I came to this hotel for a couple of days to just get away. We weren't sightseeing or anything. We were literally just looking for a hotel that we could lounge at for a couple of days. This hotel had been on my radar for awhile and was finally able to come and it did not let down! There is only one small complaint, and it's not really a complaint. But the towels that they give you for the pool are small, so I would recommend bringing your own pool towels. But other then that, everything was great!  We had a room with 2 queen beds and our own private patio. Because the weather was windy and on the cooler side, we didn't get a chance to use the patio, but the wall around the patio gave us a lot of privacy. The beds were fairly comfortable (I can be picky about beds).
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the great feedback. We are so happy that you will be back again so soon. We will make sure our management team reviews your comments about the pool towels!

Summary: A very quaint, Spanish style hotel.  The front desk and cleaning staff were very friendly and helpful during the week we stayed there.  The rooms are big enough for two comfortably and the kitchen, while small, was perfect for us as we made simple lunches for our day trips.  I sleep with a white noise maker and it was perfect to almost eliminate hallway noise and neighboring rooms, although it wasn't excessive at all.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review and helpful tips! We are so glad that you enjoyed the large room and friendly staff. We hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland.  We took an uber/lyft which was about $10/ each way,  so cheaper and easier than parking at Disneyland.  The hotel/ rooms are unique,  but not necessarily in a bad way.  The bed was pretty comfortable,  but it seemed like it had some plastic on the mattress,  which made a weird sound and made it more difficult to control body temperature.  Service was great,  the breakfast was ok. It was worth staying here and saved a lot of money vs staying really close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are so happy that you found our hotel a great value. We will make sure to check the bed for the issues you were mentioning. We do have a protectors on the top of our mattress. We hope that you come back again on your next Disneyland visit.

Summary: Very well kept property. Will stay again.  Nice rooms pool is very nice. Lots of parking in rear. Breakfast was nice & coffee was good. Great value.  Close to knotts & Disney. And very close to the beach.  All staff was helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and tips! We are so glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff and convenient location.

Summary: I booked Hotel Pepper Tree for a business trip. I was looking for something that was close to my client but also had a kitchen since my hours would be off and easier to cook when I was at the hotel. From the moment I walked in until I checked out, things were exactly as advertised. The kitchen was stocked with simple needed things. The breakfast area was a great grab and go on mornings. The in-room space was perfect and didn't feel like I was in a tiny hotel room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback! We are so glad that your stay was convenient and helpful for your business trip. We hope you come back again!

Summary: Our room wasn't ready . They wanted to charge me 28 dollars for early check in but nothing when they were an hour late getting our room ready. Rooms were dated but nice. Staff was friendly and nice place for the price.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. We do charge an early checkin fee if you want to check in before noon. We were able to check you in at 4pm which is our normal check-in time. We are glad that you found the front desk staff friendly and the rooms nice. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Hotel is clean, conveniently located on the west side of Anaheim 5 mins from D-land.  All expectations fulfilled. All you need is your own food. Breakfast items are minimal but sufficient.  If you have a larger family and want the conveniences of home, then Pepper Tree will meet your needs.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad that your stay fulfilled all your expectations. We hope you come again.

Summary: The room was clean and spacious .There were a stove and a lot of utensils , a big refrigerator . People at the service desk were nice and helpful . Free parking and acceptable complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. Come back again!

Summary: Honestly, I liked the hotel room size. It was big for a family of 3 and the kitchenette really is helpful. Appliances were in good shape and I really did like the corridor to the bathroom, it gave an added privacy for those who use the bathroom. Plenty of space in the corridor to stow away your luggage without having to jump over them in small room hotels.   Room for improvement: The carpeting in the rooms are old, they need replacement. Also, it was misleading to say that breakfast is provided, as when we should we showed up, we found out it was a To-Go breakfast, and not hot breakfast as expected. Whilst the coffee machine is cool, I really did not like the fact that I had to purchase breakfast from outside for my hungry toddler early in the morning and that messed up our
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We so are happy that you enjoyed the large room and full kitchen. We are in the process of updating our floors throughout the hotel. We do describe our breakfast as To-Go on our website and as much as possible on the third party websites (we are limited by the companies on how we can describe things). Again, we are so thankful for your comments and will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice. It’s very clean and located near our destination.staff is very friendly and helpful. Like the free breakfast. Will stay here again. It’s an older hotel but kept up very nicely.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests!! Thank you so much for the review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The room and hotel is beautiful!  The bed was luxurious and the staff were incredibly accommodating.  My boyfriend and I checked in very late after our Disneyland trip - I think around midnight - and the front desk staff were very kind and attentive.
Manager Response: Thanks for the very kind review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the room and our friendly staff. Please come back again!

Summary: Great time at the Pepper Tree.  This was a first time staying here.  The location and room were both super quiet and clean.  It was 10 minutes from Disney.  Great location.  The staff was friendly. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so honored to be apart of your anniversary trip. Thanks for the great comments. We would love to have you back again.

Summary: We fell in love with the room, can’t wait to come back! Our stay was wonderful. Very clean and spacious. The kitchen was our favorite part as we love to cook. The room felt very homey and we seriously did not want to leave lol Thank you!!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you fell in love with our little hotel. We would love to have you back!!

Summary Heading: Nice, spacious room with kitchen near Knotts and Disneyland
Summary: We liked this hotel, it has a nice space, a small private patio, small kitchen and spacious TV/dormitory area. We chose this hotel because it's pet friendly, however when we arrived we got the new that there is a fee for the pet, which we didn't noticed when booking, I'm sure it's written down somewhere, but we didn't knew, the fee was kind of expensive in my point of view. The breakfast was pretty, pretty basic, the area is really small :-(
Manager Response: We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! We are sorry that you did not noticed the pet fee prior to your arrival. Thank you for the helpful feedback. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for one night during the holidays. Wish we stayed longer. Huge room-very nicely decorated, clean, lots of rustic touches, nice Kitchenette, huge balcony. highly recommend, I think the listing online doesn’t even do it justice, the room was way better than we expected! Great stay for the price!
Manager Response: We wish you stayed longer too! Thanks for the great review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your room and the price. Come back soon!

Summary: I chose to have the room service option (towels, etc) but when I had the sign off the door, they did not clean the room. When I finally asked them to, they did not re-fill the coffee basket. Also I was on the third floor and left out the door on the side (fire escape side), but the key card slot did not work, so I would have to enter from the 2nd floor fire escape, when I told the front desk, they said they would fix it, they never did in the whole week I was there. Additionally, it wasn't until the 2nd to last day that I realized the Wi-Fi password was on the TV info spot, usually it's much easier to find the password, but even then it was incorrect on the TV info spot, the case sensitive was not taken into account when listed on there. The one thing I liked is when I made the

I have stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree for the past 15 years.  I've always know this property was a little quirky, but we learned to enjoy that about the hotel.  However this past visit in December of 2019, made  us decide to not return.  The bathroom had visible mold all over the shower walls.  Plus, MANY long hairs were stuck on the shower walls.  If they are not cleaning the obvious areas, it makes me wonder if they are not cleaning the rest (like changing the sheets).   I've noticed the cleaning has gone downhill the past couple of visits.  So this was not a one time event.  It appears this is their standard practice now.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that we disappointed you on this visit. We were glad to speak with you directly about your stay. We are working with our housekeeping on the issues you mentioned and will continue to work with our housekeeping to team to ensure our cleanliness standards are being met in each and every room. Thank you again for the helpful feedback. We are using it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Nice and Cozy place to stay
Summary: The room was spacious and very comfortable.  The Spanish atmosphere made the room feel very warm and cozy.  Breakfast was OK.  It could be better with maybe more Danish pastries.  Cost performance is very good.

Great place to stay! Very clean and friendly staff. Places we visited were all close by and within close driving distances. Small and quaint, without the hustle and bustle of large hotels.  Thanks for making it special!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our quiet pace and boutique charm. Come back soon!

Summary: I've been to the LA area 3 times for business - and I've chosen to stay at Hotel Pepper Tree each time. And I will choose to stay at HPT when I return - eventually with family. The traffic and busyness of LA is a beat-down, so it's nice to come back to a hotel that is clean, very spacious, well-decorated, and even more importantly low-key & relaxing. It was beautifully decorated for Christmas, and the staff was extremely friendly. Only constructive feedback I have is to have disposable razors available (can't take them on carry-on) and more importantly to offer the breakfast (pastries, cereal, and fruit) before the 7 am-10 am window. To get anywhere in LA by 8 am, you have to leave before 7 am - which was my case 2 out of the 3 days I was there. Therefore I had to pick up
Manager Response: Thank you for being such a loyal guest!! We appreciate your suggestions and very kind review.  We will consider your comments about breakfast. Thanks again for the feedback. We will see you soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Pepper Tree. The hotel is very affordable, and the staff were all friendly and inviting. We were even able to waive having our room cleaned each day, and received a credit for doing so. Will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the great review. We would love to see you again soon.

Summary: The staff was amazing, very friendly, and accommodating.  Our room was beautiful and comfortable.  An Uber ride was only $10 to Disneyland.  I loved having the grocery store right across the street. Having the kitchen was so convenient. We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the sweet words about our staff and rooms! We are so glad that you enjoyed our full kitchen and convenient location. Come back soon!

Summary: Nice inexpensive hotel, close to restaurants and stores. 15 minute drive to the Mickey and friends parking garage. Didn’t use the kitchen but it was a nice option to have. Plenty of parking. No hot breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: The hotel was convenient for our trip to Disneyland.  It was free parking and the hotel was cute.  Rooms were nice with the little kitchen and everything was clean except our bed had bed bugs.  We got bitten quite a few times during the night and I was lucky I brought an extra blanket so the second night we slept on top of the covers.  Everything was fine at the hotel except for the bed bugs.  We were in Room 103.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We wish you would have talked with us at the hotel so we could help you. We take any comments about bed bugs very seriously and immediately had our pest control company thoroughly inspect the room. There were no bed bugs found in the room at all, and we would be happy to show you the report. Anaheim has had a horrible mosquito season this year and that is probably what you experienced. We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and would love to speak with you further to help resolve any issues.

Summary Heading: Love Me Some Pepper Tree Hotel
Summary: We absolutely love staying at the Pepper Tree Hotel, we stay every-time we come to Disney or Knott's. Close to both parks so you can uber / lyft for a round trip of $25. Family friendly hotel with kitchenette inside of the rooms, very clean rooms, staff was amazing. Reasonable prices, especially when close to the parks. The majority of the times we stay you hardly hear anything but the walls are thin where you were able to hear your neighbor making love in the middle of the night. Other than that its a great hotel
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy to hear from our repeat guests. We are so happy that you enjoy our kitchens and convenient locations. Come back soon!

Summary: Not clean, MuSty smell, blankets too Small for bed.  Horrible staff  Loud all night long, poor sleep quality very uncomfortable beds.  Bathroom Smelled so bad of mold, cleaning crew made the bed with dirty sheets I won’t be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit your feedback. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to check your room immediately to look for the issues you mentioned. We do wish that you were able to talk with you before you left. We never want a guest to leave unsatisfied. We again are so sorry that you did not enjoy your stay.

Summary Heading: A very nice place. Close enough for Über-ing to Disneyland, but far enough away if you want an escape!
Summary: I have stayed here twice in 3 months.  Both, very nice stays, but both times I have had many small issues; although issues have always been addressed by the staff w/ pleasure, (but took much of my time)!  (Would give another star if housekeeping could be improved!...not thorough at all!  Especially since you pay extra for this service)!  Next trip I will be opting out of this “service”.  Not worth the aggravation of having to go to front desk for towels, kleenex, after my room was serviced.

We were so impressed by this hotel not only with its beauty but also the cleanliness of the rooms, convenience of the parking, easy breakfast and friendly service. It was well worth the stay and plan to stay there again.

We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights to go to Disneyland..we will come and stay at the Red Pepper hotel again when we visit Los Angeles . The staff was supper nice too.late The pool looked nice,but we didn't have time to use it

Excellent hotel perfect for families. With charming and warm decoration, small kitchen in the room, always clean and with a very attentive staff. Good location, with parking. Our third time at the hotel, I highly recommend.

The staff at Hotel Pepper Tree are very friendly, and prompt to the requests. The rooms were very clean and tidy.  There was enough silence and quite environment.  Breakfast options should be increased.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the sweet review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We will make sure to consider your suggestions. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very comfy, clean and nice.  Love staying here. Location near amusement parks, shopping and dining areas.  Home away from home.  Quiet and nicely decorated.   Been visiting for years and will continue to in future
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thank you so much for your loyalty. We are so happy that we can be your home away from home! Come back again soon!!

Summary: We loved the place and the restaurant located in the parking lot. I did not like the noise. Doors are not well insulated and we had a noisy neighbor! The supermercado across the street is also amazing. $10 Uber yo Disneyland
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed the hotel, location and restaurant. We are so sorry that you had a noisy neighbor. We hope that you were able to talk with the front desk so we could help resolve the issue. We would love for you to try us again.

Summary: Quaint hotel with thoughtful decor, kitchen suite convenient for families.  Excellent service, in fact a front desk clerk ran out to get medicine for my daughter one night because I was alone.  That was so sweet and extremely great not to have to pack up two tired and sick kids to try to find a pharmacy!  Restaurants nearby and grocery across the street. Very convenient to Disneyland. Highly recommended !
Manager Response: Thanks for the sweet review! We are so glad that you enjoyed our hotel and helpful staff. Come back again!!

Summary: Softest hotel beds we can remember. Main knob on oven was on backwards. I figured out on my own. Kitchen missing oven Mitt and plastic spatula. Fire alarm blinked annoyingly all the first night but was promptly fixed by staff
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed our beds and helpful staff. We will make sure to use your suggestions to better our hotel.

Summary: This place is a jewel hidden in the heart of Anaheim. Rooms were very clean, staff couldn't have been nicer, ample parking, all of the cooking utensils were clean and/or new, bed was comfy, everything was very up-to-date. The complimentary soaps and shampoos were surprisingly nice. The mini-mart was well stocked. I am definitely going to be staying here anytime I'm working anywhere close.
Manager Response: We love to called a hidden gem!! Thanks for the great review. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary Heading: No hot tub which was a bummer and pool not heated very much
Summary: We recently stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree for a family vacation to Disney Land. Loved having a kitchen and fridge. Toilet got plugged 4 times in one week. Neighbor had a dog that kept barking and barking. Plus they were clearly smoking marijuana because it smelled in the hall each time they took their dog out to go to the bathroom. To go breakfast bar was nice. Staff very friendly. Room nice and clean. Loved that you can wave daily maid service to save some money on your stay. Overall good place to crash.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed the kitchen, staff, and breakfast bar. We are sorry for the troubles you experienced with your neighbors and wished that you would have contacted us at the front desk to help resolve the issues. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and use them to better our service. Thank you again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: It's a nice place to stay in Anaheim. One thing that bothered me is that  the tree along the Lincoln Avenue were hiding the hotel's billboard and I've missed the entrance couple of times because of that.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We will make sure to inspect the tree by our sign. Thank you for the helpful feedback. We hope that you come back again.

Summary: Housekeeping was a problem. 2nd day room was not cleaned. Late when I got to room so did not complain. Next day room cleaned but coffee supplies not filled & dirty towels left in bath tub. Didn't expect since I paid almost $700 to stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel We are so sorry that you did not receive our best housekeeping service. We have already talked with our housekeeping staff about your situation. We wish you would have let us know during your stay so we could help resolve the issues faster. Please give us a call directly if you have any other questions.

Summary: Great location , near Disneyland. Clean room, nice to have a kitchen. Only complaint, need to ,make sure there is enough flatware and dishes. Needed to ask for forks ,and  only three plates. Took the option of not having daily cleaning done, still able to get everything we needed. I do suggest some sort of grab bar in the shower, tub floor gets very slippery. Adequate "free" breakfast, coffee, juice, milk, fruit, dry cereal. Did not try the pool or barbecue area. The suggestion of the grocery store across the street nice but very limited on choices if you want something pre made besides Mexican food. Would stay again if in the area.

Really nice place, the room was well equipped and comfortable! Not walking distance from Disney and Anaheim convention center, but comfortable and fast to drive to. Would stay here again next time I´m in the city.

Summary Heading: Wonderful, relaxing stay at Hotel Pepper Tree!
Summary: This is a beautiful hotel with spacious, comfortable rooms and welcoming staff! I came to the area on a business trip and would definitely return to this hotel if I come again. The location is convenient and rooms are very affordable, not to mention clean, chic and a pleasure to stay in! Thank you.

Hotel Pepper is amazing. Peaceful and lovely. My recomendation is to avoid Hollywood or other places. Stay in Anaheim is the best option. The breakfast is self service and perfect. The location is near Disney parks.

The ambiance of this hotel is vintage I Mexican.  So cute.  The rooms are large and the kitchens are a bonus.  I appreciated the discount in rate if we chose not to have housekeeping make up rooms and provide fresh towels as at home we reuse our towels a few days and make our own beds.  The staff was helpful and friendly.  The rates were superb.  I'd stay here again.

Friendly staff.  Beautiful landscaping.  our bath tub was clogged up when we checked in.  Better blanket can be used.  Parking is always available for late comer.  Other than that we  enjoyed our stay and would book Pepper Tree again.

The check-in process was ok. They make you bring the physical card that was used to make the reservation to ensure that the card isn't stolen.  No other hotel that I've ever stayed in had that policy, so they must have an issue here with dishonesty. Staff was courteous and friendly enough. We opted out of housekeeping service ($8/day) as we can make beds and fold towels ourselves. Interaction thereafter was kept to a minimum.  The room (double queen) was average sized. The kitchen space was small and cramped, but that was to be expected,especially for the price.  They have an oven but do not provide oven mitts. They include the bare essentials for cooking otherwise.  The hotel isn't in the best (or worst) area of Anaheim. There were some  "ladies of the night" hanging out in the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your thorough review. We are glad that you found our location convenient and our staff friendly. We will make sure to work our housekeeping team about the cleanliness issues you had. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and addresses your concerns. Again, thank you for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Clean rooms, great decor, wonderful staff, comfortable stay! The location was also great. We will be staying here in the future. Kitchen was equipped with everything we needed if we chose to cook or eat in our room

We stayed 21 days altogether at Pepper Tree. The staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean, comfortable, and have everything you need. The breakfast room is well stocked and the coffee is great!

Love hotel pepper tree Anaheim ca. Great cozy atmosphere, clean casita style room with kitchen. Close to everything we wanted to do. Friendly staff. Highly recommend. We were there over Halloween... Halloween and de la muetras is extremely special to me and i was so pleased to see everything  so tastefully done.. Thanks for making it a great trip....

Summary Heading: Good for the value, but could be better
Summary: First of all the picture on the website shows an oven cook top with a microwave range over it. We had a counter top microwave and a single hotplate to cook on. I was not able to. Lol some of the meals I had planned  ecause of this. Also the bbq I. The pool has no kid to keep in heat making properly cooking food impossible

Needs a little bit of updating, but the size of the room and value for money is very good. It would great to have an extra mirror with power sockets so you can dry our hair with some else using the bathroom. Free - light breakfast is a great start to the day! But just 10 min drive to Disneyland it's also in a great place.

Check in was a pain. The staff was a little rude when I was checking in. The bed is hard as a rock with no extra blankets in the room. The cups in my room had food stuck at the bottom inside the cup. The worse part was how thin the walls were. You heard people at like 5 am slam the doors, cough, get ready in the morning/talk, the halls outside echo and you hear it in your room etc. Was horrible and literally had hardly any sleep. It sucks because this place really does have a lot of potential. Its a cute hotel, big rooms and is a modern Spanish look. The sheets were at least clean with clean towels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are so happy that you enjoyed the boutique charm and size of our rooms. We are sorry for the issues you experienced. We wish you would have notified us during your stay so we could help resolve the issues or move you to a room not at the end of the hall. Again, we are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to use your comments to better our service.

Summary Heading: Nice place, nice hotel and all facilities included
Summary: Nice place we´ve been spending 6 nights in Anaheim. The facilities are perfect and we didnt miss anything. Cleaning was ok but there was a smell inside that should be solved. Communication with LA is OK considering the traffic. The cleaning service was a bit late during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your 6 nights with us. We will make sure our housekeeping staff sees your comments and will use them to better our service. We hope you come back again!

Summary: Let dogs stay in room alone, jeez. You can charge if it gets messed up. It's a dumb rule. It really messes people up. I had to scramble to find a place for my little innocent chihuahua to stay when he wouldn't mess ANYTHING up.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and our sorry for the inconvenience about your pet. We do not let pets stay unattended for the safety of the pet and the comfortable of all our guests. Many times pets are left unattended there is barking that disturbs the rest of the hotel. We hope this info helps and would be happy to talk with you more if needed.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree was a great little gem of a hotel!  I’m so glad that we booked it.  There were 3 of us and the room was very spacious. We loved the outdoor sitting area as well. It was so nice to have a fridge so that we had a place to put some drinks and any leftovers we had. The staff were so friendly and helpful! They made some recommendations about restaurants in the area as well as transportation to/from Disneyland.  Overall a great experience! My only request would be to have individual safes in the rooms as there were none.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you booked with us too! Thank you for the kind words and helpful feedback! Come back again soon.

Summary: Thoughtful design and helpful staff – this is the 2nd time I've been here, and found it just as charming as the first time. Rooms are big, and the price is definitely right! If you book far enough in advance, you can get a super deal on the room price. HIghly recommend.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you came back!! We love hearing from our repeat guests. Thank you for the great recommendations... and yes - always book ahead and direct!!! :)

Summary Heading: Very comfortable. We will be staying there again.
Summary: Centrally located, quiet, clean, great staff, and has a fantastic pool and kitchen. What more could you need? I have booked this hotel for a business trip, and rebooked for a family trip as well. The decor and attention to detail are wonderful. The kitchen had everything needed and the room and entire hotel were sparkling clean.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review!

Summary: This place was so great, I was a little disappointed in the breakfast, I expected a hot breakfast would have been really nice, but overall it was a great stay, I will most definitely return when we take another trip to Anaheim
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and will be back again. We will make sure to note your comments about breakfast.

Summary: Staff were excellent and very attentive.  There was an option to forgo housekeeping for the week I was there and not be charged the resort fee.  I opted for this, since I could still go to the front desk and get clean towels as needed however there were days that housekeeping either accessed the room or attempted to access the room so I don't know where the breakdown in communication was.  I would definitely stay here again the next time I am in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are so happy that enjoyed your stay. We appreciate your helpful feedback about the housekeeping staff. We will keep working with them to improve their service. Come back again soon!

Summary: The hotel staff were excellent and the room was amazing. Rustic theme made studio feel so cozy. Having a full size fridge and stove made it easy to make meals in the hotel compared to going out for every meal throughout the day. Definitely returning again next time we’re in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank so for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and friendly staff. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Handicap room had the raised tile floor which makes wheel chairs difficult to maneuver esp. with a large transition to the carpet.  Flat tile or linoleum would be best. Otherwise the service was great, it was quiet at night and close to Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We will make sure our management team sees your comments about the tile floor. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location and customer service.

Summary: Beautiful hotel very close to Disneyland and surrounded by wonderful local restaurants! The room was clean and decorated beautifully and the bed was cozy and big enough for two to sleep comfortably. We loved our stay here so much that we are planning on making this hotel our go-to stay when we travel to Southern California. Thank you!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel and it's convenient location. We would love to your go-to place in Southern California!!! Thank you!

Summary: Easy check in.  Clean and comfortable. The room had a small kitchen area and provided coffee products to allow us to make coffee for two mornings.  If we  had wanted to make simple meals we could have, but ate out.  They had area downstairs that provided simple breakfast.  Juice, coffee, cereal and pastries were provided.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We as so glad that you found the room clean and comfortable. Come back again soon!

Summary: Loved the hotel! Decor is charming.  The room was beautiful and had everything i needed in the kitchen. I didn't get a chance to check out the pool but i plan to on my next visit. I will definitely stay here again.

really nice hotel and very clean the room was clean and neat.the atmosphere was very relaxing and nice the staff was ok and the location was ok  .the breakfast for being free was ok . the location was ok too.loved the spanish theme

We really enjoyed this place. Nice rooms, service was great. Nice continental breakfast the coffee the best I've tasted in a while. I will stay there again when in the area. Great location, clean hotel and friendly staff.

Summary Heading: Best service you'll receive from a hotel!
Summary: We showed up to Hotel Pepper Tree hoping they could accommodate our 9 nights stay after a falling out with an Airbnb home. They were so helpful and got the Manager who was able to place us in a courtyard king kitchen studio for our entire stay. The staff here are amazing. They were helpful, friendly, and on top of everything we needed and always smiling. My husband and I have not stayed at a better hotel. The beds are so comfortable, once you lay your head down you're asleep. The rooms are beautiful, set up with everything for cooking, and getting ready. The air conditioning works great, so nice to have in the high 80 and 90 degree weather. We highly recommend staying here and will definitely be back! Thank you Hotel Pepper Tree for your outstanding customer service! Keep up the

We stayed here and went to Disneyland. The drive to Disney was short and you didn’t have to go on a freeway. The room is spacious. The bathrooms are small. The bed was very comfortable. The AC unit blows directly at the head of the bed, some may like that and some may not. Breakfast was fruit and pastries. They also had other items for purchase. Friendly staff!

Everything was in the apartment to sleep and stay well. The bed was very comfortable and the balcony was bigh enough to sit. The wardrobe was big enough for your staff. You get a breakfast with muffins, cakes, tea, coffee and fresh fruits!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed a good night's sleep and were able to sit out on your private balcony. Come back again soon!

Summary: Overall it was a satisfactory stay. The decor of the hotel was fantastic. It's rustic and colonial aesthetic was pleasant and lent itself well to the landscaping. The room was spacious and had most of the amenities one could ask for.    My biggest gripe was the beds. Serendipitously stayed in a room with 2 queens because we were able to pick the lesser of 2 evils.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and large rooms. We are sorry that you didn't enjoy your bed and will make sure to take a look at your room immediately. Thanks again for the review! We do hope that you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Pleasant stay, convenient location to family. Could have used a bit firmer pillow, and the bath area was clean, but nothing special, a little on the small side.  but amble closet space.  Loved the courtyard we were in Room 103, and it was surprisingly quiet considering it was a ground floor neat the entrance.  pleasant staff!  Would be nice to have had coffee available in the evenings as well.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our convenient location and private courtyards. We appreciate you helpful comments and will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: This was our second time staying at the Pepper Tree. The room is large enough for 3 to be comfortable. We were able to leave our car at the hotel while we visited Disneyland. We did not have a chance to use the pool, but I do wish there was a Hot Tub/Spa. Otherwise, a nice stay.

Great hotel off the Disney hotel strip. Way cheaper, lots more room, took Uber or Lyft to the park and saved on car rental and parking. Great supermarket across the street, nice little continental breakfast each morning with great coffee! Would definitely stay here again!

Weekend of fun with family and friends. First time staying at this location. Grocery store across the street was nice for those quick snack. I would recommend this hotel. They checked us in about an hour early. Which was nice.

We loved the ambiance of the hotel, inside and out.  The bouganvilla growing on the balcony was amazing and so enjoyable.  The grab and go breakfast was so convenient and exactly what was needed - fruit, coffee, cereal and awesome pastries.  The pool was clean and beautiful and heated.  The balcony gave us a nice view of the area.  Everyone was so kind. The room was lovely and had a separate dressing-area.  The room seemed so large.  We were celebrating our 25th wedding anniversary and the hotel gave us a beautiful bottle of 2015 wine, choclates shaped like peppers, and a Congratulations balloon!  We would definitely return to this location. Great for families too.  Loved the decor inside and out.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review. We are so honored to be apart of your anniversary celebrations! We hope to have you back again soon.

Summary: Staff courtesy and friendliness was wonderful. The rooms were clean. Perfect location. The grocery store across the street was perfect. We were able to cook a good breakfast and by everything we needed snacks for the days in the amusement parks. Perfect location not to far from the parks.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, rooms, and staff. Come back again soon!

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Large, comfortable room which felt much more inviting than a cookie cutter chain. Staff was friendly and housekeeping was excellent. Will recommend to anyone wanting a full kitchen. 10 minutes from Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendations!!!  We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm and staff. Come back again.

Summary: Absolutely love staying here. The price to stay when booking directly through them is great. It's always clean, having a refrigerator and stove in the room is wonderful. When I called to make this past reservation I had mentioned we were going to stay for our honeymoon, it appears they made a note of it as we had a bottle of wine waiting for us when we checked it. It was so sweet of them to do.
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review and for booking direct! That helps us so much. We are so glad that you enjoyed the full kitchen. Thanks again for choosing us for your honeymoon visit!

Summary: staff was attentive and friendly. The rooms were clean. the beds were comfortable. location is great. most everything you need within walking distance.only down side was no hot breakfast. No big deal!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit.

Summary: Clean, close to attractions, and nice size rooms. Best value for the money. Will definitely return again when in the area. Parking is a bit tight but it is complementary, which is much appreciated. Also free Continental breakfast.

Summary Heading: Always a great stay at Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: I always love staying here! The rooms are great. I love the fact that they have a full kitchen. They also have a continental breakfast which is pretty good! Beds are good, rooms have been updated and looks great. Shower head is low but not a big deal!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for being a repeat guest! We appreciate your feedback so much. We can't wait to see you again soon.

Summary: Very unique hotel with a lot of style. Ornate cabinets, interesting art, flooring and furnishings. I thought it was a nice change to the typical hotel artdeco & blase furniture. Forgot my belt in the cool woodcut curio cabinet.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that enjoyed our boutique charm throughout the hotel. Please let us know if you still need help getting your lost item. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Not the usual Disney parks Hotel I stay at. My daughter found this place, not far from the park. Be aware it is in the middle of a residential area by two schools so traffic in the morning just get off the property is a nightmare. Other than that things that could improve it, pen and paper in the room, pot holders for the oven and paper towels for the kitchen. The staff was very friendly, printing my boarding passes for my flight.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback and helpful suggestions. We are so happy that you found our staff friendly! We do have paper towels and pot holders in the room. We are sorry that you could not find them. We do hope you consider staying with us again and the future.

Summary Heading: I stay here every time I'm in town
Summary: I love staying at this hotel, just wish it were located in a better area. I appreciate the rustic Spanish theme of the rooms and especially the hotel and grounds and love the full kitchens, which are turnkey (including an oven!!)
Manager Response: Thanks for being such a great repeat guest! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great Hotel, very pretty and convenient to most everything. Only thing that will make me stay there again is if you bring back the shuttle to Disneyland. I didn't enjoy paying $25 a day to park at Disneyland. I don't do Uber or Lyft so I didn't have any other option.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and location. The ART shuttle stop to Disneyland did move but it is still just one block from the hotel. We do suggest a rides share option because it is faster and cheaper than any other option to the Park.

Summary: A mark of excellence in customer service is how unforeseen hiccups are handled. HP Tree does this very well. Clean, quiet, calm, and well maintained. I would love to see the addition of a hot tub to enhance the experience. Thank you for a lovely stay.

The stay was great. Beds are comfortable, the rooms are clean, people at the front desk were very nice. My only critique was that during our stay there was a lot of banging in the room above us. I don't know if they were fixing something or if it was another guest but it was all night long.

Location was good, the décor is outdated and the halls smell like vomit. The beds are OK; the breakfast is only sweets and coffee, nothing substantial. I would not go here again. If they can improve the breakfast and the smell then it would be better.

A fantastic property in Anaheim close to Knott's and Disneyland. The suites are large and proportioned well. The kitchen includes a full size refrigerator. The beds are comfy and have plenty of pillows. A nice sofa to stretch out on as well after long day of walking. The staff is friendly and attentive. There is also a great breakfast place across the street. All in all it made for a great trip!

Stayed in room 314...as we requested room on level 3 facing poolside... perfect room for us..as it was not overlooking pool but we could still see it.. loved the room and kitchenette. Everything in kitchen to use. Comfortable beds..Quiet hotel, helpful staff, clean and good housekeeping..so happy we stayed here. It's only an Uber away from Disneyland.. About $10. Supermarket across road and eateries like Subway, Burgers and fries and a 711 type store. This was much better than staying in busy hotels which are closer to Disneyland. Breakfast to go was muffins and pastries, fruit, cereal , orange  Juice, coffee.. which was great... especially as we were on the go. Needed print outs of tickets for park and flights and front desk very helpful. Two smoking areas for guest which my

Grumpy employee at reception at checkin. Other staff were cordial. Cleaning staff left our bedroom door open on the second day and the door was open all day until our arrival at night. Excellent apartment

Summary Heading: Very great place in Anaheim to stay
Summary: This was a great place to stay. I was worried after making reservations and seeing a few reviews that it was old and dirty. In fact, it is old and shows some age in areas but it’s is clean and maintained and is truely charming and comfortable.  My family really enjoyed staying there.   The location is perfect to balance the hotel prices near Disney but still be close to the park as well as other shopping and restaurants.  If money is no issue, go towards the park and pay whatever.  If your normal middle class this is a great option.

Amazing loved that it was family friendly and the location was perfect with a great restaurant on the property. And a convenient market just across the street that opened early and closed late. Highly recommended

We really enjoy staying at this hotel with our kids. Rooms are clean and kids have a nice little space to play. Kitchen set up allows you to bring food if you are on a budget so you dont have to spend money on eating out. Which is nice while traveling with kids. Close enough to Disney to drive but far enough away to avoid all the traffic that surrounds it. Love they offer a little continental breakfast if you need a little something first thing in the morning. Bonus they dont charge for parking as I find alot of places add that on. Great little place to eat next to the hotel as well. Ceviche Tostadas were a nice bonus for my husband as he didnt want to drive once we arrived and was able to walk and grab dinner for us.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your trip was perfect! Thanks for the helpful tips! Come back again soon.

Summary: My husband and I stayed from Monday September 16 - Wednesday 18th. I have to say this was one of the very best experiences and most comfortable stays we have ever had. We have stayed at the much more expense hotels before, but there was no comparison. The room was very clean. The property was kept up so nicely and manicured. The beds were so comfortable, you did not want to get up. We are from Texas an had never been to California, so therefore not sure about our surroundings. Hotel Pepper Tree felt very safe and quiet. I only wish all Hotels could be this way...extremely affordable and so very  comfortable. The staff was Fantastic!!! We will miss you guys!!! Thank you for the very best vacation and Anniversary!!!
Manager Response: We were so honored to be a part of your anniversary celebrations! Thank you so much for the amazing review. We would love to have you back on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: My husband and I were in town for 2 days to visit Disneyland and family. So we needed a fridge to keep some food and was looking for a close hotel to D-land without breaking the bank. We did make it down to breakfast but we were very comfortable in our Queen suite. Loved having the balcony and staff at check in and out were friendly and efficient. We had a great stay and loved the decor!
Manager Response: We are so happy that your stay was perfect! We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: Very nice hotel, friendly staff, clean, good cook option.  The second time been there, I'll definitely be back.Price is top.  Not far to Knotts Park and Disneyland.  Centrally located. Gerne kommen wir wieder.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review and helpful feedback! We are so thankful that you will come back for a third time!

Summary: This hotel is very cute, chill, quiet & homey. A restaurant right in the parking lot, a market right across the street & easy access to Knott's & Disneyland.  Breakfast was very nice and the coffee 👌.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the helpful feedback about our location and breakfast. see you soon!

Summary Heading: Good location, large rooms, friendly staff
Summary: Stayed for two nights while visited a relative in a assisted living g home.  Really enjoyed having the patio off the room for a private place to spend time with our relative away from the home.  The room was very spacious.  Did not care for the grab and go breakfast items but the coffee was good.

Summary Heading: Perfect First Visit to the Pepper Tree!
Summary: We just returned from 5 nights of R&R at this hotel... and our first visit definitely won't be our last!  It's a nice, clean, cute place with an amazing staff... everyone was awesome and super helpful from the front desk to the cleaning staff!  And we especially appreciated Rick's help at check in and Lupe's help at check out... they went above and beyond to make sure our stay was perfect!  Looking forward to next time!

We arrived the property 1 hour earlier 3.00 pm and checking time is 4.00 pm. H/ever we had to wait till 5.00 pm till we we were given a room. When we made the booking website mentioned that free shuttle available to Disneyland and when we were checking told that service was discontinued. `These were the two issues  otherwise customer service was very good and friendly.

We stayed for 5 nights and can't complain about one thing. Amazing service and staff. Rooms are super clean and kitchen has all necessities (pots, pan, salt and pepper). Supermarket right across the street and close shops nearby. We loved our stay and would come back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review! We are so happy that you will be back!

Summary: The breakfast was interesting that they offered . Not a fan .They had no real food mostly packaged products and fruit.     They did have good coffee and tea setup. The room was nice. Personnel were very cool.access to surrounding venues was within minutes.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed our friendly staff and convenient location. We will make sure to note your comments regarding our breakfast selections and talk with our management team. We hope you come back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Pet Friendly? /Overall good stay-could have been great!
Summary: Upon check in (registered with Travelocity) was informed that they were pet friendly, but that we could at no point leave our very well behaved dog in our room unattended.Even to go eat in their restaurant.  It was a very hard  and direct warning that not only left me wondering why I had booked in this non friendly pet friendly place, but the other person getting checked in was NOT getting the same presentation (and he had a dog). It was apparent the man checking me in had experienced one too many bad experiences and I felt he was taking it out on me. I also used the side stairs to gain access to my room that was in direct line of the "smoking area" where this specific employee was smoking alone and did not even pretend to blow away from us.   The other employees there were
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful and honest feedback.We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and most of our staff. But, we are sorry for any miscommunication that occurred during you check and will talk with our front desk about your comments. We do not let pets be left unattended in the rooms for security and safety reasons.  We do hope that you come back again to visit us.

Summary: Great hotel. Good size room for the price. Was in a great location close to theme parks. Nice and clean. Great service. Free breakfast was good. I Will definitely stay again with my family. Rooms were not cramped at all compared to other hotels.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the review.

Summary: The overall experience was above our expectations. All of the staff with kind and friendly.  the room was clean and neat. The The Decour was beautiful and also having a little kitchenette made our room feel like home.  The overall experience my boyfriend and I had was amazing.  I highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: We are so happy that we exceeded your expectations! Thank you so much for the amazing review and recommendations. Come back again soon.

Summary: well, i didnt actually end up staying at this property, although i really wanted to. i needed to find a place to stay for at least 1 month, but possibly up to 2 months. your website says for extended stays to contact the property directly for a better rate. well. the rate i was quoted was more than what i would have paid if i just booked it online. i was really hoping that a 2month stay would be more than enough to get a break on the rates,but thats not what i got. the quote was outrageous, so needless to say, i had to find somewhere else to stay
Manager Response: We are so sorry if our front desk misquoted rates for you. We do offer a discount after the first month. Were you able to talk with our front desk manager? Please give us a call if you have any further questions. We are happy to help you with a longer stay.

Summary: Comfy bed, good shower head, friendly helpful staff. Free breakfast and WiFi. The staff was GREAT!! I would definitely stay here again. The only negative is that the furnishings are dated, but that is not how I choose a hotel. Comfy bed and good shower head are my primary criteria. I also appreciate excellent customer service and definitely got it here.
Manager Response: We are so happy you chose Hotel Pepper Tree and hope you will be back soon! Thanks for the great review and helpful feedback.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, but would like a better breakfast selection.
Summary: The location of this place was perfect. It was 10 minutes from all the tourist attractions and parks. We also loved the décor. It felt comfortable and fun. The only thing we'd like improved would be the breakfast. Perhaps a couple hot items etc.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Perfect is such an honor. We appreciate your feedback and will make sure our management teams sees your suggestions. Come back again soon!

Summary: Really nice hotel at competetive rates. Room was very spacious with nice patio to sit out and fully equipped kitchen which we made full use of, as we welcomed some self catering having already spent a small fortune during our 3 week holiday touring the West Coast. Stayed as base for disney. Had a hire and drove. 10 minute drive. I believe there is a fee for shuttle service. Only negatives were we only had seating for 2 when we were a family of 4. We did get extra chairs when we asked but one was only a stool. Could hear noise from ajoining rooms. We were unlucky to have very noisy neighbours which we raised with hotel and in fairness they addressed. Breakfast was ok. Would have been nice to have some more cereal options. Overall very happy with stay though. We felt surrounding

My family of 5 stayed at a queen suite. We stayed for 7 nights and we had a great time. Kitchenette is perfect if you’re looking to save a little money on meals. It is also stocked with plates and such which is nice.  Staff is really friendly which makes your stay really comfortable.  They advertise a to go breakfast and that’s exactly what you get.  They provide cup holders with space for you to take some pastries and fruit or cereal with you.  The coffe is great. Pool is at a good temperature the only thing is I wish they had a hot tub other than that overall a great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are so glad that you enjoyed the full kitchen, pool, and our friendly staff. We hope that you come again soon.

Summary: The staff was very warm and welcoming, Always. A plus also was the coffee bar and goodies..  The location is convenient  with groceries and restaurants nearby. We are looking forward to another trip soon.
Manager Response: Thanks for the sweet words about our staff. We are so happy to have been a part of your anniversary trip. We would love to have you back.

Summary: Thus hotel advertises as pet friendly. Upon arrival with our luggage Disney passes et al we were informed that they di not accept cats! This was never explained to us when we were booking over the phone. Ridiculous!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so sorry for your inconvenience. We do notify all guests who book with us through a third party to contact us directly if bringing a pet. We also have our pet policy listed on our website. Again, we are so sorry that you did not find out about our pet policy sooner.

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful.  The accomodations were clean clea, spacious and comfortable.  The location was located near shopping and wonderful restaurants, as well as being centrally located to our family and events.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and helpful tips. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: My stay at the pepper tree hotel felt like i was right at home! Loved the kitchen and small balcony! Room was pretty clean also. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. I will be coming back in the near future
Manager Response: We are so happy that you felt at home with us! That is the best compliment. Thanks so much for the recommendations. We would love to have you back too!

Summary: The room itself was nice with a large living space, functional kitchen, and lovely patio. The cleanliness of the floors, however, were another thing. I had to wash my kids feet before they climbed into bed because they were filthy from just waking around the room. My only other complaint was the load construction across the hall on the last two mornings of our trip, would have loved for the hotel to give us a heads up on that. Otherwise, everything was great. My kids especially enjoyed the heated pool, which they spent a ton of time in over the week we were there.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the full kitchen, pool, and private patio. We will make sure to talk to our housekeeping staff about the floors. We are also sorry about the maintenance noise that you heard. We do not start our maintenance projects until after 9am but are sorry for the inconvenience.

Summary: The experience and service was top notch! Spacious rooms with full kitchen and patio. Loved that they served fresh Peet's coffee each morning. No problems with parking. The location was sort of hidden, but I liked that. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the amazing review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our large rooms with full kitchens. We hope you come back soon.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at this place!
Summary: Stayed for a month in the Spring and went back with my family when they flew out to visit. Love this boutique hotel with lots of atmosphere/ambience. Wonderful staff!  Rooms are spacious with kitchen and  full-size fridge. Plenty of parking opportunities. Grocery store and laundromat just across the street. Great location
Manager Response: We loved having you stay with us and were so happy to have your family visit too. Thanks for the helpful tips. We hope to see you all again on your next visit.

Summary: The rooms feel like an warm apartment after traveling 3000 miles to pick my grand daughter up from Disney Land Student Program..  the only complaint I have is not having a cart to bring things up with and down to the car.  i;m 62 and have a bad knee without my grand daughter I would have never been able to do it.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that you found your room relaxing and homey. We do have a luggage cart to help with baggage. We are sorry that you were not able to find it. Next time, we would be happy to help with your luggage.

Summary: Absolutely love staying here! I brought my son and his friends for his birthday weekend, they were so accommodating when I asked for adjoining rooms! Extremely clean! Will continue to book with them and refer friends!
Manager Response: Thanks for the lovely review!! We are so happy for you to refer friends and would love to have you back too.
