Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree is a fabulous place to stay. This is already our second time in 2 months! It’s clean, comfortable & very conveniently located in the heart of Anaheim. The hotel is very decently priced & all the rooms have a small kitchen witch it awesome for families trying to save money on food! 5 stars from me all the way!
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests!! Thanks so much for the 5 stars. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: Such a unique find! I usually Airbnb, but this was a quaint hotel. Nice room layout and lovely patio. Would definitely stay again. Cons: found hair from previous tenants a couple of times. Pillows are lumpy and bed sounds crunchy. My only complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your helpful comments. We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm. We will make sure to talk with our housekeeping team and inspect your room immediately. Thank you again for the helpful feedback - we will make sure to use it to better our hotel. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Few things to know before staying; would definitely stay there again.
Summary: There are a few things to know before staying at Pepper tree hotel, but I would definitely stay there again. Some of this may just be a personal preference or personal issue, but here are the things that you need to know before staying there. The good; spacious room, all of the kitchen items that you would want to use for a longer stay especially. While the grab and go breakfast is convenient it does not have a wide variety, but it does have a really good cappuccino/latte maker. They did have some fresh fruit which was a nice touch. I really felt at home in the room, possibly because it seems like it was an old apartment building at some point, but I did truly feel at home.   The patio while very comforting and possibly private (depending on which type/location of room), may
Manager Response: We are so glad that you will be back! Thank you so much for the thorough review and helpful feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed the full kitchen and home away from home feel. We will see you again soon.

Summary: My family loved the amenities. Staff very friendly. I would stay here again and I would recommend this place to my friends. It's a great place for families with small children that might need a full functioning kitchen.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you will be back and definitely appreciate the recommendations.

Summary: We had a great stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree. They were very helpful and accommodating throughout our stay. We also enjoyed our rooms and the swimming pool. Recommended if you're staying in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! Come back again soon.

Summary: Way better than staying near Disneyland on or near Disney property. This hotel is awesome. Good pool, good room, decent breakfast option, not the best but acceptable for continental breakfast. The super market across the street is amazing and you are within 15 minutes of everything; Disney, knots berry farm, malls. The beach is a 20 minute drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. Come back again soon!

Summary: Great place to stay! the room was clean, the kitchen was fully stocked, so we could buy groceries, and cook in the room. The breakfest was well stocked! coffee, muffins, pastries, cereal, fruit, milk, orange juice.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and full kitchen. Thanks so much for the review! Come back again soon.

Summary: Cute boutique hotel with great front desk service. Not a fancy establishment, but quaint with quick access to Disney and Knotts Berry Farm. Great for families who enjoy a touch of nostalgia. Rooms were clean and spacious.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and friendly staff. Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Pretty good with the potential to be great
Summary: Stayed here for a few nights because of the great reviews on Trip Advisor and Google. For the most part, I enjoyed my stay here as well.  Let's cut to the chase and see what I did and didn't like.  The check in process was painless. Almost. I was assigned room 117 which is located next to the breakfast room/front desk. However, the front desk clerk told me to go all the way down the hallway where the last room there was 116. Typically, it wouldn't be a big deal for me, but it was late and I was tired. So walking up and down the hallway wasn't exactly what I had in mind arriving at the hotel.  The room is big compared to your typical hotel rooms and there's an attached patio with tall brick wall so privacy is not an issue. The bed was pretty comfortable but note that there was no

Pros: Excellent staff at the front desk that were quite helpful and kind, comfortable beds, nice and cool AC, kitchenette was quite nice, great pool! Cons:  Breakfast had no protein, it was cereal and hostess cakes, our room wasn't cleaned once, the floors were dirty (the carpets probably need a deep clean and the tiles need scrubbed), horrible water pressure in the shower

It's close to Disney World. There's a super market across the street. It is very convenient to buy food. Its location is in the east Los Angeles,if you go to west Los Angeles,the high way always jamed,so you will take more hours to get the other places.

Everything was fine, my only recommendation would add more food for breakfast, and thank you very much for the recommendations of the Ryck worker, all very nice and thoughtful, I am sure I will be hosting there again.

Hotel Pepper Tree was a pleasant surprise in price and adorableness!  the kitchens (ours was yellow and reminded me of a tiny farm kitchen)  allowed us to make simple food and relax in the room but the nearby restaurants are excellent.  I love the Saltillo tile floors and the southwest décor.  Definitely not your cookie cutter hotel.    Breakfast... not so great.  some variety would be nice and maybe keep the coffee and tea out all day?  But the nearby Scratch restaurant had wonderful breakfast food.  Laundomat next door was helpful.  Market pricing caught me off guard... be aware that the prices change per night!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your helpful feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm and full kitchens. We appreciate your suggestions  and tips about breakfast. We will make sure our management team considers your comments. We would love to have you back again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We love staying at this hotel!  It is unique, has a lot of personality, is clean and the rooms are beautiful. It is relaxing and wonderful to have your own patio like we had this time, or balcony as I've had previously. Feels like a resort.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the lovely review! We are so happy that you have enjoyed both of your stays. Come back again soon!

Summary: Quaint, convenient and well appointed rooms.  Only recommendation would be for staff to put signs in hallways at night reminding other guests to keep it quiet...we had adults and kids making noise for a long time in the hall at 2:30 am.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! We are sorry for the noisy guests but would love to have you back.

Summary Heading: One of the best stays anywhere
Summary: My son and I drove down from the pacific northwest and stayed here. It was great! Loved the fridge to put snacks in and the comfy beds. My daughter would come over and hang out, it was great having a couch. It was extremely clean and the people were friendly. It is a little hard to get anywhere from there if you don't have a car. But we'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are honored to be considered one of your best stays anywhere!!!  Thank you!  Come back again soon.

Summary: Our room was by the elevator so the paper thin walls allowed the perfect listening experience to the constant elevator and every person in the hallway. The beds were stiff, the pillows lumpy. At one point the finish on the floor peeled off onto my bare feet. There was mold, visible water damage, and a cockroach in the kitchen. The staff were friendly and the owner is wonderful but the rooms could use some work which may explain the higher pricing. Overall our stay was whatever so definitely room to improve.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. we will make sure to inspect your room immediately. We do not allow our rooms to be in the conditioned you mentioned. We wish you would have talked with us during your stay so we could switch rooms and resolve any issues that you experienced.

Summary: I have stayed at PepperTree a couple of times. Employees are very nice and hotel always clean. But please change out the old mattresses. I woke with a backache every morning from sleeping in an indebted spot in mattresses from use after use. Time to upgrade this part of service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being a loyal guest. We appreciate your feedback. We have changed all of our mattress very recently and would love to know which room number you stayed in so we can inspect the bed immediately. Please give us a quick call so we can help resolve this issue.

Summary: What a nice surprise.  The reviews were good and  i'd previously reserved a week last summer but got cold feet with not going with a large chain.  I'm so happy we stayed this time.  The hotel is an old Spanish style converted apartment building.  The staff was warm and friendly, the room was large and the kitchen with a full sized refrigerator was a nice bonus.  We stayed 5 nights and we're very happy with everything.  We did not use the pool so I can't address that.  The Grab and Go breakfast was very convenient, fresh coffee and packaged pastries, fruit, cereal.  Only thing I missed was an ice machine.  Thanks for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you stayed too! Thanks so much for the helpful feedbackand review. We hope to see you again next year.

Summary: Glad to have a unique pleasant affordable hotel in the area. Frustations: Difficult to maintain comfortable room temp - freezing/hot. Very strong chemical smell upon arriving to the point of effecting breathing (I almost asked to change rooms) - clean is good but too much strong chemical residue, in the room and hall. NOT good. Lastly, the "maid" service entered even though we had hung 'do not disturb' sign.
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We so glad that you enjoyed our affordability and charm. We will make sure to work with our housekeeping staff regarding the issues that you mentioned. Thank you again for the review - we will use it to better our service and hotel.

Summary: I've been coming to The Hotel Pepper Tree for quite a while now.  We always looks around the LA area for different hotels, but everything else is just so expensive.  The Hotel Pepper Tree is perfect for what we need.  The full kitchen is a great feature.  We didn't utilize it this time around, but I could smell the bacon from our balcony in the morning.  This is also great if you have any leftovers from eating out so you don't just have to throw everything away.  Staff is always super friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you had another great stay - thank you for being such a loyal guest!! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The front desk people are really nice and they are kind. The decoration of the hotel are pretty cool! But you can hear anything from hallway. Room cleaning service is so bad. You need to wash dishes by yourself without providing dishwasher soap.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our staff and boutique charm. We are sorry that you did not enjoy our housekeeping service. We do provide dish soap, sponges and towels in all the rooms - they are located under the sink. We wish that you were able to talk with our front desk team so we could have helped resolve the issue during your stay.

Summary: Stayed there to go to Disneyland.  Room was nice but we had to get an uber to get anywhere the bus does not go to this location. Breakfast was slim but ok. Also hard to find lobby at first lol it's kinda hidden.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your room. We do have an ART shuttle stop at the hotel which connects you to the entire Anaheim Resort Area. We hope that visit us again in the future.

Summary: It was a comfortable and clean place.  We enjoyed our stay, ouf kitchenette was nice and helpful. Also appreciate that the hotel is dog friendly. We didnt bring our dogs, but we saw many and the room would be comfy for furry guests. Overall it was a good hotel and a pleasent stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We would love to have you and some furry guests join us the next time you are here in Anaheim.

Summary: Carpet is smelly,  room is too dark, some outlets are not working, far away from Disney.  Will not stay there again.  .. Good part is free parking and free breakfast. The charge is more than other hotel. I think I would rather go to a different hotel next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our free parking and breakfast. We also appreciate your comments and will make sure to check your room immediately for the outlet issue and carpet. We hope that you were able to talk with front desk team so we could help resolve any issues.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay here at Pepper Tree Boutique. The staff at the front desk are very nice and the room was so cute. Its very close to Knott's Berry Farm and not far from downtown Disney (10-12mins). It wasn't crowded, very quite at night and the beds were comfortable . I will for sure stay again and would recommended to others.   The only thing I didn't like was being woken up by a vacuum from the room above us and it was soooo loud and it sounded like they dropped it multiple times. It was around 9am so if you plane to sleep in just know they start cleaning rooms around that time. Also, The muffins and coffee are taken away right on the dot at 10am. So filler up cause I came at 10:02 am and they weren't messing around with putting it all way.lol  But like I said before I
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and are thankful for your recommendations. We will make sure to notify our staff about your helpful suggestions. We are excited to have you come back on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Best family place near the park
Summary: Great room, great price, great service.  We will stay here every time we come to visit southern California and Disney.   We had such a good experience we extended our stay and are looking forward to next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your sweet words! We are so happy that your entire family enjoyed your visit. Come back soon!!

Summary: The property is located in a great location, easy  access to the freeways, restaurants gas stations and shopping. The rooms include all your needs and  the property includes a pool. Thanks for the complimentary breakfast!
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful tips and feedback. We are so happy that you found the location convenient. We hope you can come back soon.

Summary: The service was great...just wish the pool was a bit more heated but other than that it was a very pleasant experience . The location was perfect and the staff was friendly . The room was comfy and spacious
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our great staff and convenient location. We hope you come back!

Summary: Great Hotel for your family if you need a kitchen. Beds are the one and only issue with this hotel. Sure it's an older hotel, but it is more like staying at your own home in a way. Rooms are on the older side and seem smaller in size than the picture, but the staff keeps them clean and well stocked with clean towels.  The beds we had were old and if you are sleeping with two people in the same bed you rolled into the middle of the beds. Wanted to get a roll away being we had 3 people in the room, but was told it was an additional 13.00 for toe roll away bed. Toilets are older and could  use a change to the Elongated style since people are ever larger and larger these days. Would stay again if they replaced the beds. Very close to Knotts Barry Farms and overall a nice place to
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our home away from home feel. We appreciate your feedback and have looked into the beds immediately. Thank you again for your helpful feedback and tips.

Summary: My family and I just enjoyed a wonderful stay here at Pepper Tree Hotel! The staff was very professional and helpful. The room was clean and spacious and we loved the the Spanish style! We would for sure stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks so much for the great review.

Summary: Despite having some age, the property is well maintained.  Located among restaurants and a grocery store within walking distance.  Kitchen was sparsely appointed but anything requested was provided almost immediately.  Front desk staff was phenomenal.  Regardless of who was working or whatever time of day or evening, they were friendly, attentive and engaging.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and our friendly staff. We will make sure they see your very kind words.

Summary: This was the filthiest room I have ever stayed in. I don't think the places had been dusted in a yr. Good thing we brought our own pillows and blankets. We were so tired when we got there or we would have gone elsewhere. I took pictures of greasy grime on walls. I'm totally disgusted by the filth.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We inspected your room immediately but could not find any of the issues you mentioned. Again, we are sorry that you felt this way and that you did not enjoy your stay. Please call us direct so we can help you further.

Summary: This hotel was very comfortable - eclectic spanish style - spacious room and loved the fact that we had a full size fridge and private patio.  Staff was friendly and very helpful.  Was worried about parking but we found a parking every time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique style and courtyard studios! Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: A great option in the Anaheim area
Summary: I recently flew in to Anaheim for a job interview and I chose this hotel to stay at because it was close to the business I was interviewing for, had the best price, and I was intrigued by the advertised full kitchens in the rooms.  I had a really pleasant stay here. All the staff were so kind and helpful. The room I had was large with a HUGE window and a bigger balcony than I have at my home apartment. The kitchen was fantastic and the hotel provides pots and pans, silverware, dishes, and drinkware as well as paper towels, dish soap, and a scrubbing sponge to wash the dishes in the great big sink.  The decor of the hotel was unlike any I've seen. Rustic and warm with the coolest light fixtures in the room. All in all, I enjoyed my time here. It felt a lot like home. My only
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We hope you get the job. We so appreciate your helpful feedback and tips. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice little hotel,  decent breakfast,  roomy rooms.
Summary: Nice rooms, kitchen nicely stocked with utensils, cute little sitting area with couch, the bathroom is small and rooms could use some updates, no hot tub but nice little pool area with bbq grill, staff is friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our large rooms and full kitchens. Thanks for the feedback and review.

Summary: This was probably the friendliest hotel I've ever stayed at. The grounds and hotel are beautiful old Spanish decor. The room had everything we needed and was clean and comfortable. The hotel also offered a free shuttle to Disneyland and was only ten minutes from there. It's even closer to Knott's Berry Farm and a fairly short drive to beaches. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the compliment and wonderful review. We would love to have you back.

Summary: Room's were very nice sized.  Cute patio area.  For a family it was nice because there was room to move around and had we stayed more than one night, the kitchen would have been super nice. It is older and smelled of bleach but plenty of towels lots of plugs for electronics and cute water fall on patio.  Overall very happy

We conve from Utah ti Disneyland/baseball games a litt and never really knows where yi stay that's nice bitt doesn't cost a fortune. This place was awesome.  I think we found we've we will akways stay! We will definately stay here again!!!

It was clean and the staff were friendly and helpful. The beds were pretty comfortable and it had a kitchen with all the utensil you need to cook at the hotel. My kids loved the pool but we loved the location. Very close to knotts berry farm and a supermarket right across the street. We even saw a squiel in the smoking section which we named pepper tree squiel. I would stay here again when I visited California.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay!! We would love to have you back again.

Summary: Thank you all so much. We really enjoyed our stay and thank you again for the card and wine! We loved the location and the ambiance of the hotel (inside and outside). Being from Arizona, our tiled hispanic styled room made us feel right at home.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm. Come back again!

Summary: Stayed for 10 days while visiting family. Hotel is a great to use as a base, kitchen very useful, all nice and clean. Beds very comfy and clean. Bit noisy but then that’s to be expected with a hotel full of excited Disney visitors! Breakfast was nice, great coffee and plenty of cereal and fruit. Thought I might be able to use the pool but it was pretty much kids only as very small. A small fitness room would be really good. Will definitely use again
Manager Response: We love to hear from our extended stay guests! Thanks so much for the tips. We are so happy that you will be back.

Summary: I loved this place.  Close to Disney and rooms are very spacious and comfortable.  The reception was great, the cleaning was on top of all my requests.  Only downfall was that the pool and pool area are not exactly what was pictured, but the teens loved it.  Would stay again for the price and service.

Summary Heading: The room was nice but it was not very clean.
Summary: The room was nice, quiet and comfortable bed, my only complaint is that the day of our arrival I found a hair in the tub, which already generates distrust as to how clean the room is. The next day, the problem was solved.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your staff and are very sorry for the hair that you found. We will make sure to work with our housekeeping staff to improve their service.

Summary: I have stayed many times to visit family and I would not go anywhere else. The hotel is well situated, and the rooms are sizeable and comfortable.  The staff are incredibly helpful on any matter, small or large. As with all hotels, one is at the mercy of who is next door, and this time we did have noisy neighbours who crashed about at 5.30am with no respect for anyone else. but that is not the fault of the management.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thank you so much for the comments and review. We are sorry for the noise that you experienced this visit and appreciate your patience and understanding. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I booked my stay based off of what the hotel offered. I got there and it was more than I expected and  I had a request that they helped with last minute. I had a great experience and I'll stay again!!!
Manager Response: We are so happy that your stay exceeded your expectations!! We would love to have you back again. Thank you for the review.

Summary Heading: Great place to take a vacation
Summary: This was a great place to stay at. My husband and I were very impressed by the layout of the hotel. Very cozy place to stay at. Not to far from the beach and other places to visit. I loved that they had everything in the kitchen to make a meal if you didnt want to go out to eat

Everything good breakfast but bien jodido no waffles  no toast no bagels, you charge for yogurt continental breakfast is an exaggeration maybe a poor continent   Motel 6 and Best Westerns have better breakfasts

We loved everything.  One thing that should be upgraded, there are no dead bolts on the doors. There is a lock, but when you open the door the lock automatically opens. Which means my kids kept opening the door. (1,3,4,8) So, thats my one thing I did not like. Everything else was awesome! We had a downstairs room with a courtyard, it was perfect!

Easy check in and staff was very friendly and helpful. Room and facilities were clean and parking was convenient. Location was good for traveling to different attractions. The only improvement to check in would be for the Hotel Pepper Tree to have more than 1 luggage cart available on the property. We had to locate the luggage cart and retrieve it from another guest room before we could unload our luggage. It took my wife and I about 30 minutes to locate the cart in another guest room.

Summary Heading: NOT a Certificate of Excellence 4 years in a row quality hotel!
Summary: The hotel is not what is advertised!!! Not updated, not clean and the furniture in bad chipped up condition! The guests are worrisome also. Do not stay here.  How could Trip Advisor give a 4 year in a row Certificate of Excellence? Not possible. Needs a thorough inspection from T.A.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and that you did not choose to stay at our hotel. Because you were not satisfied when you arrived at the hotel, we were able to fully refund and cancel your reservation immediately with no fees. We care about the comfort of all of our guests. We worked with you to resolve this situation quickly, so you could find another hotel that better suited your needs.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with the spacious accommodations in the room. The kitchen and sitting area were very convenient in lending itself to a comfortable space to lounge and visit. I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: We would love to have you back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: I was a little bit disappointed because I got a call days before the check in and requested a room above the pool and when I got there they said that none available. I have been coming to this Hotel now for more that 5 or 6 years in a row.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests. Thank you for your feedback. We did our best with assigning you to a room that was very close to the pool but are sorry that it wasn't quite what you expected. We do are very best to try to accommodate all guest requests especially when the room was booked a few days before arrival. We will make sure to assign a room closer to the pool on our next visit. Thank you again for your loyalty.

Summary: Great location and nice for a great staycay. Will back to this location real soon. The staff was real helpful and knowledgeable of the area. The hotel is real clean and the king studio is amazing for a couple stay.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you a great staycation. We would love to have you back soon! Thanks for the review.

Summary: Hotel staff were nice, no ice machine, in room, rooms were ok, a bit on the old side, was surprised that the rating was fabulous, an ok place. Some reviews were way unkind, the area is older but if you're going to Disneyland it's good, we didn't have any problems. Kitchen, comfortable beds, just older is all, but good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed our location, beds, and full kitchens. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I stayed one night and had a nice time.  My fiancé and I were there for a getaway trip with our dog Truffles.  It was the only hotel we could find that let pets stay there.  Everyone was very nice and we felt safe being there.

Summary Heading: For the money, there isnt much better
Summary: Ive stayed here a few times when vacationing for a Disneyland trip. For the money, you cant find much better. 15 min drive from Disney, walking distance from good food and a supermarket. Pool is always fun and the kitchenettes help you save money by being able to cook at your hotel.

Summary Heading: Nice Place but a few Problems
Summary: Nice place - clean and attractive. The biggest problem was the terrible cell phone signal. My wife has AT&T and I have Verizon - it was very difficult to receive or make phone calls. If I stood in the corner of the parking lot I could get 2 bars! The staff acknowledged the problem - nothing they could do. Wifi wasn't that good either.  If the above 2 items aren't your concern, you should have a lovely stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and helpful feedback. We are so glad that you found the hotel clean and charming. We are sorry for the cell phone issues you experienced. We will also make sure to look into the Wifi signal and hope you were able to contact our WiFi support team. Thanks again for your comments - we will make sure to use them to better our hotel.

Summary: The hotel was better then expected , they should have better pictures of the rooms online because it was amazing ! Also pictures that there’s a restroom in the room... wasn’t to sure if there was one !rather then that it was the best vacation so far due to the room!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: It was perfect for my purpose. Loved that my studio suite was very roomy, with  a kitchen , rooms were cleaned daily, bed and sheets were excellent .I loved that it was quiet(did not hear much of  any activities from other rooms or the hallways or outside traffic ). Happy not to be near Disney or Convention Center traffic. Was close  enough to those places tho’. I did drive tho’. But hey, Free Parking! Being inside the building was like being in a Spanish casa/villa 😉Did not expect grandeur or over the top luxury, but it certainly felt homey elevated. I could have stayed at a more luxurious hotel but i paid for my entire stay of 4 nights for 1 to 2 nights(at discount) at those places! I found great value for the money staying here.

I love coming here! The staff is courteous and so helpful. I enjoy the Spanish flavor with the tile and painting-charming and old school. For me it is centrally located and the kitchenette is homey!  I splurge and get the patio with the fountain-I find it relaxes me. I have stayed here 6 times in the past year as I come for some family business. This hotel serves my needs quite well.

Just one comment.. our tub faucet leaked really bad even when tightening the faucets! Very wasteful!! Everything else was very nice and we noticed a lot of updates since our last visit!! Thank you! We will be back!

Incredibly beautiful rooms and great location , I highly re the kitchen king studio ! The service could be a bit better also the pool is not too large but I didn’t care for that . There’s a lot of grocery stores close by so the limited dining options onsite are not too troublesome. If you travel with kids you might need something with larger pool and more amenities though.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique style and full kitchens. Thanks for the review!

Summary: Love to stay here it's such a cute hotel. Last stay was on the top floor which I didn't care for. I love the bottom floor in the middle of the floor so you don't hear the elevators. Love that they have a kitchen, makes it feel a little more like home. Always friendly staff.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear from our repeat guests. Thanks for the helpful tips. We love our Courtyard Studios the best too!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay for families
Summary: We had a great time at this place.  The room was clean, comfortable, spacious with a kitchen and needed utensils, cutlery, microwave, fridge and oven and cleaning supplies and also a balcony! We loved the Spanish style architecture filled with nice relaxing sounds from flowing water !! The breakfast was okay but can be better with more fresh pastries that are non GMO and vegetarian.  The breakfast area was very cramped so we just had it at our room.  They had pure water that we could fill up and  some snacks that we can purchase.  It's also a 10-15 min ride to Disneyland and takes about $10.  There is a nearby grocery store to buy essential items.  The stay was great and service was good.  We were happy with the stay.  Highly recommend this place 👍

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. A cute and quiet boutique hotel with beautiful furnishings. I am so happy we chose this hotel. 10/10 would stay again!! The patio was a great plus that I hadn't expected prior to our arrival
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We are overall satisfied with our visit. We stayed in room 219 and the room directly above was continuously very noisy past 10pm. After an hour of the noise I called the front desk and they called the room. They said they only checked in 2 minutes prior to me calling. Wrong! We could not sleep because of the noise above us and in the hallway. I would suggest better sound proofing the hotel. We love the hotel and the location though. Beautiful property, this was our 3rd stay there.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thank you so much for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that you love our location and boutique style but we will make sure to look into the noise issues you mentioned. Thanks again for the review. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree for one night and decided to change to another place to stay during our visit to Anaheim.  It is a quaint hotel in a quiet area.  The property is well maintained and clean.  Our room had a king bed with a large couch to lounge on and watch TV.  There was also a full kitchen that was fully equipped from what we could see but we didn't use the kitchen.  A staff member called me after I booked the reservation through Expedia to see if there was anything they could do to prepare for our stay to ensure that we were comfortable which I thought was really nice.  I have never received a call like that before.  We chose to move to another hotel after one night simply because we wanted to be closer to the attractions but there was nothing wrong with the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so glad that you found your room clean and our staff friendly. Thank you for the helpful tips.

Summary: I can recommend the hotel! Very calm, good neighborhood, clean and big rooms, enough parking spaces. It is a great place! Pool was also clean, nice furniture, modern air condition, comfortable beds. Top!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recommendations! We hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Came back to stay here for my bachelorette party, the staff was very welcoming and kind. The room was perfect and clean. Enjoyed the stay very much as I always do. I love this hotel!! Can’t wait to come back. Hopefully in October.  It’s always a perfect stay.
Manager Response: We are so honored to be a part of your bachelorette party! Thanks so much for the review! We will see you in October.

Summary: We were very satisfied with the room for the price!!   The size and speciousness was great!  The only concern was when I grabbed a towel off of the rack and upon unrolling it discovered it had makeup on it, not just a little but quite a bit and it wasn't a stain it was "fresh"  face makeup smeared on the inside of the roll.  It had obviously been put up in the rack used...
Manager Response: We are so happy that you found our rooms large and a great value. We will make sure to talk with our housekeeping staff immediately about the issue you found.

Summary: We spent the week and everything was wonderful. We slept like babies, location was wonderful, and the rooms had everything we needed. The only complaint we could have was the wi-fi connection at times. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review! We are so happy that everything was great. We hope you were able to talk with our WiFi customer support to help resolve the slow speed.

Summary: Great spot for a trip with my dog.  Enclosed private patio on the first floor… Totally safe for him.  You can’t leave your dog in the room so check out Rover.com if you need a pet sitter.  The staff was exceptionally nice and offered to help us repeatedly. Great Pete’s coffee and a snack before 3 days at Disneyland. Free parking for both of our cars.  Super beds. What a great little spot this was..Helpful staff too!
Manager Response: We are so happy to have all of your family stay with us. Thanks for the great pet tips. We will make sure to pass them on to our other guests. Come back again soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel! It was very clean so it made our stay extremely comfortable and relaxing.  The staff was so nice! And the pricing is unbeatable.....Next time we come to LA we will definitely stay here!

Good location. Very clean hotel. Very nice staff, helpful. Would recommend for a short stay or long term. Close to shopping and attractions without the high hotel prices. Check in and out process seamless.

The room was very spacious and decorated well, but all the walls were filthy. They looked like they had not been wiped down in months, the bathroom in one of our rooms was also very dirty and there were mite looking bugs in there. The floors were also sticky in the kitchen. During the morning of our departure, I had one crawling on my body in the shower. I was disappointed and disgusted because I have stayed here before and also had a separate room and it was both clean and pleasant.

Hotel was clean. Staff was courteous and helpful.  The bed was great. Closet was huge  The breakfast was lacking. Basically fresh fruit and muffins and bear claws and sweet rolls. Now for the decor. Not sure if the wood in the room was just old or was supposed to look like that. Also the raised tile on the floor was hard to walk on. Was hoping not to stub my toes. Location was good about 5 miles from Disney. Can also buy tickets from the desk.

Summary Heading: Very spacious rooms and great amenities!
Summary: This is the second time we've stayed at this property, and definitely won't be our last! The rooms are very spacious and the property is unique and quaint. I enjoy the vibe of the hotel! On top of that, the hotel staff is very accommodating and kind. We were visiting for a special occasion - and we had surprise balloons, wine, and chocolates waiting for us in our room upon check-in...as well as a handwritten card welcoming us to the property! It was such a sweet and genuine gesture! We'll definitely be back!
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests - Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and are excited for your next visit with us.

Summary: This is a beautifully decorated hotel with friendly staff.  The room we stayed in was a king courtyard studio that felt like staying in someone's guest suite at their house.  It was very spacious and comfortable and the courtyard patio was like a miniature backyard and even had a cute little fountain.  I appreciated being able to borrow a DVD player from the front desk so my child could watch some Disney DVDS we brought with us.  It was a very good value, close to Disney, and I felt very safe staying there.  The free and good quality/ coffee bar was a huge plus.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and helpful tips! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and homey atmosphere. Come back again soon!

Summary: Nice place with a cute pool, nearby super market; took long walks; has a bus stop adjacent to the hotel... hotel booking was smooth when done from Singapore; front desk staff were courteous during my entire stay of 9 days...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! We are so happy that the entire process of your stay was easy and relaxing. We would be honored to have you back again.

Summary: Loved the Spanish tile fountains and bougainvillea growing up the walls.  Great Locations close to markets and easy access, Staff was very helpful and friendly.   Nice quiet peaceful stay! We loved the little courtyard off of our room!

Rm 126 and 309. The first floor room seems to be a converted laundry /  maintenance room. It had strange outlet on the wall. I love the hotel’s quirky old vibe. Third floor room has the beautiful tile.

We loved it here so much and will definitely stay here again if we make it back to California.  The staff was helpful and nice the entire stay.  Everything was pristine and clean.  I could't find one flaw in anything.

Summary Heading: LOVED the room with a private patio!
Summary: It’s a very cute place!! I stayed in a ground floor room with two queen beds and private patio. I LOOOOVED the private patio, which gave the grownups a place to relax while the little ones are sleeping.   The front staff were all nice and helpful. The beds were comfortable and the blackout curtain worked really well. As long as you get lucky with neighboring roomers you’ll get good night sleep. (You hear EVERYTHING from every direction!) The shower was one of those water conserving shower head, and while I get the reason why they chose it, it was still the most disappointing part of the stay.    The housekeeping was not consistent at all. We always had different number of towels and the floor was never vacuumed on any of the three days we requested to get the room serviced. (Two

Everything was awesome! I'd like to do a special thank to Dayse. She was amazing! I hope to come back again. The breakfast is very good. The room was very clean and the bed is very comfortable.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our friendly staff, breakfast options and room. Come back again soon!

Summary: I was a satisfied customer. There is Beautiful decor from Mexico.I was very impressed. definitely would recommend you and definitely will come back. Thank you for a Pepper Tree for a beautiful place to stay.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm! Thank you so much for your recommendations. We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary: My wife and I were in the city on business and wanted to stay as cheap as we could. The room was inexpensive! We brought a cooler so we could make meals while we were there. So no restaurant bills and the hotel rooms were very nice. The Hotel was close to everything!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that you were able to use our full kitchens during your visit. Come back again soon!

Summary: Room smelled of musty old wood. We bought deodorizers to try and help, but didn't really. Sheets were scratchy and made us feel itchy. We wore flip flops in the shower because we just didn't feel it was cleaned very well. After sheets were changed they were a bit better. Kitchen area smelled terrible. Did not use any cabinets. Fridge and stove was really nice! Did not use the pool area due to cloudy weather and tiny pool area. This hotel had great ratings but we were very underwhelmed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. We hope that you were able to speak with our front desk staff during your visit so we could help resolve the issues you mentioned. We will make sure to inspect your room immediately. Again, we are sorry that you did not fully enjoy your stay, but we will use you feedback to better our hotel.

Summary: The property is very nice, we used it for a trip to Disney and the location is perfect, just 10 minutes from the parks. Is family friendly and very clean. There is also a Target and many restaurants close to it.
Manager Response: We are so happy that our hotel was a great spot for you to stay on your Disneyland vacation! Thanks for the great review and tips.

Summary Heading: The morning staff was so kind and friendly. Pepper tree was very charming. We would stay again.
Summary: The morning staff was so friendly. The breakfast host was such s nice guy. The hotel was very charming. The pool was very fun for the family. It was a very nice stay. We would stay again. The location was close to everything.
Manager Response: We love our staff too! We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm and convenient location. Thanks for the review.

Summary: Room was clean. Good service, would stay again. Some minor maintenance needed in bathroom on door and sink. But overall good stay. Good to have kitchenette with refrigerator. Mattress should be replaced soon.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed the fill kitchen and good service. We will make sure to look into the maintenance issues immediately! We would love to have you back.

Summary Heading: Clean rooms. Friendly staff. Great for families.
Summary: We absolutely loved staying here. The rooms were very clean. Comfortable beds. We had a room with a king, twin and a full sized kitchen. Perfect for families. Staff was amazing and very easy to work with. House keeping did well tiddying up every morning. We had our own little patio to ourselves and a cute little "entertainment" area.  I only have two minor issues to staying here, while checking in we were told there was a complementary 24 coffee bar which was true for half of our stay and the second half they stopped offering it. The second was the bath tub. While it was clean, the floor of the tub seemed dirty, I'm not sure if it was stained or what but I had a hard time with that. Overall, very pleased with our stay and will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and the private patio area. We think these are the best rooms too! We did change the coffee bar hours during your visit and are sorry. It is still available until 10am every morning. We will make sure to inspect your bathtub immediately. Thanks again for the review. We are so happy that you will be back.

Summary: I really enjoyed staying here. The rooms are very comfortable,  the staff is very nice and accommodating, and the location is nice. My wife and I stayed here as part of our 10th anniversary trip and the staff left a gift in our room with a note wishing us a happy anniversary signed by the staff. I will be staying here if ever in the area again and will reccomend to whom ever I know that needs a room in the area.
Manager Response: We were so honored to help you celebrate your 10th anniversary! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. If you come back Anaheim, we would love to have you.

Summary: We booked because it looked like a really pretty hotel, my girlfriend really like the style of it. The front desk ladies were so kind to us! Will definitely come back at some point if we happen to go to Disney again soon!

Summary Heading: A great location for a Staycation
Summary: This is a great place! It’s small and has it’s charm. The hotel is so close to Knott’s Berry Farm. The kids enjoyed the pool. You meet people from all over the world. Their front desk is conveniently open 24 hrs.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and convenient location! Thanks so much for the great review. Come back again to relax soon.

Summary: everyone was very helpful at all times. the room was great and the location of the room was too. there were good restaurants just a short walk away. on location laundry room would be nice but there is one across the street, and there is all kinds of shopping near by
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful feedback and tips! We are so glad that you enjoyed your trip!! Come back again soon.

Summary: Thank you for such a great stay!  The hotel staff was AMAZING and the place is very tidy and clean!  The area is a bit noisy (traffic), but since we were away most of the day, it really didn't impact us much, as it was pretty quiet at night.  The pool looked super clean and refreshing, but I didn't get a chance to jump in (next time).  Thanks for such a great place!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are so happy that you found your room clean and the staff friendly! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My husband and I were traveling to Anaheim with friends.  One day was a pharmacy seminar and the rest were for fun.  We were looking for a nice inexpensive place to stay.  We enjoyed staying at the PepperTree. The beds were comfortable, the rooms were quiet, and we had a balcony and enough room so all four of us could play cards around the table.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the great review and helpful feedback.

Summary: I couldn't have been happier with our 4 day stay at the Pepper Tree. They Spanish style is so charming and the rooms are quite big with comfortable beds. And the price is simply unbeatable. Oh and the art bus picked us up right outside to go to Disneyland and Knotts. We have found our forever hotel in the OC!

Our stay was for 4 nights everyone was extremely friendly. The property and rooms were very clean. Sure the bathrooms could be updated but they were very clean. The rooms were very spacious. The property has a Old Mission  Cali vibe. The coffee machine was awesome and so was the lite breakfast offered for free!! Check out the Mexican supermarket across the street it's awesome if you are into that sort of thing! We will be back!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and helpful tips! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. Come back soon!

Summary: unwinding from stresses of lifes daily grind...  this is a great stay so far..  experiences here as of to date have been great.. The Courtyard off Beach or Country Inn Suites off Clemmintine are nice but do not have homey feeling as Pepper Tree the only setback for me is that you have no incentives (reward programs, discounts) for me to continue to enjoy weekend gettaways here...something to keep us coming back...
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful feedback. We are so glad that you have enjoyed our boutique charm and homey atmosphere. We will make sure to consider your idea about a rewards program. We do have a book direct discount and are also happy to work with your unique situation. We would love to have you back again.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights,  family of 4, they have roll away cots, but the one we got was broken/lopsided that I had to pad with blankets for my dtr to sleep on.  Throw pillows on bed need to go,  highly unsanitary/ can't be washed nor can covers be changed... After the 2nd night of trying to hide them housekeeping didn't put them back on beds thankfully.  The concept of the hotel is nice,  but its dated, which makes it feel less than clean.  Walls thin, but I sleep with earplugs.  The dishes we used were not washed daily, but they don't provide dish soap, so they just piled up. The continental breakfast provided is actually packaged muffins/pastry, creal, and orange or apple or banana,  so don't bother if you eat more... go next door to the Scratch Room for great breakfast.  It was
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are sorry that we did not quite meet your expectations. We wished that you would have spoken to us during your visit so we could help resolve the issues you experienced. We do dry clean the throw pillows on all of the beds. We also do have dish soap for the dishes located under the sink. Thank you again for your review - we will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel and service.

Summary: This hotel was so homey! The staff was awesome. David the manager, was very helpful. He went above and beyond, when it came to booking my room. Room was nice, clean, and it was really quiet.  Thanks!!🤗
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We love David, too! We are so happy that enjoyed your room and our homey atmosphere. Come back again soon.

Summary: As a Medical Sales Rep I stay at hotels 100+ nights per year, normally I stay at huge chains where I accumulate points, this property is so exceptional that I don't mind making an exception for receiving points.  This place had very eclectic rooms, all have small kitchens and unique themes.  The ground floor are my favorite as they have patios with fountains and table with chairs.  Great Property.

they were over charged for some fee.  dirty room. uncomfortable everything. Breakfast was not much food for breakfast. We'll never want to join this hotel again.  We do not have a reservation for this hotel again, and I do not have a recommendation to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and our sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We are also sorry that you were unaware of the resort fee when you booked through a third party website. Thank you again for your comments. We will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: What a beautiful experience , Great location, helpful staff, very clean rooms full of character, good kitchen. On the go breakfast . Swimming pool clean and beautiful.  Highly recommended  for individuals and families

Summary Heading: Nice stay at the Pepper Tree
Summary: all in all, our stay at the Pepper Tree was good, our only complaint was a strange smell in the room, most likely the carpet. The bathroom was also very small.  Bed and towels were clean. Pool area is small and literally in the parking lot, hence a little strange. The hotel has a bit of a charm to it, making it a little more pleasant then your typical motel.

Great service, great staff made for a great stay! I came for a conference I was presenting at and I loved the fact that they had partial ADA compliant rooms, that made a big difference. I was even able to make arrangements with the hotel for the pick up of my mobility scooter.

Not terrible, but I wont stay there again. My husband and I stayed here for our sons wedding. It was conveniently located and I wanted a suite that had a kitchen etc.  The room was good sized, but arranged awkwardly. I had a king patio suite.First thing I noticed is that there wasn't a screen door on the sliding door, Not usually a problem, but with the fountain outside, we knew mosquitoes would be there. So we couldn't enjoy the sound of the fountain with the door open.  Its advertised as a full size kitchen, which it has but there wasn't a table to sit at. There were only two arm chairs and a small round table that we couldn't fit our take out food on. There is a single bed in the room as well, and that didn't need to be there. It took up way too much room and there could have
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for your thoughtful feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed the location and full kitchens. We will make sure to note the suggestions that you gave and will make sure our management team discusses them. We are sorry that we were not quite what you were looking for but appreciate your review.

Summary: The staff is super friendly, anything you could think of they would offer a solution.  The Rooms are wide and spacious, well equipped and the beds are really comfortable. The kitchen and appliances work perfectly.  The only issue that I found was that we had no soap to wash the dishes in the kitchen, but the person at front desk corrected it immediately.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so glad that our staff was helpful for all your needs.  We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: Pretty clean room and super nice staff,and when we arrived late at night and we can still cook in our room,really close to the Disneyland and convenient store close by ,there is one thing not really good was AC not working very good but that’s not big problem for us~
Manager Response: We are so happy to be your home away from home. We are so glad that you enjoyed the kitchen and staff. We will make sure to look into your AC immediately. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: The room was roomy, space for everyone. Everyone was very nice and helpful. The room itself was pretty clean, carpet and bathroom could use an update. My only real complaint would be the smell. The hallway was unpleasant but the room didnt smell.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed our large rooms and helpful staff. We are sorry about the hallway smell you experienced. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: The stay was very pleasant. The only concern or suggestion is some type of wall clock or night stand clock radio of some sort. I have to bring my own portable clock. It would sure be nice for that little  convenience .
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the suggestion. We will make sure our management team sees your comments.

Summary: Great location, friendly staff. Close to hwy, disneyland and shopping. Common areas are always clean and maintained. Free parking is great. Grocery store right across the street. Heated pool is small but great for a nice swim after a day out.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! Come back again.

Summary: Very friendly Latin decor hotel. Rooms have space to move around in and have a small kitchen. There is a nice private patio outside. Their also a latte machine in the breakfast room with a general selection of items to eat and a self serve 24hr pantry kiosk for chips and snacks. Pool is clean and is frequented by children, though they are very quiet. Knott's Berry farm is very close, with a round trip Lyft cheaper than parking and gets you door to door. Also service to and from Disneyland. Just 35 minutes from uncluttered Long Beach Airport and pretty much a straight shot down the street. Staff makes it five star , being attentive and always smiling.  I do recommend this hotel as a high value.😃
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the fantastic review! We are so thankful for the recommendations and helpful tips. We hope you come back again soon!

Summary: I would say the staff is super helpful and friendly. This is where my family will be staying when they come to visit. I didn't have a traditional stay. I was recovering from a minor surgery and just wanted a quiet,  comfortable place to do that.  Hotel Peppertree exceeded my expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are glad that you were able to rest and relax during your visit.

Summary: Pepper Tree is a quaint Spanish style hotel about a 10 minute Uber ride from Disneyland. Enjoyed our stay and worth the 10 minute distance. The rooms can be noisy depending on your neighbours which was a bit concerning but they do provide ear plugs. Nice to have coffee, tea and lattes available as well as orange and lemon water. Breakfasts we usually had in our well appointed suite but the hotel did have pre packaged pastries and mini muffins. Not real breakfast but grab and go as advertised. Nice grocery store right across the street with great choices. Also a laundromat across the street so we were able to go home with freshly washed clothing. ART bus also picks up right at the hotel but found the return trip from Disneyland took too long due to too many stops so ended up

This is a beautiful boutique hotel with a lot of character.  The staff was very friendly and the 24 hour coffee bar was wonderful.  The 'take & go' was good with fruit, cereal & pastries.  We had no issues with noise and the kitchen was adequate for what we needed.  The only thing that would have added to our overall great experience was if it had a 'hot-tub'.  We would definitely stay here again!

Room was very comfortable, very quiet. mini to go breakfast area was so convenient it took us only 10 minutes to get to Disneyland the staff were super nice people. The pool was sparking clean and very enjoyable. the flowers and trees were beautiful

This was, by far, one of the best places I’ve stayed. The staff was extremely helpful, having a small kitchen allowed us to cook our own meals and feel the comforts of home without renting a whole house! The poolside BBQ grill was great. Breakfast is limited but the 24 hour coffee machine is great! This hotel is in close proximity to the attractions of Anaheim.

I give 4 stars because I had a small issue at check in. We planned to stay at the hotel for our disneyland family trip. My mother in law had reserved the room for us as a gift and paid for the room online. When I arrived at check in the attendant said they needed the card used to book, which I didnt have. So in short I had to use my own card which took $500 out of our spending money. We did get our $100 deposit back at the end of the stay but still would have been nice to buy gifts or souvenirs instead of the room as originally planned.  The room was great, I liked the decor and the kitchen was good. Pots and pans ect included.  I wish they had a set of tongs for cooking. But overall we enjoyed the stay and would stay again. You are close to disney and its easy to get to. We

We had a 3 nights stay here in April 2019. Convinient location, close to Disneyland. Room was clean and nice, but the kitchen was not-so-functional - tiny and without any dedicated table/chairs. I mean I could cook, but where/how to eat? On the bed? Doesn't make much sense to me. Also, breakfasts were all sorts of junk food which is absolute crime considering how many youngsters are staying here. Please remove that garbage from your kitchen guys, it's better not to serve  breakfast at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so glad that you enjoyed the location and clean rooms. We do have tables on all the patios/balconies along with tables by the couches. Our To-Go Breakfast does include fruit and cereal options along with pastries. We appreciate your suggestions and will make sure that our management team reviews them.

Summary: The room was great. The price was an amazing value. It is not within walking distance to Disney but it was a very close and convenient drive! Customer Service was top notch. Every employee we encountered was helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! We love helping our our Disneyland families on their trips to Anaheim. We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel was very old so that made it interesting.  It was well maintained. Only problem was the carpet in our room was filthy!  The desk said it was just dust, but if we went barefoot on the carpet our feet were black which comes from people's dirty shoes.  The bed was comfortable and the kitchen well supplied.  Loved the coffee machine in grab and go breakfast area which was accessible 24 hours a day.  We don't drink coffee but it also had hot and cold chotoblate and vanilla milk
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so glad that you loved our free coffee and full kitchens. We are so sorry for the carpet. We wash our carpets on a regular basis and will make sure to service your room immediately.

Summary: It was an amazing experience, everything we wanted. The only downside was the small toilet/bathroom and how thin the walls were. I could hear families screaming every morning. Overall I loved it and the staff was great!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and our staff. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: This is our second time staying here. The front staff was so helpful and nice. They held our bags for us while we spent the day at Disneyland. Rooms are spacious and have everything we needed to cook and enjoy our stay. The complementary coffee bar was a highlight and a reason we would come back lol.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for the feedback. We can't wait for you to come back again - your coffee will be ready and waiting!

Summary: I planned a bachelorette trip for my best friend here and couldn’t have been more pleased with the service and room. The room was perfect for a group of 4 and we even received a special in the room from the staff. The staff were very responsive with any requests or issues and the free coffee in the morning was delicious! It was note quite in walking distance t Disneyland for us but we had a car (with free parking) and we’re able to get there within about ten minutes. Close to freeways and hotel seemed very safe and well maintained. Thanks again for a great stay!

My family was very happy with our stay there. The grab and go breakfast was convenient. Cleanliness was good, staff was very helpful and nice. Location was great for Disneyland, beaches, shopping, and eating including eating at the Packing House.

I will say this was a really cute Spanish style room. I enjoyed our stay. Staff was very helpful. Pool was clean. This is a great place to call home away from home. We look forward to staying again in the future.

The hotel needs a car because taking the bus make take longer time and also waiting. The hotel is cheaper because areas closer to Disneyland is technically higher cost and also depends on the season. Also right across from the Disneyland is the convention center. Parking around Disneyland and convention center costs money when parking at close proximity, unless parking in residential street unrestricted further away and free, but takes longer to walk.

It was a very relaxed place. Our room was good for the short time we stayed. We did not stay in our room for very long, very close to Disneyland and really close to the beach as well. I do recommend. Staff was very friendly and helpful!

Summary Heading: Great value for Anaheim, could use some TLC
Summary: We loved our stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree. We would consider it again. It was a great price for the area and we loved having the kitchen, patio and seating area. We've got a 1 year old so the extra space was great. The only feedback that we'd have would be to give the rooms a little more TLC. Having a little one trying to get into everything, we noticed the built up dirt on the side of the frig, the not so clean areas under the cabinets and such. We also missed out on the only pool day we could have due to pool cleaning/repair from 9am-2pm.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are glad that you may come back again. We will make sure that our housekeeping team see your comments and improves their cleaning of the details. We are sorry that you missed the pool. Again, thank you for the review. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: The staff was friendly. We did not use the complementary breakfast. The beds were comfortable, also I like the free parking and easy to find parking at night. The hotel was close to Disneyland and freeways. The only negative was our room was on the second floor and we can hear people walking around upstairs and kids running around in the hallway at night.

rooms perfect and cozy without the hotel feel, kitchen area was clean and everything worked as it should. The staff at the hotel was great and seemed eager to do help up out with anything we needed not matter how small. I will stay there again.
Manager Response: We love hearing that we are your home-away-from-home! Thanks so much for the review. We would be happy to have you back again!

Summary: The kitchen studio served me well, as I had tons of food from my mom that I needed stored, reheated, and consumed during my stay and a means to clean all the containers to be returned to her.  I was pleased with the sparkly cleanliness of the kitchen and bathroom.  The bed was VERY comfortable, and I liked how there was an atrium that would separate my bed from the noise out in the hallway.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that the kitchen was so helpful for you. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Could use better pillows. Otherwise was great. The front desk person at check in was very friendly. Who ever was on the next days was not so kind. Liked the fact that the room had a kitchen. The rooms were very clean.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will are so glad that you enjoyed the clean rooms and full kitchen. We will make sure our staff sees your suggestions and will use your comments to improve our service. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: We had two reservations one was for 6 nights and a concurrent one for 4 nights.  The hotel was exceptionally clean and accessible for our day trips.  The staff was friendly and helpful all the time.  We tried to use the pool once and was disappointed that it was very cold and not heated at all. We reported that to the desk but did not have another opportunity to revisit the pool.  The only other item that we had issue with was the water pressure in the showers. Both rooms had only a minimal spray that made it difficult to rinse off making the time in the shower longer. We would certainly consider staying  at the Pepper Tree and recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recommendations! We are so glad that you enjoyed your long stay with us. Our pool is set to 82F which is the recommended pool temperature for heated pools but sometimes it can feel cooler if it just recently rained. We are sorry that it wasn't as warm as you were hoping for. We will have our maintenance team look into the shower pressure immediately. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: This is by far the best hotel we've stayed in! It has a lot of character and charm that just makes you feel your're at home. Excellent! In addition we loved the pool and pool area, it was very clean and the grill works!
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and the boutique charm of our hotel. We would love to have you back again.

Summary Heading: Beautiful & Clean Hotel and Friendly Staff
Summary: Ended up staying an extra night. I loved everything about my stay. At first, you're taken back by the beautiful landscaping and southwestern decor. Then you're greeted by a friendly and helpful staff who does a great job at telling you more about the location and nearby attractions. The rooms were very clean, the kitchen was fully equipped, and the house-keeping was impeccable. The hotel is surrounded by a lot of residences and a local grade school, but you still get to feel like you're on a quick escape from the daily grind. Can't thank ya'll enough for everything!
Manager Response: We are so glad that you extended your stay! Thank you so much for your kind words and helpful review.

Summary Heading: Great location for family trip to Knott’s
Summary: The Hotel Pepper Tree was clean, comfortable and well appointed with great access to lots of restaurants and of course, theme parks.  We enjoyed the patio, pool area, and mini cafe with free coffee and breakfast.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and tips! We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree.  The room was perfect for our family of four.  We enjoyed cooking in our room and swimming in the pool.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  Next time we are in Anaheim we will stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your stay was perfect for your family. We are so glad that you will be back again.

Summary: First day i checked in and there was clog in bathroom. At night annoying sounds started coming from toilet. When called cuatomer service she jumped to conclusion of switching rooms without even listening to the whole thing. Didnt she know i had two kids sleeping and in middle of night i cant just switch rooms. Poor service
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry for the issues you experienced. Since the issue happened before 9pm, our staff offered to either move rooms or help fix the running toilet. Since you did not want to switch rooms, our front desk staff did go to your room to help fix your toilet immediately. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations but do feel like we tried our best to help resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

Summary: Clean, very helpful staff, loved the room, and that I was able to take my little dog with me. I also noticed staff cleaning wall and really working hard! The all night coffee and teas available were appreciated. Only negative would be the show and tub. The shower didn't have good flow-weak. The tub was painted and peeling. I didn't get down on this though, because the over all stay was super great and the staff so nice!! Thank you for a great time!!

We loved staying at hotel pepper tree. Short drive to Disneyland and staff was very friendly. Rooms were cleaned everyday while we were at the theme parks. I loved the grab and go breakfast and coffee bar!

Great stay.  Very comfy beds. 24 hour coffee bar was amazing. Rooms could use some updating, yet comfortable and clean.  Would stay again. We very much enjoyed breakfast across the street ... well priced and yummy!!

We truly enjoyed our stay here. The entire staff was so attentive and the property is adorable and located very conveniently. I will definitely stay here every time I’m visiting the Anaheim/LA area!!!
Manager Response: We love our staff too! Thanks so much for the kind words. We would love to have you back again.

Summary: Very convenient to Disneyland.  Free bus ride to the park right outside the hotel. The room was nice and clean. The kitchen and patio was nice to have rather than just a room.   The staff was very accommodating and friendly.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review and tips. We are so happy that you will stay with us again!

Summary: The house keeping didn't do the best job, but overall it was a nice enough place to stay. There weren't enough towels at first but we went and got some from the front desk, and they let us check our bags at the front desk so that we could go and maximize park time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We ware glad that you enjoyed your stay but will make sure to talk with our housekeeping staff about the service you received. We hope that you will stay with us again.

Summary: WE have always stayed at La Quinta but our daughter and her family suggested this hotel. So glad she did. We loved the room set up. It was very comfortable. The room and bath were so clean!! We wil be back in September.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you stayed with us and will be back again so soon. Thanks for the great review!

Summary: Love this place. Friendly staff. Nice, comfortable, clean rooms. Perfect for our family. Decent price. Have stayed with them 3 or 4 times and never been disappointed.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much staying with us again.

Summary: This was a great choice for us b/c of the kitchens. Being on the 3rd floor helped with noise reduction. The specialty coffee bar was a bonus. We would've liked more options for the complimentary breakfast. But overall a great stay! Would come back for sure.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Quiet residential location was a plus, shopping near  to hotel. Location hard to find, not able to see hotel signage from Lincoln ave. On site restaurant not user friendly (hard to find any ala carte items) , staff not very welcoming. No to go menu in hotel. Rooms were very spacious, nice to have a functioning kitchen.

Rick and the staff at Hotel Pepper Tree make you feel welcome from the time you arrive. The rooms are open plan, self contained and extremely clean.  Plus you have sliding doors to let the beautiful Orange County air in. I have stayed once a year at the Hotel Pepper Tree since 2008 and would recommend it highly to  wanting the perfect base to have a great holiday in California.

From the very moment of our reservation we had the sensation of reserving a room in a very nice, clean, comfortable, relaxing place; and it was exactly like this. We will be back the next time we are in the area..

Summary Heading: Great place for families in Anaheim
Summary: We stayed there a couple of times, since it is an excellent choice for families. The studios are roomy, with a lot of room to keep your things. Kitchen reasonably equipped and the balcony is gorgeous, especially if you ask to overlook the front of the building and the heated pool. Beds and shower very good; staff is friendly and accommodating. Breakfast is included, and coffee is actually excellent.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review and tips. We love to hear from our repeat guests! Come back again soon.

Summary: The website is charming, however in person is a whole other experience. We stayed in a Queen Kitchen studio for 2 nights and each night cost us $216.60 We had 2 small dogs staying with us and the cost per pet was $25 each night. We did not use a credit card, we used a debit card, and paid a $100 deposit, which we did get a few days after we checked out. In my opinion, $216 was outrageous for the quality room we received. It was filthy. The walls were noticeably dirty in each room. The fridge appeared to have jelly smeared along the handle where you open it. The bathroom walls had some kind of yellow scum on them. The location felt & looked sketchy. A friend who works at Disney came to visit us in the hotel & said that we picked a sketchy part of town. We felt the bedding was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. Since you did not notify our front desk about your concerns, we were not able to help resolve these issues. We usually receive great comments about our cleanliness and are so disappointed that you did not receive our best service. We are already working with our housekeeping staff and inspecting the room.
