We are located in a typical neighborhood in Anaheim next to a golf course and shopping area. Because we care about the safety and comfort of our guests, we do have security on the property. We do appreciate your feedback and will make sure to use them to better our hotel.

Summary: Great place to stay close to a lot of places. Porto’s, and a lot of eating places. Disney is 10 minutes away. There’s is a super market right across the street and an amazing seafood restaurant right next to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful tips and reviews. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and the local eateries.

Summary Heading: Stay here, you won't regret it!
Summary: Great hotel for the price.  They are very friendly and were able to cater to our needs quickly.  Loved the patio we had and the room was quiet and comfortable.  The breakfast was so-so but still a wonderful place to stay.

I went with my husband and baby and extended our stay. Very cozy place with everything you need! Rooms are spaceous and very cozy. Fernando from front desk solved everything in the nicest and kindest way. Definitely would go back!
Manager Response: We love when our guests extend their stays! We are so happy that you enjoyed the boutique charm and convenience of our hotel. We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: A charming hotel with all the amenities, close to everything!
Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree was the perfect hotel for our family. It was close to Disneyland, Knott's, restaurants, bars, and supermarkets, while still being a quiet and unique place to stay. They were welcoming of pets, and especially wonderful was the heated pool. It happened to be an extremely cold day that we were there, and the pool was so wonderfully warm, you could see steam rising from the surface. It was an unexpected and delightful surprise. We would absolutely stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the charming review! We are so happy that you will be back.

Summary: The location is very convenient, right next to a nice grocery store and decent restaurants. A short drive to Disney and other attractions. The room was spacious and clean and offered all the standard amenities in addition to the kitchenette. Overall we were very satisfied. The decor is a bit dated and the carpets in the hallways could use a refresh. The pool area was very nice - we had it all to ourselves for the most part (so maybe not as nice if it gets crowded). The pool is heated, but only just enough - how well you can tolerate it depends a lot on where you're coming from. We visited for 4 days during a cool stretch and the high was about 65F in the shade - however, in the midday sun it got a lot warmer and my kids and I spent many hours in the pool on one of the sunnier
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful tips and feedback! We are so glad that you enjoyed the location and value our hotel has to offer. Thanks for the recommendations. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Great location to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm.  Clean room.  I like the kitchen feature with large refrigerator. Weather was cold so I did not try the pool.  24 hour snacks/vending area but need a credit card.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and tips! We are so glad the location was perfect for your trip. Come back again!

Summary: We loved our suite with it's very serviceable kitchen and exceptionally comfy beds. The grocery across the road (recommended by the hotel) had piles of tasty treats for us. We would stay again in a heartbeat!

Great place, always a good time &great location. A lil disappointed in the cleanliness this time around. Always my first choice to stay when we go on vacation, the location is to good for the price always

I stayed in room 219 & my daughter in-law stated in 222. I enjoyed my stay at this super cute & comfy hotel. Bed was comfortable, clean, quiet, staff was polite & really appreciated the shuttle service to/from Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that your stay was comfy and convenient. Thanks for the great review and tips.

Summary: Front desk & breakfast service staff were very friendly & helpful!  Room was large & had many amenities.  We stayed for a week and daily housekeeping was great.  Not just towels & bed made, but toilet & tub scrubbed daily along with kitchen clean up.  Will definitely stay here again when traveling to this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our stay and our friendly staff. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We really enjoyed our two nights at the pepper tree really greAt service they let us check in at 1:00 which was awsome clean rooms nice kitchen for warming leftovers up and the Refrigerator was great to keep our drinks cold the bed was super comfy free guest parking   Thanks we will be back   And David at the front desk was very helpful
Manager Response: We will love to have you back!!! Thanks for the great review and feedback. We will make sure David sees it - we love him too!

Summary: Stayed for 3 weeks and loved the staff here. Everyone from the mananger over the reception, maintenance and cleaning staff were great and very helpful. Large room with little kitchen and large fridge. A studio apartment. Very cozy with lot of ambience. Nice balchony and pool area. Supermarket and laundromat conveniently located across the street.
Manager Response: We were so happy you during your 3 week stay! Thanks so much for the kind review. We hope to have you back again someday.

Summary: This  place is kinda unique, with its older spanish style hotel and the nice landscape. It makes it pretty nice and relaxing. At first I wasn't sure that we would like it but turned out to be real good. Staff was super nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and   relaxing atmosphere. We hope you come back soon.

Summary: Walls where very thin.  We heard everything. Pool was not heated to swim in.  Uneven tile was slippery.  Customer service was good and the property was very clean.  One last thing.  Smoke alarm went off. The front desk check it out.  They took it out but didn’t replace it.   Wire hanging out of the wall for three days.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so glad to hear that you found the staff helpful and the rooms clean. We are sorry for the fire alarm issue you experienced. Our maintenance team has ensured it was working correctly and has replaced it back in your room. We appreciate your helpful feedback and will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: What a great place.  We travelled from Australia with our little girl who turned 8 the day we arrived.  She was so excited to find balloons and a special hand written birthday card and chocolates when we walked in our gorgeous room.  What a lovely gesture.  All staff were friendly and the room was spotless and comfortable.  We loved our stay and thank you for making us feel so welcome.

Rooms were clean , kitchen well stocked, comfortable king bed. Grocery store located across the street which is handy to grab supplies for your stay. Location of hotel is close to major attractions offered in the Anaheim area.

I stayed at this hotel with a friend in one of the queen studio suites. The beds were comfortable, the room was very clean and spacious. Our only complaint was that the door had no sound proofing and noise from outside would travel in. There was some random beeping at around 7am two mornings in a row, and sometimes people would have conversations in the hall loud enough to wake us during the night. Also, if the water pressure in the shower was not ideal, especially when trying wash off a day at Disney with sunscreen and everything. The drain was also a bit slow in the shower so it was hard to feel clean. Otherwise the fact you get a full kitchen and a location close to Disney and other parks, this is a great option in compared to the much higher priced hotels nearby.

Let me start by saying that they had a picture of Paul Hogan at the end of one of the hallways, this made me smile as I had a poster of Crocodile Dundee when I was a child. The Hotel Pepper Tree was a great place to stay and super close to Disney. The ART bus was available and I did end up buying tickets but decided to drive as the Mickey and Friends parking lot of Disneyland park is so nearby.  The room was a king kitchen studio courtyard, which was smallish but nice. There was an unneeded couch in the room which took up a lot of space and would have been better replaced with a small dining table. One other thing, cellphone reception was not very good in my room and was very spotty, I felt that the walls interfered with cell reception. You could hear noisy people talking, doing
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and our tribute to the owners (they are Australian)! Thanks so much for the helpful feedback and tips. We would love to have you back again!

Summary: The room was cozy, welcoming, and rustic. We had no problems with anything, and we really enjoyed our stay. The complimentary breakfast was delicious! I would truly recommend this hotel to anyone who asks.

Hotel Pepper Tree did a fabulous job of making our one night stay one to remember.  After a brief phone call two days prior to arrival and informing receptionist of our desire to have the most desirable room to celebrate our anniversary, they did just that and more.  Upon our arrival we had a bottle of red wine, balloons, and a Happy Anniversary card!!  Nice touch Pepper Tree.  We'll definitely come back and it made the visit that much more impressive that The Scratch Room was right across the street with great food.
Manager Response: We were so honored to be apart of your anniversary celebrations! We love the Scratch room too - It is voted one of the best place to eat in Anaheim. Come back soon!

Summary: We loved the room clean over al the decor was beautiful  Restrooms were clean amenities were good. Loved the patio deck very private. As for the bed very uncomfortable tossed and turned all night. We couldn't get some rest at all. Other wise very satisfied
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the boutique charm and private patio. All of our mattresses have been replaced in the past year, but we will make sure to check your room. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Loved Hotel.Child with us went crazy when he saw room. Everything in new hotel was great. Food was okay.  Front desk told us dinner was included with our reservation which surprised us because we new breakfast was. She assured us it was.  She was wrong.  It was embarrassing when we mentioned it at the restaurant and they said there was no record of that and of course no one at front desk admitted making such a statement.  Why would we lie?  We were told that when we got our keys.  Nonetheless we loved the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and helpful feedback. We are so happy that you love d the room. We are very sorry for the confusion about dinner. We are unsure how that happened but will work with our front desk staff to ensure it doesn't happen again. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Beautiful  hotel lovely and clean great staff very helpful 5 min drive to disney parks room was clean and cosy rooms are fully refurbished kitchenettes have everthing you need if you like to cook or there are some great little restaurants close by knotts berry farms just up the road to
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel and convenient location. Thanks for the review and helpful tips.

Summary: Great location and on site restaurant. Convenient store across the street. Young, pleasant and cheerful staff. Rooms are very nice, efficient and well equipped. Kitchen well supplied with kitchenware. Nice free breakfast goodies!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our staff and large rooms. Come back again soon.

Summary: They do not want your business! They sent me a cancellation email 2 days before my stay, although I have booked 2 months before. When I called to inquire re: reason of cancellation, the manager came up with a story that someone called the hotel with "the last 4 digits" of my CC and requested to cancel. When I offered to give them a different CC, they refused. They also told me that they would not re-book my reservation, even if I were to pay cash upon arrival. When I checked with my bank, they told me the hotel has actually charged the deposit and then refunded it. I am really glad they cancelled, actually, because I got to stay in a much nicer hotel after all!
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the fraudulent credit card issues that you experienced. Because the credit card used for your reservation was reported as fraudulent, the reservation was automatically canceled by the third company with whom you booked. Again, we are sorry for the confusion and frustration this caused you. At Hotel Pepper Tree, we strive to protect the private information of all of our guests and future guests to the best of our ability.

Summary: Great experience, location superb. Rooms were huge to accomodate for 4. Value for money. Breakfast was basic but good enough. Homely feel. Balcony was nice. Toilets were a little small but a bathtub in there made up for it

It was a great stay.  We felt safe; it was quiet; staff was friendly; rooms are cute....dated but cute.Beds were comfortable and we liked that we had a choice of different pillow softness to choose from.We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you will be back! Thanks for the feedback and great review!

Summary: This was our 2nd stay at Hotel Pepper Tree in the past couple of months, and yes, we will be back for a 3rd, and probably more.  The staff are friendly and helpful.  There was a minor plumbing problem ("running" toilet that was more noise than anything else) that was attended to and fixed immediately.  Couldn't ask for more.

The stay was amazing loved the room very clean bed was comfortable loved the morning coffee from the kitchen. room felt very homie service was excellent really good size of a room wasn’t to far from everything in the city all in all great stay will be back .
Manager Response: We are so glad that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Excellent all the way! Only thing I would change is have healthier breakfast items. Everything in there is loaded with sugar. There are some good restaurants around though. Good staff and friendly environment. Thanks. 5 Stars.
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review and helpful feedback. We are so glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay. Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great experience at the Pepper Tree
Summary: Comfortable and clean and the service was excellent. Desk staff were very accommodating, attentative and personable.  The room was clean but could use a makeover especially the bathroom.  All in all it was a good experience and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. We are so happy you enjoyed your room and our friendly staff. We are in the process of making updates throughout the hotel and hope you come back soon see them.

Summary: Hi,i enjoyed my stay at your hotel, thank u very much.here are my comments:1- Lights in the room in general and in the bathroom in special are very poor, I couldnt have a good shaving as lights didnt help.2- the furniture is really outdated and needs to be renewed, specially the kitchenette corner.3-  Internet was completely dead in my room (304), i had to buy a portable 4G router to get my work done.4- Breakfast is something that you really need to cancel or improve, it is a shame the way you feed people as if they are soldiers, However i paid for the breakfast but never had it when i saw how people are stacked on each other waiting for something not even edible.5- Staff was very helpful and polite, keep it up.6- Parking was good and easy, Thank you.7- space of the room was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your helpful and thorough feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed our large rooms and our friendly staff. We are in the process of making updates throughout the hotel to some of the things you mentioned - lights and furniture. We are sorry that you had a connection issues but do not see that you called our special WiFi customer care line. Our WiFi consistently provides 9.2 Mbps download and 10.01 Mbps upload speed throughout the hotel. Thanks again for your helpful comments. We will make sure to use them to better our hotel. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Communication with the Hotel prior to arriving has been most informative and pleasant. They took the time to listen and answer questions. Room was in prestine condition. Housekeeping was prompt. Late checkout at 2:30pm only cost an additional $23. Although they didn’t have breakfast, it was still a great with fruits and pastries. Bought tickets directly from them and got a free shuttle service. I want to thank the staff and manager for making this such a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and helpful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you can visit us again soon!

Summary: We loved the stay. Only negatives were the distance from the parks and the rooms were not sound proof so we could hear our neighbors when they came in late. We loved the decor and the kitchens were very nice. Impressed at the cleanliness. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We would love to have you back! We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm and full kitchens. We are sorry about the noisy neighbors during your stay. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: One of the best spots to stay in Anaheim
Summary: I have been staying at Peppertree Hotel on and off for over 10 years. It is pleasantly consistent every time. Great customer Service, Great rooms, Great Location and beautiful property. I was going through Medical training in Riverside and still chose to stay at Peppertree because I knew it would be worth the money and it would be centrally located.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for your loyalty all of these years and the great recommendations. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Excellent hotel! The staff was super friendly and helpful! This is definitely our go-to place to stay when we're in the area. We will definitely come back again. We wouldn't go anywhere else. The studio rooms are perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our staff and convenient location. We would love to have you back again.

Summary: I felt like I was getting a great value when comparing what I got in my room for the price. I have food allergies so having a kitchen was my favorite part. I also felt the room was spacious and good for holding a small family with my king bed and single bed suite. The only drawback was the distance from Disneyland but the shuttle was easy to take.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review and tips! We love to hear that your room was a great value, and that the kitchen was helpful for your food allergies. We hope you come back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great for family on a budget
Summary: I’ve stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree multiple times. What keeps me coming back is the value and location. It’s nice being away from the main Disneyland area craziness and you can’t beat $90 a night for a suite with a full kitchen. It’s older and has some unique charm with its decor, but could use some updating in the bathrooms and lighting. I will for sure continue to stay here when the price is right.

Summary Heading: Nice all around spot would revisit after remodel is complete.
Summary: Remodel should help to update the property. The beds and water pressure could be improved. The space was pretty and service was kind. I really liked the kitchen and was able to purchase everything I needed from the darling market across the street.
Manager Response: Thank so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm, full kitchens and friendly staff. We are making updates throughout the hotel and hope you come back to see them soon.

Summary: We loved this cozy boutique diamond in the rough!  There are so many hotels to choose from and we found that this was such a great value and only a short drive to Disneyland.  The free breakfast was nice to grab a quick bite and it was great being able to run down and grab a free coffee or buy a snack from their self serve kiosk.   My only complaint would be that you could hear all the hallway and other room noise.  We were on a bottom floor room and could hear the guests above us and guests/employees up and down the hall.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm. We love to hear that we are a great value and offer convenient amenities. We appreciate your feedback about the noise - we will make sure our management team sees your comments and uses them to better our property. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stay there usually 4 times a year.  Always in room 124.  Not that that's better than the other rooms, it's just more convenient for us with my disabled daughter.   Always clean and everyone is nice.  Will be back again!
Manager Response: We always love to have you stay with us! Thanks for the great review. We will see you soon. :)

Summary: I had a nice, spacious room with everything needed for a longer stay.  Staff was very nice.  I'm not crazy about resort fees, and this one seemed especially silly due to the lack of any of the facilities a resort would have other than a pool.  My only other concern was that the TV's appear to be really old, so the picture is not up to the standards of this century.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed the large rooms and friendly staff. We are in the process of updating our TVs in all of our rooms. We hope that you come back again soon to see the updates!

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was spacious and clean, and the beds were comfortable. Having a full kitchen for our trip with a grocery store directly across the street, saved money on eating out every day. We would definitely stay again. Only suggestion would be recycling available in room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful feedback and comments. We are so happy that your stay was comfortable and convenient. Plus, we love to hear about our guests saving money with the full kitchens!!  We so appreciate your  care for the environment. Our housekeeping staff does recycle as much as possible and we do follow all the guidelines from the City of Anaheim for recycling our trash. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: first of all the room is nice and spacious but the noise is unbearable...from the workers literally standing outside the door to the thin walls...called the front desk and got nothing but excuses....if you want sleep, don’t go to this hotel
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are sorry for the noise issue that happened during the middle of the day. We did our best to resolve the issue and have spoken with you personally about this since you have stayed with us so frequently this last year. Again, we are sorry that this last stay was not as good as your other visits.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay this year very much. The property was clean, quiet and security was good. It was located close enough to our event that we could walk there and back. We cooked most of our meals in the suite but found a small lack, a pot or casserole dish with a solid lid for steaming rice and vegetables. Otherwise there were enough utensils to cook for two. We picked up coffee, hot chocolate, a piece of fruit and a little pastry each morning for breakfast and added our own additional items. For our way of eating the breakfast was only 50%. Eggs and Yogurt would have been nice additions.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review and tips. We are so happy that you enjoyed your full kitchen and our convenient location.

Summary: "This is like home!" Was the first words out of my 8 yr old's mouth. Hospitality of the staff felt warm & genuine not just to adults, but towards the kids from the security guard to the front desk followed by housekeeping and the man with the big coffee cup. Only minutes from Disney and various grocery stores to get your food from. The comfort of being there eased the feeling of missing our other family members not being able 2 join us. Room was spacious & clean, kitchenette was sufficient & clean. Definitely a place I look forward to booking my next visit from the Bay!
Manager Response: We would love to be your new Anaheim home away from home! Thanks so much for the kind words - we love our staff too! We hope to see you again soon .

Summary: Our team loved staying at the Hotel Pepper Tree. The central location to beaches, theme parks, grocery stores and training were key for us. The individual kitchens were great and allowed them to have a lot of freedom to eat when and what they wanted.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review and tips! We had so much with your team during your visit. We would love to have you all back again.

Summary: The hotel is strategically located near grocery and food chains, and more importantly to theme parks like Disney.  To a family of 7 like ours, the access and connection between 2 rooms is perfect to us.  We had a pleasant stay.  But if I could suggest, breakfast offering should include some cereals and eggs but that is too much to ask for the hotel rates that we got.  Value for money -- it is the best.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your family of 7 enjoyed your stay and our convenient location. Thanks for the feedback about breakfast - we will make sure our management team evaluates your suggestions. Come back again soon!

Summary: Our experience is great with this establishment. It has the family travel in mind. When partaking of the theme parks nearby, it is highly recommended that you stay at this hotel. The staff were super accommodating
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and friendly staff.

Summary Heading: The good, the bad and the ugly
Summary: Room wasn’t ready until 3:20. Desk clerk did not tell me we could get free tix for shuttle when we bought Disney tix. Child next door screaming and crying every early morning. Very thin walls. Desk staff inefficient and did not alleviate situation.  Hotel is cute, pvt area nice, convenient location
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed the private courtyard and our boutique charm, but we sorry that you did not receive our best service. We will make sure to work with our staff to improve their service. We hope you do stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We had all our family with us. 16 in total. They all enjoyed your hotel. The kitchenette was great for those with little kids. The use of the barbecue, the big rooms, how easy it was to get to Disneyland, the cleanliness and the service was excellent. We would definitely stay at the Pepper Tree again. Thank you for making our 50th anniversary an enjoyable memory.

Perfect place for sleeping and not being disturbed, condition issues related to age of property and general need of maintenance and upgrade to things such as bathrooms and kitchens but staff are wonderful and very responsive to needs and services such as purchasing tickets etc
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your helpful feedback. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our friendly staff and quiet rooms. We are in the process of making upgrades throughout the hotel. We hope that you come back to see them soon.

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. We went to disneyland which was not that far away. The hotel was clean, with store near by just in case resturant was close. Overall great time and stay. We will come back
Manager Response: We would love to have you back! Thanks so much for the helpful tips and review.

Summary: This hotel meet all my needs and expectations. It literally close to super markets, target, Disneyland and many restaurants. The rooms and very clean and stocked. Front desk where very helpful and great service.
Manager Response: We are so happy that we exceeded your expectations! Thanks so much for the helpful tips and comments. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Water was shut off for a little while. Would have liked to have been told about that before we checked in. Tub/shower was cracked and chipping off. Could not plug the tub to give my kids a bath. Everything else was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are sorry that we missed notifying you of the quick maintenance procedure. We will make sure to check your tub immediately. We do hope you come back again.

Summary: We enjoyed our 3 nights at hotel pepper tree. Staff very friendly, rooms nice and clean and large, and price was excellent. We will plan to stay here again if visiting the area. Keep up the good work and service.

Breakfast only was packaged cereal, too many processed sweet bakery items, oranges, apples, bananas.  The pool was nice.  Bed was comfortable.  It was great value for our money.  Service was top-notch.  Kitchen was missing a dish rack - but I used the strainer as a rack.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed our comfy beds, pool, and friendly staff. We will make sure to note your comments about breakfast and see if there is a way to meet your needs. We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary: Check in was fast & easy. Lots of parking space. Our room was very clean & had more than enough space for a family. Big tv, coach, patio, & furnished kitchen. I would definitely stay here again & I would recommend this hotel to my family & friends.

Good Hotel - excellent staff, friendly, makes you feel at home.  Rooms are very clean.  Location is good - near major parks, with restaurants nearby, good market across the street.... Only thing to improve would be the mattresses - I found them not very comfortable, sagged a little. Otherwise, the hotel was excellent.

Summary Heading: A Lil Rundown but facilities at its best
Summary: Stayed from 5 -10 Dec 2018. Full kitchen with all utensils & crockery. Very useful as we need whipped up food. There was some Halal food available but a lil far to go for every meal. Supermarket just across the street to get groceries. Halal meat is just abt 7 mins drives away at Altayebat Halal supermarket. For Asian groceries is just 8 mins drive away (99 Ranch). Halal paste for cooking is also available. Best Disneyland is just 13 mins drives away. Go to Ralphs supermarket for full groceries just 7 mins away too. Room is lil cramp fr us 3 adults & one 12 yr old but we  rested comfortably.  Hotel provides free simple breakfast to go like muffins,cereal,fruits,coffee, tea, hot choc, cappuccino to enjoy there, to pick up before going out or to have in our room from 7am to 10am.

Summary Heading: OVERALL RATING/REVIEW OF HOTEL PEPPERTREE KITCHEN STUDIOS
Summary: We have stayed at Hotel Peppertree twice this year and we enjoyed the roominess, cleanliness, and location of this Hotel, especiall when visiting children in Fullterton.  We stayed at this hotel twice this year, and we enjoyed everything about this hotel!  The nightly hotel rate is reasonable and affordable as well.  We enjoyed the self breakfast option where we can pick and choose our breakfast and take it up to our room!  We will stay at this hotel in the future, when the need arises!

The hotel was clean, beautiful, and the staff was very friendly and knowledgeable.  We will definitely stay here again! The location was perfect and the neighborhood was quiet. Rooms were large, clean, and the kitchenette was a plus!

The hotel looks old, but it is clean and quiet.It is easy to move because it is not too far from downtown.There are also marts around so you can buy things easily.Each room is NO SMOKING, so it does not smell, but in the case of TV channels, it needs to be changed. WIFI is easy to use but needs to be improved since it is often disconnected after 10 PM.

I have frequently stayed and recommended this hotel to colleagues, family and friends. My visit on Dec 13th and 14th has made me switch to a different hotel. I had never had these problems but this time my AC chugged along at the wrong temperature, my phone wouldn't work unless i walked out of my room, there was roaches and their system declined my cards. I spoke with  my bank on speaker phone and they confirmed that the hotel's system was malfunctioning...still I had to go to an atm to pay a 200 cash deposit for the 2 nights I stayed
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and being a loyal repeat guest. We are so sorry for the issues with the credit card. We worked with you and your bank to help resolve the issues but in the end, the credit card did not unfortunately work. We did make an exception for you by offering to take cash and a security deposit. We do wish that you have mentioned the other issues that you experienced with our staff so we could help resolve any issues. Again, we are so sorry for the inconvenience. We did all that we could to help you.

Summary: This place is amazing! Totally exceeded our expectations :) We were only a $10 uber ride away from Disneyland, so convenient for someone visiting Disneyland. The room was huge, full kitchen, t.v., couch, comfortable beds and a water fountain out back with an ivy covered private balcony. We were on the bottom floor. This will always be our go to hotel for future vacations!!

Always stay here from Vegas for family vacation.  Staff and service are great.  My little daughter found a left over socks under the bed but not a big deal.  So might want to have house keeping take more time cleaning. We'll be back again; kitchen, free parking, free WiFi, & on to go breakfast were great for our budget.

The property and rooms were all well maintained. The staff is also all very friendly. David at the front desk was also very accommodating. The only complaint I have is of the breakfast lady who was very rude. Also, fresh coffee and milk should be available 24/7 and the coffee machine should be discarded because the coffee from the machine tastes terrible.

Never has any hotel been so kind and personal! Excellent customer service! Thank you for making our anniversary so special! We enjoyed our wine and chocolates and the card was such a nice touch! We will always be back!

After reading online reviews, decided to stay at the hotel for several days for a vacation back in 2015. Was a lovely experience. Staff was courteous and friendly, hotel is pretty, room layouts spacious, equipped, inviting. Flash forward to now, 2018, and staff was polite, but not exactly inviting. Hotel is still pretty. Stayed only overnight this trip so the room given was ... minimal ... Queen courtyard was smaller than the King. Like, significantly. Which is odd as 2 beds would imply more people - yet the space was much, much smaller. Anyway... it was adequate for our needs but not nearly as impressive or memorable as previous trip. Also, cleaning job wasn't top notch as there was some evidence of previous guests in places that implied quick/sloppy room cleaning. Would still

Clean, comfortable, friendly staff, functional rooms, well located, exactly what we needed. The beds are very comfortable, good pillows and linen, good american breakfast, everything works in the room. Very good bathroom, the kitchen allows us to cook some of our meals, good parking front and back of the hotel. Laundry is just accross the street, also restaurants and a  market .We'll be back and recommend it  for sure!

The breakfast is only a bread and coffee and some fruits, don’t expect more. The kitchen is well equipped and in front of the hotel is a store were you can buy everything you need to cook and have a great meal.

Summary Heading: Making Disneyland a little more Happier
Summary: We have finally found our Disneyland hotel.  Everything was great.   The front desk was helpful and kind, the to go breakfast was just enough, loved the extra room in the room and the full kitchen was great.  The drive to Disneyland was easy.

I really enjoyed my stay in this hotel. Everything was perfect : staff was helpful and kind, housekeeping was perfect, room is spacious and functional as the kitchen and the location is good : supermarket and laundry near, not too far to the theme parks (knotts, Disneyland). It was perfect and the best hotel I’ve done during my holidays in USA.

We had a great experience at this hotel. The reason I gave it a three was because of the cleanliness of the bathroom the vanity looked redone, but there were stains on the walls and cracks in the grout around the tub. It just looked like it could use a deep clean.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful comments and feedback. We are so happy that you had a great experience and we will make sure to inspect your room immediately.

Summary Heading: A place to stay while at Disney with family
Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree for 3 days , our intention was to go to 2 parks then depart , but it rained the week while we where there . The property was clean at best , the staff was friendly as well. On our last night there was a party going on in the room a joining ours so I made a small comment to the front desk and it was corrected fast . The continental is just that and nothing special .For the cost it was a good place to stay . My family however returns to Hotel Pepper Tree about 2 to 3 times a year . Oh by the way the surrounding restaurants and stores are less then expected .
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the feedback. We love to hear from our repeat families. We are so sorry that you experienced the rain during your visit. We hope to see your family again soon.

Summary: I had to fly into LA for business and needed a place to stay close to Orange County. This was not a name brand, but the price was right and reviews were good. Was impressed with the size of the room and all the little "extras" included with the room. Bathroom was small, but I could tell it was an older property. Very clean and the staff was friendly. Would certainly come back to this hotel for a non-business trip.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great feedback! We are so glad that you enjoyed your business trip with us and would love to have you come back again for a fun visit.

Summary: Bathroom needed a little  maintenance, hot water handle in shower loose, Cabinets need cleaned in bathroom and kitchen (inside). After having room cleaned they only left 1/2 roll of TP. Good things were, the third floor was Great, very quite. Loved the coffee-latte machine in the breakfast room that was open all the time. When coming in late evening it was so nice to have a fresh Latte.Counter staff very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We love our free coffee/lattes too! We will make sure to work with our housekeeping staff to improve their service. Thanks again for the helpful comments - we will use them to better our hotel

Summary: Location requires a car, but the parking is free and it's easy to get to Disney/Knotts/Convention Center, etc. All are a 15 minute or less drive away. The beds are insanely comfortable. Everything was very clean and the staff was incredibly delightful. Stay here! You won't regret it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations and helpful tips! We hope that you come back again soon!

Summary: We were very pleased with our stay at the Pepper Tree Boutique Kitchen Studios. The room was spacious and the staff very accomodating. The room was spacious and the breakfast was good. Hoping to come back and enjoy the hotel in better weather.
Manager Response: Yes! Please come back again to enjoy our pool and garden areas. You did visit during some of the few rainy days of the year. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Great location and comfortable rooms. One thing that maybe you could change is the floor of the rooms and the hall because it causes a lot of noise when someone is carrying luggage and also it affects a lot the wheels of the luggage.

Had a lovely stay at the hotel. Room with patio was very spacious. Sheets were clean, employees were nice. Only con is that the room smelled a little old, nothing a candle & open sliding door cant fix

Summary Heading: Confortable, clean and easy check in and check out
Summary: Good hotel, I got what was offered on the website, clean and tidy. I always found space to park my vehicle. It is located a few minutes by car to Disneyland, and close to pharmacies and restaurants. I would go back without problems.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy that you had a good time. Please come back again soon.

Summary: Our family chooses to stay at Hotel Pepper Tree every year when we come to CA for our annual Family Vacation. There is plenty of space and is our little home away from home. And since we stay 5+ days, it is just what we need to not feel homesick and enjoy every day until we have to return home.
Manager Response: We so appreciate you visiting us every year! Thanks for the review. It means so much to us to hear from our repeat guests. See you again next year.

Summary: The hotel, despite being old and needing to be renovated, was perfect for what I needed. The cleanliness of the hotel was superb. So clean. The room is great as it has a kitchen with all the essentials you need. The service is also first class. I would suggest that they put in a clothes washer and dryer in the rooms.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback and suggestions. We are so glad that your room was perfect and clean. We will make sure that all of our staff sees your comments. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice place..Im sure Ill be back.
Summary: Me and My family celebrated the 6th birthday of my daughter in here in Disneyland.We  have soo much fun.We stayed here in Hotel Pepper tree kitchen Studios.and its so convenient to any locations.the staff was nice and attentive my concerned and Im sure be back soon here..

930/5000Right choice for us. We travel frequently to visit our daughter who is studying in the USA and normally spend 15 days or so it usually makes a traditional hotel environment a very boring environment. This time we tried the Pepper Tree and loved it. It is not a hotel for those who like that cold and impersonal hotel environment. For us it was perfect because it is a cozy place with a Mexican decor, has kitchen in the room, the room is a good size, has what we need close by - market, laundry, 24h convenience store and parking. We felt at home.It also had a room with great coffee, tea etc. besides eating things to buy 24h inside the hotel. The breakfast is very simple and the hotel needs minor renovations, small things, but the ambiance is very pleasant and charming. The

Customer service was Excellent and the stay was Awesome! Our family was there from Northern California & Seattle for a Wedding. The time there was very pleasant! The pool area was utilized by my family and clean. The rooms were cleaned and replenished with fresh towels. My family occupied 3 rooms, one for my daughter and 1 son, the other for our 4 boys, and then one for my husband and I.

Fantastic location, great character, good WiFi, large studio apartments with balconies, right next to the i5 freeway, supermarket across the street, friendly staff. Not the ritz, but good facilities and fantastic value for money, would stay again.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks for the review and helpful tips.

Summary: It was a short daycation with my boyfriend and I but it definitely pleasant. We didn’t want to leave. It felt like home honestly. I love the Spanish style decor of the place. It came with everything we needed! A full kitchen, big closet that we didn’t even use, a couch and table and huge bed. The bed and pillows weren’t as comfy as most hotel beds are but it wasn’t horrible. The ac didn’t feel like it was staying on because I kept waking up hot and sweating so I barely slept with the sheets and blankets but maybe it was just me because the boyfriend was perfect he said. Besides that, I loved everything else. The heated pool was nice, could be a little more heated during this time! Loved that it’s close to shops and restaurants as well. Service was also great. Guy at the front

The hotel was in a good location to get to Disneyland and the Longbeach Aquarium.  The hotel personnel were most accommodating and the breakfast was well stocked.   Our room with the patio was wonderful and we ate all our meals out there.
Manager Response: We love our courtyard patios too! Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location.

Summary: The hotel was in a good location for our needs. Easy drive to Knott's, close to our family, easy drive to Newport and Long Beach. Kitchenette worked great for us. Definitely something we need due to a family member with severe food allergies. Amenities were good. We will most likely stay here again.

Very friendly staff. Great smoking area. Privacy is appreciated. Great breakfast, location and i would definitely stay here again it felt like home away from home. Showers had a great massage feature and the rooms are amazing.
Manager Response: We would love to be your home away from home in Anaheim! Thanks so much for the great review and helpful feedback. Come back soon.

Summary: Friendly staff. Good location. But very old hotel. Worn out mattresses. Not continental but grab n go breakfast. I don't understand why you have this limit for two hundred minimum characters for the review. It does not make sense..

Hotel need renovation to improve guest room structures, finish. Had trouble with air conditioner and requested service to for a better comfort, may need replacement .  Also limited parking for hotel guest.

4th stay at Hotel Pepper Tree and it always feels like a home away from home.  Spacious rooms with full kitchens and sitting area to watch TV.  Feels like a little mini apartment and I love the décor.  Staff is super friendly.  Very clean.  We were in Anaheim for 8 days or so and being able to cook and not have to eat restaurant food was awesome for my family.  Less than 10 minutes to Disney.  My teen daughter actually asked for me to book here because she likes it so much.   We have never used the pool but it looks very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review - We love to hear from our repeat guests! We are so glad that you were able to cook in your full kitchen during your stay. We will see you the next time!

Summary: Staff were friendly and helpful, they couldn't do enough for us.  Breakfast was good it was nice that we could take it back to our room to eat it on our balcony. and the room was spacious and very clean.  The room was a little dated but certainly sufficient for our needs. Peaceful surroundings.  Excellent location for Disneyland.

Clean room, full kitchenette. Bed was a little bouncy and stiff, but comfy enough. Air conditioner blew the cold air directly at the bed, so in order to keep the room cool enough, it was kinda chilly in bed all night. Pretty light water pressure in the shower made it difficult for my wife to wash her hair, but not too bad. The room door had an auto-close mechanism that didn't work and it dropped a screw when we opened the door. Breakfast was just packaged Danish, milk carton and some "take out" coffee. Still a nice hotel that I would say in again.

This was our second time staying @ Hotel Pepper Tree and I'm sure it wont be our last!. The convenience of having a kitchen in our room is mainly the reason why we come here. We have a 5 year old who is a picky eater so it makes it so much easier to be able to make the foods she's used to.The only complaint I have for our recent stay was that our neighbors kept arguing either late at night or VERY early in the morning. They woke me up several times unfortunately. Other than that it was great!
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thank you so much for the review and your loyalty. We are so happy that the kitchen is convenient and helpful for your family. But, we are sorry for the noise issue you had this last time and hope you were able to talk with the front desk to help resolve your issue. We are glad that you will be back. Thank you again for the helpful feedback. We will use it to better our hotel

Summary: Excellent hotel to stay at very friendly staff and attentive to our needs. Not a bad distance from Disneyland too! Would recomment to anyone needing a place to stay for extended time. Quiet at night and good sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks for the lovely review! We are so happy you had a great night's sleep and a good encounter with our staff. We appreciate your recommendations and hope we can see you again soon!

Summary: Cute little place with lots of character.  Good and quick breakfast, nice pool area, comfy rooms, pretty ambience, close drive to everything. I’m a picky person and really enjoyed my stay here. Really friendly and helpful staff too.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and our boutique charm!! Thank you so much for the helpful tips and feedback. We would love for you to come back again!

Summary: I like boutique hotels because they tend to be clean, cozy, and quaint.  Hotel Pepper Tree was no exception.  There were a lot of small special touches that made the stay very personable.  And the staff was very happy and helpful during check-in and when I wanted recommendations for the area.  I will definitely stay here again.

Bed was comfy enough, really all I needed.  Couch and chairs in the room weren't comfortable at all.  Room layout is awkward: the bed is directly visible when room door is open, bathroom is cramped, and closet area seemed unnecessarily large.

We traveled with 2 11 month old babies and found our stay very cozy and comfortable and very baby friendly! The place was very clean and we enjoyed the festive day of the dead decor, the nice pool, and complimentary breakfast!

The Spanish theme was beautifully carried throughout the hotel, starting at the front entrance all the way to the spacious balcony. The customer service given by the front desk was above & beyond. The light breakfast was small but decent, we especially loved the quick convenience store. We went to Blizzcon at the Anaheim convention center for almost every day of our stay. We chose to take Lyfts instead of renting. The location was perfect for that. It's a low-medium traffic area so our driver always showed up within about 10min, and we arrived within about 15min, sometimes less. The restaurants and stores nearby and between my route made it easy to enjoy my time outside of the con as well as give good use to the kitchen included in our room. The A/C & heating unit is placed

Customer service and location were excellent. However, I was not pleased with the strong chemical smells left from the cleaning products. I also suggest the hotel install screen doors so bugs don't fly in when the sliding door to the courtyard/balcony is open.

Room was clean, staff was friendly. Everything was as described. Internet was literally abysmal. Tin cans & string would be better. Wound up hanging my charging phone off the balcony for a hotspot. I'm a network engineer and tried every trick in the book, nothing worked well, disconnections were frequent, speed was "Acceptable" when it wasnt disconnecting every 45 seconds-5 minutes. Halls could be a little noisy, you could occasionally hear "intimate" activities at night as you walked through common hallways. Once again, i cannot relay how awful the internet is there, combined with the stone structure of the building, your cellphone reception is going to suck. Its a literal black hole. They need to provide better in-house wifi.

Very clean. Nice pool. Staff were all very friendly and helpful. Great grocery store right across the street. Close but not TOO close to Disneyland. Nice quiet neighborhood. The continental breakfast spread was good too. We would stay here again, no question!

Summary Heading: Decent, but not very close to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel is older with some refurbishments but the kitchen and bath is 1980-ish. Still, the Spanish tile and sitting area was lovely, and our balcony was the perfect spot for morning cocoa--right next to the gorgeous bougainvillea which gave us a feeling of seclusion despite the traffic. The room was very quiet and we slept great.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review! We are so glad that you love our boutique Spanish charm and private balconies. We love to hear that you had a great night's sleep. We are making upgrades to our bathrooms and kitchens throughout the hotel and are thankful for your feedback. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had an amazing time. The room was comfortable, it was close to everything that we wanted to do, and the staff was absolutely delightful. We look forward to staying here again on another trip to California.
Manager Response: Thank so much for the review! We are so happy that you time with us was amazing and comfortable. We would love to have you stay with us again!

Summary: We've been traveling the usa for two months and this was our last night before going home. Honestly this was the best place the whole trip, and we stayed at 4star apartments in Vegas and Miami. Just saying. Loved the breakfast and Cafe-department and its system. Felt very at home. Only thing we missed was a better TV. The bed had plastic cover under the sheets, not a big fan of those, and the couch looked awful. Everythin else was exceptional. We will be back! All the way from Finland.
Manager Response: Wow! We are so thrilled to be the best hotel on your USA trip! Thank you so much for the helpful comments. We are working on upgrading the TVs throughout the hotel. We hope you come back to see the upgrades soon!

Summary: This hotel is very out dated..... The cleaning staff needs to take their time when cleaning the bathrooms the bathtub had hair in it and the floor was covered with hair.  The bath towels had a stale smell to them . Which is why I bring my own from home.  The front desk staff over all okay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very sorry that you did not receive our best service and found hair in the bathroom. We hope that you were able to contact the front desk so we could change your room or have our housekeeping staff come back to clean it more thoroughly. We will make sure to work with our housekeeping staff to improve their service.

Summary: The hotel's location is central to amusement parks, shopping, beach etc.  Freeway was easy to access.The Kitchen Studio worked perfect for us and we appreciate the suggestion of shopping for groceries across the street.  They have good prices.   Hotel Pepper Tree met all our expectations and the staff was awesome!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We love to hear that you found our hotel convenient and a great value. Thanks so much for the money saving tips. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: Very nice hotel, and was perfect for our trip. We called ahead and were able to do an early check in to accommodate for our 2 small children.Pool was great, service was great, the room was perfect. My kids loved the decorations in the lobby too.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear about your perfect stay! Thanks so much for the review. Hope you come back again next Halloween.

Summary: We love Hotel Pepper Tree! I booked this years hotel through hotels.com and I feel that I would have gotten a better price if I would have booked through the hotel. It just seems that I paid more for the hotel than I have in passed years.  The bathroom door in the room we stayed in needs upgraded. It kept getting stuck. It was a pain to open and I had to have help several times to get out of the bathroom. A such a silly thing to say about a hotel.  I also wish there breakfast lasted a little longer we missed out booth days we stayed.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We always do recommend booking direct to receive the best deals. We will make sure to check your bathroom door immediately. We hope there is a next visit soon so you can enjoy our To-Go breakfast in the morning.

Summary: We booked this last minute and were pleasantly surprised how nice it was for the price. We would come again! The little kitchen made it so we could have some meals in with the family. Also loved that I could walk to the store across the street.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the kitchen and the convenient stores nearby. We would love to have you come again. Thanks for the helpful tips and review.

Summary: We enjoy the Pepper Tree because the kitchen studio enables us to save some money and relax a little bit rather than eating out the entire time. Unfortunately some time since the last time we stayed they broke their partnership with the restaurant in the same lot and no longer offer breakfast included with the room. The property could also benefit from a hot tub.

The walls to the rooms are so thin! i was woken up at 7 am by screaming children everyday of my stay there which was horrible and not a way i wanted to spend my little vacation. Every time i called the reception desk to ask for things like more towels and blankets they would forget and i would have to go down myself to get it from them. i would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that our hotel did not your expectations and that our staff did not promptly bring the items to your room. We will make sure to work with our staff to improve their service.

Summary: My pillows were absolutely terrible I'm having neck pain I talk to the front desk agent he said that they are going to reimburse me $20 I had to visit a chiropractor yesterday I think I should have been more than $20 thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry about your neck pain and  wish you would have told us about the pillow issues immediately. We would have been happy to bring new pillows to your room. If you have any other questions, please make sure to call us directly.

Summary Heading: The Hotel is location is a 10 minute drive to Disneyland Parks with out getting on the freeway
Summary: The Hotel is location is a 10 minute drive to Disneyland Parks with out getting on the freeway. Not far from the Orange County airport. The breakfast/coffee bar was nice and convenient. It was affordable compared to other options in that area.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful tips and review. We are so glad that you enjoyed out To-Go breakfast and convenient location.

Summary: Large and spacious rooms, a very nice large balcony. While there is a bit of hallway noise that fills the room, it is nonetheless a comfortable and clean place to stay in Anaheim. The staff is very friendly, and the hotel has a very nice vibe.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm and large rooms! Thanks so much for the helpful review. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: I was so impressed with this place! It was truly a gem of a find. Clean, quiet, cozy, friendly and very reasonably priced. Received the BEST nights sleep ever in a hotel! I will definitely stay here again if the opportunity arises, especially if I have my daughter with me; I know she would love it!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! We are so glad you found us and had your best nights sleep! We will be happy to have you back!

Summary: Parking is free, rooms are rustic, lighting is terrible in the bathroom area.  Customer service was excellent, when I had an issues, it was taken care of. Rooms are ok, but not spotless. Noticed top of fridge was not clean.  It's a good hotel at a decent price if you don't want to pay the price of hotels next to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed our customer service and the value you received at our hotel. We are sorry that the room did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to inspect your room immediately and talk with our housekeeping staff about your comments. We will use your feedback to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Very cute. Trading traditional hotel amenities for the luxury of a studio apartment
Summary: There aren't any meeting spaces at this location, nor is there a fitness center or a free breakfast. On the weekends, there was some sort of construction, or something, going on a block over and their trucks were loudly beeping at very early hours, so I didn't sleep in much on my days off, although I know this isn't the hotel's fault. My room (on the third floor, no less) had an ant problem, even though I never left food out - they were all in the bathroom. Other than that, this space is wonderfully kept and festively decorated for the seasons.

One of the days they missed to clean the room. We did have the Maid Service sign on the door knob. Room was great! Wasn't too fond of the bathroom though. Would be nice to have it updated. Location was convenient and close to nearby stores and food. Too bad they don't have a fitness center or business center at the hotel. Best I liked was the theme of the hotel as they decorated for Halloween. Least is that it lacked some amenities we would've utilized like the fitness center and a bigger breakfast lounge.

We've stayed before and we always enjoy the Pepper Tree but we particularly enjoyed staying in the King suite on the first floor.  The enclosed tiny courtyard with the plants and fountain were a real bonus.  It's like having another room.  We always enjoy having the kitchen but the addition of breakfast and 24/7 coffee and tea was a deal-maker for us.  Thanks for adding that.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your review! We love to hear from our repeat guests. We do think our Courtyard Studios are the best! We love to have you back again soon.

Summary: My friend recommended the Pepper Tree. I loved the old spanish feel and staff was very friendly and helpful.  Private patio, Very clean, and the kitchenettes makes it great if you want to save and bring groceries.  Conveniently located to plenty of food,  shopping,  and of course amusement parks.  The only reason I gave 4 out 5 was the noise.  I guess being older we could hear the other surrounding guest in and out and every step the guest above us made.  Over all, I'd definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are so happy you took your friend's recommendations! Thanks so much for the helpful tips. We will see you again soon!

Summary: Absolutely loved this place great staff great EVERYTHING very quite relaxing rooms unforuately missed breakfast cause I slept so comfy cozy but was still able to get some great expresso and some gourmet cookies from the breakfast staff and bananas .... Great excellent loved it overall

This was the 5th time we choose this hotel as our last night at the end of our vacation before we fly home.  The rooms are still excellent. They are large clean with comfy beds. Also the staff is very friendly and will help you anywhere they can.  But they changed the complimentary breakfast. It is no longer provided by the restaurant next door. And that's a shame because they served an excellent breakfast. The current complimentary breakfast provides some hot drinks/juice, cereals and some pastries. Also the breakfast area is way too small for the amount of guests.  In my opinion this was not a good move made by the hotel owners. You cannot seriously call this a decent complimentary breakfast.  Also the price is quite high and together with how the breakfast is provided now we
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback from our repeat guests. We are so happy that you continued to enjoy the large rooms and friendly staff. We are sorry and surprised that you did not enjoy the breakfast updates. Most of our guests have enjoyed the change to our To-Go style breakfast and all day coffee bar.  We will make sure our management team sees your comments. Again, thank you for your loyalty all these years. We do hope that you will come back again in the future.

Summary: Room was overpriced.  Cont'l breakfast a joke.  Too small of a space for a single to fit in room with families.  Shower pressure on third floor was like bathing in an outdoor fountain. No enough lighting in bathroom and dressing area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We do offer a free To-Go breakfast each morning and are sorry that you visited the breakfast room at a busy time. We will check the issues you mentioned with your bathroom immediately and ensure the room is meeting our standards.

Summary: Really liked the coffee machine that is available great to use later after breakfast is over. Also they serve Petes coffee which I love overall very happy with this place.  It was pretty easy to get to Disneyland from there also.  Very clean rooms

Summary Heading: My stay at Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: My son and I really enjoyed our stay recently at Hotel Pepper Tree.  We loved the decor and the friendly staff. We enjoyed cooking in the kitchen as a way to save money and time. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and loved our boutique charm! Thanks so much for the kitchen tips. We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Dirty full of bed bugs + unannounced 5$ a day resort fee
Summary: Avoid at all costs! The room was full of bed bugs! We got bitten 3 or 4 days! At first we thought it was just mosquitoes but then we found out these were bed bugs! Some other reviewer said they found a dead rat! In addition to the dirtiness the hotel charges a 5$ a day fee that is not announced anywhere when booking online. Awful..
Manager Response: We are sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. We do believe your review is misleading  since you did not actually stay at the hotel. We were happy to fully refund you as soon as you decided to cancel your reservation. We did thoroughly check the room after your brief visit but did not find any  trace of bedbugs in the room. If you have any further questions, please contact us directly.

Summary: I fully recommend hotel pepper tree. The theming is wonderful. Its like staying at a Disney Themed hotel off property. I will return to Hotel Pepper tree. It's very close to Disneyland and knotts berry farm and not far from Long Beach!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great recommendations and tips! We are so happy you enjoyed our style and convenient location.

Summary: We were really impressed by the size of the room, cleanliness and facilities at the hotel. it was not an expensive hotel so it was unexpected. We would definately come back. The supermarket across the road is great too.

It was a great place, great staff made us feel welcome. The breakfast was the best for a vacación where every minute count, it was so great to grab and go. The kitchen in the rooms was perfect to Cook a meal and the market was right across the Street. A Quick drive and we seré already in disneyland, very near the highway to a Quick drive to los angeles, many malls around too. Perfect hotel

Hotel Pepper Tree was great for our family! The staff was friendly, it was centrally located to Disneyland, Grocery Store, on-site restaurant and even a laundromat & convenience store! The hotel was very clean and having a fully equipped kitchen was heaven sent with 3 kids!

Thank you very much for the warm welcome and for making sure my stay was a pleasant one. Misty was awesome and very helpful to make sure that everything turned out well on my wedding day. All staff were kind and helpful. Thank you for the nice gesture gift. I will definately stay there again.

We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree! The staff is friendly and ready to help, the decor is pretty, the beds and pillows were very comfortable! There is a great grocery right across the street and a coin laundry is also across the other side.

We chose this hotel for our Disneyland vacation. We were so impressed with the professional staff, the clean rooms, and the comfortable beds. The kitchenette was a great addition. We definitely recommend this hotel and plan on returning in the future.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations and review! We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Very good and clean hotel with customer-friendly staff and good amenities
Summary: This is a  good hotel, suitable both for family and business travel. Located at a reasonable distance from Disney Land and Anaheim Convention venues. The staff is very attentive to the customers needs and is very friendly. The breakfast is OK. There is also an open-air swimming pool and guest car parking lots. Overall, Pepper Tree is a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the nice review! We are so glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff and convenient location. We hope that you come back again soon!

Summary: It was really calm and nice, cozy hotel.Especially, I do like the supermarket in front of the hotel( cheap and delicious bakery..My kids loved it~!! :-))Also those coin laundry just cross the hotel..deep appreciated the kind indian guy  in that coin laundry~In general, I'd like to emphasize on this hotel image was so perfect~!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and helpful tips of the area! We are so glad that you found your stay perfect.  We hope you come back soon.

Summary: The wi-fi was terrible and wouldnt work on the iphone at all.  The bathroom was dated. TV to small for the room. Staff was friendly, beds were comfy enough. breakfast was average, the area for breakfast was to small or set up in a manner that didnt move people through efficiently
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your helpful feedback. We are glad that our staff was friendly and helpful.  We are sorry that your phone was not connecting to our WiFi, and we hope you were able to call our help desk to resolve your issue. Thanks again for your comments - we will use them to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel In Anaheim area
Summary: Great place, clean and spacious rooms with Kitchen space. Beautiful Antique looks. Need more vegetarian choices for breakfast. Free coffees in vending machine. Sufficient parking space. Not much far from Desneyland and Santa Ana airport.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review and feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed our large rooms with full kitchens. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We really liked this place. It made us feel at home. Our studio was super chill with a private patio. The sound of the water fountain relaxed us. Our bed was very comfortable and good we slept well after a long night of partying.

We moved away from Anaheim 23 yrs ago. We stay here whenever we come down here. Mainly because the location works out great for us. The rooms are clean, comfy, friendly staff. Love coffee bar and breakfast.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for the review. We will see you next time.

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a perfect vacation
Summary: The whole area is very clean.Great feeling of being safe in their hotel. Get to feel home away from home with their accommodations A very Professionand and friendly staff. Willing to provide any information or help in any way. Wish every place was like this.

Summary Heading: Cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in...
Summary: This hotel was awesome...So clean and well maintained.  Would stay there again for sure..The rooms were like a small apartment with full kitchen and dress room.  A love seat to watch TV.  Very Quite and the pool area was also spotless...great value for the money.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the amazing review! We love to hear that we are the cleanest hotel you have stayed at and that we are a great value! We can't wait to have you back. Thanks again for the great review.

Summary: There were other guests yelling in the hall multiple nights for several hours, the walls are thin so it was very loud. Other than that the hotel was nice. The front desk was great. The room was clean but the tub/shower didnt seem very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your helpful feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed the hotel but are sorry for the noise issues you experienced. We hope you were able to speak with the front desk staff so they could help resolve the issue. We do hope you will come back again in the future.

Summary Heading: We will be staying here again!!!
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay with Hotel Pepper Tree. This was our 30th wedding anniversary. The staff helped make it wonderful. Everyone was so helpful, always happy, and pleasant to speak to. Our room was perfect. A private balcony, full kitchen, very clean and comfortable.  We had started planning our next stay with them before our trip was even over!  I love the idea of a kitchen studio. We stayed six days (supposed to be seven, a family emergency required us to leave a day early and they credited us back for that full day) saved a ton of money bringing in and preparing a lot of our own meals.  We will definitely be staying here again!  Thank you everyone at Hotel Pepper Tree!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for spending your anniversary with us! We are so happy that you enjoyed your special occasion. Thanks so much for the tips for saving money and using the full kitchens. We can't wait to have you back.

Summary: My sister and I visited the area and stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree. We found the accommodations very spacious and comfortable. This was so helpful with my sister being in a wheelchair. The service was excellent, our room clean and the beds were comfortable. The coffee bar was not only convenient but tasted great. Thank you for making our visit such a good experience. We will definitely be back.

My wife and I were in town for one night, for a concert at the Honda Center. Even though its like 15 min from the venue. The stay was so worth it. It The decor was so my wife style. The staff is so nice and the place is very well kept. Highly recommended.

Was convenient to everything that we were attending.  From Disneyland to knotts berry farm.  There was a grocery store across the street.  Many nearby restaurants.  Very quite.  The hotel was very cleaned.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful tips and feedback! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you come back again next year!

Summary: Found a DEAD, DECOMPOSING rat on the porch of room 106. The pungent smell of fish and urine was immediately noticeable when the sliding glass door was opened. It the room is cleaned before another guest arrives, how was this missed? What else are they neglecting to clean? I talked to the front who only offered to switch rooms. I contacted hotels.com and got a full refund. Had to switch hotels at 10pm after driving from the Bay Area.
Manager Response: We are very sorry for your experience, Danielle! We did refund you entirely and did everything we could to help you during this situation. Cleanliness and comfort for our guests are our top concerns. We thoroughly inspect all of our rooms for cleanliness before each guest arrives. Because the garden patio is outside, there is no way to stop nature from getting  into the patio area. We are sorry that we did not inspect the patio more closely but will use this situation to better our service.

Summary: It was one if the best placing I been into. The service is amazing, so clean and fresh everyday. Very helpful people. Quit and also really reserved. I'm pretty sure I will be back to this hotel again when I take another family vacation thank you for your amazing service.
Manager Response: We are so honored to be one of the best places you been too! Thanks so much for the great comments about our staff - we love them too! We would love to have you back again.

Summary Heading: Highly recommended .very friendly and helpful staff and clean room and very nice location there's many shops around
Summary: staff are very friendly, the area is very nice.  They serve nice breakfast and nice hot drinks. The pool is very beautiful and clean. The room is cleaned very well. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations!! We love to hear that our staff is friendly and our rooms our clean. We are also happy that you enjoyed out To-Go breakfast and coffee bar. Come back again!

Summary: The Hotel Pepper Tree was nice.  Very clean, although the dishes were not clean.  Maybe that should be checked between guests.  Could have used a couple more kitchen towels, and a little better kitchen supplies.  My only complaint was the AC, located right over the head of both beds.  I literally slept with a hoodie on, WITH THE HOOD UP, all nights.  No way to control the oscillation, so no way to avoid the air blowing directly on your head at night.  It didn't get the other half of the room cool at all, so if you turned it down too much, you were sweating.  Also thought the additional "Resort Fee" collected at check-in was ridiculous.  This hotel is nice, but definitely should not be rated a "resort" just because it's close to Disney Land!  Misleading when you think you've

We chose here due to the acceptance of dogs and the kitchen. Our house was being fumigated .The staff made all the difference .They are friendly and caring and very hard working .You should be immensely proud of them .If we ever need a place again coming back here for one reason- great staff. Thank you so much for accommodating us
Manager Response: We love our staff too! Thanks for the positive comments - we will make sure that they see what your wrote. Thanks for the review!

Summary: I was looking forward to staying at this hotel based on the online photos, however, the general location of the hotel was very disappointing. My room looked out at industrial trash bins and apartments. Under the surfaces of cabinets, head board, and A/C unit, this place really needs a good TLC touch up and deep cleaning. The functionality of the A/C unit was poor, making sleep uncomfortable. My biggest frustration, though, was being charged $23 extra for a late check-out, which I strongly feel should be waived at least as a one time courtesy to a first time guest. I wish I hadn't spent the money. I won't be returning.
