Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that our hotel was not a good fit for you and our sorry that you won't be returning. We did notify you of the late check-out fee at the time of check-in. Since your room was needed for another reservation, we did need to make sure your room had time to be cleaned and prepared for the next guest.  We will check your room to make sure it is meeting our standards and will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: First stay... won’t be the last!!
Summary: This was overall the best hotel experience I’ve ever had. With a full kitchen, private balcony, clean room, quiet & safe hotel, and my most favorite the 24 hour coffee bar! From the moment we walked in the staff were incredible and made us feel at home. I plan to stay here every time I’m in southern CA! Thank you Hotel Pepper Tree! My daughter and I had the best trip ever.

Summary Heading: clean, affordable, spacious rooms with a full kitchen!
Summary: We need a kitchen but didn't want to spend a ton per night as we need to come to the area frequently over the next couple years so we decided to try this place!  We will be back soon!  It is nicely decorated, clean, and spacious.   I like that I'm supporting a small business instead of a large hotel chain too.  Free parking.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so glad you were able to enjoy the full kitchen and large room. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: the room was amazing and the staff was so polite. We stayed for 4 nights. We enjoyed the breakfast provided and the little shop on site to buy snacks from. Highly recommend this hotel, we will be returning for sure!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations and great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our staff and amenities. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Really good place to stay in Anaheim.
Summary: Clean, lot of space and beautiful. The "to go" breakfast with the paperboard trays are super convenient to pickup the breakfast and start your day. The bed quality is really good. The location is good as you have a supermarket crossing the street and a few places to eat. Is 10 min away by car from Disneyland. The room is big and with kitchen which is really nice.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback and tips! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We love to hear about the convenient to-go breakfast and use of our full kitchens. Thanks again for visiting us, and we hope that you will be back again.

Summary Heading: Charming, old-world ambiance in a reasonably-priced family hotel
Summary: The Pepper Tree was a welcome change from chain motels and hotels.  The bright, sunny, corridors, hand-painted tiles and decorative touches, amply-sized rooms with kitchenettes all made for a comfortable, attractive home-away-from-home for our five-day stay.  There's an excellent grocery across the street and good public transit nearby.  The staff was knowledgeable and helpful.  Altogether a pleasant experience; I would not hesitate to return.
Manager Response: We are so happy that enjoyed our boutique charm and our home-away-from-home feel. Thanks so much for the review.

Summary: No cable channels, no clock radio, no screen on sliding glass doors to balcony. However, it was really clean. The tile floors were really uncomfortable barefoot. It's on a very noisy & busy street. Could be worse.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are happy that you found our rooms very clean, but we are sorry that we did not quite meet all of your expectations. We do have cable TV channels and wall clocks in all our rooms. We will make sure to note your other comments and use them to better our hotel.

Summary: they forgot to service the room the first day. Came back to the room after a day at Disney and no clean towels and beds not made. Had to go to front desk at 10pm to get new supplies. Room was quiet and kitchen was clean

Very nice Hotel.  I arrived before Check In time but there was a room for me and my dog.  On the first floor and next to a entry door. There is an outstanding (the name escapes me) seafood  restaurant in front of the Hotel.  There are many places to walk pets. Huntington Beach is about a 30-40 minute drive.  I-5 is also

Room needs update . Very old dirty floor . Not happy with stay. Ac right on top of the head, found inscets on the floor, tiles are not good, my daughter almost feel, water was keep going in the washroom after flush.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to inspect your room to ensure it is meeting our standards. We wish that you would have talked with our front desk during your visit so we could have resolved any issues immediately.

Summary: Hidden gem. Absolutely a favorite! The room was spacious, nice balcony. The whole staff was so nice and friendly. Very helpful and the service was great! Location is good and there's even a grocery store across the street that has pretty much everything (and more) you need. We will definitely come back some day.

it was an amazing stay!! the staff was always so kind and helpful, they smiled at us whenever they saw us.everything was always so clean.  my friends and I will absolutely recommend this hotel and even stay here again

Excellent hotel! Great customer service! Very close to all the parks which we wanted. Great studio so we felt like home and we can get groceries from across the street and cook our own meals if we wanted to. This is our 2nd time staying here and will definitely come back again...over and over!

Hello, my daughters and I stayed with you guys last Monday night.  We were in need of a place where we could spend sometime working on some administration work and we were attracted to the price and the layout of the room with the private patio.  our favorite part was the patio and the relaxing fountain that helped us get our work done.   We enjoyed the tea and coffee and fresh fruit in the morning.  The only thing we had a problem was the up stair neighbors who were a little too noisy to our liking and we had to close the sliding door.  But we over all really enjoyed getting our work done there  and having a good night's sleep.  thank you

We had a pleasant enough stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree and loved the room and the facilities. The location was ideal for Disneyland but lacked much in the way of restaurant choices...I guess this is the price you pay for staying further west of Anaheim and away from the main tourist area. The walls however were paper thin and the fellow guests were less than quiet (not the hotel's fault) during our stay so I was very aware of young children running up and down corridors, irate mothers and snoring dads!

Summary Heading: Great Value Hotel with Super Friendly Staff
Summary: I was not expecting much from a hotel in this price range but from the phone call I received 24 hours after making my reservation asking I had any special requests or questions about the hotel to the coffee at breakfast (my partner is Italian, she needs good strong coffee) we continued to be surprised throughout our stay. The staff are excellent, extremely friendly and their desire to ensure we had a good stay seemed utterly genuine.

We stayed one night, but reserved three. The morning after our first night, we xouldn’t wait to check out. Second floor had some folks in two rooms that spent the entire night knovking on each other’s door, opening and closing doors and talking at volumes that kept us up. The management supposedly talked to these people, but nothing changed. Also, the HVAC unit in our room had this creaking sound from possibly a damper door when the unit cycled off, so that contributed to no sleep. Good luck with this hotel from hell.
Manager Response: We are very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations, and we were happy to give you a refund. We did immediately inspect and resolve the noise issues that you experienced. We thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and will use your feedback to better our property.

Summary: This is our second time staying here and it was amazing. Staff are so friendly. Guest that stay their are friendly. Rooms are nice and clean. We will definitely be staying here again. I will totally be recommending this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests!! Thanks so much for the review and recommendations!

Summary: We loved the location it was close to everything. Restaurant, mini mart and grocery store next to us. Huge, clean rooms. Loved the authentic decor, just like the pictures on the website. Our future hotel from now on when we come to visit California!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!love this place
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the lovely review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our location and boutique style. So glad to be your new CA hotel. Come back soon!!

Summary: Had all the conveniences of home except for laundry which was next door but very affordable. There was a coffee bar that had flavored coffee and hot chocolate. Little ponds with fishes at the entrance for the kids to watch. Good size pool not much use. Mexican seafood restaurant on site and a huge grocery on across the road with everything you need to cook. Breakfast was a little disappointing didn’t care for the muffins and biscuits. The fruits was ok.  All in all met the needs of our stay of 6 days for a family of 4 with young kids.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful review and tips for families! We are so happy that you enjoyed our home-away-from-home environment and amenities. Thanks for the helpful feedback regarding our breakfast and are glad that you were able to use your full kitchen during your visit. Thanks again! Come back soon.

Summary: Great, Friendly and Centrally located Hotel. Nice cool rooms with Spanish theme and spacious. Parking is hassle free. Stores and places to eat within walking distance. Highly recommend ! Will stay again
Manager Response: We are so glad that you will be back! Thanks so much for the recommendations.

Summary Heading: Great location for families to stay
Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The kitchen was nicely equipped and we were able to save money cooking our own steak dinner for the price of eating at a fast food restaurant. Only problem we had was the bathroom sink and bathtub drained very slowly which caused a delay between showers but we would stay here again!

My wife and I have stayed here twice. Very clean and comfortable place to stay. You feel like you are in your own studio apt. I would recommend this hotel to everyone. They have breakfast available and coffee 24/7.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! We love to hear from our repeat guest. Come back again soon!

Summary: The staff was super friendly and accommodating. Especially looking after us while we waited for our room as we arrived super early. They were very informative and gave great options for things to do and places to eat. The rooms were clean, cozy and the beds were very comfortable. If we are back in town we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy to hear that our staff was so helpful and friendly. We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary: The people at the front desk was the nicest people in this business i have met in a long time, very attent and helpful. The rooms were really confortable, the hotel itself is very beautiful and with a calm and relaxing atmosphere

Great place. 10 minutes from Disneyland. Breakfast was great they have a coffee machine with a huge selection. Beds were comfortable and I liked that they had a little seating area in front of the tv so you don't have to sit in the bed to watch tv. Only thing that was missing was an ice machine.

My family and myself checked in on 8/14 to 8/18 very happy since I called to check on my reservation I spoke to daisy and was so helpful so I knew I was going to be happy but experience was beyond my expectations very happy we will definitely be back any time we are in Anaheim.

Clean hotel with friendly staff. Good parking. Close to a supermarket and subway. No laundry service but there was one across the road. Large pool lots of towels,BBQ area and a Resturant on site. Three levels with an elevator and 24hrs coffee.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback and tips. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Very friendly staff and comfortable rooms!! Loved the complimentary breakfast. The front desk staff were very helpful arranging a tour and transportation.  Lots of room in the room. Only thing I wanted was a safe for storage of our passports.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed our To-Go breakfast and friendly staff. We do hope to see you again on your next Anaheim holiday.

Summary: My boyfriend and I came  for a trip and we loved the room! It came with a kitchenette and we cooked breakfast everyday which I loved. Our patio was nice, but I wish they would let you smoke on it. But other than that everything was great! Great staff

Service is good! so many kind of coffee is always available. There are clean and useful room! when I ordered the crib for my nephew, the guys quickly prepared it in room for us.The only thing is there are no laundry room…　But totally so good!

Everything was as advertised. The only thing and only problem we had was loud kids in the morning the walls in between seem a little thin. It's a great deal great place great location. Very close to Disneyland and every delivery service delivers there

Every member of my family have enjoyed stay at this nice hotel.   5 rooms and 4 days all relaxing.I recommend it to everyone.   It is just perfect and outstanding.    Something attracted my attention which is the tiles "I love the look"

Very good hotel. Great location. A quiet beautiful place. Spacious room. Large kitchen. Beautiful, large balcony. There is a swimming pool on site. Bathroom, toilet, a little old. Good service. The Internet was bad, it was upsetting.

Summary Heading: A weeks stay at Pepper Tree
Summary: We stayed at Pepper tree due to its convenient location for Disney,  the beaches and Hollywood.  Lovely kitchen apartment with a balcony for meal times.  Adequate free breakfast and local shops a walk away to stock up should you wish to. A nice pool for a cool dip and free parking seals the deal.  Brilliant for couples and families alike.

What a great place to stay whilst in Anihiem. We where so lucky to find this little gem, at first we had a holiday house rental booked like we have done 5 times prior on our trip to Anihiem from Australia. 24hrs before we where due to fly to the USA we received a email from the home owner that Anihiem council no longer permit rental under 30days.Wow nice to hear 24hrs before we fly out , i frantically searched the net to try and salvage what looked like being a disaster  and found the HOTEL PEPPER TREE.  All i can say is thank you to the cancellation as i would have never found this GEM , from the sel cont accommodation  to staff/pool/ the location this place is not a 10 out of 10 but a 11.... we will be back .

We had a nice stay in Hotel Pepper Tree, the room was big enough for the four of us.The kitchen and bathroom were old, but very clean.There was a lot of space for our clothes.We went to the waterpark and the attractionpark, it’s nearby Hotel Pepper Tree.

It's a very quiet, yet very uniquely done hotel that has a lot of charm and worthwhile amenities.  The staff were incredibly nice and helpful, as well as the location made it easy to get everywhere and everything that I needed.

Overall our stay was excellent. We had a few issues with our stove but the staff made sure everything got resolved quickly. The pool was sparkling clean. The only negative is that the grill didn't have a lid so grilling was difficult.

The hotel itself was cool and the staff was very friendly but when I booked it said breakfast was included. We were disappointed and the prepackaged pastries and coffee....I think if we had been staying long term the kitchen would have been nice but the room seemed crowded.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the staff and our boutique charm. We do offer a free To-Go Breakfast each morning but recommend the Scratch Room next door or using your in-room kitchen for a big hot breakfast. We do hope you come back again on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We normally rent a house on our yearly visit to Anihiem from Australia.  But this time a day before we where due to fly to the USA we received a email from the house owner that Anihiem council no longer permit rental under a month.  Wow great timing ,tell us 24hrs before we fly out. I went online to find a motel to try and salvage what looked like being a disaster holiday and found THE PEPPER TREE.  All i can say every time we visit Anihiem again we will be staying at the Pepper tree  as it was a 10 out of 10 and my wife is a hard marker and the whole family totally loved it, I would love to thank the house rental lady for the late cancellation as i would never have found this GEM.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your house was cancelled too! ;) Well maybe, we are happier that you found us and loved your stay. Thanks for the great review. We will see you again next year!

Summary: We stayed for three nights. The room was clean. The staff was really service minded. We liked the location. The ac was really quiet. Our room had a big balcony.  We have really nothing to complain about when it comes to this hotel.  We will definitely stay here again.

I was attending a conference, in Anaheim, and selected the Pepper Tree hotel for my four day stay.  How excited was I about the private patio that would allow me to eat outside, paint and/or just relax.  I had a problem with my room and they were quick to move me, although a comparable room was not available.  The next day they moved me into a room like the one I'd originally reserved (king with patio).  The Pepper Tree is not a fancy place but it is lovely, rustic and Spanish style.  There are fountains and beautiful clay tiles, interspersed with carpet.  I was so pleased with the customer service I received, until I asked for liquid creamer for my coffee.  Apparently, their customer service does not extend to their "kitchen" or breakfast area staff.  I was told liquid creamer
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and helpful feedback, Sharon. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, and we thank you for your patience when moving rooms. We are so sorry for the miscommunication from our breakfast staff. We have already talked with them and will use your comments to improve their service. We do hope that you will return again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: While it's not adjacent to anything major in Orange County, the Hotel Pepper Tree isn't too far from much of anything you might want to do.  No, you're not going to get a lavish breakfast, but some pastries, fruit, and cereal are available and that's not too bad.  These are kitchen studios, so it's assumed you'll be getting some groceries anyway.  The kitchens are small, but capable.  Well supplied with the few necessities, and make the rooms feel enormous with the extra space.  The coffee and tea are always available, and drinkable.  There's the usual not so drinkable stuff in the room with a 4 cup coffee pot, but blech.  There's always something you could say,

I liked the theme of old Spanish style but it was pretty outdated!  Was not aware during booking that it was a pet friendly hotel,  had I known I would not have booked, my kids got a bunch of flea bites and found a flea in their bed!
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We do have a few rooms that are pet friendly but the majority of our rooms are not designated for pets. We are so sorry for the issue you found in your room. We are treating your room immediately. Unfortunately, people do bring pets into their rooms without our permission. We wish you would have notified us during your stay so we could have moved you and your family immediately to another room.

Summary: We stayed here for a week a few years ago, and it was okay, but they have greatly improved the property. Each room has a kitchenette which I highly recommend having when staying a week or longer. They have a restaurant in their parking lot, however we didn't try it. There is a laundromat right across the street that has very reasonable rates - we did 1 load wash and dry for $1.75. It is close enough to walk as the hotel is right on the corner with a stop light. There's also another restaurant in that complex across the street that is the best Japanese fusion restaurant we've ever eaten at. The rooms are spacious and we had great housekeeping service every day. There was one small issue with the water not being able to turn off fully in the bathtub, but we brought it to the

The staff is far more accommodating than most! They literally opened up a new bag of candy peppers for my 2  boys! WE baked cookies there and it was nice because they had all the plates, bowls, utensils and cookware needed. The pool is always a great place to relax and enjoy.  Love the breakfast and specials English cookies or pastries. So good!!  Highly recommend. In fact, met a man and his wife in Downey last weekend and told them about it!!!

I had looked online at this place literally for years. After many unsatisfied stays at other cheaper hotels I decided to give it a try. Close to Disneyland and Target (had and emergency stop here) super cute décor and over all comfy beds, spacious and had everything I needed. Only issue was that the other guest were super loud but that is not the hotels fault and to be expected.

We didn't use the kitchen but really enjoyed the space of the room and ambiance.  We sat out on the balcony at night and just enjoyed the evening. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We'll definitely return.

The hotel was just right for what we needed it for. Kitchen studio made it nice for us to cook or store and re-heat leftovers.  The swimming pool isn’t very big, but it was still nice. The A/C worked perfect for us which was a major plus.

It was the perfect room , we enjoyed ourselves ! And check in customer service was amazing. I don’t have anything bad to say about that. Will definitely stay there again! However breakfast can be a lot better.

Great for longer term stay.  Fully equipped kitchen, microwave, gas stove, full size fridge.  More like a studio apartment.  Grocery store across the street.  Several restaurants within one block.  Each room has a patio or a balcony.

Very nice stay, the hotel has a great location and swimming pool, the room with kitchen and balcony is fantastic, the room service is very good, the only thing that I recommend improvements is the breakfast, because there are few options.

We enjoyed our time at the hotel.  The hotel itself and the rooms are a little dated, and the kitchen area in the room is very small indeed. But the location is good and felt safe.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: My friends and I booked the hotel for our Disney trip. The staff was so nice and even before we stayed I called in with questions and got an answer right away. It was a great time and I look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review! We are so happy that you Disney getaway was all that you hoped it would be. We would love to have you back again soon.

Summary: My wife and I were very happy with this hotel the staff is very friendly and the room was nice. I enjoyed the fact that we had a balcony it was nice to just relax and have a cup of the complementary coffee that was provided with the breakfast. The breakfast is great because you can just grab on the go they had muffins, danishes, apples, and bananas. Another great thing is if you want to make your own meal in the room they had a fully stocked kitchen a full size fridge and a stove as well as a microwave.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review and helpful tips! We are so happy that you enjoyed our To-Go Breakfast and our full kitchen rooms. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Repeat customer from Vegas.  Price is fair plus you get a kitchen.  Rooms clean and spacious with separate bath area.  Free parking and wifi.  Better than some hotel close to theme parks and it's just 5-10 mins away.  Close to everything needed.   4/5 stars for a 3 stars hotel highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and recommendations - we love to hear from our repeat guests!! We will see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Cute but dated and overpriced; especially the outrageous incidental fee.
Summary: Bathrooms and kitchen are dated. They require a $200 incidental charge upon check in which is the most I have ever been charged and I typically stay at 5 star properties that only keep the credit card on file. Overpriced for the area and the accommodations. It was a cute hotel and the staff were nice enough but I would rather pay more and a stay elsewhere next time.

I absolutely love this place. It's clean, it's cute, it's conveniently located. The value for the room is incredible! I just love the ambiance that is here. I especially love the little decks off of each room. The soap/shampoo/conditioner choice is so good. I love Tarocco; it smells so good. Check in and check out are always super easy and quick.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great reviews and tips! We are so happy you loved your stay. Come back soon!

Summary: Fabulous hotel, really enjoyed the decor, ambiance etc. Staff was fabulous and helpful. Parking was a little tight, neighborhood was ok. Beds were comfy. Kitchen was great, considering their breakfast is only cereal and pastries. Cleaning staff did great except they didn't touch our dishes that were in the sink?? Seemed like a service that should have been natural. Other than those minor inconveniences the hotel was fabulous and I wouldn't hesitate to stay again

Our stay was very nice, didn't get to swim,  due to all that was going with our purpose for being in town.  Loved having a kitchen. Beds very comfortable.  Very nice and helpful staff.  Loved the breakfast on the go bar!

This is a great value for what you get. The rooms are large and clean for a great price. I always stay here when I'm in the area. The rooms include a kitchen and full fridge. Service is quick and they have parking in the front and the back. The room also had a nice balcony where you can sit and catch some fresh air.
Manager Response: Thank you! We love to hear from our repeat guests. We appreciate the helpful tips and feedback and can't wait to have you back again.

Summary: Our stay was nice, great location.  The  only issue was the cleaning staff slammed room doors when they wee finished cleaning the room, so forget about a day time nap.  Still, I give it a 5 rating because the front desk staff was outstanding, they accommodated our room change,and the property itself is nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful comments. We are so happy that you enjoyed our friendly staff and hotel. We will make sure to notify the housekeeping staff about your comments and will try to improve this. Thanks again for visiting our hotel. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: I had so much fun at this hotel. I was in town for a concert and it had everything I needed. Adorable Decour , comfy bed, full size fridge, and nice personal patio. Close enough to Disneyland that the next time I come I know exactly where I'm gonna stay!

Summary Heading: Very Good Hotel in Anaheim, CA
Summary: My wife and I really enjoyed our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. Our room was clean and with all amenities for our stay, even in the kitchen you will find everything you need to cook and serve yourself. They also have room service and a continental breakfast (coffee, fruits, bread, cereals, cookies, juice, etc.). Hotel personnel is very helpful, great customer service. We will definitely consider to come back in our next visit.

I stayed 15 days at the Hotel Pepper Tree for the facilities it has as its location, kitchen, parking, breakfast and coffee 24 hours. Very good relation cost quality. The parks of Disney and Knott are less than 10 minutes away. It has a supermarket in front and a laundry next door. If you have any problem contact the Manager and He kindle solved it or help you if you need some special requeriments.

I chose the pepper tree because I wanted a cute hotel for my boyfriend and I to stay while we were in town for a concert. There were some random average reviews that made me nervous, but once I booked through Expedia, I got a call form the hotel thanking me for booking and wondering if I had any requests to make my stay amazing. Then once we got to the hotel they were able to move around rooms so we could get an early check in. The best part was the room!!!! SOOOOO ADORABLE AND BIG! The little kitchen and the full sized fridge, along with an outdoor patio was to die for. Also as a frequent Disneyland guest, the proximity to the park along with the room amenities are a great combo. Overall the AC unit was a bit complicated. But they have a print out for help. I would 120% stay

i really like this hotel its very nice and quiet ,friendly stuff special the housekeeping  about the room its really big with beautiful balcony and nice view my next visit to LA sure i will stay in again and i really recommend the hotel to any one looking for comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and staff. Please do come back again!

Summary: Not a bad Hotel, cleaning service not good, snack area not kept stocked, Breakfast, nothing hot except coffee or tea, elevator very very small only one, slightly disappointed in the Hotel. The one thing was the location was good, but did see a lot nicer Hotels closer to our destination will stay there next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that enjoyed our convenient location but did not meet the rest of your expectations. We will make sure all our staff sees your comments and will use them to better our service.

Summary: This place is a Good location for a Knotts Berry or Disneyland stop and the convenience of being able to cook a little while you have Time restrictions helped out. Thanks for the cleanliness of this hotel.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our convenient location, full kitchens, and clean rooms. Thank so much for the review! We hope you can come back again soon.

Summary: This hotel is very quiet, we were here for 5 days, enjoyed the to go breakfast and coffee with muffins and this little pastry (picture) every morning before heading out for the day. We come back in the evening, room was cleaned by house keeping w new shampoo/conditioner/towels. Enjoyed the pool area,we get the use the pool ourself a few time. This place is only 12 mins from Disney parks, market across the street and Walmart is 5 mins away (Anaheim plaza).
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful review and tips! We are so happy that you had a peaceful and relaxing stay. We love our alfajores too!

Summary: We stayed about 5 days. It was our central point for all the places we visited. The hotel was clean and quaintly decorated. During our stay, it was very hot and we were grateful there was AC in the room's. Would recommend this hotel for all.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations and review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm. Come back again soon.

Summary: Great value & perfect place to visit Disney or KBF if you are planning on stay a few days & still want the ability to enjoy a home cooked meal. We were there for 4 days & used the kitchen for breakfast twice & dinner once! Staff was great. Only negative is that the cont breakfast isn't much of one. Definitely stay again
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the full kitchen in your room! Thanks for the helpful feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: We really enjoyed our room at the Pepper Tree. We extended our stay by one day and unfortunately had to change rooms, but the staff were lovely to move our things to the new room. Both were spacious, and comfortable. It was nice to be 10 mins away from the Disney attractions, yet feel we were well away from the hubbub. It was a very good value.  One warning- you need to ensure that the door closes firmly behind you as you leave the room. My son was the last one out, and he did not do this. When we returned later in the evening, we were very surprised to see our door ajar!  Nothing was amiss, and we determined that the door was not secured by us! Otherwise, a great stay- we would come again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful comments and review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your rooms and our helpful staff! We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: The hotel didn't seem to have any updates in a long time.  The bathroom floor tile was pretty gross and looked like mold could be growing near the tub.  Water never shut off in the bathtub area.  The stucco on ceilings was in need of removal or repair.  The beds were very comfortable.  We are not really that picky but it just didn't meet up to our standards.  Also leaving both doors open in the lobby  and having an animal - hopefully it was a cat - run through at 10:30p.m. was a little scary to me.  Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you found the staff friendly and helpful, but we are sorry that your room did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to inspect your room immediately to make sure it is meeting our standards. We will also talk with the management team about the lobby doors. We do take the safety of our guests very seriously and have our grounds monitored 24 hours a day.

Summary: Good experience , more space than other hotel but we can hear everyone talking outside the room. Quiet time is after 10:00pm but some guess still stayed outside our door after 2:00am and talking &laughing
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed the large rooms and are sorry for the noise from the other guests during the night. We hope you were able to contact the front desk so we could help resolve the problem.

Summary Heading: Rooms were very Spacious. Breakfast 🥞 was great and Restaurant across the street was amazing. I didn’t have any issues
Summary: (200 character minimum) Reviews must be at least 200 characters. I didn’t have any issues with my room in fact guest were great m. I will come back for sure. 3 night and I only paid 385 for 2 queen courtyard size.  I will be back
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that you will be back!

Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay in Anaheim.
Summary: This is the third time I have stayed Hotel Pepper Tree.  The price is the best in the area for a lovely room with a full fridge, microwave, small stove and dishes, basic pots and pans and silverware.  It is an older property and the shower handle didn't work great, but it was good enough. Through no fault of their own, one night I didn't get much sleep because there was a guest next door to me that was out of control, yelling, singing and carrying on.  The hotel had to call the police to have this guest removed, but as soon as the front desk understood the degree of disturbance, they acted quickly and had the guest removed.  It was a very unfortunate situation.  As a result, my room was not cleaned that day, but housekeeping was sufficient on the other days.  The beds and room
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for the review and your loyalty to our hotel. We are so sorry for the inconvenience that you had to experience. Thanks you for your patience and understanding in this unusual occurrence. We do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I loved the staff and the location and access to Disney is second to none..   The ONLY thing I didn't like is the placement of the A/C units.  They blow right on your head. No matter where I directed the air it hit either my bed or the kids bed.  Other than that our stay was nice..
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and helpful feedback.  We are so happy that you enjoyed our customer service and convenient location. We will make sure our management team sees your comments about the air conditioning. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our AC woke us up in the middle of the night 3X with an outrageously loud noise.  The 1st time it happened it was spitting water on us.  They fixed it twice and offered a new room but would prefer $ off

Summary Heading: Great hotel as always, with unfortunate incident with extremely disruptive guests
Summary: This is my preferred hotel in Anaheim, let me start with that. Generally, the staff are super friendly and helpful. New staff and existing staff alike need to be brought up to speed with strict policies regarding dealing with hotel guests who are disruptive late at night, especially considering this is a hotel who has policies about its policies. Example - For repeat guests who have cc authorizations on file, obtaining an authorization for that cc authorization to be used is not only redundant, it is very customer-unfriendly. An aberration for the service expected here. Please remedy this. Otherwise, excellent as usual.

Nice warm atmosphere. Very clean and friendly staff   The pool has a nice relaxing atmosphere with comfortable chairs. The beds are comfortable. The kitchen setup has whatever you need. There is even a private patio to sit in

Great location and staff was very helpful! The only negative I have for this hotel is it would be great if the shower head was adjustable. It wasn't possible to shower without getting hit in the head by the water, even when I wasn't going to wash my hair. Maybe updating the bathrooms would be a good idea. Otherwise, fantastic place for the price!

We booked this hotel online because of its proximity to all routes in and around Los Angeles.First impressions were of a warm and welcoming staff. We had originally booked for a straight 9 nights, however my son who lives closeby  in Irvine treat us to a couple of nights in San Fransisco. The staff were only to pleased to accomodate this, refunded the cost if the two nights we were away and held our luggage till we got back. Even though we had a great time in San Fransisco, when we returned it felt like coming home. The room we returned to was just as comfortable as the first but in an even better position. Staff welcome you every breakfast time and the choice of food and drink does the trick. The pool is well positioned at the front of the hotel and the shrubs and trees give

This is a quaint hotel in the midst of a neighborhood.  Overall the hotel is very nice for the price, with kitchens, comfy pillows, nice pool and pretty grounds. Hotel does need some upkeep, touch up painting, etc.  The internet was so slow and down so much it was not functional for work. When I spoke with the front desk they said they just put in boosters and there was nothing they could do - very disappointing and had to use hot spot entire stay.  Breakfast was good coffee, fruit, cereal and packaged muffins. The staff was very friendly and attentive, and the quaintness of the hotel made up for the deficiencies.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm, breakfast and full kitchen rooms. As the front desk said, we are in the process of making updates throughout the hotel to improve our WiFi service. We are sorry that you were there during the upgrade process and did not have adequate WiFi. We do hope you come back again to try out our new WiFi and enjoy the same quaint boutique experience.

Summary: If you just want to stay in and cuddle with your hubby this is the perfect place to do that! They gave me no hassle about my small service dog, the room was immaculately clean the bathroom was very nice the kitchen was fully stocked with everything we needed everything was close by to buy our food to cook. The only thing that disappointed me was the fact that we did not receive the room that I thought I had originally booked which would have been a garden View with a balcony but I didn't receive that. I was also told that as long as my credit card did not say Debbie that I would not be charged a $100 deposit fee and that I can use my American Express. Upon arrival Not only was I told that I couldn't use my AmEx I had to pay the deposit still but they reduced it in half to $50. I

Nice room but my toilet was leaking and i had a hard time with the ac. The other thing i didnt like was the smoking areas were at the end of the hall and even though we had a big patio we werent allowed to smoke. Even though the rooms were nice i probably wont stay here or recommend it. The maids & staff in the breakfast area were awesome.

This place is almost a secret. Stay here you will be surprised by the spacious rooms with full kitchens, great old hacienda decor and try the Mexican Mariscos restaurant that shares the parking lost. Great value for the money and only 3.5 miles to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are so glad you found us! Thanks for the great tips and recommendations.

Summary: I liked is a small hotel and had nice view to the pool plus the  room was great size for the price, its around 12 min away from disney. Great customer service and loved the pillows. breakfast was ok for the price, they had coffee and tea all day and at the morning some cereal and some bread and fruit.

I personally will always be booking into this hotel when I get to California. It never disappoints!! I love the fact that it's not too big or too small, very comfortable in my opinion. I like that the poolside is surrounded by palm trees, and that you have a kitchen in your room and right across the street a supermarket to buy all your groceries for your stay. It's also very near by to Disney land and Knotts berry farm. Hotel pepper tree is a great stay!!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you always come back! Thanks for the helpful tips and suggestions. We will see you again soon!

Summary: I visited Anaheim with my sister, my niece, my mom and my son. We were looking for a place near Disneyland and we found a perfect spot in Pepper tree.  The employees were very kind and helpful and, although it was difficult for us to move the luggage through the second floor (the floor tiles were not smooth), we could manage.  The only thing I could suggest, is to improve the cleaning. I found a sock in one of the drawers that weren't mine or my party. I didn't tell them about this because I didn't  have time.

Customer service at front desk was wonderful. Kitchen staff were kind and courteous, kitchen was always fully stocked during breakfast hours. Only housekeeping was not good, room would not get cleaned until you would tell them to clean it  late in afternoon.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the customer service and breakfast. Our housekeeping staff does service the rooms daily - late mornings and afternoons. If you talk with the front desk, we would be happy to service your room at a specific time in the future. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Staff was friendly and the room was clean, but unfortunately, I was mainly looking for a comfortable and convenient place to sleep while we did a Disney trip and it was not great for sleep.  The doors are so thin and every noise in the hallway echoed into our room all night. The room across the hall had a smoke detector go off and a family on the floor (maybe the same room) moved rooms at 2am. My husband and I slept so poorly.  My expectations weren't high, but I would never stay here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that you did not get a good nights rest during your visit. We will work with our staff to reduce the guest noise as much as possible during the night. Thanks again for your helpful feedback. We will use it to better our guest experience.

Summary: Hotel Pepper tree was Very clean, the staff was friendly, we had a very good time and enjoyed our stay, we will be coming back for sure, this place was perfect for any vacation, family, couples, or even traveling alone.

Chose this hotel based on reviews, it's proximity to Disneyland and the good price, and what good choice it was! Stayed for 4 nights with family and had a lovely stay. Specious and clean room, nice balcony, free parking and last but not least very friendly and helpful staff. We bought our Disney tickets throught them and got 15$ off of each ticket which was a great deal. Only thing we found lacking was breakfast, but the fully equipped kitchen area in the room and the 24 hour hot water/coffee compensated for it. Overall, nice and quiet hotel to come back to at the end of a long day. If we'll be in the area again, would definitely stay there.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you choose us for your Disneyland trip. We are so glad that you used our Disneyland $15 off ticket deals and that you enjoyed your full kitchen. Thanks for the recommendations and helpful tips.

Summary Heading: REVIEW OF OUR STAY @ HOTEL PEPPER TREE
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree; it offered us all the amenities of a timeshare hotel and were comfortable staying there!  The breakfast offerings were excellent as well!  The location of the hotel was very good for where we needed to be and appreciated the highway being close to the hotel!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree is the only hotel we go to when we visit Disneyland.  It is only a five minute drive away from Disneyland with no traffic.  It has a grocery store right across from the hotel and a restaurant on property.  A great hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for being such a loyal guest! Can't wait to have you back again soon.

Summary: Was not pleased with the area,the rooms were very old,beds were not comfortable.There was a gap around our door so the light from the hallway shone through all night long and we could hear everything in the hall because of it.On the last night of our stay the toilet stopped working.The customer service was good,they were very attentive to our needs,just was not extremely pleased with the way the hotel looked,very old.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We are happy to hear that the customer service was helpful and attentive. We will make sure to inspect your room and door. We do hope that you were able to speak with the front desk regarding your issues so we could help you during your stay.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, internet could be better
Summary: Great hotel with pool in good location for Disneyland at a good price.   Internet in room could be better as was slow and disconnected often.   Kids enjoyed stay and that was the purpose of visit.   Good local chain with old fashion service.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that your family enjoyed your stay and our pool. We are in the final stages of updating our WiFi and are working hard to provide the best connection and speed for our guests. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to use it to improve our service.

Summary: My family and I were visiting from out of state. We picked this location because it was near Disneyland which was on our to do list, plus it had the comforts of home. We were able to make our own meals when we were in the room or grab a quick light snack on days we got up early from the pantry next to the front desk. The staff was extremely helpful when my daughter dropped her mickey toy in our downstairs neighbors patio. They even replaced the batteries for us since it was left on all day. I would definitely like to stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so happy to be your home away from home! Thanks for the kind words. We can't wait to have you back again.

Summary: My husband & I stayed here for a week for our honeymoon & it was so wonderful! We loved everything about this hotel, from the location, the staff, the decor & of course the breakfast!! They always made sure we had fresh towels & our bed made! The staff was so helpful with all our questions & always had a smile on their face! We would recommend this place to anyone!! We look forward to our next stay!
Manager Response: Congrats again on your wedding! We were so honored to have you stay with us for such an important occasion. Thank you so much for the helpful review and recommendations. Come back again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree.  The décor is lovely, the staff is very nice, and the room was large, clean, and very comfortable .  We had a nice enclosed outdoor space with a fountain.  Full updated kitchen was a plus.  There is plenty of parking and it is pretty quiet.  We will absolutely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Great stay at Hotel Pepper Tree!!
Summary: Room was very clean and slept incredibly well!!  Property is very well maintained and staff was very helpful and courteous!!  Free breakfast at the Hotel saved me time the next morning in order to get to my UC San Diego OSHA Class on time.  Next time I'm in the area will definitely try to stay at Hotel Pepper Tree again.  This was on UC San Diego's OSHA Training Institute's recommended list and I can see why.  Best wishes for continued success!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback and comments! We are so happy that you slept well, ate well, and enjoyed your business trip. We would love to have you back with us again... maybe for a vacation trip the next time!

Summary Heading: Competition trip with group of friends
Summary: Me and 2 of my friends stayed one week in hotel. Overall experience was very positive. Hotel is beautiful, kitchen corner useful and enough well equipped, professional and friendly reception staff, spacious room with own beautiful patio, plenty of parking spots etc. Also lot of restaurants and other facilities nearby. Only little bit negative part was that cleaners often tried to come several times to our room during morning/midday even we told we want cleaning during afternoon and that timing was also mentioned in information leaflet. Because I shared king-size bed with my friend, we asked extra blankets so both could have own one. But still every day cleaner removed extra blankets from bed and made it like it would be ready for couple use. That was kind a annoying because she

Hotel Pepper Tree has a great feel and friendly people. I loved the quiet rooms with double-glazed sliding doors and block-out curtains, and comfortable beds. It was great to have a proper kitchen too. The pool was really nice and clean, and the plants and decor was lovely. I thought it was very good value for the price. Highly recommended.

Everything was great until hotel employee made my teenage daughter uncomfortable....Pertaining to the Hotel everything was outstanding...The staff even left a special gift for my son's birthday....Great Place..

Location is perfect if you want to stay away from those crowded chain hotels around Disney. It’s a great value considering the design and decor of the building. Kitchens are spacious and convenient in case you need essentials for cooking.

Hard beds, noisy hotel guests, slamming doors, intermittent Wifi reception, very limited TV reception and no DVD player so can't rent a movie. Bad shower head and toilet so low you are practically sitting on the floor.  Sheets not changed when you ask for.  We stayed for 10 days but never again. Very old hotel and because they have a small pool they charge a nightly resort fee added to the room rate.  Definitely not worth the nightly price.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations and will make sure our management team checks your room immediately to ensure it is meeting the hotel's standards.  We do have DVD players to use for free available at the front desk. We did change your sheets during your stay but because the "do not disturb" sign was on your door for several days, our housekeeping staff was unable to service the room as much as possible. We again are sorry that you had some issues and wish that you would have informed us during your visit so we could have help resolve them.

Summary: We loved the feeling of this hotel. The staff was the best. They were all very caring. Not fake. Need pot holder for oven. Gas Barbecue to low on the flame to cook. Other then that when we come back we will stay here. Made our trip great.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and friendly staff. Thanks for the helpful feedback!

Summary: First and for most people should know The Pepper Tree Hotel will hold deposit 3 plus days , after telling me it would be refunded as soon as housekeeping cleans the room . It's been 3 days still waiting . The rooms aren't exactly fresh and the breakfast was served with expired milk , I would not , I mean will stay here again, also the rooms are boring with bad basic cable reception .
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that you will stay here again. We did refund your deposit the same day of your check-out. The speed of the refund is determined by your bank unfortunately. We do appreciate your helpful feedback and will use it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: The room was clean, nicely decorated and had everything I needed in the kitchen and bathroom.  I would recommend this hotel to family and friends.  I only thing I would change is the breakfast because I don't eat muffins.  Booking.com didn't explain that it is continental only, I thought there would be hot eggs and meat offered.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful comments and recommendations. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We do offering our To-Go breakfast each morning, but for a full breakfast, we suggest some great restaurants just across the street from the hotel. Thanks again for your review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: What a charming hotel with Spanish styling.  The tiled floor keeps the hotel cool, the kitchenette is sweet,  the vibe is so relaxing.  The hotel attracts guests that are polite, and intent on having fun, and respectful of the quiet hours, I got great restful sleep, but forgot to take advantage of all the breakfast amenities.  Pho nearby, big and stocked grocery store, neighborhoods well kept.  Front desk awesome!  Elevator slow, so take the stairs, you will feel regal descending the stairs to the lobby.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. Thanks for the helpful comments and tips.

Summary: My overall review - 10/10: Hotel Pepper Tree is affordable, with clean spacious and beautiful rooms. It is  easy to locate and commute to and provides professional and friendly staff service, definitely worth the stay.

The room was comfortable and clean, it takes a little reading and trial and error to learn how to use the AC unit. I did notice that the refrigerator was noisier that it should be when it was kicking on and off. I told the front desk about it when I checked out. the staff was vary helpful at all times.

Nice Hotel but, terrible cleanliness, the floor was with dust and the room have a bad odor, the personal who service in this hotel was great everyone who know was very kind. excellent site and excellent location
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are  so happy that you enjoyed the convenient location and friendly staff. We will make sure our housekeeping staff sees your comments about the cleanliness immediately -most of our guests usually enjoy the cleanliness of our hotel. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We do hope you return to the hotel.

Summary: Everyone was friendly and helpful. The rooms was nicely designed and clean. The staff was wonderful, had the pleasure of meeting the FOM. The restaurant in front of the hotel was well priced, good food and very hospitable. Must stay...

Our stay at Pepper Tree was very good. We liked everything. Couple of issues. Wifi was a bit slow and you had to make several connections as it didn't worked sometimes that was a little issue. And the maids were a bit noisy in the morning. The rest was excellent!) Would love to come back)

Hotel centralized in the heart of OC, room was in good condition although it might be time to update some of the room interior including carpeting and refrigerator. Beds were comfy, great sleep, good value.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad to hear that you slept great and thought our hotel was a good value. We are in the process of making updates throughout all our rooms and will make sure to look at yours immediately.

Summary: We love the hotel. The kitchen makes it even better for longer stays. However, the bathroom for our last stay was created for someone 6' 5 due to the shower head being attached to a goose neck pipe. Even when set to the lowest angle the water hit the end wall. For someone shorter, it was hard to breath.  The other problem is the AC unit is mounted high on the wall and blows directly at the head of the bed. It needs to be redirected.
Manager Response: Thanks for helpful feedback. We are so happy you loved the hotel and full kitchens.  We will make sure to check the shower in your room and see what we can do to make it more accommodating to all guests. Thanks again for the helpful comments. We will use them to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great family location for the Anaheim Resort Area
Summary: The hotel is older, but it is very clean and remodeled. The hotel has character and charm that some of the chains lack. The room was large and had a full kitchen. The 1st floor courtyard room was very private and added to the character of the room.   The breakfast offerings were sparse, but enough to not starve. The Mexican supermarket across the street has everything you need to cook in your own room. TV’s were not HDTV which was not good as we tried to watch the Stanley Cup Finals on it. Additionally, some of the linens were slightly stained upon our arrival - we called the front desk and they took care of that without question.  We would recommend to friends and family and we would surely book again.

Me & my husband had a great time at the hotel pepper tree. Our stay was very comfortable and front desk (Randy G.) helped accommodate to our every need. He helped us check in and also gave us directions to places and things to do for couples which came in very handy. He was very respectful, had great manners and amazing customer service skills. I would recommend this hotel to everybody coming to visit. Thank you Randy from hotel pepper tree

Summary Heading: Best place to be while visiting Disneyland
Summary: This place is little bit of Spanish style nice roomy with kitchen and small back yard just like 5 min drive to Disneyland theres bunch of restaurants and shopping around and don't forget to meet randy he does a excellent customer service job and very helpfull

Very friendly place, loved staying here. everithing is so close by the hotel and can go for a walk to the grocery store to cook up something on the stove they have in the room! They also surprised me with a bottle of wine and a card that everyone signed wishing me a happy anniversary. Can't wait to go back again!

I went with my bf for a 3 day Disneyland trip and stayed for 4 nights. The room was very clean and guest services were very kind and prompt. Didn’t really need to use the kitchenette since we left really early two days, but it was adequately stocked to cook if needed. (We ended up only using the fridge and tea kettle to heat up water for tea and coffee.) The only downside is that the walls are very thin so you can hear guests early in the morning walking down the halls, mainly kids who are really excited about going to the Disney Parks, the one day we decided to sleep in a bit since we stayed at the parks late the night before. It’s farther away from the parks than the neighborhood hotels and there is no shuttle, but I personally didn’t mind since I have free parking with my

Friendly and helpful staff. Loved the breakfast girl. Everything was very clean and the pool was refreshing. Love the new coffee & tea bar. Perfect location and amenities for families visiting southern California attractions. Have been staying here for years and the quality has improved alot.

Enjoyed our 4 night stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree.  Room was large and quite comfortable.  Full kitchen was great.  Would have been better if there was a small dining table for 2 people. Great supermarket across the road.  Staff friendly and helpful.  Easy parking. Breakfast pastries were tasty.

The staff was great.  They put something nice in our room because they knew we were celebrating a graduation.  Very friendly and accommodating.  The room was a little dated and the bathroom needs a huge facelift, but overall it was a good stay.  The wifi was terrible, which made things difficult for a guy like me who needs to get work done.  Other guests were pretty noisy, and as others have noted the sound tends to carry through walls and floors.  But overall, a pretty good experience and I would stay here again.

A gem of a Hotel at reasonable price. Well kept with very nice staff. Highly recommend ! Easy access to all the good stuff to do and see in Anaheim and LA area. Disney, knotsberry farm, beaches, hollywood etc are all pretty close.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed our friendly staff and convenient location. Come back again soon.

Summary: Surprisingly good.  Great to have a full kitchen. Room was clean.  Most staff very friendly.  Enjoyed the coffee and pastries in the morning.  Beds are firm and the blankets are too rough for my taste. Will be back.  Very convenient if you plan on going to disney with a car.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful tips and feedback! We are so happy that your stay was even better than you expected and that you will be back.

Summary: Beautiful style, confortable, good value, nice coffee to go, free parking. Very good staff, helpful, polited. Only internet was not enough. I strongly recommend this place. There is a market in front of it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and amenities. We are currently working on our WiFi throughout the hotel. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Check in was easy. Good location. Room was great. Kitchen wasn't fully stocked with cooking gadgets and utensils but we made due. The shower could be updated. Not much pressure. Really enjoyed the courtyard off our room.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback! We are so happy that you enjoyed your private courtyard room and our convenient location. We will make sure to check your shower immediately for the pressure issue you mentioned. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: Location could not have been better Very clean and staff was helpful,pleasant, and informative. Coffee bar was especially nice as was the pool area. Nice having a BBQ available too.  The price was the best part.

Summary Heading: hotel staffs were really kind and nice
Summary: on the day of arrival, I needed an extra bed. the hotel staff showed me three different rooms by taking me to each one of them. very convenient for me to choose from different set of beds. full kitchen was really useful in traveling with kids. convenient to go to a market across the street in walking distance.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. We are so happy to hear that our staff went above and beyond to make sure you had the best room during your visit. We are so happy that the full kitchen and market were helpful to your family. Thanks again for the review. We hope you come back again.

Summary: Hotel was very cool and a nice setting. We really enjoyed the full kitchen. The inly downfall was that i did get bit 2 wjile there amd room service didnt give new sheets only made the bed. I lmow this because i had spilled juice on the sheets and the same sheets remained there throughout my whole stay there

Nice, clean hotel. Walls are thin, you can hear everything from hallway and next room. Super friendly staff. Lots of places to eat nearby. Try the taqueria inside the grocery store directly across the street, food and bakery are really good. Would stay again

The hotel is very cozy, its not a luxury place but its very nice. They have kitchen it the room and everything is very clean. Many places around the hotel, like a supermarket and a restaurant outside. People at the reception also very friendly

Summary Heading: It was a really nice stay.
Summary: Beds were comtcomfort. The layout was nice and ambiance was homey. Our son was actually sad to leave this hotel. We were never left behind on maid service and we would sometimes leave our room at 12 or 1 booking direct from the website offers the best stay so I would recommend checking their direct website .

This was our first stay at this hotel and we really enjoyed our stay. The hotel was relatively quiet and comfortable. The price was great, the room was beautiful and spacey, the patio was a nice touch, and the kitchen was useful. The front desk staff was kind and courteous. The only downsides were the uncomfortable bed (too stiff), a funny smell in the room, and an old tiny bathroom. Otherwise, it was fairly clean and served us well. We will definitely return.

Wifi could’ve been better. My hotel room got like no phone signal so I tried to rely on the wifi but it wasn’t any better. Other than that the room was very nice. Perfect size for me traveling solo. The snack shop was convenient too

It was Very Comfortable Sleeping on the King Bed. The Room kitchen and bathroom are Superclean! and the Staff Super kind and caring. We would come back for sure. The Kitchen was a definite plus! I enjoyed sitting on the couch also, watching tv.

I stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree for a conference near Orange County ROP. It is near many stores and restaurants, and Downtown, and not too far from the parks. I went to the Packing House and the brewery near by. Big fridge, with kitchen, and utensils. The hotel was very clean, and kept up very well. Nice staff; they saved my charger for me after leaving it behind. I will stay again with my family.

Room has everything you need to stay a few days while away from home.  It is a bit dated but the location can't be beat.  The kitchen had all the tools needed to enjoy a meal right in the room with a large enough refrigerator, stove, microwave and all the pots and pans and plates needed conveniently included.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our full kitchens and convenient location! Thanks for the great review. We love to be your home away from home.

Summary: Taylor was AWESOME!! She went above and beyond even before we showed up. The staff even left a fun surprise for us in our room welcoming us in.yet in Saying that it was a little disheartening that the rest of the employees did not have the same  bedside manner. at times we thought we were irritating just asking a simple question. (Wish Taylor was there 24/7).  New to the area 1st time on vacation we had a couple questions we ventured out and asked Siri instead LOL… Bathroom was much cleaner after we left (I scrubbed) but kitchen was awesome!!  We had one broken bed that we did not dare complain we made it work.  Kids loved the hot chocolate and the pool (website says heated but definitely was not) little far from Disneyland but loved the Spanish style.Parking was definitely an

Loved the decor. Very clean. The location seemed safe. The kitchen was equipped with everything we needed. The bathroom could have used a little updating. If in the area again this is our go to hotel.
Manager Response: We would love to be your go-to hotel in Anaheim! Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and full kitchens. We appreciate your helpful feedback and will us it to better our hotel.

Summary: Hotel was Great. It had everything. And I loved the outside space. Loved the fact that it has a full kitchen. Will be booking this hotel for just about every trip I make down there. Also the lady at the front desk that helped me was very patient with me since my bank did not want to allow the transaction to go through.

This hotel is amazing from Check in to Check out!! We stayed for 6 nights.Everyone at the front desk were awesome even down to the housekeepers. When I first booked the hotel i called to make sure they received my reservation and to inform them that our flight would be delayed and I told the front desk guy that it was my 3 yr old birthday and we were coming to take him to Disneyland and he put a balloon and card and chocolate in our room and he asked what room we wanted. The location was great and the rooms were awesome. I only had two minor dislikes which No laundry in the hotel and not having our sheets changed at least once during the 7 day stay. But there is a Laundromat next door and I will ask next time for sheets to be changed. Other than that my stay was amazing. Thank
Manager Response: Thanks so such a thorough and helpful review. We are so happy you enjoyed your birthday trip. We are sorry that sheets were not changed and will talk to our housekeeping staff about your situation. We hope you can come back again soon.

Summary: I have stayed multiple times and enjoyed each time.  The rooms are homey and clean and the staff is friendly and helpful. I go to visit my son and enjoy bringing my two granddaughters to swim in the pool.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for the review. We can't wait to see you again.

Summary Heading: Rested & recuperating before & after Disney fun!
Summary: Visited area for conference & fun afterwards. Enjoyed pool and patio. Coffee 24 hours & refreshments are available. Nice Mexican Seafood restaurant nearby too. Close to Disneyland & attractions.  Pleasant residential area , quiet and clean!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. We are so happy that we could provide you with a relaxing visit.

Summary: The rooms are dated, but clean.  There was very little outside noise in the room I was in, but the noise in the hallway was unacceptable.  The bed is about average.  There was a very basic free  breakfast of fruit and coffee.  However, there is a large variety of snacks and breakfast items such as yogurt and cereal for sale.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Close to Theme Parks
Summary: Great hotel that's close to the theme parks in the area. Close to everything you need- grocery store righ across the street and shopping centers near by. Great customer service, friendly staff, and I loved the
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy you enjoyed our friendly staff and convenient location. Come back soon!

Summary: The front desk gal Misty! Astounding! the hotel was sooooo great! But she was really beautiful. I told her she reminded me of a younger Christina Applegate. She was humbled. The hotel can hire well!!! and the décor and feel is sooooo good! and did I tell you, Misty was pretty!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We will make sure our front desk staff sees them.

Summary: It was perfect, we really enjoyed it, from the friendly and warm welcome, given by very helpful member of the staff, to the lovely hotel style, the very comfortable room, with its well equipped kitchen and comfy chairs, we really loved it and would recommend to everyone! The free coffee bar was amazing, allowing my daily dose of espresso , the healthy parks pantry offer was really helpful too. We used the pool too, in some spare time when not going at the parks , and it’s enclosed setting was really enjoyable, sorrounded by beautiful bougainvilleas ! Definitely a place to come back to when visiting the Orange County!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm. Come back again soon!

Summary: Pepper Tree Hotel was a good stay. Loved the vintage Spanish feel and ambiance, the included kitchen was excellent. If we had a complaint it had to be the small bathroom; we had to keep the doors open due to lack of ventilation. Understandable for an

I would have given 100% because it was gorgeous and comfy! And they accepted my service dog without a hassle. I was just misguided on what cards i could use and had to pay an additional deposit. They reduced it which was sweet of them but i financially wasn't prepared for these extra charges then a charge for late checkout i requested due to a severe medical condition. They however were very nice and helpful and accommodating and even had a bottle of Malbec waiting for my husband and i when we got into our room!

I stayed here for 5 nights, as a base for disneyland, universal and seaworld. It has full kitchen with microwave, oven, burners and fridge. I stayed on the first floor and found the room a bit gloomy and dark, not sure how upper floor rooms would feel like. Had issues with the water drainage in wash basins, but maintenance staff was quick to resolve it. Discount that they provide on disney tickets is really unbeatable (only if you book hotel direct through them). Disneyland is around 15 mins drive from hotel, and that's a great plus. Breakfast options are very limited but they do provide discount coupon for breakfast at a place across the street. Overall, I enjoyed the stay and would definitely stay there again.

Clean, spacious, comfortable room, good for our family of 4. Kitchen was basic, but met our needs, nice to have full size fridge. However, beds not very comfortable- mattresses springy and lumpy. Location was convenient, close to many stores, restaurants. Nice pool, no hot tub. Great complimentary coffee (Peet's), no substantial breakfast. Good value. Would book again next time we are in Anaheim.

Very friendly staff. The location was pretty good. About 10 mins away from everything. A nice little market across the street. My only problem was the noise. Wow, it was pretty bad. You could hear EVERYTHING. The walls must be really thin. Could hear children running up and down the halls, sounded like a stampede up stairs lol. I think they had a bad smoke detector and it beeped for hours in the morning. I could hear it from the bedroom. It didn’t help we were a little close to the elevator, you could hear people talking coming off the elevator late in the night. I think they should look to switch up the tile. You can hear the noise of the rolling suitcase hitting in between the big cracks of the tile from the bedroom. They also charge your card in advance if you stay more than
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to review the hotel. We love to hear from our repeat guests. We are so happy that you enjoy the staff and our convenient location. We are sorry about the noise issues you experienced during your stay. We will make sure to look into why your room during this stay had issues since you didn't have this problem during your first stay. We do always charge a one night deposit at the time of booking. We do hope that you will come back again in the future.

Summary: Loved our stay with Hotel Pepper Tree. Not only was it close to everything we needed but it was beautiful with friendly staff. Our bedroom was spacious and comfy. We had the King room with a courtyard patio. The bed was super comfy and we liked the layout of the entire room. The coffee bar was a go-to for me. We hope to stay here on our next trip when we bring our kids.

Summary Heading: My favourite place to stay in the Anaheim area.
Summary: Always good service, great rooms, full kitchen, great ambience. Even better now they have added the pantry room. The breakfast at the restaurant in the parking lot is honestly not great - food could be much healthier with better selection. BUT, that said, this is my home away from home. Only thing missing is an exercise room.

Centrally located with plenty of parking. The rooms are exceptionally clean and the beds comfy. No in-house breakfast to speak of, but the unassuming The Scratch Room 2415 Lincoln Ave, Anaheim will sort out the hungriest traveler for a reasonable price. Aussies will love this place. We will be back.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We love Aussies and are owned by two Aussies! We do have a To-Go Coffee Bar each morning along with our Mini Market. We do always recommend the amazing, Scratch Room, for a great hot breakfast.

Summary: I enjoyed every aspect of the hotel, minus how loud it could be. The walls are thin and could hear the pipes in the wall plus kids through the walls. Would stay here again, but only on the third floor.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and will stay here again. We are sorry the noise issues you experienced. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and will use them to find areas in which we can improve.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you are traveling by car
Summary: This is a great value for the size of room and location.  We loved the Spanish style architecture and design, the full suite with kitchen, and the private balcony.   It was easy to get to the parks by car from here, in a nice neighborhood with lots of amenities nearby (gas stations, groceries, etc), easy access to the freeways.  The staff were reasonably friendly and efficient.  It was quiet at night, and the beds were comfy.     My only issue was with the "breakfast included"...basically, there is none.   Just some packaged pastries, some fruit and a fancy coffee machine.   They do have yoghurts and cereals and other breakfast items...but you have to buy them from their little vending machine/kiosk setup.   So, just get your breakfast and other food items from across the street
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so happy that you enjoy our boutique charm and amenities. We do only have (and advertise) our To-Go Coffee Bar and always suggest using the full kitchens in the rooms or to eat at the great place next door. Thanks again for the helpful tips and would love to be your go-to hotel in Anaheim.
