Summary: Our room was completely adequate for our weekend stay in Anaheim with our 2 small dogs and our grown son in a second room. The enclosed patio was very convenient since we had our pets.  When I made our reservation the desk clerk told me there would be a $25 charge for pets.  It was not till checking out that I found out the $25 charge was per dog($50) per night ($100) for the 2 nights we were there.  That was disappointing.  On Saturday, we all left our rooms from 3pm - 11pm. We never received any maid service. It would have been nice if they would have come in to make the beds and empty the trash under the sink.

Perfect for a family visiting Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm etc. A good grocery store just across the street and some nice restaurants in the neighbourhoor. Very poor breafast, only porcelin etc for two persons and you must clean that yourself.

It was very nice that it is a dog friendly hotel with patio rooms.  Having the kitchen in the room was helpful as well as having complementary breakfast provided and a restaurant on grounds that we went to and had some great food.

Accommodating staff in a very charming hotel. Clean and would book again for an Anaheim trip. Great restaurants/grocery stores nearby. Shout-out to the nice hotel manager and his wife we met at the delicious Teddy's Cafe Burger & Teriyaki restaurant :)

Summary Heading: Avoid if possible, not value for money
Summary: The breakfast advertised is misleading. They just have muffins, fruits and tea/coffee. The rollaway bed was ok for kids. No bell service so had to carry our luggage all the way to 3rd floor. Small room but kitchen facilities were good. Dailt cleaning not up to the mark. Parking area was good. Nearby supermarket and laundry was convenient.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback and tips. We do not advertise a full breakfast but only mention our To-Go Coffee bar but are sorry that it did not meet your expectations.

Summary: The hotel has spacious rooms and the kitchen is terrific. Although the decor is dated and could be updated, you have everything you need for a great time! I loved the easy self-service coffee bar and machine as well as the snack purchase area. The cost is reasonable and the location is just where you need it to be if you're visiting the Disney parks.

My husband and I loved everything about this hotel. The decor, location, staff, coffee/breakfast options, and spacious room. We will definitely be back. The price is as also very fair, especially for the area.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back!! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Stayed at this cute hotel for one night. It’s definitely different from the big name brand hotel we normally stay at when we make a trip to Disneyland. Kitchen in the room was stocked with necessities (just bring your own food). The private courtyard was adorable touch which is what attracted me to book this hotel. I’ll definitely be staying here again on our next trip.
Manager Response: We would love for your to come back again soon! We agree that the courtyard rooms are the best. Thanks for the review.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay very much. The only thing that was bothersome was when the other guests and maid services pushed carts up and down the hall ways. It was extremely loud on the ground floor.  We had a two year old that typically takes naps around the time of room cleaning and he was constantly getting woken up by the loud carts getting pushed up and down the hallway.  Not sure of what would be possible to help the situation but maybe looking into getting rubber tires that u can air up on the carts instead of hard rubber or solid plastic tires. I think the aired up tires would be much quieter and easier to push the carts. Other then that we had a great stay, our little one loved the pool and it was nice to have that grocery store right across the street.

Summary Heading: Rustic Flare and Good Customer Service
Summary: This hotel is only a few minutes from Disneyland and is located across the street from a Mexican store so it is easy to save some money on food by buying groceries and just cook a few meals in the room since it counts with everything to cook, utensils, pots and pans. The check-in was simple and the front desk staff was very nice and attentive. Our room was spacious and very clean. It was a great experience...the only few points were not really related to the hotel but, there is a seafood restaurant Right in the corner next to the entrance and smell of fried fish was constant...not very pleasant after a while smelling it.

My friend and I stayed here for a week in February. The front desk staff was so friendly and courteous, and made us feel welcome every time we interacted with them over the course of our stay. We also saw the manager quite often and he was always happy and asking us how we were. The room was clean and the bed was so comfy! I think our only thing was that some of the pillows were a little too worn but regardless, we both slept very well, and there was little to no noise from surrounding rooms! We made frequent use of the kitchen - having conveniently purchased groceries from the market across the road! And the covered deck was also a treat, as we often ate and relaxed outside. All in all, our trip was wonderful and we found a home away from home in Hotel Pepper Tree. Thank you to

This is a group hotel, where buses make very much noise. Busdrivers let the engines run in the early morning before 7 o clock and let them run after 10pm. The groups do not care about the normal Traveller. Nobody cared about the noise. You could hear the neighbors noises and talks. The breakfast you offer is ridiculous. Only packed danishes and that was it.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review the hotel. We do not normally have groups at our hotel but did during your stay. We will make sure the management team see your comments regarding your experience. We do offer our To-Go Coffee Bar each morning which includes premium coffees, espresso drinks, fruit and pastry options. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We hope you were able to talk with our front desk manager during your stay so we could help you.

Summary: A amazing hotel very affordable, amazing location right near Disneyland and Knott’s Berry Farm and only 5-10 mins on a Uber/Lyft very convenient wouldn’t hesitate to stay here next time! Staff were also very friendly and the rooms were clean
Manager Response: We would love to have you back again! Thanks for a great review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Nice 'Boutique' Hotel. Doesn't Live Up to the 8.4 rating that they promote. Older hotel, good sized rooms, hard bed, uncomfortable bedding, poor breakfast (always out of something) & fair to poor service - would never go out of their way to help or resolve an issue. Won't stay here again!
Manager Response: We are sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. We do hope you were able to talk with our front desk manager during your stay so we could help resolve any issues that you experienced. We will make sure to talk with our staff regarding your comments and use them to better our service.

Summary Heading: Nice stay but kitchen needs more
Summary: Loved the hotel! So much character! Store and places to eat across the street. The only problem was how the kitchen was stocked. We picked this place so we could save money on eating out. There is an oven but nothing to use to cook in the oven. The pans had plastic handles and no cookie sheet or oven pan. There were 4 of us in the room but only servings for 3. No blender, pot holders or kitchen linens Loved the full sized fridge. Could use better bedding like a comforter. There are only the thin blankets. Also the free breakfast is terrible but they do have a really nice coffee bar / machine that is avalable 24 hrs. They have a mini convenient store open 24hrs in the breakfast area, you use your room key to get in, which is nice. Despite all the negative things I loved staying
Manager Response: We are so happy that you will be back! Thanks so much for the tips and helpful feedback. We do hope you contacted the front desk to get additional cooking items. Your room is not meant for 4 people which is why there wasn't quite enough dishes, but we would have been happy to supply more for your stay. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and will use them to better our hotel. We hope we see you again soon.

Summary: The staff was amazing but the rooms need to be upgraded!!! The carpet was old, the grout was missing from the tile, the bathtub was really old and the towels had stains on them. Everything was really outdated and it needs to be redone.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed our friendly staff. We are sorry your room did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to check your room immediately for the issues you mentioned. Thanks again for the feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Kind of worn out but not a total bust
Summary: Let's try to be positive. The location was pretty good for going to Disneyland if you have a car. The staff was friendly. The beds in our room were real good. Our room was a kitchenette room(although we did not cook) and the layout was good, but it had no dining table. The room was clean. Here is the downside. Even with the aforementioned the place is dated and pretty well worn out. Our love seat was wicker with a homemade upholstery job. After a day at Disneyland our door would not open. The electronic lock would not work. The fellow at the front desk finally got it open after a bit of a wait. He said the batteries were dead. When we came in our room had not been made up. Evidently housekeeping had the same problem and did not report it and just skipped the room. The
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed our friendly staff, convenient location, and comfy beds. We are sorry for the issue with the door and are working with our staff to ensure that issue does not happen again. We do hope you try our hotel again.

Summary: Reserved suite a month before arrival.Was told there would be a $45.00 charge for the dog,which is reasonable,but was charged $45.00 per night at checkout a week later.Also was given a room next to a suite being remodeled.The work shift was 8 to 4.Not good for wife who needs afternoon rest.
Manager Response: Thank you, Ronald, for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you choose our hotel during your week long stay and are sorry that you did thoroughly enjoy your stay. We do only charge $25 per night per pet. We are sorry for any noise from you experienced during the day but we would have been happy to move your rooms. Please contact us directly if you think there is still an issue with your bill. We would love to help rectify this situation.

Summary: I was very impressed with what the hotel had to offer. It was a very quiet hotel with everything we were looking for. We were going to Disney and needed a quiet place to sleep and relax in the down time. it doesn't have that vacation feel to it but for sleeping and feeling safe this was the place to go. The price is what also made it amazing. Very affordable for what was offered. We never made it to the complimentary breakfast but I was happy that it was offered just in case.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that we were able to provide you with a relaxing and peaceful visit. We are also happy that you loved the price and value of our hotel. We hope you can come again soon!

Summary: I did not realize there was no breakfast, only grab and go snacks so that was a disappointment.  Staff was extremely kind and helpful.  Pool was great.  The room was clean but a little run down.   I *hated* the raised tiles that caused all carts to sound like a marching band each time they went down the hall or even outside.   It was farther from Disneyland than I thought but thanks to UBER, we managed fine.   The price was great.   Very helpful to have a full grocery store right across the street.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback! We are so happy that you enjoyed the price, staff and pool area. Our free To- Go Coffee Bar is described on our website along with several other for purchase options at and near the hotel. We will make sure to use all of your comments to better our hotel and staff. We do hope you come again.

Summary: We had stayed there previously and then it had a hot tub,  but this time not.  Was easy to access and had stores nearby.  Pool was too cold and without a hot tub.  A brother from Australia and a brother from Alaska were with us.  Everybody was helpful and courteous.  We did like the coffee and such that was available in the morning.

Great value. A nice size room with all of the necessary amenities. Plenty of room to spread out. Also, it is close enough to Disneyland that Unere was only about $8.00 each way. Cheaper than the cost of parking.

Amazing staff and exceptionally clean.  This property may not have all of the shinny new amenities but is kept very clean and staff responsiveness was excellent.  The staff were very personable and welcoming💕
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your sweet words! We are so happy to hear that you loved our staff. We hope you come "home" again soon!

Summary: Everything was great room was clean and very quiet in the mornings. Me and my husband go every year on a little vacation to get away from LA. Always a great experience.  I would highly recommend this hotel for families with children because it is close to Disneyland and Knots Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your help staycation tips! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again next year.

Summary Heading: Some downsides but overall good value
Summary: Room was great, very spacious. Decor and overall hotel atmosphere was nice. Loved the enclosed private patio and the fact that we could cook a nice little meal for ourselves. A few downsides although I imagine this doesn't happen all of the time... The dishes in the kitchen weren't exactly the cleanest.. seems like whoever used them before hardly washed them and put them back and housing keeping didn't check or they would have seen food residue on the dishes..yuck! The closet was really big and spacious but had a very off-putting odor... My guess (hope) is it was just an unusual mishap but the noisy hallways must be a usual occurrence. You can hear every suitcase, cart and footstep that passes your door, not to mention any knock on nearby room doors and conversations held in the

Not only could we hear the elevator move up and down all night but the people next door that came home drunk at 2am were so loud I felt like they were in the same room. We could hear them sigh! This was a last minute booking and the good reviews, location and price had me excited. Even the style of the hotel had appeal. The front desk was efficient and friendly but I couldn’t sleep at all! Also, we were hot and couldn’t locate a thermostat to control the temp. The kitchen would have been a nice feature if we were staying longer, but the “breakfast” was disappointing. Ore packaged pastries, fruit and coffee do not qualify as breakfast. Some yogurt, toast, or a bagel would have been nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so sorry for the noise issues you experienced from the guests next door. We do hope you were able to talk with the front desk so we could help with the noise and to help you find the with the air conditioning controls. We do offer a free To-Go Coffee Bar option for all of our guests but also have multiple for-purchase options: our in-hotel pantry store, two convenient restaurants, and a grocery store to buy items for your kitchens. We again our sorry that you did not get a good night's rest.

Summary: Bathroom was dirty and toilet was not flushed or clean, no towels, a/c did no work  reception do not want to refund my money even as I said I was not staying and wanted manager to call me next morning.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We were happy to give you a full refund for your stay. We did inspect your room immediately and found the room clean with the AC working correctly.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay!! It’s very quiet and only a 5-10 minute ride to the convention center and Disneyland. The staff was professional and very helpful with my all of my questions. The pool and outside areas were nice... Our balcony opened over the pool, surrounded by palm trees and bright flowers.

I was a little skeptical at first going to this hotel. But when you go to the room its really nice. I love the gas stove and the kitchenette. We went to the restaurant for breakfast but its only continental. So we went to the Latin Supermarket across the street. They also serve breakfast there and pretty much have everything to make breakfast in your room. All in all I would still go back.

I really like that there’s a kitchen with everything you need for a small meal. I also liked the fact that it’s not to far from Disney Land and also down the street from my family. Overall it was a great experience.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the 5 stars! We are so happy that you enjoyed your full kitchen and convenient location. Please come back again soon!

Summary: We found the staff to be helpful and friendly, and the room was clean, and the grocery store was close by. Having a full kitchen was very convenient, and free WiFi and parking was another added bonus.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful comments and tips. We love to hear positive comments about our staff!

Summary Heading: Great location and value for Disney/LA
Summary: Large room with balcony, full kitchen and private dressing area.  10 minute back way into Disneyland without getting on I-5.  Convenient to downtown LA.  Very good coffee available all day.  Add boiled eggs to the continental breakfast items for protein - fresh fruit and pastry items were good.  Housekeeping was very good. Thank you. (You don't need to give rooms new soap every day - it's wasteful).
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback and tips. So glad you enjoyed your stay and our location. We will make sure our housekeepings staff sees your comments.

Summary: The staff was very nice. Bed was uncomfortable and the pillows were horrible. Walls thin so noise was audible. I don’t like writing bad reviews but this place really wasn’t great. But again, the staff was very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. We did just change all of our mattresses throughout the hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed our staff. Thanks again for your comments - we will use them to better our hotel and service.

Summary: Everyone was very friendly. The kitchen was super convenient. I really enjoyed the private patio , it was very nice place to sit and eat. I definitely would consider coming back to the pepper tree on my next visit to Anaheim
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay! We do hope you come back again soon.

Summary: I love this place, very convenience to all places. Everything in the room are great, i stayed for 5 nights. Will be back here again, hopefully longer than this time. Thank you! Please keep up the good work!

Summary Heading: Very Nice! Enjoyed and Will Come Back
Summary: I liked literally everything about this hotel. I liked the outside and the fact that there is a Mexican restaurant right in front of the hotel. The hotel was quiet and clean. I enjoyed having a kitchen during this stay as my husband went fishing in Newport Beach. The staff were very nice! What I really liked was the design of the hotel inside. IMPORTANT: The beds and pillows were SO comfortable! I slept great. They had a continental breakfast but I do believe they could improve in this. I would like to see them add some bagels and cream cheese and some cut up fresh fruit. All in all I picked a winner and will definitely go back! I also found it pretty central to wherever we were going. Although we didn't go to Knott's Berry Farm, it was quite close. Thanks for a great stay!

Me and my fiancé were traveling through Anaheim with our dog and found the pet friendly PepperTree Hotel. At first they said he was too big for their policy (40 lbs) but after looking through the policy and finding no weight requirement and speaking to the manager on duty he said he could make an exception for us. We ended up staying an extra night and had two wonderful days of rest. Thank you again for everything!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are so happy that all of you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: The hotel was a little difficult to find, but was in a prime location.   Our stay was wonderful, clean room and very quiet area.  Beds were very comfortable.  I think the breakfast could have been a little better but since we had full kitchen it made it easier to keep to my own dietary needs.  The coffee bar was a big hit on the trip, as well as the blackout curtains.  It was very easy to get some rest during the trip.  Would recommend this hotel to anyone looking to visit the area, and actually get some sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful tips and feedback! We are so glad you found us and enjoyed our convenient location. We love to hear that this was a restful trip. Thanks for the recommendations.

Summary: Excellent helpful staff. rollaway bed was available so children did not have to share a double bed. pool was tepid and refreshing.  late check out was a real bonus. situated on a busy road, but the traffic noise was minimal.

Before we even arrived the staff was amazing. As soon as I booked online I got a call from them asking if I had any special needs or requests. Then when I had to cancel one of my nights a couple of days before the trip they had no problem doing so, no charge. This hospitality didn’t end when we got there. Great people and a nice room. I had no idea it had a full kitchen in it! There was so much space!!! We took a short Uber to and from Disneyland. We’ll definitely be back.

Summary Heading: Great Boutique Hotel...very cute and cozy..would recommend and definitely stay again.
Summary: Such a cute and cozy boutique hotel.....great customer service started before I arrived with a phone call thanking me for booking. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it to others. The location was great as well. Perfect distance to restaurants and all the tourist  activities like Disney and Knotts Berry...

We had a few groups of family’s  staying at the hotel. Everyone enjoyed themselves. The kitchen worked out great. The rooms were clean. The pool was heated.  It was very close to the volleyball sites where we needed to be.

Love this hotel. We will probably make it our staple stay at Disney when we are doing more than a day or two at the parks. Love the ability to cook and load up the fridge. Great for kids they loved the extra room we had compared to other hotels. Kids loved having the balcony and looking at surrounding area and our car. The bathroom and hallway to bathroom we very spacious and is nice for a long stay and can hang the whole families clothes. Only negative is that bathroom could use a touch up paint job. But that is hardly a complaint to keep me away.

A great place to stay. Clean unit, pool and lobby. Friendly staff. didn't use the breakfast as we cooked in the unit which is why we stayed here. Only issue was the room next to us was very loud into the late night. Access to all amenities was terrific.

I love to stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. For both business and pleasure. They have a wonderful Spanish style decor. And most rooms have a kitchenette so you can cook in your room if you would like, great for a family. The hotel is minuets from Knott's and Disneyland. Last but not least, the rooms are always clean and the beds are super comfortable. I would recommend this hotel to anyone in the Anaheim area.

Having travelled through California through several hotels the amenities and spaciousness of the Hotel Pepper Tree room as well as the nearby shops and facilities including a nice clean Coin Op Laundry were a much appreciated relief. Staff were helpful and friendly. Highly recommended for anyone looking for value for money

Nothing fancy and it's pretty outdated but the staff is friendly and made everything easy.  A little further from Disneyland that I would prefer but if you use Lyft/Uber it's not too bad.  The pool looked nice but we didn't have a chance to use it.  Very quiet area.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff and quiet atmosphere.

Summary: Hotel was in a great and calm location. We stayed there for 4 nights and had a pleasant time overall. Only thing that I thought missing was complimentary breakfast though. It would be great if they can provide complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and our convenient location. We do offer our free morning To-Go Coffee Bar with fruit, drinks, and pastries. We also have our Pantry which offers lots of food and snack options at a great price.

Summary: Hotel Pepper tree is my go-to stay each and every time i want to go to disneyland, (which is very often). I have stayed at other hotels in the area, very exquisite places too as well. Yet, none of them gave me the feeling of home.. like Pepper tree continuously given me. Staff are always on their A game, and do their best to always accommodate every guest. Plus they have the best prices for their rooms too. Which have full kitchens!
Manager Response: We are so happy to be your home away from home! Thank you for being such a great and loyal guest. We are so thankful for your recommendations and reviews.

Summary: The room is larger than we thought. There is a kitchen, a sofa and a closet. The bed is soft. Everyone in the hotel is nice. It is not far from Disneyland, and we received information about Disneyland at the front desk. A good place to stay!
Manager Response: So glad that you enjoyed your stay! Thanks so much for the helpful review and tips.

Summary: Room was clean with kitchen basic utencils and appliances.  Staff were friendly.  Maybe their breakfast should stay open till 11:00am, which is their checkout time.  Otherwise this is a great place to stay.

We have stayed here twice already and we love it! Rooms are very comfortable and not to mention the having a full kitchen is absolutely a plus. I would recommend this place. It's clean and the service is excellent.

We have stayed at this property numerous times. We continue to return because of great prices, full kitchen, comfy beds,  low resort fees, free parking, friendly and helpful staff, and proximity to the parks. The only issue we had was the lack of kitchen items for our planned usage. We planned to use the oven, but there were no oven safe dishes or hot pads. If those items are available at the front desk, we were not made aware. We will stay here again, but will have to prepare better for kitchen use.
Manager Response: Thank you for being such loyal guests! We are so happy that you enjoy all our amenities and our friendly staff. We do have extra items available at the front desk. Thanks for the suggestions and helpful comments.

Summary: Currently writing this review in our room. Arrived here at the pepper tree with a lovely welcome from reception.The staff here are very friendly and helpful and always smiling, they can't do enough for you. We stayed in room 110 ground floor which was comfortable and clean with a full kitchen. There is tea and coffee and cold drinks available 24 hours and a large supermarket situated across the road .Thank you pepper tree for looking after us! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: I have no complaints, an excellent hotel and an excellent service even though my credit card did not have my name on it and it is their policy to present a card like this there was no problem, everything was solved and there was no problem to make my reservation or my check in The room service was perfect everything in order every time I arrived everything very clean excellent staff and customer service Thank you guys greetings
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and found our staff helpful. Thanks for the great comments and review.

Summary: Really enjoyed our families one night stay. The check-in was excellent with Andrew. He was very accommodating with providing a late check out thr next day. The hotel was very clean. I didn't give it 5 stars because I believe the place needs a little updating. I would definitely return with my family.

Always like to stay here because of good service and near to everything. The only bugging me is the small area of parking. Everything is okay. Having kitchen is very nice, the grocery is just in front of the hotel.

I enjoyed my stay at Hotel Peppertree, the staff was very nice and helpful.  The room was spotless and housekeeping would come in and do some cleaning every day.  The continental breakfast could have had a few more options, but it was adequate for being complimentary.  Overall it was a very enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Your always clean friendly an I love the hotel
Summary: Always a clean an friendly staff.   Daisy is met favorite.    She is always friendly an makes sure whatever you need you get.     She really is great.     I think overall there is no better hotel in the area.   We went to knots berry farm an you are only 2 miles away an having stayed there before for over 2 weeks I came back because of Daisy an your great staff an hotel.

Stayed here plenty of times it’s great for the price but it’s luck of the draw with the rooms at times maintenance wise we had to plunge to use the toilet they said they’d fix it and never did and offered no discount

The service at the  hotel was bad they didn't notified me in detailed about the dog policies over the phone when I booked the room. I had to change all my plans because of the inconvenience once I was there
Manager Response: We are sorry over the confusion that was experienced. We do hope you were able to talk with our front desk manager so we could help resolve the problem. We will work with our front desk staff to make sure we are properly going through all of the pet policies with our guests before arrival.

Summary: We received excellent service and the room was completely clean.  Starting with the customer service, the personnel is super nice.  The breakfast good, the room completely clean with all you need to have an excellent vacations.  The kitchen is full equiped. My rating is EXCELLENT!

Just what I needed in accommodation for a short stay travelling alone. The staff were all super helpful and friendly. There was plenty of fruit for breakfast, and I couldn't get enough of the lovely coffee bar!

I love the location it was so close to Disneyland. We had a lot of eating places to choose from also in case we didn’t want to use the kitchen. The staff was really friendly and very helpful I enjoyed

From the website description I was expecting a romantic setting. We were disappointed in the shabby condition of the room, noisy fridge that hummed loudly all night, carpet felt dirty/greasy and torn, couch was so worn looking that I was afraid to sit on it because it seemed dirty.  The toilet did not flush well. We did not make use of the breakfast room because it was not much to begin with.  We planned to stay 6 nights but checked out after 2 nights of not sleeping well.  Linens were shabby and rough, as were the towels.  Also, on the first day we had tiny bottles of soap and shampoo that was enough for one use.  The second day it was not replenished.
Manager Response: We are sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to inspect your room immediately to ensure that is meeting our standards. We will also make our housekeeping staff sees your comments. We again are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay but appreciate your helpful feedback.

Summary: This is our third visit to Disneyland and to the Pepper Tree. The best part is always the service, although the price as well as having a kitchen is also wonderful. We were disappointed to see the full breakfast gone, although greatly appreciated the new coffee bar.

I've really enjoyed my stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. With just $50.00 more than Motel 6, I get a full kitchen in which I can prepare my meals and not be compelled to eat out. Dishwashing soap was also provided for me, too, which was great in that I did not have to make a special purchase for it. My pillow was too soft, but with three other pillows at my disposal, I was able to work with these conditions.  The towels also could have been cleaner.  I found one in which the orange color of someone's ear wax didn't get completely washed off via the industrial laundering system. I also know I could have called to ask for a much more firmer pillow(s) or cleaner towels, but I was able to work with what I was given.  If a towel was too dirty for me, there were other towels for me to use.

Although not a 5 star hotel, Pepper Tree, the friendliness, efficiency, and attention to detail made our stay very enjoyable.  Very convenient location for our needs.  Next time we visit Anaheim, we plan to stay at Pepper Tree.

Summary Heading: So close to being better than good.
Summary: Having lived in Spain for 12 years we are used to rustic & so The Pepper Tree was no surprise. The rooms were clean & comfortable with the housekeeping also acceptable, because of the flooring there is a lot of noise from cases,trolleys etc. being dragged along. This is not a hotel to stay in for any length of time 3 to 4 days is enough,we were here for 15 days & the restaurant outside (not belonging to the Hotel I believe) was not appealing for anything more than the continenatal breakfast which is all we ate there. This hotel is so close to being very good,all it needs is a lounge & a bar area within to make it far more welcoming. All the staff were very friendly & efficient. As far as our room goes, it was only lacking some comfortable seating & a in room safe. To sum up our
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review and helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel. We are working with the restaurant to improve their service. We also added a To-Go Coffee bar in the hotel.

Summary: I love that this place is so close to everything. A supermarket across the street. Restaurants all around and so very close to Disney. I love that it has a full kitchen and that its clean.  If you are looking for a clean place close to everything including Disney for a great price - this place is it

Great price! Loved the little patio. Overall loved the hotel, beds comfortable, water hot, room spacious, lots of closet and storage space. Parking was a little challenging at hotel. Approx. 10 minutes to Knotts Berry Farm or Disneyland. Target down the street. The staff we delt with were friendly

The room was very spacious. The bathroom was pretty small though. It was clean and the staff was extremely friendly and helpful. There was plenty of parking which was free. If you’re planning on going to Disneyland, this is not within walking distance. The balconies were nice. We actually ate dinner out on it one night. The pool looked nice and clean but there is no hot tub. The continental breakfast was a joke (toast, tiny donuts, some cereal, and yogurt in a big bowl for everyone to dish out of). They’d be better getting rid of the breakfast and using the money they save to do updates as needed. Once we saw what the breakfast was we left and drove to Burger King. We didn’t eat breakfast the 3 days we were there. It was kinda disappointing since we’d counted on saving money on
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review. We are happy that you will stay with us again. We have started a new To-Go Coffee Bar located inside the hotel - we hope you will use it next time!

Summary: Room was nice,spacious and clean. Bathroom tub needs replacement. Again, 2017 TV should be HD. WiFi connection was very poor, especially in the evenings.  It is close to Disneyland, <10minute drive. To go breakfast bar was very nice but hot items would have been great. continental breakfast offered in onsite restaurant was poor. Cleaning service did not wash used coffee cups.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We happy that you enjoyed our large rooms and convenient location.  We are also happy that you enjoyed the new To-Go Coffee bar! We will make sure to check the WiFi speed from your room. Thanks again for your comments. We will make sure our management team sees them and uses them to better our hotel.

Summary: Room 218   Refrigerator was much too loud and ran most of the time.    Cleaning and luggage carts very loud when they moved across tile floor.   Must be a way to eliminate that.     It happened at hours of the day and night.    Very disturbing in my room which was close to the tile floor.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We will make sure to check the refrigerator in your room immediately. We are sorry for the noise issues you experienced and will look into possible solutions. Thanks again for your helpful feedback.

Summary Heading: Excellent staff tonya was very helpful and I plan on staying at pepper tree every time I'm in town
Summary: I was surprised on how nice the rooms were and I enjoyed my stay this is my second time  staying and I was very happy with the cleanliness of the rooms and how easy it was to find the location I will be recommending this place to family and friends
Manager Response: So glad you will be back! We love Tonya too. Thanks for the recommendations.

Summary: There was only one thing that wasn't Super excellent in my eyes, and I felt it was minor and so I didn't bring it up to the staff.  The A/C unit was making a small popping sound when it was on then for some time after it was off. It wasn't enough to bug me but did affect my sleep slightly, again small enough to where I didn't feel it needed attention at the time.

We always stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree when going to Disneyland. It’s clean, close to Disneyland, and has good service. The only thing missing would have to be a bit better continental breakfast ( it’s more like a snack right now) and a rewards program for those of us who visit often.  Note: The hotel does offer other breakfast options that can be purchased.

I loved the comfort and style of the entire room! Felt just like home which was great at the end of a long day. Will return here. Wish the breakfast had a better variety including hot food like egg and sausage.

Photos can be deceiving, older hotel so in some areas it shows the wear and tear. Not bad for the price I was able to get. Hard to sleep because you can hear what others are doing: toilet flush, shower on, cabinets shut, doors shut, walking around rooms. Continental breakfast was actually a restaurant across the driveway.
Manager Response: Thank for the review. We appreciate your helpful and constructive feedback. We have just added a new To-Go Coffee Bar in the hotel every morning. We hope you come back again to try it out.

Summary Heading: Review for Hotel Pepper Tree, Disneyland Visit, Nov 2017
Summary: The hotel was very nice including the staff, the quality of rooms, the kitchen facility etc. Just one suggestion on the breakfast, please include some protein in it like eggs/sausage etc. Also when we entered he first time in the rooms they seemed to be little damp so if you can consider little better ventilation it will be good.

Wish I could have stayed longer than just one night. I will definitely be coming back and would love to bring my kids as well. The hotel has a very welcoming vibe. Felt so at home being there. Having a full kitchen was amazing!

This was a wonderful stay.  The place is vintage and fun.  It is a great place for families.  The balconies are very nice. The room and kitchen are spacious.  The pool is great.  The decor is fantastic!! Only thing  - maybe a new couch/sofa. A little too vintage. We will be back and have told all our friends and family - what a great experience we had. Awesome Staff!!  Thank you!!

Three nights out of four we were woken up many many times with children jumping and running above us. We told staff about it but it continued. Will only stay on third floor in the future if we return at all.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful comments. We do hope you stay with us again. We are sorry for the noise issues your experienced during your stay. Thanks again for your feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: The bathroom above us leaked into our room and their response was it is out of our control! Nope Your bldg should not have leaks!! The room smelled of rotting water and it was really gross. Not happy about it
Manager Response: We are sorry for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. The guest above your room did overflow the bath tub which unfortunately caused a leak into your room. We were happy to move you rooms immediately but you declined. Again, we are sorry. We tried our best to resolve this situation.

Summary: The plug for the bathtub didn’t work and the continental breakfast was terrible. The housekeepers and front desk staff were wonderful. It was quiet and cute.  Needed more blankets, pillows were a variety of softness which was helpful for comfort.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback - we will use it to better our hotel! We are so happy that you enjoyed the staff and our boutique style. We did just start offering our To-Go Coffee Bar inside the hotel shortly after your stay. We hope you come back to try it.

Summary: The staff was very helpful and courteous. The rooms were ok. We have stayed here before but I don't remember the mattresses being so hard and uncomfortable. The pillows were the same. Otherwise the rooms were spacious and the kitchen was nice to have, although the pots and pans were terrible. The breakfast over at the restaurant is not really worth going to. You're better off getting your own food and using the kitchen.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so thankful for being a loyal, repeat guest! We will make sure to check your mattress immediately since most of guests love the new mattresses in all our rooms. We have started a new To-Go breakfast in the hotel and hope you come back to try it. Thanks again for your helpful comments.

Summary: We were looking for an affordable room while vacationing at Disneyland. It was a short drive to the park and the room was clean and had everything we needed. Staying with just my daughter, we felt safe.

Overall nice hotel if you travel with family and need to use kitchen. We were a couple , did not use the kitchen at all. For the price we paid, possibly we could have cleaner room without kitchen and all other facilities.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are glad you enjoyed the hotel. We do appreciate your comments and will make sure our housekeeping staff sees them and uses them to better our services.

Summary: It was a great Hotel nice, small, not too loud. It was perfect for my taste. I really recommend it.  The fact it had a kitchen was great. The people that work here were great and I called to get a room earlier and they had it ready by the time we got there. Great service.

The hotel was more than we expected. The room was very clean and spacious. We loved having a full kitchen with a grocery store directly across the street. The staff were very courteous. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip.

The hotel is not new but very clean and convenient to parks. Our beds had noticable grooves from use and the housekeeping forgot washcloths and soap. We easily fit our family of five in our double room with a kitchen. Our room was right by the elevator so it was very very loud  with people coming and going.  The few negaives aside We will probably return.

From the initial reservations on the phone, to various emails with Rick, the manager, to our check in and check out.....we were SO happy and pleased. For the age of this establishment, all was excellent, in our opinion. We will, when we return, definitely stay here again. All was sooo special and memorable for our family. Many many thanks!

Summary Heading: Not the best visit, but good
Summary: We got upgraded to a room with a private patio on the first floor. Generally I don't like first floor rooms, but the room was nice so we agreed. I regretted it when we heard lots of overhead noise late into the night. We were accommodating and did not call to complain but we will definitely be requesting a top floor room from here on out.

The room size and amenities were good. Staff at front desk were cheerful. Hotel has a number of upgrades, the breakfast options were average, BUT: I did not get my wakeup call on first morning. I requested a couple of hangers but did not get any. Maid did not vacuum or mop clean bathroom floor on Day 3.
Manager Response: Thank you for the thorough feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the large rooms and amenities. We will make sure to work with our staff and our sorry that we did not do our best. We will use your feedback to better our hotel.

Summary: Nice Hotel with style near all Anaheim attractions. Kitchen was great. Also had a balcony. Pool was fair. They need a hot tub! Only complaint was the road noise. Ask for a room in the back of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! So glad you enjoyed your stay. Thanks for your helpful feedback.

Summary: Bed sheets were unchanged and slept in, hair was found in the bed, prior to sleeping in the bed. Trash was found hiding next to the bed frame: candy wrapper, bottle cap, large piece of plastic from a package. Bath tub was dirty with grime. Room was not thoroughly cleaned. Large pieces of trash were visible. Bed sheets should be changed after every guests departure.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We would never let a guest enter a room that has not been completely cleaned and sheets changed. We are sorry that you found any hair in the bed and wish you would have contacted our front desk. We would have given you a new room immediately since you were unhappy. We are sorry that you did not receive our best service and have brought your review to our housekeeping staff so that they can improve their service.

Summary: Very nice hotel but wifi too slow ! They need to improve it. The room was big enough, clean, and quality service perfect. The staff was very friendly. Another thing: they need to improve also their continental breakfast...too poor
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and helpful feedback. We will make sure to use it. We are in the process of updating our breakfast options. Come back again soon to see the changes.

Summary: Nice to come back to our room after a long day at Disneyland!  We will stay here again next time!  Loved all the fountains... also liked our private patio... lots of fun!  Might be planning a family reunion in Los Angeles next year.. we will recommend the pepper tree!!   Thank you!! The Anderson family !
Manager Response: So happy that you will be back - would love to host your family reunion! Thanks for the recommendations!!!

Summary: Overall our stay was good.  We had lots of space and the kitchen was a nice bonus.  The only issue we had was the room had a little bit of a smell and the water would come out brown for the first few seconds,  just signs it's an older hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your large room and full kitchen. We will make sure to check your room for the small issues you experienced.

Summary: Breakfast was seriously a joke. We stayed because we were informed that we could upgrade to a buffet breakfast for $6.99 per person and when we got there the girl said they had never had such a thing. We were told by  different employees of this upgrade and it was on the website that we could upgrade.  As for the rooms they were old with orange-ish yellow walls (putting on make up was extremely hard) the paint/stain on the cabinets was very worn and chipping. A simple paint of the walls, and cabinets would Make a HUGE difference. We have a family member with a mental disability service animal and they stated that the law does not recognize this type of animal so they charged up $25 a night. Later I found the law and our animal for the disability is allowed in hotels. I was not
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are sorry that you did not enjoy our breakfast and were confused about the breakfast information  We do mention that we offer a free continental breakfast and hot breakfast options to purchase but nothing about a buffet breakfast. As for our pet policy, we do happily comply with all ADA regulations. Again, we are sorry that you did not thoroughly enjoy your visit with us.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a Disney trip. It was very quiet and well-maintained and the staff was very friendly. One tip use the hotel map to Disneyland. My GPS took me a different route every single day.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great tip! We do give you the fastest (shortcut) route to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Loved everything about it!!!  Highly recommend
Summary: Super convenient, amazing value for the money and super clean. Great charm and amazing price!  30 mins from lax, less than 10 to Disney and a fraction of the price. Rooms are great, very spacious and had everything!  highly recommend
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations!!

Summary: Didn't actually stay. Originally booked on a travel site. When client cancelled our meeting, hotel was kind enough to reschedule the booking at full price.  Meeting was again canceled. Tried to cancel my stay, but hotel did not allow. I tried to move to date where I hoped to use for recreation but plans did not work out. So in the end I was charged for the stay.  I did appreciate their effort to help but don't understand why we couldn't just cancel. They got their rate for that night but never again.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you were not able to stay with us. Since you were cancelling your reservation past our 24hr deadline, we were unable to refund your reservation. We did try to help you 2 more times and so wish you were able to stay with us.

Summary: My husband and I loved the room we got.  We absolutely loved the kitchen, private patio, how spacious the bed & tv area was, the continental breakfast, and how friendly the staff was.  The only minor thing that I saw was that I felt that the bathroom was a little outdated but that is mostly overlooked with everything else that the room and the staff offers.   Also, please know that it is hard for me to sleep in hotels or anywhere else that is not my home or my bed which is why I put that the sleep quality was average.  My husband slept very well in your hotel before our race.  I also could have been way too excited to run at Disneyland too which is why I could not sleep well.  Overall, Well Done on Everything!!

The hotel is nice and of great value. The staff was friendly.   The breakfast was just pastries and fruits. No protein... Also, the gas stoves were old and not very safe. We accidentally bumped into it and left the gas on for a while.

A priceworthy hotel with kind of family atmosphere. Rooms are spacious with kitchen. If you stay on ground floor you can go out and sit on your own patio. If you stay at levels you can have your own balcony. The beds were a bit worn so we didn’t sleep too good. They were partly renoveting so they seem to put a lot effort in their hotel. The breakfast is served at a separate little restaurant just outside. Not the standard we are used to at home but it will start your day. Often the breakfasts are kind of poor but that’s the way it is in this exemple of ”cheeper” hotels. We have stayed at this hotel before a few times and will come again.

Very cute, located near Disneyland and the convention center with a quick drive.   If you are looking for a hotel with all the top amenities, this may not be what you want.  However if you're looking for a cute hotel, rustic and out of the norm, this is perfect with the clean pool and nice rooms.

Upon entering the hotel we noticed a strong cigarette smoke smell..it continued throughout the hotel and in the elevators. The actual bedroom smelled strongly of urine. Not sure if it was the carpet or mattress. Won’t be back.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you had smell issues throughout the hotel. We are a non-smoking hotel and are surprised about the smoke smell you experienced. We wish that you would have mentioned your issues to the front desk so we could help rectify the situation.

Summary: I felt very comfortable here with two dogs during my stay. They enforce the quiet time after 10pm, which is nice. There is a swimming pool and free continental breakfast. There are, in fact, vending machines, also. My room had a full size fridge, microwave, stove, kitchenette. Dishes were included. The hotel provides shampoo, etc. Coffee is in-room. The tub liner covered the tile tub. Smoking is on the east side outside. Parking was close by. The front staff was very nice and helpful. The staff providing breakfast was super. The hotel may be older but it has historical old California charm. Located right behind a Mexican restaurant that serves fish dishes, which is where you get your continental breakfast. Within walking distance of Thai and other cuisine.

this is nice hotel with kitchen and close to Disney. the rooms are spacious and comfortable bed.value for money.good amenities.definitely stay again.good for family with kids.parking seems to be limited.close to shops.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, very welcoming
Summary: Loved our stay here! Check in was excellent and they made us feel right at home. The rooms are beautifully decorated and I loved the tiles and the "vibe" there. Also very close to Disney and other attractions. The only small complaint I have is that the walls are a little thin so we could hear a lot of what was going on with our neighbors. The free breakfast is nice but it would be great to have a protein selection with, maybe boiled eggs? Of course hot food would be great too. Overall we loved our stay here!

This is a fantastic hotel to stay at. A very nice ambiance. I like the feel of this hotel. Very friendly and welcoming staff. Comfortable bed to sleep in. Very clean and spacious room. I would definitely recommend staying here

What we received for the price we paid was way more than we expected. We will most definitely be returning.  We did not like the breakfast, too little variety and too poor quality. That can definitely be improved!  As of everything else... Amazing!

Our room was by the elevator and all we hear was the loud noise. On top of the noise, we Woke up and found bed bug crawling on the bed. We were disappointed and we informed one of the hotel associate.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you were not satisfied with your stay. We did look into your complaint immediately but did not find any bed bugs in your room after several inspections - we take these complaints very seriously to insure the safety and comfort of all our guests. We are sorry for the noise issues you experienced.

Summary: A nice hotel. Wery helpfull staff. The kitchen was old, but fully equipped. Nice south facing room and balcony. And a nice pool. With a super market across the street, and also coinwash we found all the shopping we needed. We had an nice stay.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the helpful tips.

Summary: I selected this hotel primarily because it was just around the corner from where I would be conducting my class; price was comparable to other hotels in the area.  Front desk gal was warm and friendly.  Room was clean and comfortable and quiet but somewhat dated.  I had an early morning so didn't stay for the continental breakfast.  Kitchenette was a surprise, so this place would be good for people traveling with kids/families.

For the price, my stay was pretty nice. It was often very loud and the cleaning service was pretty poor. I completely understand that people come because they are excited to go to Disney, but I would not recommend to professionals who are working in the area or traveling for business.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you found your stay a good value and enjoyed your room. We will make sure to talk to our housekeeping staff about your comments. We usually receive great remarks regarding our cleanliness. Thanks again for your review.

Summary: Convenient location to Disney/California adventure. Nice neighborhood, clean rooms, kitchen provided and grocery store across the street. One remark - If you say you care for the environment and we keep hanging our towels, please don't wash them.

I stayed at hotel pepper tree for  a 8 days.  The location is closed to everything that i needed to go. Breakfast wast o.k.  Housekeeping was an A+.  Customer service was excellent.  I stayed at this hotel for a short vacation with my family.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again.  Jacquie

I would - and totally plan to - stay here again. I loved the design of the hotel. It wasn't the most pristine establishment - some paint or small aesthetic repairs could be made -  but everything worked fine and we loved the space and staff.

We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree. The hosts were very accommodating to the needs of our family and were friendly and polite. If you want a space that is truly unique, this is the place to go.

Very quiet. Nice pool. Considerate staff.  I liked the private courtyard with fountain at each room.  Very clean room.  I would like to have had a hot tub by the pool area.  There was no traffic noise....

People were friendly. The room was nice. There was a strong smell of disinfectant in the lobby. Continental breakfast didn't have any protein, mostly bread, pastry, cereal and fruit. Maybe eggs, sausages or bacon would have been nice.

I like the large bed and the breakfast and the location of the hotel and service was very good  and will come back again when I go to California.  The staff are very friendly.  I will recommend the hotel for friends who travel to CA

LOVED your hotel...Only a few minor things we didn't like. Our king size bed was hard as a rock. Also the continental breakfast was a real let down. No eggs, waffle maker, bacon or sausage. We walked in & then walked out...Overall, we loved the room. Walking distance to a golf course, just a few minutes from Knotts. The room was like a studio apartment. Next time we're in Cali, we're staying here.

I made the reservation for my adult teen daughter and her friend. They said the hotel was very pleasant and they felt safe. My husband and I plan to take the family there soon because of their experience. Deep gratitude.

Summary Heading: Our 4th Visit to our piece of heaven.
Summary: When we visit from the UK we always choose Peppertree.. this was our 4th visit and again it did not disappoint! We had friends with us this time and they loved it too!! We only had the chance to stay one night and would loved to have stayed a lot longer... its like having your own apartment with everything you could need xx Hotel Peppertree never lets us down and its this reason we keep returning...

Summary Heading: Great Boutique Hotel, close to everything.
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Pepper Tree Hotel for a week in October 2017. I made the reservations online on the hotel site and check-in was a breeze. Slight hiccup that is that you should have a credit card vs. debit card for incidentals. Debit cards result in a higher deposit. The kitchenette was very useful with a gas stove and oven. The skillet was pretty well hammered and the Teflon was flaking off. I would suggest bringing one of your own if you are particular (I brought a crock pot). There was a terrible heat wave in the area that week, but the AC unit worked like a dream and was very quiet. The continental breakfast at the restaurant on-site was very lite (cereals, cut fruit, yogurt, toast, small pastries and coffee/juice. I cooked eggs and such in the room. Although

I had forgotten my credit card at home so needed a different way to prove the card on file was mine. The first front desk person was rude, however the second person to help me was both nice and helpful.

We stayed here for 3 days, LOVED THE LAYOUT OF THE ROOM. The free breakfast, kitchen, couch, our own private patio, it was a really nice change to the A typical hotel room. GREAT PLACE TO STAY! We will stay here from now on when visiting Disneyland.

The hotel was a nice stay. We liked the kitchen. The beds were comfortable. Pool was small but uncrowded. The room was quiet and the beds were comfortable. It was about a 20 minute drive from Disney. The room was older but clean. Small tub area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and helpful information. We glad that you enjoyed the full kitchen and room. We are about a 10 minute drive to the resort area.

Summary: Great hotel for the price and location to disneyland, knottsberry farm and universal studios. Staff is excelent. Only negative thing i have to say is that they dont have recycling bins anywhere in the hotel. It’s 2017, there’s no excuse to not recycle.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your reviews! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. As for the recycling, we have asked the city of Anaheim about this several times and have wanted to help with this also.  When they pick up our trash, they do not have a separate way to pick up recycling vs normal trash. They say they sort the recyclables at their facility. Thanks for the review and the great question.

Summary: Would highly recommend Hotel Pepper Tree  to all our friends, family and coworkers.  We will be staying here when we return to Disneyland next year.  Courteous service, clean rooms, comfortable beds, nice kitchen and balcony.

I liked how the room looked and was comfortable... close to Disneyland and the highway for other touristy things.... didn’t use the kitchen other than the fridge to store groceries... didn’t eat at the restaurant as there was mostly seafood options and my group isn’t into seafood.

Me and my friend wanted a place we would be comfortable in for an extended stay, this place was not only beautiful and aesthetically pleasing, the amenities included were perfect. Staff was very friendly and helpful as well.

I come to OC every weekend to see my kids and hang out and always stay at least one night at a hotel.  This was by far the best for the price period......  Will stay again for sure and I've already told associates about the place.

Enjoyed our stay with Pepper Tree, the room was pleasant...loved the balcony. The room was clean and quiet. We would definitely recommend the Pepper Tree to others looking for a nice getaway. The kitchen would have been great for someone on a more extended stay.

Everything was very nice . The rooms have plenty of space. The only thing that I rate lower for are the bathrooms the showers need repair and new paint. Behind the toilet the wall was yellow. The continental breakfast lacks a little but bring your own stuff you've got a full kitchen which is great. The staff is very nice. I would definitely book this Hotel again

The staff were always on top of what we needed. Friendly and professional. We were very impressed with the staff! Our room was clean and the bed was extremely comfortable, thank you so much for a fantastic stay. We will continue to recommend this hotel to our family and friends!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and recommendations!

Summary: The Staff was very accommodating.  The hotel was very close to Knott's Berry Farm which was our destination.  Restaurant and Market just across the street . The continental breakfast was served in the Mexican Restaurant in front of the hotel, dry cereals, bread and local pastries, , but they only had fruit for our gluten free family. The front rooms were a little noisy near the street and not all rooms have the updated carpet and kitchen counters., but a full kitchen if you prefer to make meals.  The Pool was sparkling clean and we had a great stay.  .
Manager Response: So glad you had a great stay. Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are making big changes to our breakfast soon. We hope you come back to see them.

Summary: Stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree for 5 nights and had a great time enjoying the pool and balcony. We stayed here to visit Disney and found uber was the easiest way to get around. The pool and hotel area was clean and staff were friendly. The walls are very thin so we our sleep was disrupted many times throughout the night due to other guests walking down the hallways or being noisy in thier room. Other than that, it was lovely. Breakfast was simple, they mentioned you could order hot food but the server was very disengaged and we never saw the option displayed.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the wonderful review and helpful tips! We are making so big breakfast changes and hope you come back to see them.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree was a pleasant surprise!  The rooms, while older were well furnished, the beds were comfortable and the staff was excellent.  The bathrooms were small and the toilets too low but overall the room was very nice.  I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: So glad you will stay again! Thanks for the helpful comments and suggestions.

Summary: The breakfast is estremely poor for the money we pay to sleep per nigth.  The mattresses are very flat and does not offer a good back support.  Location is fair but it is not by the Disney. We had to drive about 4 miles to get there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and your helpful feedback. We are in the process of making huge changes to our breakfast selection. We are sorry that our mattresses did not meet your expectations and will make sure to check your bed immediately.

Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree is at a good location and has a charming setting. The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. The staff is very friendly and always ready to help you. I can definitely recommend everyone this hotel when you are in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm! Thanks so much for the recommendations.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for...
Summary: Priced very reasonably but you really get what you pay for. Beds are uncomfortable, floors were dirty, a/c not working...and this was day one of a four night stay. We didn’t try the continental breakfast since we were going to the parks every morning early each day so I can’t speak on that. WiFi in the room was spotty but hey, free is free right? My main gripe is the location of the hotel. Located in a sketchy neighborhood which made it uncomfortable for my family at night. Just be sure you stay in your room when it’s dark and double lock the door and you’ll be okay...I think
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are sorry that you did not receive our best service but will use your comments to better our hotel. We were able to fix the issue with your AC immediately. We are located in a typical neighborhood in Anaheim (and southern California) that is right in the middle of the Disneyland Resort area and Knott's Berry Farm. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Very nice little boutique hotel with friendly staff and clean room. The only complaint we have is that in the morning when guest starts checking out, the suitcase rolling on the tile floor is rather noisy. Also the cleaners were fidgeting with their trolleys outside our room (room 201) at 8am which made quite a bit of noise. Overall we are very pleased with everything else.

So pleased with my stay here. Perfect for couples on vacation. Rooms were cute and clean, and kitchen was an excellent addition when staying multiple days. Room outfitted with everything you could need!!

Good value for room with kitchenette; great front desk staff; new air conditioner unit was nice; good water pressure in shower; bathroom had mold (?) on ceiling above bathtub/shower; bathroom lighting poor; television reception poor for 2017; poor breakfast choices (at least a waffle maker would be nice); cleaning staff hit and miss with face cloths/towels/bathroom supplies during week stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed our customer service and full kitchen rooms. We will make sure to check the conditions of your bathroom immediately. We will also make sure to talk with our housekeeping staff to make sure their level of service is consistent. Thank you again for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to use it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Charm hotel in a nice area. High confortable/value ratio. Nice for families with kids. Nice personnel. It is highly reco
Summary: Very nice and charm hotel. Very high confort/value ratio. Very nice attending people. Highly recommended for families with children. Nice location near attractions and good restaurants. Very safe and family stile.

The King suite courtyard on the main floor was very nice. It has a little private courtyard with a water feature and just enough greenery, bamboo and palms. I was able to get work done while the Children slept in. The staff is nice and the internet is free, though a little slow if you have multiple streams going. If they upgraded the WiFi I wouldn't stay anywhere else. The kitchenette has a full size fridge and stove, oven and microwave as well as all of the cooking implements. There is a little store across the street but go to Ralph's 1 mile away and save some money. It is an older neighborhood off the beaten path a little but once the Disneyland crowd has left in the mornings it is nice and quiet.

I've stayed there before and really liked it the last time so I wanted to try it again. My boyfriend and I were impressed at how clean it was, we were able to check in right away. It was also much easier to get too than other hotels we've stayed at in in our past visits to California.

When we got off the freeway we were concerned the hotel would be a dive however it is a little gem in the middle of Anaheim. The outside is very nice, the pool was great, the front desk staff were very courteous and helpful. We only stayed one night but thoroughly enjoyed our room. It is decorated in a Spanish style and was just perfect for our short stay!

Suited us well for our needs. Parking area dark. Tile floors very noisy when rolling luggage, tried our best to be quite at late hour arrival and early departure.   Probably wouldn't stay again because we don't frequent ARea and the location wasn't the best
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback back. We are happy that you enjoyed your room. We will make sure to check our parking area to make sure all the lighting is working correctly. Thank you.

Summary: I don't do these surveys, but I have stayed at this hotel 5 times. not because its the cheapest, nicest, fanciest, but because the rooms are comfortable the staff is nice and the neighborhood is clean
Manager Response: We are so thankful you took the time to write your review. We so appreciate hearing from such a loyal and repeat guest. Thanks for the comments!

Summary: Absolutely wonderful service! Was walked to our room and toured me around. Treated like a celebrity. Full of energy even at 5 in the morning helping us. Love the interior and how large the space was!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the 5 star review! We are so happy you received our 5 star treatment at 5 in the morning. Come back again soon!

Summary: Our stay was great. The hotel is a great price, it's super clean and beautifully decorated. I wouldn't say it's within walking distance of Disneyland but we park there anyways so we didn't mind. The staff was great, I actually can't wait to go back.

The sound proofing needs to be looked into, the hotel was lovely and service great. Perfect location for Disneyland and not a bad drive to Universal. We were able to hop over to Huntington Beach for a beautiful sunset.

The room was excellent, the bed was large and comfortable, the staff were great, the breakfast was sufficient and plentiful but the choices were limited. The area is very good for tourists as it is easy to visit different places

Excellent service, beautiful establishment, great staff. Very clean, friendly atmosphere. I took my service dog with me and everyone made us feel welcome. It is a quiet place, services are done on time,   I would gladly go back again.

The so called fine print on website was misleading and not explained well by the attendants when checking in. They were rude. And if your going to make someone pay a cash deposit, make sure you have an ATM in your lobby instead of making  them walk across the street. Make sure you look to see how many people are going to be staying in the room. Have enough dishes for everyone. No place to eat at in room. Patio only had table for 2, we had more people  in our party. Had to eat in shifts because of seating at table and dishes and silverware.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are so sorry that you were disappointed with your stay. We do not require a security deposit for rooms unless there was not a valid credit card present at the time of check-in. We usually do not accept cash at all and will look into your specific situation immediately. We will also make sure our management teams sees your comments about seating. Thank again for you helpful feedback. We will make sure to use them to improve our hotel.

Summary: This is like the 5th time I stay here and every single time I get the same friendly service and most importantly is the cleanliness of the rooms! The kitchen is a huge plus. The housekeeping team is very friendly and Do a great job. As well as the front desk! After checking in I receive a call from them checking if the room was good and that if I needed anything else! To me that is great service
Manager Response: 5 times! Thanks so much for being such a loyal guest. We so appreciate your feedback. We can't wait for visit #6.

Summary: Friendly staff, nice and clean rooms with full kitchen. Unfortunately Wifi was unreliable and not working most of the time. Also noisy hotel even with a room with a balcony in the back instead of the busy street. We could hear the heavy doors close most of the nights and couldn't sleep because of that.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We hope you were able to contact the front desk about your WiFi issues so we could resolve any issues you were experiencing. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: The hotel has a great locación and good price. Perfect room size. Reception people very kind.  Perfect bed. But poor breakfast and the hotel in general looks very old, bathroom with many details and smells bad.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are making huge changes to our breakfast selection later this month. We hope you come back to see them.

Summary: Loved the style of the hotel. It was nice and quiet as well , a ART bus infront of the hotel to Disneyland would've made it 5 stars. But other than that everything was great. Didn't get to try the breakfast
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We are trying to have the ART shuttle move to our hotel instead of the pickup location down the block... We are waiting for their approval. Come back again soon!

Summary: The Hotel Staff was very nice.  The Hotel itself is old.  They do their best to keep it updated, but it is very obvious how old the building is.  The kitchen cupboards didn't close and the appliances were very outdated.  All in all it seems like a good deal for the price.  Unfortunately if I return to Anaheim, I won't stay at the Pepper Tree.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to review our hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed our customer service and thought the room was a good value. We are in the process of making upgrades throughout the hotel and do hope you try us again in the future.

Summary Heading: charged $200 extra deposit after paying in full!
Summary: Even though I had paid in full 3 days prior to our arrival, the desk decided to charge us a $200 fee for "using a debit card"  saying it was refundable after we left. Mind you, my payment had already cleared and they had the money. There was no mention of this on their website either and such a thing has never happened to us before and we stay at a lot of hotels. I believe they charged us the deposit because they made a very prejudice choice to charge us because of our appearance (we have visible tattoos). The owner/manager let the front desk person handle the awkward exchange even though she was right there, she never came to speak with us or acknowledge the conversation. She had her back to us the entire time. We were very offended. We are family people who have prominent
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to review our hotel. We are sorry for the confusion you experienced at the time of check-in. We do state everywhere at the time of booking that a valid credit card and photo ID are required to check-in. A valid credit card is needed in case there are any incidental charges for the room. This is a hotel policy that is applied to all our guests and is in no way based on stereotypes or prejudices. We are also sorry that you felt offended by the behavior of the other front desk attendant who was in the office at the time. We will make sure to better our customer service at our front desk. Again, we are sorry for your confusion. By charging the $200 security deposit, we were allowing you to check-in without the needed valid credit card - we were making an exception and trying to help ensure you were able to keep your reservation.

Summary: I stayed with my wife and 6 year old kid in Oct 2017. We had a very pleasant stay in this Hotel. The ambiance is beautiful and the rooms are spacious and clean. The kitchen is sufficient and the beds are comfortable. very good for the price. will certainly choose them again during our next trip to disneyland :).
Manager Response: So happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Very pleased with this hotel. We stayed for one night prior to leaving to travel home. I wish i had more time to enjoy the facilities as the hotel was above my expectations given the price. Would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations. We hope you can come back for a longer stay soon.

Summary: I always come here when I will staying over the weekend. The area is nice. The rooms are spacious. And everyone is so friendly! I recommend to everyone! I love the balcony, and the full kitchen! I will definitely visit again!
