We chose this hotel based on how it looked on the website and the very reasonable price per night. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The property is a bit older, but the decor and service make up for it. WiFi worked great, and we were right at the end of a hallway. There’s a grocery store right across the street, which makes having a kitchen in the suite a huge bonus. There are also convenient walking-distance options for food. One minor thing we found nd was that even though there was an inviting pool on the property, there were only chairs for sitting upright, no lay-down loungers available. Maybe it was only us crazy Canucks that we’re looking to lay out in the sun in late September! My wife didn’t like the AC unit blowing right at her side of the bed, but we were

perfect kitchen!! fantastic location!! clean & quite room!! close to disney and highway!! wonderful staff!! The room was very clean and comfortable with everything provided.  I love HOTEL PEPPER TREE!!

Beds hard as a rock.  Breakfast was sad, consisting of bad snack cakes, and what I can only describe as off brand Tang.  Irrational smoking policy.  Neighborhood mixed, at least there was a good breakfast restaurant across the street. .
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We are making big changes to our breakfast this month to improve our selections. As for our smoking policy, we do not allow smoking in any of our rooms but do have a designated smoking area on the property for the comfort and convenience of all of our guests. Thank you again for your comments. We will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: Pepper tree was close enough to Disneyland yet affordable.  The hotel was quiet and the employees friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the pool when we weren't at Disneyland. We had a great time!  Hoping to come back someday.
Manager Response: We hope you come back too! Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Best experience with staff at a hotel
Summary: This was by far the best service I have received even compared to a fancy hotel. The staff are top shelf! It was 9pm when we realized the pilot was not lit on the stove and they were there in minutes to fix it so we could have midnight pizza! And then when we checked out, we left behind a chiropractic therapeutic pillow and they called us with the best manors and let us know they were holding it for us. Beyond that they were friendly and so professional. I was very impressed as the staff even seemed young and you just don't see that much these days anymore. I highly recommend this stay even though it is a bit off the strip for Disney Vacationers.
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the great comments about out staff and the recommendations. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary: Very cozy and clean. Housekeeping did a great job and cleaned when we needed. AC and wifi worked great, home away from home. Enjoyed the pool and was a great price. Kitchen was handy, could have had pans for the oven, and more cutlery but suited our needs as there was just us two.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback! We are so glad you enjoyed the hotel and our homey vibe.

Summary: I've stayed here for 2 different trips to Anaheim for Disneyland trips, & love it. Great location, friendly staff, full kitchen large clean quiet rooms easy to get to theme park & interstates Great stay.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for your loyalty and helpful feedback. Come back again soon.

Summary: This hotel met our needs 100%. Easy check in and out. Clean, huge room had everything we needed. Loved the location for Disney. We didn’t use the continental breakfast at all since we were off doing things early in the am so can’t speak for that. Housekeeping always came when we put our maid service sign up and room was cleaned well. Pool was warm enough even in the evening. Loved this hotel I will miss it!
Manager Response: So glad you found our hotel convenient, clean and comfortable! We would love to have you stay again.

Summary: We came here for the price, we'll come back for everything else!  The rooms were beautiful, the staff were great and the Disney discounts were a bonus! The continental breakfast was pretty lacking unfortunately, but everything else made up for it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and helpful feedback. So glad you enjoyed the value in our boutique hotel. We are making some major changes in our breakfast and hope you come back to see them.

Summary: The hotel was stylish, clean and convenient to area attractions.  Also, several restaurants in the vicinity.  We found the staff to be friendly and helpful.  We would definitely stay here again and we highly recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: So happy that you will be back. Thank you so much for the recommendations!

Summary: This hotel is perfect. Price and location were great, but what really charmed us were the fantastic staff and the lovely adobe-style decor. Beautiful touches like private courtyard with fountain, Spanish tiles, comfy beds and pillows, bougainvillea. We were three families with children coming to celebrate a birthday at Disneyland. Staff provided great support and service before we arrived, including a birthday gift for my husband, and throughout our stay. Was great to have restaurant on site -- they, too, went above and beyond, serving us late our first night, though we arrived from airport just at closing time. All of our families loved the hotel and would definitely come back and highly recommend.

Employees were very friendly. Really enjoyed the rooms.  Very cute. Microwave kept cutting on and off. Sat morning found a cockroach and showed the lady in front. VERY disappointed with that situation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad that you talked to us at the front desk and we were able to give you a refund because you did not receive our best. Because of the garden patios, bugs can enter our rooms on the ground floor. We again apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: The rooms were comfortable and clean. My husband enjoyed reading on the patio. The family liked the kitchen for making snacks and keeping water cold. Coffee pot was very nice to have! Our email address is; rcgatlin7@gmail.com
Manager Response: We love the private patios too! So glad you enjoyed your full kitchen and private patio. Come back again soon.

Summary: Worst hotel stay ever customer service trash said we had dog hair in our room we stayed at Disneyland every day why would we bring a dog no pictures and no apology for accusing us. My girlfriend was very upset this was her birthday vacation and she had a great time until the check out. Work on your employees
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the poor customer service you received during your stay. We did call you to personally apologize for the situation and to compensate for the frustration you experienced. We have used this to better our front desk staff and take your comments very seriously. Thank for your helpful feedback and we again are sorry for the poor check-out experience.

Summary: I come to Anaheim yearly & always stay here. Love the price & the rooms. Wish it had a small gym with just the necessities so that I wouldn't have to find a gym while down here, but I love this hotel.

entrally located in Anaheim, our boutique inn makes it easy to discover the best attractions in the area. Visit Disneyland Resort, Knott’s Berry Farm theme park, Anaheim Convention Center and Anaheim’s extensive shopping and dining options – all within a 10-minute drive. Better yet, spend your days relaxing next to our sparking heated pool.  Owned and operated by Australians, Hotel Pepper Tree was designed with an infusion of Californian and Spanish styles. Our friendly staff and boutique property have earned us TripAdvisor’s Excellence Award for 3 years running.

Excellent hotel, the people are very friendly, the rooms were clean and tidy. Packages were received promptly and delivered as soon as possible. The bathrooms were clean. A safe place that I would gladly return to again and again.

Summary Heading: Good location, nice staff and nice room
Summary: Stayed for disneyland, it's close, has parking and on a quiet location. Nice staff and very comfortable room. The hotel got good value for the money and I can recommend it if you are going to Disneyland.

We stayed here because we were traveling with a friend who booked their hotel here. It is a but far from Disneyland. The rooms are nice, clean, and quiet. The beds are extremely comfortable. I enjoyed my stay.

We loved this hotel! It was very clean,comfortable,quiet & they have wonderful friendly staff. I loved our outdoor courtyard and the Spanish style decor. We're from New Mexico and felt right at home here. We'll definitely stay here again.

if you have a car and want to be near Disney this is a great option. It is cheaper than most in the area and has spacious air conditioned rooms with a nice feel. The staff are lovely and the entire stay was made easy. The breakfast is all you need and whilst fairly simple beats or at least matches the usual free quality inn style breakfasts. A really nice stay.

It's good for price. Street view was nosiy from cars. I hope you to improve soundproof system for the next visit. We had a problem with nosie from next door.  But the staff was kind and nice. I'm gonna stay there next year again.

It was fairly quiet, except for the noisy families in the hallway going back and forth to the elevator.  The room was spacious.  Only used the refrigerator in the kitchen.  Thought the carpet was old and dirty looking.  The bathroom was ok--small, and the grout on the floor looked grungy.  Overall, our stay was alright, and the location was great.  The breakfast was minimal.  Staff was very nice, and pool was good, too. Free internet and parking included saved a lot compared to other places.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed our convenient location and thought the price was good. We will make sure to use your helpful feedback to better our hotel.

Summary: Nice hotel and has a full kitchen but the only thing was the floor was filthy I have a one year old who crawls and her knees and feet were filthy from crawling all over the floor. The bed was comfortable
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are so sorry that floors were not cleaned properly. We will make sure to inspect your room immediately.

Summary: We found this accommodation in Anaheim very good choice on our way through the area. This is a place to go if you are not looking at all the Disney hype. Also the price we found very reasonable. The room was spacious and also hada kitchenette for those who would like to cook their own food. The service in the hotel was very good. Hotel room in our case did include breakfast, however not much to report on that.

Summary Heading: The property is in a great location. I love the gas kitchenette with but the a.c. is the only problem.
Summary: The location and atmosphere is wonderful the only down fall is the a/c.  The decor is on the older side but if you dont mind its great. My kids loved the pool and across the street is a store. They also provide dishes, pots a nd pans

The reviews were accurate.  This is a very nice quiet hotel not far from Disney. Easy check in/check out.   Rooms clean and comfortable.  We had a courtyard room and would recommend booking this type room.  Very private and quaint.

The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. Loved the full kitchen and large room. The location was great. Close to all of the places we wanted to visit. Will return to this hotel again in the future.

The staff was ultimately friendly and helpful. The location lent itself perfectly for visiting multiple beach locations and Disney attractions. I will go here again for sure. There are even a few all night delivery restaurants nearby!

Stayed for one night during road trip. Very welcoming efficient receptionist and the hotel was quirky and old fashioned but had all we needed. Our room was on the third floor facing the back of the hotel so no road noise. The room we large with kitchen unit and large balcony.  The aircon worked really well but the refrigerator was a little noisy all night.   Breakfast served in the adjacent restaurant was basic but suited our needs.  Good little hotel, good location with nearby supermarket, and friendly staff. Recommended.

Easy check in. Easy parking. Comfortable bed and so nice to have a kitchen in your room.room was clean and well taken care of.rooms ac was on and blasting when we got there that was amazing! Great hotel can't wait to come back

We stay here every time we come to Disneyland. Good price and we love the kitchen as we come home at night for late meals. Also on 5 min to Disneyland which is great. We never did the breakfast because my kids just do cereal so the grocery store right across the street was great to get some quick meals

The only thing we would quibble about is the noise from Lincoln Avenue,otherwise everything was perfect.what else can we say the room was great ,the bed was very comfortable and it was lovely to have a balcony.

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to Disneyland and beaches
Summary: We made a trip to Disneyland Park as well as Huntington Beach. Hotel Pepper Tree was located just 4 minutes from the park. The kitchen made it easy to store food for evening meals and snacks. The staff was always helpful and courteous. The breakfast had little for those requiring gluten-free foods, though. Fruit just isn't a continental breakfast if that's all you can eat. Would have liked to have seen eggs, bacon, and single serve yogurts.

When my flight was cancelled I needed a place to stay and quickly. This place is clean,safe, nicely decorated, and convenient. I only wish my stay was longer so I could have enjoyed the pool and balcony.
Manager Response: We hope you can stay longer on your next visit! Thanks for the review.

Summary: Beds are comfortable, staff were very approchable and warm, and the room, hotel and grounds were very nice. The breakfast was a nice amenity and the wifi worked very well. great take out options nearby and a grocery store!

Everything else about the hotel was between great and ok but we were in a cellular dead zone. The hotel's WiFi was unacceptably horrible. We were misled. Completely cut off from communication with outside world. This is unacceptable in 2017. Had I know the WiFi would be that terrible I would not have booked the hotel for any price.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you had a bad WiFi connection. We do not see in our notes that you contacted the front desk about your issues. We will make sure to check our signal in that area now but are not experiencing any other issues throughout the hotel. Again, we are sorry and wished that you would have talked with us during your stay so we could help rectify this situation.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights and really enjoyed it. The location is fine, and it is in a nice and relatively quiet area. We loved the style of the hotel, that's what we likes most, so hopefully they wont change it to a modern style. We World love to comeback back.

Summary Heading: Nice place, Nice people, good location when visiting Los Angeles, we appreciated free breakfast and parking
Summary: We loved the place quiet and very clean room,also appreciated mexican supermarket right in front of the  Hotel where you can buy any   of food or product! We highly recommand this Hotel !!!! For a good Time on LA try this Hotel
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! So glad you enjoyed your stay and our amenities.

Summary: Front Desk staff did a commendable job for keeping my credit card secured during my 2 days stay @ Hotel Pepper Tree. I thought I've taken the c/card from front desk but unfortunately I didn't upon check in time. I was impressed that they did try to contact us but unfortunately they can't get through as we switched off our overseas phone.  Keep up the good work guys!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and encouragement for our front desk. We will make sure they see your comments. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and our helpful staff!

Summary Heading: Will Be Our 'Go To' Place to Stay
Summary: This little motel is great!  It's an older property, but it's clean and well kept. The style is eclectic and quaint.  Lots of room and the large balcony is so much better than just a window (that usually doesn't even open).  The kitchen is a plus with a stove, refrigerator/freezer and microwave. Pots, pans, dishes and utensils are included.  Price is great for all of these features!  It was just the 2 of us, but would be great for families, as well.
Manager Response: So happy to be your home away from home in Anaheim! So glad you enjoyed our full kitchens, large balconies, and our boutique charm. Thanks for the review.

Summary: Nice motel - breakfast provided was good.  Also, provided free parking.  Hotel staff very helpful in printing some documents for us while we were there.  Was a good, central  location for our planned activities.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy that your found our hotel helpful and convenient.

Summary: I always stay at Pepper Tree. Many reasons:   the styling of the hotel, the helpful staff, easy parking, good food nearby and good shopping not far away. The spacious rooms are a real bonus when travelling.
Manager Response: So happy to be your favorite! Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Hotel was very nice except for ...
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the hotel for two nights.  The room was nice with a nice patio.  When we got home I realized I left my down blanket in the hotel room.  I called the hotel and it was not turned in.  I called the following day and it still was not at lost and found.   I am upset at myself for leaving it but more upset that either the housekeeper or a laundry employee did not turn it in.  This blanket meant a lot to me.  I have psoriatic arthritis and this blanket was soft and did not hurt my skin.  It took me months to find it.  The front desk clerk even ageeed that someone took the blanket and I won't be getting it back.  I hope the employee who took the blanket needed it more than I do.  But it is still wrong to steal.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel and are sorry that we have not found the misplaced blanket. We have talk with our housekeeping staff, and they were not able to locate it either. Our housekeeping staff is a trusted part of our hotel family, and we would never consider an item to be stolen from anyone on staff. Again, we are sorry that you cannot find your blanket.

Summary: We had a lovely time at this hotel, friendly, helpful staff. The rooms were spotlessly clean every day. A free continental breakfast was served daily, the only negative I can think of was the breakfast foods served were all very sweet.
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review! So glad you enjoyed our hotel and staff! We are making upgrades to our breakfast this month. We hope you come back to see them.

Summary Heading: Much better than the typical bedroom/bathroom everyone else offers!
Summary: I've stayed here 3 times now, and will always look for a room here first. It's like a small apartment. The complimentary continental breakfast is adequate, but there are no eggs, so I order from the menu and pay. Served as I like it.
Manager Response: Thanks for being such a loyal guest! We love having you stay with us. Thanks for the helpful tips on breakfast - there will be changes soon to our breakfast setup and options.

Summary: We stayed at this property three days at the end of our vacation in Usa .Quiet but convenient location  near to shopping malls and Disneyland Park. Spacious and clean rooms with balcony, kitchen and nice fridge. Abundant breakfast and friendly staff. Small but cute pool, the kids enjoyed it with pleasure. Recommended!

When I walked in my room, it was soooo beautiful. The Spanish décor was outstanding. Not too big and not too small. The kitchen had a full sized refrigerator, a microwave and GAS STOVE. Loved it. The courtyard was a bonus. So quaint for my family of 4. I will definitely recommend others to stay there.

Great room. Reasonable price. I loved the layout and style of tje Hotel. The staff was friendly and matched the atmosphere. I will definitely return in the immediate future. Very homey feel and close to grocery stores and markets.

Hotel had a very homey feel to it, loved having our kitchen in the room!! Also really liked the AC unit! Good location, not too much traffic, but still within 10 min of stuff to do. Only complaint would be the thin walls....we had some neighbors get back to the hotel around 1am and they weren't super considerate of the time. Needless to say we could hear them through the walls for about an hr.

The staff was friendly, the room was huge, the price can't be any better and the location is okay. It was very clean and the kitchen with the fridge is perfect. The only thing that wasn't good, was the breakfast.

A little dated but good value for the price. Very convenient to have a kitchen when traveling with kids. Close to Disneyland and all the amenities. Staff was very helpful. The continental breakfast selection was not good so we didn't go for breakfast in the mornings.

We stayed four nights here. The room has a kitchenette with  the basics. We did breakfasts and a couple of dinners ourselves. Very tidy all around, friendly front desk staff and a great little swimming pool. It's a ten minute drive to Disney. Not a very modern hotel however, a basic continental breakfast is included and each Disney Park pass we got at a $10 discount from the front desk.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and the full kitchen. Thanks for the helpful tips and feedback.

Summary: Awesome Stay! Comfortable, and clean. We were exhausted after Disneyland and hotel pepper tree was convenient, and affordable. I only wish the continental breakfast was served after 10 AM, because we did not get to enjoy as much.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review! We are making some big changes to our breakfast soon... will make sure to note your time request! ;)

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at this place for the first time in Anaheim together. We use PepperTree EVERY time we are in the area. We love it and it feels like home. It's a quaint little secret of ours in the middle of Anaheim.
Manager Response: Love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks for you loyalty. Come back again soon.

Summary: This was a comfortable, clean, convenient hotel. The receptionists were nice, room was spacious and had a separate dressing area and kitchen. Bed was comfortable. I would stay here again if traveling through the area.

Beautiful boutique hotel. The staff is very friendly; they call to verify your dates and to see if you have any special request. The hotel is very clean, comfortable beds with large rooms. After one stay this will be our go-to hotel for our Disney-Anaheim trips.  Keep up the great work Hotel Pepper Tree.

Summary Heading: I would definitely stay here again!
Summary: The rooms where clean and large. The beds very comfortable. Pool was nice and clean. The front desk staff was very helpful. I was not a big fan of the breakfast. We reserved two rooms and they where both great!!

We were very happy with our stay at Hotel Peppertree!  A very unique a clean property. The staff was friendly and kind!  We will return when we are visiting the Anaheim area. We really liked the boutique style of the hotel!

There are several markets, and fun nearby. The breakfast is very simple and options for an American breakfast; But the price is fair price, the room is large with a small kitchen. Good location in Anahein with easy access to Disneyland;
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful tips and feedback. Hope you come back again soon.

Summary: We need a kitchen when traveling, and this one was nice!  Liked everything about hotel, except for the air conditioning unit in the room, and no protein with complementary breakfast--but we had the kitchen!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and the full kitchen. We will make sure to check your AC in your room immediately. Plus, we are making big changes to the continental breakfast in September. We hope you come back to see them. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Everything was very nice and clean. Bed was confortable. Staff was best.. the were very friendly and it was in their best interest you need. (DVD player, key replacement, 30 min extra to check out with out an extra charge because we woke up late lol)  I think theyre the main reason why going back to this place. LOVED IT ♡
Manager Response: So glad you will be back! Thanks for all the love. <3

Summary: Found Peppertree on Booking.com but booked directly with the Hotel.  This worked out best so we could get the discount on Disneyland passes.   Our room was good size, nice little kitchen area. Front desk staff was very helpful and nice.  The housekeeping staff was also nice, as we had a  request that they kindly handled.   We never made it to the pool area (no spare time), but it looked so relaxing and clean.  I would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Awesome room with living room, kitchen and private patio!!
Summary: Loved the first floor rooms! Our patio was very private and cute!! Close to the street but I will be booking another stay here very soon!my family was very impressed by the room, stocked kitchen, and Spanish decor!
Manager Response: We love the courtyard studios too! Thanks for the great review. So glad you will be back.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. The bed was very comfortable.  We only stayed one night, but would have used the kitchen had we stayed a bit longer.  Room clean but could use a bit updating.  All around a nice stay.  We will probably come back the next time we come to this area.   A very nice hotel and nice employees attending.   Thank you!

This is my favorite time of year to visit Anaheim because most kids are back in school. We usually drive down from the bay area, it is supposed to be a 5 hour drive that turns into 8 hours. Add a toddler into that mix and its a drive that never ends. We arrive at the Pepper tree and my boyfriend goes to check in, he comes out a few minutes later telling me they want an additional $200. I go to the front desk to see what this is about. and I'm greeted by two sloppy receptionists, one who rudely  blurts out "I was just telling him what the $200 was for and he said he was going to get you to pay. It's on your booking confirmation"  when I was just asking her for clarification on the additional $200 they wanted to charge me. She clarified for me that it was for incidentals. That
Manager Response: We are sorry that you felt our customer experience was poor. We will make sure to work with our staff to improve their service. We do charge a security deposit fee if no valid credit card is presented at the time of check-in. We do state this at the time of booking and on our confirmation emails. Again, we are sorry for the confusion and frustration this caused you during your stay.

Summary: Tank you for the breakfast, it was perfect! Thanks for your hospitality. The pool was very nice and we appreciated to have towells included. We appreciated very much our stay and especially the quality of the service from the working staff.

The visit was nice per usual. this was the third time booking this hotel. It was unusual that I had to pay again when I arrived when I always pay in full. There should be a disclaimer because this ruined my trip.

From my own personal experience, this is one of Anaheim's finest.  It is conveniently close to most stores and is a middle point for Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm.  They even sell tickets there.  The hotel had a very unique, intimate setting.  It was very comfortable and the staff was very nice and professional!!!  The next time I stay in Southern California this is my go to hotel.  Thank you guys!

The hotel reminded me of Mexico.  So, it felt like we were really far away.  Staff was super friendly.  My only critique is for the room to be called a "suite", it was a bit smaller than I expected for a family of four.

Nice hotel with good rooms with comfortable beds, pool, free wifi and parking. Only let down by the free breakfast.  It was continental but very limited selection. Only very very small muffins, cake, fruit and cerials, coffee juice etc. Was disappointed there were no croissants or pastries.   Accepting the lack of breakfast, we would return.

Peppertree stay while visiting Knott's Berry Farm and Knott's Soak City, quaint little place right in the heart of Anaheim excellent service very clean great housekeeping enjoyed a little kitchenette continental breakfast was weak, but being so Central made up for that cuz it was easy to find other alternatives all in all a good stay
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location. We are making some big breakfast changes in the next month and hope you come back to see them.

Summary: Very nice, clean and pretty place to stay. The staff were super sweet and didn't bother us. Loved that there was a kitchen and roomy balcony. Only wish there were more breakfast options and comfier bedding.

Summary Heading: Great Room but breakfast needs improvement
Summary: We loved the room and friendly staff. Breakfast is really awful, nothing healthy, even the little cinnamon rolls were cut in two! -we don't eat that but it's the first time I see this ! . We selected it because of breakfast and we were very very disappointed.  It's preferably not offer it and insure good rate as the room is awesome!
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. So glad you enjoyed the room and customer service. We are working on major upgrades to our breakfast in the next month. We hope you come back to see our improvements.

Summary: I liked it nice place but room we were in there was banging all night long on Willa's and ceiling so I didn't get much sleep....so I figured in another room it would b way better...... I'm going to try hotel again and I'm almost positive it will b better night sleep

Summary Heading: Great value.spacious clean room near disney.
Summary: We booked a night here to be close to disney and it was perfect at 8 mins drive! Big spacious room with comfy bed and living area also. Pool was lovely too after a long day round the park! No bar in hotel was a downside as there is nowhere nearby.

had a pleasant stay at hotel pepper tree for a week. kitchen was adequate, rooms, specially the bathroom, could use some renovation. everything was clean, all the staff were very courteous and helpful. Breakfast was ok, could use some more variety.  heated pool was nice. 10 min to disneyland, very easy to do back and forth. good value for money if you just want to sleep and maybe cook a few meals.

Good location for what I had planned and super close to Disneyland parks and not too far from universal studios.  Decent size room, loved the fact that there was a kitchen with a normal size fridge! Definitely utilized it . Conveniently there is a grocery store across the street and a laundry place as well. I would book again . I do wish the quality of the mattresses gets improved, they use mattress protectors which is a HUGE deal !!. Was too busy to use the pool so no input there from me

Stayed in the Hotel Pepper Tree for 3 nights to visit Knotts Berry farm/Soak City (about a 10 minute drive away). We were welcomed by a friendly, courteous Andy? Our room was lovely, very spacious with lots of wardrobe space, a small kitchen, well equipped with all we needed and a bathroom. All spotlessly clean. We usually eat cereal for breakfast, so were ok with what was on offer. There was also a selection of breads/cake, yoghurt and melon. We didn't use the pool. It was quite small. The only downside to this property was it's location. The places to eat within walking distance were a little downmarket and we had to drive to the nearby Olive Garden.  I would highly recommend staying at this property as it really was great value.

Everything was great. The staff were very friendly.  The only negative thing was our room was not cleaned daily.  The room was close to Disneyland.  The kitchen was a great addition.  We will go back again next summer.

Very nice personal, nice rooms, nice but small pool. Lots is cleaner odors, breakfast no fun, very hellhörig. Location good for Disneyland trip and to the coast like Huntington Beach. Hard to find good and healthy food in this area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. So glad you found our location easy and convenient. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Service excellent and cordial also beds in good shape we loved .breakfast is ok and if you want to buy different food for $7 they have awesome food extra  . For the price of the night you still having breakfast free any ways

Summary Heading: Just ok for a short stay
Summary: Basic hotel with a decent style and kind personnel. Pros: large room with kitchenette and patio.  Cons: not so close to disneyland as advertised, bathroom old fashion, breakfast poor and in a separate building, no milk for baby in the night.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Glad you enjoyed our large rooms and courtyard patios. We are 3.5 miles from Disneyland (about 10 minute drive) and even closer to Knott's Berry Farm. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: This hotel is about a 10-15 minute drive to Disney parks. The hotel is a mimic yo an apartment.  The rooms are Spanish styles, but kitchen and bathroom are outdated. My family only stayed 2 nights while at Disney. The continental breakfast is not great. No eggs, pancakes, bacon or warm items. Only cold ones, like pastries, donuts, fruit, cereal, and bagels. The staff is very welcoming and friendly. I have only one complaint and it was that i could hear the heavy steps of those above us. Good spot if your looking to save.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, stylish hotel close to everything.
Summary: We enjoyed our three night stay at this Spanish style hotel close to Disneyland and not too far from the coast. The staff were delightful and very helpful, the beds comfortable and the rooms a good size. I would not recommend the breakfast, such as it was, to anyone.

This is a nice and clean hotel. Very helpful staff. Convenient location and  found many restaurants and shops are open until late in the evening. Out door pool was nice. Kids enjoyed staying here. Prices w.ere reasonable

This hotel was Extremely accommodating to my needs! I was the maid of honor for my best friend, I was coming in from the Bay Area and I had To be at the venue at 1pm. They allowed me to have a early check in and help me in a timely fashion! The room was beyond Excellent.. I felt at home.. I did not get to use the kitchen much for this visit, but I can promise I will be staying at this hotel for all of our future visits!!

Continenial breakfast sucked. U could have more variety, like pancakes, waffles, eggs, bacon, sausage. Oatmeal.. but that was my only complaint..i wuld definatley stay here again. Great for familys, we had a king bed suite it could sleep at least 6-7 people..

My son and I were in town to see the Angels and the Dodgers play.  I went on booking.com to find the most reasonable place in the area and settled on Hotel Pepper Tree.  It really was fine.  There's a full kitchen in the room (we didn't take advantage of it but it's really beneficial for a family).  The hotel was nice and clean, plus they had free WiFi.  Plus, they had a complimentary light breakfast in the morning.  Excellent place and I'd highly recommend it.

The staff was very gracious and helpful.  The hotel was always clean and all of our needs were met.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.  The only thing that was question let was the location.  It was a little removed and we were unsure of the area (safety-wise)

The hotel is clean and tidy with a nice pool area.  The bedrooms were a good size with cooking facilities and fridge. The hotel offers free continental breakfast however if you prefer a hot breakfast there is a small additional charge. Breakfast was very busy and a bit chaotic.  We would stay again if we were in the area.

I stayed with my wife and kids and was very pleased with the distance to disneyland, the friendly staff, and the kitchen. We were able to save money by making our own food and keeping several items in the full size refrigerator.

For this business traveler, The Pepper Tree was great. The staff was very helpful, the room comfortable, the pool clean and inviting. I saved a great deal and ate better because I had my little kitchen.  They even helped my husband leave me a birthday surprise.

Summary Heading: Good Location at a real bargain
Summary: We have stayed several time over the years on our visits to Disneyland. The property is convenient for visiting the parks and just far enough away to get away from the high prices and crowds. They offer a discount to the parks as well. This is not a new property but it is staffed with a friendly and helpful staff and large, clean, comfortable rooms. This is a boutique hotel with a Spanish motif that reminds us of South Baja. They provide a free breakfast that will fill the morning hunger at the restaurant that is on the property. The restaurant serves Mexican seafood and was perfect for dinner. This is a family hotel and can be a bit noisy but not the fault of the hotel. Many food choices in the area and a grocery store across the street to fill the refrigerator and cook your

sink cracked in bathroom Kitchen counter peeling limited kitchen utensils couch to low difficult to get out of limited towels only one chair for table glasses to small no ice maker poor choices on free breakfast
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to check your room immediately and will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: The kitchen was a good surprise. It has a Hispanic Market in front so we could make dinner and keep some money for ourselves. The price was fair though when we wanted stay a more day the price was almost double.

Summary Heading: Complete Value for money family hotel
Summary: Extremely friendly staff. Clean rooms,. Furnished kitchen, wifi is also good , but some devices may not connect always. Supermarkets and convenience store, Laundry , pharmacy nearby. Only one recommendation  for the hotel to keep bathroom rugs or mats in the bathroom.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback.  So glad you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location.  We do supply a bath mat in the bathrooms and are sorry that you did not receive one. We will make sure to talk to our housekeeping staff about this issue. Thanks again for the review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed in the Hotel Pepper Tree for two nights to allow a visit to Knotts Berry Farm. It worked well for that purpose; 6 minute drive. We had two rooms as we have two teenage children. The rooms were clean and comfortable with a kitchen area (unused by us). Slightly old fashioned feel overall and the bathroom was small but fine. Really good main beds and the 3rd single was ok but not for anyone over 6ft I would think. Excellent supermarket immediately opposite for longer stays. Complimentary bfast was in a side room of the Mexican fish restaurant located in front of the hotel. It was very basic; cereals toast and a few buns with coffee/juice; adequate but minimal. We ate in the restaurant one evening and enjoyed it; good service and what we think must be authentic mexican
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and helpful tips! We would love to have you back again. So glad you choose to stay with us.

Summary: Great location . Close to everything. Very clean. Kids had fun at the pool and best of all , it felt really homie. There is a grill that works very well. Kitchenette in downstairs rooms are a great feature for long term stays. Price was great. Staff was very nice. Continental breakfast is at the restaurant that is in the same parking lot. Grocery store across the street has everything from coolers to umbrellas for those beach days. Will definitely be back and recommend it. Totally worth it!!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the tips and great feedback. We appreciate your recommendations and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The cleaning staff were great. The pool area was no hum, very uncomfortable chairs unless you were lucky enough to get one of only 2 tables (these were the I my umbrellas as well). The continental breakfast left much to be desired, the toasters didn't work properly and there were no protein options just breads, cereals, pastries and some fruit. Very poor. Luckily there was a restaurant across the street called The Scratch Room that served an excellent breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful comments and suggestions. We will make sure our your feedback regarding the pool area and breakfast given to the management team. We are working on some major improvements to our breakfast options... but we do always suggest the Scratch Room! They are the best.

Summary: This was a nice surprise. Very reasonably priced with good decor, kitchen, full refrigerator, sofa, spacious. The decor is Mexican very warm homey colors. Very welcoming. I would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and large full kitchen rooms. Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Lovely place w/character and potential BUT
Summary: Dont stay in rooms 302, 202, 102 next to the elevator. The elevator motor pump rattles very loud next to the room and  will keep you up to ruin your sleep. The continental breakfast is the worst Ive ever had. Nothing but sugary products. Even the juice was artifical sunny delight crap. Advertising the continental breakfast is misleading.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the 4 star review. We are glad that you enjoyed our boutique charm. We are making some major changes to the continental breakfast soon. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: It's ok, but too expensive for the quality
Summary: The hotel looked fine. The room looked and felt out dated.  Everything looked quite old. The dishes in the kitchen looked dirty (including pots and pans). The best thing was the refrigerator, but it was very loud, so you have to wait for it to turn off it's freezing cycle in order to fall asleep. The rooms have no insulation, and if you need to get up early - you hear all the people in nearby rooms or in the hallway like they are inside your room. So in my case, the night wasn't restful despite the comfort of the bed.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will  check your room immediately to make sure it is meeting our standards. Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoy everything about your stay. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Pro:  location, spacious room, cheap Cons:  dish towel was dirty, bed not that comfy, it's not very quiet, you can hear everything, house keeping kept throwing away the soap we opened, it was a waste considering they have all these save energy signs about washing towels and such
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful feedback. We happy that you enjoyed our location, large rooms and affordable rates. We will make sure to talk to our housekeeping staff immediately about the issues you experienced. We appreciate your helpful comments and will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree.  The rooms were clean, comfortable and included full-size refrigerators, a stove, oven, microwave and necessary plates and utensils needed for cooking.  A nice private balcony was relaxing and a place to dry bathing suits and towels after a nice, peaceful afternoon sunbathing by the pool.  I would recommend having lounge chairs available at the pool, however, as they are much more comfortable than regular patio chairs.  I would like to see more items available at the continental breakfast, perhaps a waffle maker, as there was only cereal, some fruit and toast as options.  Overall, I would highly recommend Hotel Pepper Tree, and we will definitely return the next time we are planning a trip to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and the full kitchen. Thanks so much for the helpful tips. We will mention the lounge chairs to the management team. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Everything was great except restaurant staff was rude when I asked for a to go container for my continental breakfast. We were not allowed to take the food back to our room. We had to eat it in the restaurant while they played the news on a big screen tv with the volume up. It was rally annoying.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are sorry for the poor experience you had at the adjacent restaurant. We will make sure we notify them of your comments. We are working with them to improve their service and working on other changes to improve our breakfast experience.

Summary: The front desk service was excellent.  The room was clean and so was the bathroom. The bed was comfortable but the pillows definitely need to be replaced.  The kitchen had a full size fridge and a small stove and kitchenware.  The furniture a bit old  but clean.  But the price was right!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful comments. We will make sure to check the pillows in your room immediately. We hope that you were able to tell the front desk staff during your stay so we could switch them out. All of our bed have 4 pillows (2 feather and 2 cotton). So glad you enjoyed the full kitchen and clean room for the right price. Come back again soon.

Summary: Highly accommodating.  Quiet hotel and close to Disney...10 minute drive.  Front desk was highly attentive and friendly.  I had an issue with the refrigerator humming the first night and reported it in the morning and within a few hours they switched it out for a quiet one. Hotel was clean with no smell in the rooms. Very comfortable stay with its charming boutique feel.

The bed could be a little more comfortable. Over all it was a clean room and an ok stay. The hotel had great accommodations and excellent customer service. However, the walls are very thin. Over my 4 nights here, there were families in the rooms next to me and across the hall. I heard children screaming and running around most of the night. They were in and out of the room, letting the door slam. Through the door and walls, I could even here the parents telling them to be quiet in hushed tones. Insulation would be a great investment for this hotel. Very difficult to sleep. Just a suggestion...There should be rooms dedicated to families away from those of us who are there for business and need a good nights sleep.

It has hands down been the best hotel I've been to in Anaheim. It's price made it even better. Loved the seafood restaurant near it. The breakfast was great. The little patio outside was comforting. My kids and husband loved it. Definitely my go to hotel from now on.
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the great review. We are so happy that we will be you go-to Anaheim hotel from now on. See you soon!

Summary: The location of this place was great not to far from Disney land  customer service was excellent rooms were clean  bed were comfortable staff was very friendly and accommodating wifi was great over all give this place a try
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! Come back again soon.

Summary: Breakfast was awful?  All breads/pastries were stale, water luke warm, orange juice weak!  For the amount of money charged for the room, the very least that could have been offered was some bacon/eggs and fresh bread products. Definitely not a good value for families with children ... VERY DISAPPOINTING.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay near the theme parks
Summary: Nice place to stay near the theme parks. The hotel is well decorated with an old fashioned style. Poor breakfast served in a restaurant in front of the hotel. At the swimming pool there were only sitting chairs but not long chairs to lay.

I very much enjoyed staying at The Hotel Pepper Tree check in was super quick and staff was friendly. I will be returning again soon. Moved from a different hotel and regret I didn't choose your facility first. I loved the decor and especially enjoyed the pool!!
Manager Response: Love being a home-away-from-home! So glad you found us. Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Like this hotel. This is our 2nd time. Cozy and clean. Location is also close to disneyland. Big shopping Plaza is close by too only 2.2 Mikes away. All kinds of restaurants are close by. Gas station within a block.

Very nice decorated. Big and comfortable room. With a nice kitchen, big TV, and a beautiful terrace. Nice swimming pool area, with B-B-Q.  Great Location, very close to Disney parks. The best choice to go with your family. Everthing was great!!

Very good location, close to family attractions such as Disney land. Room is clean, kichten is convenient, breakfast is good for the family. Hotel staffs are very friendly and helpful. My mom misplaced her cell phone, hotel manager spent quite a bit time helping her, we found it in our room. Overall, it was a very pleasant stay.

Hotel was very clean and employees were very nice and  courteous room service was excellent also kitchen was very good, need some more dishes for a Family of 5 or more. This was a very good place and I would recommend it to family and friends

Summary Heading: Best hotel in Anaheim !!! I'm very happy with my decision to book at Pepper Tree.
Summary: I will definitively come back!!!!! I will recommend this hotel to my friends and  coworkers! people and staff are very friendly! Feels like home. I came with my husband and my baby and both of them like the hotel.

This is a wonderful, family friendly boutique hotel. Very friendly and helpful staff. We had two rooms -- the Queen Courtyard and the King Courtyard. Fully equipped kitchens, comfortable beds, large recently renovated rooms, nice swimming area, convenient location for Disneyland and other attractions. It was great having the enclosed patios as part of the rooms. We will definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to our family and friends. Thank you Hotel Pepper Tree for a great stay!!

We came to Anaheim for a birthday/Disneyland celebration, were looking for economical lodgings, but didn't want to stay in a chain hotel. The Pepper Tree exceeded our expectations, in size of the room, cleanliness, friendly staff and location. The kitchen with full sized fridge was much appreciated. The old world feel of the hotel was charming, without being outdated. Have already recommended it to several friends and co workers.

My husband and I loved the Hotel Pepper Tree, it was smack down In the middle of all our preferred areas. We will defintely be staying here again. Our favorite part was the full sized fridge and kitchen area. We didn't have to eat out and could make our own healthy food.

Great place to stay love the Spanish style look. The pepper tree holtel was centerly located price per night was cheaper than all the other holtel in the area. This place should be called the hidden jem.

Great hotel for a good price. I do however recommend you bring sandals or slippers so you don't step on the dirty carpet. Also the restaurant across from the hotel is where you have your continental breakfast or for a reasonable price you can purchase a delicious breakfast.

Really enjoyed it. Great location - Mexican supermarket across the road a must visit - staff keen and friendly. Great breakfast. Bit creaky noises from folk moving around upstairs, but apart from that great. We had double queen garden room. Plenty of room for two adults and two large teenagers. Would love to come back :)

Was over all a good stay always like this hotel. This time was harder to sleep due to upstairs being rude and banging on everything and stomping when they where walking around in their room. I think they kept moving the patio furniture around to which caused alot of noise.

There is a room charge of $200 cash or ur card with a debit logo a charge of $20. Never said anything when booking room. The area is not eat u expected to be in the photo. The hotel is very hot n stuffy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We did mention at the time of booking our hotel policy regarding our security deposit. Since you did not have a valid credit card, we did have to take a $200 refundable security deposit.  We do not see a $20 charge anywhere on your reservation and want to make there is no bank error. Please call us direct about this situation. Again, we are sorry for any confusion you had booking through a third party and our credit card policy.

Summary: My family and I love this place. Friendly staff, clean room, safe environment, minutes from disney. I visit California once a year and this hotel is a great place to stay. Staff is so sweet. Nice pool

Good overall. Not a lot of outlets by the bed. Couldn't find the trash can (it's under the bathroom sink, no other trash cans in the room). Loved how dark it was with curtains. Slept too long. 9.5/10!

The hotel is at very convenient location. Groceries, pharmacy etc are nearby. Room were cleanly maintained. Kitchen was nice too. Very comfortable for a family of 4. We drove from SFO, one day to universal studio and another day in Disneyland. Easy access To both location by Uber or Car

Large and comfortable room. The kitchenette was equipped with everything. There was a grocery store across the street, which we loved! Only a ten minute drive from the Disney parks. Safe area and great customer service. Will definitely return!

Although the hotel had everything we needed the rooms need a freshen up, the furniture was old and worn and there was a strong smell of cigarette smoke even though the hotel is a non-smoking complex. The rooms at the front of the complex are very noisey due to the non stop road traffic. The complex was very close to a supermarket.

Sweet and quaint little spot! I loved the decor of Spanish/Mexican art and flair! Very clean and surprisingly quiet (surprise because of volume of kids/families).  My only tiny complaint was due to deli-full kitchens in rooms, there was sometimes a mixed bag of strong food odors when walking thru the hall to elevator (people from all over have a distinct aroma of their own cuisine), which can be pleasant or repulsive depending on ones own taste.  But, with that said, aromas never bothered me in my room, even though, they were coming from the room next door to mine.

Loved the hotel and had a great stay, the only downside was a smell in the bathroom that didn't go away (we think it was coming from the sink) and the tub floor had a dip in the center, that felt like It may fall though the floor at some point.  It may not be that bad but.....

If your looking a great place to stay,this hidden treasure of a hotel might be just what your looking for. For a fair price you get a room that's really comfortable ,quiet and very nicely set up.The kitchen is a add bonus if you just want relax and not have to out looking for something to eat.   Having a great balcony is something I enjoy just to be able able to go outside and enjoy.I know I'll be back just like I have many times before.

My only regret was the pool hours. They close too early so my children didn't get to swim at all. We were up and down and by the time we got to the hotel it was past pool time. Definitely the pool hours should be extended.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel. Our pool does close at 9pm for the comfort for all our guests. We will make sure our management team considers your suggestion.

Summary: Good location, very close to the Disney (Uber charged <$10 both ways). Breakfast was very good, but cant take it back to your room if someone doesn't feel like getting up from the bed early. Pool was small and not very clean, but was fun Kitchen was good and had everything we needed We'd requested for a room for 4 at the time of booking, but the room was only good for 3. We didn't complain and one smaller kid managed on the sofa.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay. Thanks for the helpful tips! We are sorry that the third party you booked with made a mistake for the room type. We would have been happy to help you if you notified the front desk staff. We appreciate your helpful feedback. Come back again soon!

Summary: My favorite thing about staying at this hotel is the comfort of the beds and pillows. It is always clean and the bathrooms are extra clean. The staff at the hotel is always friendly and super helpful. Always a pleasure staying at the hotel

Horrible expensive and the state taxes out of sight. The room was no more than $1-!25.00 per night and for 3 nights 99.00 in taxes-we will NOT return to California EVER!! We will have family come to our State.  Rooms are very old and require updating/refurbishment.
Manager Response: We are sorry that the CA taxes are the way they are... we wish we could changes that too. Thanks for your feedback.

Summary: Stayed a night but loved the place. Would be perfect for a few days. The kitchen was well stocked. I love my morning coffee. A better brand and more than 2 cups would have been better. Otherwise it was perfect.

I was leaving one morning at 9am, and they were mopping on the 4th floor,  and on the main floor, right by the elevator.  I believe this was the wrong time for this, many customers in and out.  The floor was very slippery.

Children and I were in town for VidCon 2017 and found the location perfect. I liked the convenience having the Hispanic grocery store across the street which serves an excellent breakfast. I will definitely consider hotel Pepper Tree for our future VidCon trips.

Love the location love the kitchen we will definitely be back this fall of 2017 love the closet space. The continental breakfast had a great selection of fruit cereals Bagels and coffee and juice. Love the architecture

Our family of 5 fit perfect in the king size room where there was also a twin size bed and the couch was perfect for my 5 year old. On our checkout day our car wouldnt start and the front desk came put and helped us get on our way. The hotel was close to Disneyland and was overall a nice place to stay.

No tips or guidelines> Thank you, we were very comfortable. The hotel receptionist was very helpful and polite. I was very happy to find you in the last moment. We wanted to stay longer but you were sold out.

Pressure of shower head was good but water kept switching from hot to cold! Hotel was good overall but staff is not very friendly and do not smile much! Great location, close to Disneyland and other nearby beaches!

Summary Heading: Cute but can use a little more...
Summary: Our key card didn't work on our 2nd day. Towels had lipstick stains. Garbage under bed from previous guests. Kitchen was cute. Room was spacious. Pool area was nice and private. Nicer than I expected.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed the large room and pool area, but we are so sorry that you did not receive our best housekeeping service. We will make sure to use your comments to improve our housekeeping team. We do  hope you will stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay. The hotel actually had character!!!... no boring hotel room that you've seen a hundred times with dirty carpet. They actually had Spanish tile floor (at least our room... We were on the 1st floor.) The service was excellent!! We placed our reservation directly through the hotel. No problems at all!! We even had our own patio off our room.  Kitchen was will stocked with all you need. Pool was great! My boys enjoyed the turtles that squirt water into the pool! Would go back again. Excellent value!!

Always stay here when we are going to Disneyland. Clean, quiet, convenient. You won't be disappointed with your stay. Breakfast was decent and you can stock up in snacks for your day for the kids. Look no further!

Breakfast is very simple, It would be nicer when teh breakfast has more choises. The hotel is nearclose to Disney and on the other side of the street is a supermarket. The rooms are big and clean and there is a good WIFI connection, also in your room
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful tips! So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Great little place and quiet with excellent rooms with kitchen. Kids had a great time using the pool after our long day at Knots Berry Farm. Excellent staff and I would recommend to anyone for an enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! So glad you enjoyed your Knott's getaway.

Summary: Rooms were spotless, A.C. worked great, house keeping came by daily. Overall great stay. My only complaint was that there wasn't an outlet next to the bed closest to the window. Other than that, excellent.

The concierge desk is always very helpful. Any questions I have, they are able to assist me. Each room is fully equipped with a kitchen and stocked with at least 4 sets of dinnerware. The room is always clean and turn down service is great.

Hotel had birthday balloons and chocolate in room for daughters birthday. Nice touch! Also loved the patio courtyard and free parking was also a bonus coming from another hotel charging way to much to park.
Manager Response: So honored to help celebrate your daughter's birthday! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Coffee was terrible. Everything else about the hotel was great however booking.com let me know the price of my room decreased but the front desk did not offer price reduction. I felt as though i had bern penalized for booking in advance. The front desk should over internet discounted rste if they do not want clientele to feel ripped off.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed the hotel. We will make sure to tell the restaurant about the coffee. As for the rates, they do vary and change depending on the season. If you book through a third party, we are unable to change the reservation/rates ourselves. You would need to talk to booking.com about this situation. If you have any further questions about this, please feel free to contact us.

Summary Heading: My stay at Pepper Tree Hotel
Summary: I absolutely loved staying at The Pepper Tree hotel! The staff went above and beyond! It was immaculate and extremely comfortable! It was central to everywhere I needed to be! I will most definitely be back !!
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the amazing review. Come back soon.

Summary: We loved this charming hotel!  The decor is unique and fun, the pool was awesome, the rooms spacious, the service fantastic!  If I ever have a chance to come back to the area, I'll definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our boutique charm! We would love to have you back again soon. Thanks for the review.

Summary: The kitchen was great to have when traveling with family and wanting to fix meals in your room. Loved the balcony even though we didn't have a view. The pool was ok...but was disappointed that there wasn't a hot tub. We stayed on the second floor and the guests above us were very noisy, early in the morning. Sleeping past 6 am was impossible along with the noise in the hall from other guests. This was my only complaint as we were on vacation and wanted to sleep in. The maid service was great along with the front desk personnel.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay. We love when our guests take advantage of the full kitchens! We are sorry for the noise issues you experience and will make sure to have our management team read your comments. We will use you feedback to improve our hotel.

Summary Heading: The hotel is much better than the photos!
Summary: At first when I saw the photos on the hotel website I thought that the Hotel Pepper Tree was a very small hotel likewise a motel. But as I came in I noted that the hotel was a very big one pool and kitchen inclusive. Excellent hotel!
Manager Response: So glad that we exceeded your expectations! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We loved our stay - everyone was very friendly - the manager  very concerned about  comfort of the guests - grandchildren LOVED the candy at the front desk and the swimming pool - we were able to grill our lunch there two days - what fun - we will recommend this hotel it is close to Disney - easy drive - parking is good - THANK YOU for a wonderful stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendations! We are so glad that you family enjoyed your stay!

Summary: This was my first trip to California to visit the Disney parks. The hotel was close by and reasonably priced. The staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean and well maintained. I would deffinatley consider this hotel again for any future trips to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. So glad you enjoyed your stay and visit to SoCal.

Summary Heading: Big Value in Anaheim with great studio kitchen, big fridge and microwave!
Summary: Nice big room with studio kitchen in Anaheim. Close to Disneyland. We came here to visit a close friend and visit Disney and this hotel  was the perfect place for us to stay with 3 small kids. The room is bigger with mini kitchen complete with basic tools to prepare simple meals. The pool is nice an clean and the staff are terrific!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback! We are so happy that our hotel was the perfect fit for your family. We hope you come back soon.

Summary: The room was clean and comfy but a little noisy because of doors slamming a lot. The pool area was clean and being able to BBQ out there was awsome. My only complaint was with the continental breakfast. They had mini donuts out of a package, some fruit, cereal, coffee and juice.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback.  So glad you found the room clean and comfy. We will make sure to let the restaurant see your comments. We are working with them to improve their service.

Summary: They tried charging my card three times 200$and 50$ and 50$ without my permission they also accused me of smoking in the room when i clearly did not thats why i smoked outside! Horrible will never stay again ! Dont stay here!
Manager Response: We are sorry that you had a poor experience. Because you did not follow our hotel policies, there were fees for smoking in your room/balcony and for not checking out of your room on time. If you have any further questions about the fees please contact our  management team.

Summary: Hotel Peper Tree was in a perfect location to go to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm.  Room was clean. I did not try the pool.  Room had a full refrigerator and stove, with pots and pans but could have used more plates and silverware. I would stay here again the next time I am in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: So glad you will be back!! Thanks so much for the helpful feedback.

Summary: will always stay here when I am in Anaheim.  They always treat me with respect and accommodate my every request.  I would maybe think about remodeling the bathrooms or maybe just do minor repairs to sealing and grouting.  other than that, Excellent
Manager Response: So happy to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for the helpful review. We will see you again next time!

Summary: Dirty and stained pillow cases. Dirty tile floors which left the bottoms of our socks blackened.. Bathtub drain plugged up with hair. Food crumbs on the kitchen floor . Definitely not worth the price.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you had a poor experience and did not receive our best service. We will look into your room immediately and speak with our housekeeping staff.

Summary: Stove did not work properly & balcony lock is not secure, it would latch but when you push on it, it would open, luckily it is on the 3rd floor of the hotel & we had no valuables inside. The staff were great & the cleanliness was quite good.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel and your helpful feedback We are sorry that you experience issues in your room. We have sent our maintenance staff to the room to fix the issues you mentioned.

Summary: Older hotel. Very charming hacienda style. Staff was friendly.   Room was not cleaned well. Dust was so thick on baseboards I could lift it wit my finger. I called housekeeping to come back in and vacuum the chairs and headboard because they had hair on them, and to dust the baseboards.  Halls and lobby were cleaned. My parents had another room and were also not satisfied with the cleanliness.  I probably would not choose character over cleanliness again.  Close to major attractions.

Nice except for seating.  Staff very nice.  Should have more silverware.  Facility acceptable.  Front desk friendly and accommodating.  Breakfast acceptable but could be better with little more effort.  The breakfast you could order and pay for was a good value

I absolutely loved this place!  My reservations were not what I had originally booked for by a online booking agent, but one of the front staff immediately found another accommodating room for my family, even though the hotel was booked.  I also liked the full kitchen available.   I will definitely be staying here again.

Great hotel for families!  Close to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm.  Great value for the money.  Breakfast could have had a little more variety & included some hot foods - should have been called a continental breakfast.

The staff was very nice and friendly, but the bed was way to hard in room 116 my back was so sore! I called the desk and told the man  who answered and he apologized and offered extra pillows, so we slept with the extra pillows under our back. The store 24 7 across the street kept charging me different prices than there signs would say I will never go to that store again. However that teriyaki store and breakfast place called the scratch were both amazing!

Hotel Pepper tree is a good place to stay. It's clean and feels safe. The beds are a little firm and our bedspread had some stains on it. The breakfast is a bit sweet but better than a regular continental breakfast. We liked it.

Great comfy bed, kitchen in need of a few more items to utilise the facilities, but it worked for the price.  Great if you need interconnecting when traveling with kids!  front house staff could not be beaten on service!

The STAFFFFFFF was amazing homegirl at the front desk was so informative about getting to stores/knotts anything we needed! The only thing I wish they had was a better continental  breakfast but during check-in she mentioned it wouldn't be that good! All in all I'll be back....

Customer service was great. Kitchen in the rooms was very good, especially with children. We even cooked a few meals there. Location ase good, not far from Disney land. It is great that there is a supermarket across the street. Kids really enjoyed the pool. Good hotel for the price!!

This is a three floor hotel located about halfway between Disney and Knotts Berry Farm. The rooms are spacious and well ventilated. A/C is available, but only needed at the height of the day. Balcony with chairs and a big sliding door. Nice kitchenette with full size fridge. Pretty Southwestern decor. Breat bedding and towels. Free continental breakfast at the restaurant next door. 24 hour mini-mart across the street. Shopping center and bank nearby. I was there for business, but it was a very warm, relaxing place.
Manager Response: So glad we were the perfect fit for your stay! Hope you can come back again soon... for a vacation this time!

Summary: The rooms are great very homey and cozy the only negative factors are the wifi is not the best and if you get a room next to the elevator you will hear everything and you won't get a lot of sleep. There's a particular worker named Andy Gonzalez who will answer all the questions you have! He's great!
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and the helpful service from Andy. We will make sure to check the WiFi connection from  your room. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: We have stayed here many times now, and always enjoy it. It's like a home away from home for us. 4 times last year, twice this year. And we are about to book for next year too. Nice well presented property and well equipped rooms.
Manager Response: Love to hear from our repeat guests!!! Thanks so much for your loyalty. Can't wait to see you again next year.

Summary: The Mini-Kitchen was amazing to have during our stay. They were located directly across from a supermarket so our first night we went over and got some food and were able to keep it all week. The Balcony was really nice although we didn't get to use it as much as we wanted because of the nature of our trip.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a family getaway!
Summary: Stayed here for a few days to check out attractions in the area.  The location was great.  The rooms are slightly dated but very clean and spacious.  Kitchen amenities provide everything you need to save yourself some cash on a meals while vacation.  Was slightly disappointed that there was no hot tub, but the pool area is nice.  Overall a great value, I would definitely stay here again when in the area. Oh, and the staff was very friendly and helpful too!

Summary Heading: Great place for a week long stay
Summary: I highly recommend staying at Hotel Pepper Tree. I stayed here for 5 nights, the week of Memorial Day. I've also stayed here two times before as well. It is a few minutes drive to both Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm. The staff is quite friendly and accommodating. The price is excellent compared to the expensive bed bug hotels that are directly across from Disneyland. And you get a little studio complete with a fridge, stove, kitchenware and a little seating area. The parking is also free. I was also able to get $15 off each Disneyland ticket that I bought, since I booked directly through their website. Not for sure if that is a permanent deal or not. The only knitpicky downside is that the doors are quite thin so you can hear guests and employees walking and conversing down

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient, but not entirely comfortable.
Summary: The inside of our room was very clean. And, the kitchen was very convenient.  It was a close drive to Disneyland, which was also very convenient. The worst thing was definitely the continental breakfast. It was really bad. The cereals that were offered were stale and the selection was really poor.  We only went to the breakfast on the first day and went out for breakfast every other day.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are so happy that you found the hotel clean and convenient. We are sorry that you had a poor experience at the adjacent restaurant. We will make sure they see their comments. We are also working with them to improve their service.

Summary Heading: Will not return to this hotel
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights on our honeymoon and we were not satisfied with our stay. The bed was extremely uncomfortable. Our patio door would not open unless you pulled really hard and then it would make a loud noise. I was not pleased with the bathroom as the bath tub appeared to be dirty or stained with black spots. We were surprised to see that there was no hot tub at the pool. It was chilly during our stay and we wanted to use the hot tub. The breakfast was terrible. The options were not great. Also, the wifi was not great at all. The only thing we liked was that it was only 10 minutes from Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. We did just replace all the mattresses throughout the hotel and our sorry that you did not enjoy it. We hope that you were able to speak with our front desk manager during your stay so we could help resolve the issues you were experiencing. Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay.

Summary: We stayed here because it was inexpensive and only a 10-15min drive to Disneyland. The service was great and the room was wonderful. My only issue was the noise from the hallway outside the room is somewhat disruptive at night but this did not affect my positive experience in any real way. Will definitely be staying here again next time we are in Anaheim!

Hotel is very nice, the decoration of the hotel and the rooms is very nice. Spacious and well equipped room. Staff very friendly. Good location, 30 min from the airport in a quiet area. Supermarch "in front of the hotel also very convenient.

Excellent place to stay for family vacation. We enjoy our stay. Excellent customer service and housekeeping. Our kids love the swimming pool, they we're very happy. Hotel parking very convenient and accesible.

Great place. Clean and quiet.  Breakfast was a little to sweet. Not use to having so much sugar for breakfast. That's the only fault.  It's a little far from Disneyland. So if you plan to go in and out all day staying closer would be a better option

Although the tile floors were nice and appropriate to the hotel design, they aren't handicap friendly.  Neither was the bathroom.  Don't know if they have accessible rooms.  Other than that, we really liked the staff and would recommend the hotel without hesitation.

Summary Heading: Great value. It is a family hotel, due to the location, so be prepared for a lot of children.
Summary: Everything was great Except on check in the front desk person ran our charge card twice for the five night stay. That put an extra crimp in the budget. We were home on a Tuesday and the money  was not until to our account until  Thursday.

Summary Heading: The hotel-feels like home to me..
Summary: Feels like home.and the location is accesible to all...We spent our 9 nights here and we don't have complain at all.I love the kitchen inside the room we are allowed to cook,housekeeping is great almost everyday they come to clean.I found the place great and surely to be back soon...

Enjoyed the hotel and the staff was great.  Wish there was more to work with in the kitchen, though the fridge was a nice full size one.  Continental breakfast was probably the biggest disappointment.  I've had plenty of continental breakfasts and don't have high expectations of them, but this one really wasn't very good.

We enjoyed our stay at the hotel. As we were unfamiliar with Anaheim we found the location okay. There was a a Supermarket and food shops across the road.
