The front desk staff were very friendly and always willing to help. Rooms were generally quiet. Breakfast was interesting with the plastic plates and utensils.  Would recommend to friends. Good value for money.

We used to stay at the Lemon Tree, took a chance to see if this one measured up. It did, indeed. The staff was friendly, had a problem with the toliet, maintence came quickly and efficiently.  Took care of the problem.  Plan on coming again.

Older property but well maintained with helpful staff. Easy to find location with plenty of free parking. The offered continental breakfast is very limited and basic. A wider variety of food  would be much more satisfying.

The water was clogging in the Wash basin and in the bath tub. After reporting, the bath tub clog was taken care. However, Wash basin was still an issue. The wardrobes, cupboards are of vintage type. There are very small flies that were flying inside the room.. I believe its because of the plenty of plants they have in Patio and in the whole hotel complex. Break fast was average..Had very very limited choice..No Waffles, Apples or Bananas..Good part was it's near to the Disney Land and also there is a Super Market right opposite to the Hotel if you need to buy stuff  for cooking, etc..

This hotel seems like it used to be an apartment complex. Having a full kitchen & balcony was wonderful. I think the room was bigger than some apartments I've been in. There are many nice touches throughout the place. The decor is rustic Spanish with tile & statues nicely arranged. All of the staff felt genuinely happy to help.  Our room had a king bed, full closet, table/desk, smallish & older but reasonable bathroom with toiletries and a hair dryer, a couch, a balcony that looked out onto the neighboring apartments (still a nice touch tho), and a full kitchen with a regular refrigerator instead of a mini-fridge. The kitchen was stocked with plates, utensils, and pots. One morning we awoke to the lovely smell of bacon as a nearby room must have been cooking it. There is no

Place was very nice .. the rooms were very cute and kid friendly great location comfy and clean. No major issues wish the free breakfast was better had no meat or eggs just cereal donuts toast yogurt and a little fruit also like not real orange juice which was odd but overall would def stay again. Great place and great value

Summary Heading: Great location for a Disney Vacation
Summary: Although this location is not super close to Disney it was a 5 minute drive with easy freeway access and the full kitchen was well worth the additional distance.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast could have been a bit better...adding a waffle maker and having bowls and plates that could transport back to the rooms would be great.  We will definitely stay here again on our next Disney vacation.
Manager Response: So glad you will be back! Thanks so much for the helpful feedback. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. Excellent customer service. The beds were very comfortable, clean bathroom and kitchen. overall it was value for money. We strongly recommend for a family on a budget!

great value for the dollar. staff was always friendly,breakfast was adequate. would return there if going back not many resturants real close. you definitly need a car. rooms were clean and bright. not fancy but fine. staff was able to assist wiyh answering questions and directions.

I stayed in this hotel with my family. It was very clean and well maintained. Location wise it is great. The best part was the patio attached to the room. overall it is a great value for your money. I would strongly recommend this hotel

I had a great stay. Didn't get to use the swimming pool was too busy spending time with family. Woke up too late to enjoy the continental breakfast. Overall stay was great, staff was great. Will definitely stay there if I travel to Anaheim again.

We were very happy with the location of the hotel.  We loved the fact that it's not a big chain hotel with hundreds of rooms.  Our room was spacious, well- appointed, and comfortable.  It's hard to beat having a kitchen and private patio!  We would definitely stay again should we need a hotel in the Anaheim area.  The staff was very friendly, helpful and professional.

It was average.. I read a review stating that if someone checks in during the middle of the night you can hear everything, it is very true. I could hear someone rolling their suitcase around 2:30 in the morning.. not a pleasant wake up call. Not only that the lights in the hallway do shine through underneath your room door. It was a bit bothersome. I probably would have spent a little more to stay somewhere else. The area surrounding the hotel is ok... it's nothing spectacular. The bed was average.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We will make sure to check the door to your room so that it is meeting the floor properly. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: We like the hotel really convenient to a Mariscos restaurant by the way is really good we are planning to come back to the hotel we like the rustic look and kitchen in the room really close to everything

My Family and I stayed here for a disneyland trip for a week and it was great...just 10 min away and away from traffic! Kitchen was awesome , patio was great to have and just perfect for my kids and I.

I loved it  the room very spacious very quiet at night slept really good my only thing was our stove did not work but I mean I could have went and told them and I didn't receptionist was very nice housekeeping is very nice it's a great place to stay at for the price that you pay

Need hooks in bathroom. Towels were hung but replaced anyway. Breakfast was terrible. Balcony was nice. Bed was comfortable. Everything a little worn down--needs face lift. Bathroom particularly difficult to use
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel . We appreciate your helpful feedback. We will check your room immediately to make sure it is meeting our standards. We are happy that you enjoyed the balcony and comfortable bed. We will use your comments to make sure we improve our service.

Summary: We have enjoyed the Hotel Pepper over the last several years, because it is pet friendly.  Having the kitchen and patio is a great help as our travels are often for medical reasons at the Anaheim Memorial.

Started off great the girls for check-in were very sweet the room was clean bathroom is very small . Breakfast is unwrapped donuts & bagels and cereal so ok I guess. The guys at desk need improvement! When asking for a couple more washcloths they said "why how many days are you staying " and we never got any. Pool is beautiful. For the size I'd say the price needs to come down. Especially since you have to drive everywhere. Was very quiet stay though that's a plus .
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are so happy you enjoyed the pool area and your quiet room. We will make sure to work with our front desk staff immediately to improve their service. Thanks again for your review. We will use them to improve our hotel.

Summary: Most things were good. The wifi was spotty and a woman at the front desk did not check to see if my employer had sent a credit card authorization so I had to call them even though they did submit one.

Nice Hotel, but the breakfast was a disappointment. I didn't use the pool, but it's small. The rooms a nice and comfortable. The service is very kind and friendly. The hotel would be much better with a really good breakfast – for me, it was the worst in 2 weeks in different hotels (most of the cheaper).
Manager Response: Thank so much for the helpful comments. We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and staff. We are working with the restaurant to improve their service.

Summary: We've stayed at many places in anaheim now, taking our kiddo to disney. We typically prefer AirBnBs but we'd only stay here from now on! For the money, you can't beat it! Such a nice room, with all the amenities of an airbnb, and actually cheaper!

Great place, friendly and effective employees, great kitchen, bedroom, and bathroom amenities. It was about a 5 minute trip to Disneyland and about a 10 minute trip to a local park. We had a comfortable stay, though the wifi was fairly weak and the continental breakfast lacked protein options. Would recommend to friends and family.

Cozy room, just like staying at home. The relatively quiet ambient enables a sound sleep. Their keeping voice down policy after 10pm helps maintain a quality staying atmosphere. Nice kitchen facilities, including a microwave, a stove and a big freezer etc, add additional living comfort. Of course, they serve the compatatively best continental breakfest there.

This place was great for the price. The location isn't the best, but I found this hotel to be a little gem. I love that each room has a patio and a kitchenette. Also the staff was really friendly and the rooms were clean.

When I asked about providing a baby bed for our son via email after I booked the room, I was (after several weeks) informed that they had upgraded us to a bigger room upstairs which would provide sufficient room to accomodate us and our son and that they would provide a kid's pen for him, which I found really nice. However, when we arrived we were given a basic and quite dark room downstairs, next to the reception. No pen and no upgrade whatsoever.  The room was clean. The bathroom was very small and old (but clean). The breakfast looked good, as there was fresh fruit, yoghurt, cereals, toast and a selection of bagels, donuts, etc. Unfortunately the bagel my son chose was moldy, so we did not really enjoy our breakfast... All in all I was a little disappointed, especially as it
Manager Response: We are so sorry that we did not meet your expectations or provide our best service during the stay. We are so sorry for the poor experience you had at the restaurant.  We will make sure to talk with all of our staff and use your comments to improve our hotel.

Summary Heading: our stay at a pepper Tree
Summary: My son had stayed here before and I will have to say out of all the places from Las Vegas,  CA, OR, Washington,  Utah, this was the nicest place and many were more expensive.  I plan to put the pics on my Facebook page to help you out.  Regards, Sheryl Westmark

A wonderful stay. Location great, pool refreshing and best french vanilla at breakfast ever! Only complaint which is not the hotels fault was the people above us slammed doors and were very loud a couple nights but over all super happy.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review and helpful feedback! Come back again soon!

Summary: My husband and I had a very nice time at the Hotel Pepper Tree. Everything was great. I have no complaints. The staff is great, everybody is really nice.  And they have a great service. I would definitely  recommend it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! Come back soon.

Summary: Very comfortable and clean, kitchen had most amenities.  Cleaning staff were very accommodating and rooms were  clean.  The location is within easy driving distance to Disneyland.  Front staff were excellent.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: So glad that you will be back! Thanks for the helpful review.

Summary: We stay in pepper tree from 10/may to 14/May. We have a terrible experience y will never come back to this hostel. why is terrible: - the "continental breakfast" is a joke. - when we arrived all the dishes was wet. - we saw a mouse in the patio (we stay in first floor)  - we smashed a spider in the wall next to the bed. - the housekeeping didnt do our bedroom one day (and we left the paper in the door)  - is a old establishment so you Hear all the noises I still waiting a call from the manager, and a refund for all the problems.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you did not receive our best during your visit. Our manager, Rick, did reach out to you and left a message. We do hope that you return our call so we can help you. We are sorry that our breakfast did not meet your expectations. We are working with the restaurant to improve their service. We have also worked extensively with our our pest management service to make sure the exterior of our property is pest free. We will make sure to use all your comments to better our hotel Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay.

Summary: I booked 2 queen rooms that are connected.  When I arrived there they didn't have it available and give me 2 rooms next to each other.  However,  they were able to give me 2 king bed connected rooms and provided a roll out bed. If not,  I would not have recommend this hotel.  However,  the gentlemen in the front desk tried to correct the action so in the end I was happy with that.
Manager Response: We are sorry that there was confusion about the room type that you booked. Unfortunately when you book through a 3rd party, you will not received the best information - this is what happened in your case. You did reserve two rooms side-by-side. That is what we had available to you at the time of check-in. We are happy that we were to help you get another type of room that was adjoining. Again, we are sorry that the 3rd party did not give you the correct information.

Summary Heading: Could be better place to stay with improvements
Summary: This is a good basic place to stay and affordable for families looking for a SoCal vacation spot that's convenient to both Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm.  The kitchenette (stove, microwave, sink and refrigerator) are handy for longer stays.  There's a basic continental breakfast included at the co-located restaurant and you can upgrade to hot breakfast items at an affordable $6-8 extra.  Wifi (albeit weak wifi) and parking are also complimentary onsite.  We were given a third floor room which is preferable if you can get it.  Our room had a noticeable musty odor once you turned off the A/C unit.  There's a great fresh breeze that can waft in from the balcony facing Lincoln Avenue, but will be noisy from the street traffic and there is no screen door so bugs and birds can fly
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed our convenient location and our full kitchens. We will make sure our management teams see s your comments, and we will use them to improve the service throughout the hotel. Thanks again the thorough review.

Summary: I stay at this hotel with my son whenever we are in the Anaheim area. It's a bit away from the Disney parks, but the price and full kitchen is worth it. I make eggs in the morning, pack a lunch, and then cook dinner at night, which makes for a very economical vacation. And parking is free!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoy the full kitchen! It is such a great way to save money while visiting the theme parks. Thanks for being repeat guests.

Summary: The room is a good size and the kitchen makes the stay even better. The staff is excellent. We had a few minor issues and had them taken care of within the hour of being reported.  The staff was always considerate and friendly, at all hours.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your room with full kitchen and our helpful staff! Thanks for the review.

Summary: I loved the decor and our little patio. Would be a 5 if the rooms were not so noisy . Could hear every time water was turned on anywhere around us. All comings and goings down the entire hallway. But the staff was great and the hotel itself had a great vibe .
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our boutique charm. Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will use them to better our service and rooms.

Summary: We spent a good time in the instalations, personal was excellent attention, the room was clear and confortable, the kitchen worked properly, we had a lot of space in the parking lot and everyday breakfast was delicious.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for those looking to stay on a budget
Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree was an awesome hotel for the price, if you book through them you can get great deals on their rooms, even better than some travel sites. When my wife and I arrived, the front desk service was exceptional, the room was clean and ready to go almost 1.5 hours early for us. Great service there. The kitchen was just the right size, be aware that they only provide minimal cooking and dinnerware (it was just the 2 of us so we were fine, but you might want to bring more). The swimming pool was always kept clean and was very refreshing, no hot tub, which would have been a nice addition. The room service was great, although we do believe that they were eating some of our theme park snacks.... can't confirm this, but routinely found our snacks opened after we had closed
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your thorough and helpful feedback. Thanks also for the recommendations.  Even though we do not believe that any of our staff would tamper with a guest's belongings, we have talked with our housekeeping staff regarding your comments. We are also working with the restaurant to improve their service during continental breakfast. Thanks again for the helpful comments and review.

Summary: Very quaint and comfy!  Enjoyed the courtyard patio. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the location was perfect! All the fountains and tiles added to the charm. The pool was large and clean with the cutest turtle fountains! Loved our stay and will be back!
Manager Response: So happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm! We will be so happy to have you back. Thanks for the review!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with atmosphere!
Summary: I picked this hotel because of the atmosphere and quaintness from the online pictures as well as the good reviews.  It was very convenient to the family I was visiting.  Quiet, clean, comfortable.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: So happy that you will be back and that you enjoyed our boutique charm! Thanks for the review.

Summary: Very cute hotel! Clean and incredibly convenient for a longer stay.  The rooms are essentially studio apartments, with full kitchens and utensils. Very clean and charming.  The property has a homey spanish hacienda feel to it. It is a  bit away from attractions/convention center.
Manager Response: Love to be your home away from home! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Check in was a lengthy event. The receptionist was methodical but slow.  First hiccup was I did not have my credit card that I had done the reservation with. Then the copying of my ID was a slow process plus as slow with getting the info on the card I was carrying. I had booked 2 rooms. They insisted the guest in the 2nd room come to reception to identify herself and have her ID copied When I booked the 1st room, all the do's and dont's were explained in excruciating detail to me. The receptionist then insisting in doing the same to the occupant of the 2nd room. All told a 30 minute check in.  After that it got better. Rooms were clean and comfortable. The included continental breakfast was better then average.  If they sort out that slow check in, I will go back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the helpful feedback. We are sorry for the inconvenience you experienced at check-in. We are currently training some new front desk staff members but will make sure to use your comments to improve our service. So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Everything was really good I enjoyed this hotel and will recommend to family and friends. I will definitely return to hotel pepper tree when I return to anaheim again. Great service nice staff everything was great.
Manager Response: So thankful for your recommendations! Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Room 102 - Next to Hotel Lobby - Too Close
Summary: Came back exhausted from Disneyland around 9PM and was given this room. Could hear kids, suitcase wheels rolling across the tile floor, etc at all hours of the night.  The room was clean, but couldn't sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are sorry that had trouble sleeping. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and will see how we can improve the noise issue for that room. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: the breakfast was already picked through when we arrived at 9am.  the bed was comfortable  and the free parking was a plus.  i liked the convenient location to shops and gas stations as well as our basketball tournament venue
Manager Response: Thank so much for your helpful feedback. We are sorry that you had a poor experience at the restaurant and will work with them to improve their service. So glad you enjoyed our amenities and locations.

Summary: Really nice room for the night. The balcony was great there were couple chairs outside. The room was spacious and the bathroom area was great. Huge closet was a nice touch. It was overall great stay!!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your quick stay! Come back for longer next time.

Summary: This hotel has Very cool decor.  The front lobby is nice and very inviting. The Room was average. The room smelled like marijuana. I don't know if it was from another guest or what. Continental breakfast was kind of weak.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm. But, we are very sorry for the smell of smoke from another guest. We very strictly enforce a non-smoking policy throughout the hotel and even on the balconies. We are sorry that another guest did not comply with our policies and made your stay uncomfortable. Please make sure to notify the front desk of this issue in the future so we can stop it immediately.

Summary: Hotel was very good, but the breakfast we skipped after one time. Choice was very limited and variety was below basic. Unfortunately the level of breakfast was definitely not as how it was rated by booking.com. Usually I am ok with a basic breakfast, but here it was less.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and our sorry that the continental breakfast did not meet your expectations. We will make sure that the restaurant sees your comments and that our management team looks into solutions to fix this. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Extremely poor breakfast and the beds are very uncomfortable. Location is okay if you are here for Disneyland. They keep the place clean but needs major update.it looks like the place is falling apart
Manager Response: We are sorry that you did not thoroughly enjoy your stay. We have replaced all the mattress throughout the hotel this spring and usually receive  great remarks on how comfortable they are. We are constantly making upgrades throughout our property and our sorry that you did not enjoy our boutique charm.

Summary: The place is nice and comfortable. It is recommended if you're planing on staying for a couple of days. The kitchen is suppilied with many stuff and the room is very clean I have had recommended many people to stay at hotel pepper tree
Manager Response: Thank so much for the recommendations! So glad you enjoyed your stay and full kitchen.

Summary: This is truly a hidden little gem. Located in a great spot- not too far from Buena Park either. Kitchenette has everything you need to prepare a meal, grocery store nearby for all your shopping needs. Hotel may not look like much from the outside, but it is absolutely gorgeous inside. Great decor, comfortable beds, attentive staff. Really enjoyed our stay and looking forward to staying again.

Summary Heading: First time and definitely not the last
Summary: The room was cute and cozy.  The a/c was brand new and great for those hot Cali nights.  The hotel itself has a great vibe to it.  The only thing that was not up to par was the continental breakfast.  Apart from that great place to stay!

I enjoyed my stay at the Pepper Tree.  It was very comfortable and an easy drive to the Anaheim Convention Center for a conference I was attending.  I would gladly stay there again.  The tile floors in the hallway and part of the room were very nice.  The room was quiet and had a nice balcony.

Summary Heading: good quality in cost point of view
Summary: I'd like to visit again. For Disneyland, it's the one of the best lodge. (It's about 10 min.) If you have a babies, it'll be a good place to visit Disneyland. (Of course it's good place in quality versus cost point of view.)

Summary Heading: Great Value for a Nice Room
Summary: A little further away from DisneyLand, but only a few extra miles away. Great beds, interesting rooms. Staff is excellent. Quiet, away from the main road. I will visit this hotle again. Parking is no problem at any time day or night.

Great location for going to disney. We had a room with a kitchen so we could save money on food. Worked out great. The kitchen was supper tiny, and they had the basics. Although no pans for baking with. The fridge was loud but served its purpose, even with tje bottom broken shelf. The beds were ok, not the worse I've slept on. Everything was really clean exsept for the tub which i think was stained. They had a leak while we were there in the hall, but they were on top of it and had it all fixed in a couple of days. Thats includding the replacement of the carpet.  Really cute place and well worth the money. The staff was super nice. Just bring your own pool towls if you plan on spending time in the pool.

Hotel Pepper Tree is a super quick drive to the Disney parks, and the parking at the hotel is free. The outdoor pool is fun for the kids. Having a full kitchen is an excellent way to stay frugal and healthy during your stay, and there's a Ralph's grocery a few minutes drive away and a Mexican grocery directly across the street. All of these factors plus the excellent rates make Hotel Pepper Tree perfect for families.

My wife and I really enjoyed staying at the Pepper Tree Hotel. It was very clean and comfortable. There was no excessive noise and the staff was very congenial!  We did not visit the swimming pool but it did look inviting. My wife who is from Peru really enjoyed it because everything was so clean. We were provided fresh towels as needed. I was able to use the internet service provided a couple of different times. Overall I would recommend this hotel to everyone because it was so comfortable. Also it was only about 4 miles to Disneyland which was the main reason why we stayed there.

Good stay for 1 night.  Breakfast looked like someone dumped a bunch of Hostess Gems out for you to eat.  Fruit bowls were pretty much picked through and empty for the most part, We went and got breakfast somewhere else
Manager Response: Thanks for you comments. We are working with the restaurant to improve their breakfast selection. We hope you enjoyed your room and our customer service.

Summary: Loved the decor and feel of this sweet little oasis! Clean and comfortable with a nice little pool to cool off in, it was a great Disneyland base for us with the kitchenette and awesome grocery store across the street!!

Stay length: 3 nights  Location: Excellent for Disney, opposite a super market, and a short drive to some great eateries.   Arrival: Checked in no problem, staff friendly.  Room: A little dated and tired in places, but clean and spacious.  Cleanliness: Very good.  Price: Reasonable for that area and quality.   Additional pluses: Asked for a quiet high room when booking which we got. As it was the first leg of our honeymoon we were greeted with a balloon, card, chocolates and wine when we entered the room which was a really nice touch.  Negatives: Minor for us, but the wifi is a little hit and miss at times. This may be because we were right at the end.  We would go back and advise to others.

We've stayed here before and didn't have a problem. This time wasn't as comfortable. One of the burners on the electric stove didn't work, the bigger one too:/ There were rusty knives, and we didn't have a table to eat at which is usually in front of the tv. We had to move the desk table over to eat on it. The bed felt extra stiff/firm. Maybe it's just the rooms on the bottom floor that are this way??
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We always appreciate the comments from our repeat guests, and we hope you had time to mention these items to the front desk during your stay.  We will make sure to check your kitchen and room issues immediately.

Summary: This hotel was very nice for a 3 star hotel.  The beds were very comfortable.  The front desk people were very nice.  I really enjoyed the balcony.  It had a full size kitchen and the television worked great.  Also room service did a good job at cleaning our room.  However, I gave it a 3 1/2 star because I don't think it is a very safe place to stay with children.  We didn't feel threatened, but the stairs to the upstairs were right when you entered (without a door), so there was no security.  The hotel is rather old too, and the air conditioner was very noisy.  My grandchildren made me turn it off at night.  The street noise was also very loud and there didn't appear to be much insulation in the walls.  We could hear people in the hallway as well.  Would I stay here again?  Not
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and full kitchen in the room. We will make sure to check the AC in your room immediately because they should be very quiet. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to use it to better our hotel.

Summary: Wifi was so slow and kicked us out all the time. Beds horrible, Shower pressure nonexistent, no seal on hall door. You can hear everything in the halls. Breakfast people where very rude. Food had mold.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will look into the issues you had with your room immediately.  We hope you talked with our front desk manager during stay so we could help you immediately.

Summary: I will never stay in this hotel bad service relly ugly rooms too.cable goes only at certain hour . the kitchen is very old cabinets are all faithed refrigerator is all with mold never in my life will stay here and i reserved with month. Ahead sopoused to stay close to my sisters room and the day we got there they said it was a mistake .
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We are sorry that your rooms were not right next door to each other but you were still on the same floor very close to each other. We have inspected your room and there is no mold on or near the fridge. Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoy your stay.

Summary: I was also very kind to us who do not understand English. The staff were also very kind to the children. So, we were able to stay at ease. There is a supermarket in front of the hotel. And next to that there is a convenience store so it is very convenient for family traveling bu travel.
Manager Response: So glad you found our staff friendly and helpful! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Found this property on Trip Advisor and booked this property due to ratings. Stayed here for a Dental Convention in Anaheim. Enjoyed our room with the kitchenette, conveniently located off of the I-5 with restaurant on the premises. Pool area could use an upgrade with chairs and umbrellas and jacuzzi, especially since we were walking all day at  the big Convention Center. Don't forget to bring the credit card/debit card you made your reservations with, we were almost not able to check in because of this; even though we already paid for the room. Other than that, we just needed 2 extra pillows. Also, my only other suggestion is to put a security gate with card access at the base of the stairwell at the west end / street side. Other than that would return.

The hotel was as pictured and overall it was a nice stay. It was curious that the stove was a gas stove when there were no matches provided. The continental breakfast was also lacking, considering the quality of the rest of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review the hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We do have gas stoves that ignite without the need for matches. We hope that you were able to ask our front desk for help. Thanks for your helpful feedback. We will make sure to use it to better our hotel and continental breakfast.

Summary: Great spot close to Disney. Great amenities for the price!! We have a toddler and the sliding door in our original room was not latching properly. They quickly got us in another room without a problem. Loved having the kitchenette. Great atmosphere on the property and the bed was very comfortable. The complimentary breakfast leaves a bit to be desired but it's free food.

Hotel Pepper Tree is average. The facilities are dated and the hotel needs a good deep cleaning. The light fixture in the bathroom was rusted. The light fixture in the hotel room had exposed wire nuts. There was no light switch to shut off the balcony light. The hotel WiFi had a policy that if you use over 10mb a day they reserve the right to charge you. It was hard to find the front door to the hotel, it's in the middle of the building on the South side.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to immediately check your room for the issues you mentioned. We do not have a fee for our WiFi. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: First time in California. This hotel set standards high for when I return. Area was amazing, a lot of food places to eat and convenient stores and grocery stores just minutes away, could even walk if wanted.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but a few let downs
Summary: The hotel room was nice enough - although the floor was really dirty. ( our feet were filthy after walking barefoot on the tiles after a shower). We had none or very little at best Wi-Fi and were told by staff that there were black out areas in the hotel but we could stand out the front of the hotel where the access was good !!! ( we relied on having internet access for our daughter to do her overseas schoolwork) The toilet didn't always flush and the shower took about half an hour to drain ach time it was used. On a good note - the beds were very comfy - although the bed for our 15 year old daughter had no pillows so I had to go to reception to ask for some ( even though we booked and paid for three adults)
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are sorry for the issues you experienced. We are making improvements to our WiFi to keep up with the ever increasing demand and areas that did not receive the best signal. We will make sure to check your room immediately to inspect the bathroom and floors. We do provide 4 pillows for each bed and extra pillows in the closet but are sorry if some were missing. Thanks again for your comments. We will make sure all of staff will see them so we can improve our service.

Summary: We had a wonderful time.  My wife and I didn't know what to expect in this hotel but was pleasantly surprised when we where dropped off. It was 1:30 in the morning and seeing our room so clean and welcome was a very welcome sight. Thank you.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations! Come back again soon.

Summary: We were impressed by the decor, cleanliness and comfort at Pepper Tree.  The pool was fab - pool towels available.  Kitchen and bathroom facilities good.  Beds super comfy - what you need after a day at Disneyland.  Breakfast in the restaurant in the car-park was appalling - poor quality food, limited options and surly service - which was disappointing.  Other than that - I would recommend Pepper Tree - just BYO breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed your room and the pool. We are sorry that the continental breakfast was disappointing. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and works with our restaurant staff to make improvements.

Summary: Super nice and clean hotel. You get a full kitchen which is awesome for longer trips, like I took, to be able to get drinks and save leftovers. Would definitely recommend for longer stays or stays with big groups. We typically use embassy suites for our shorter trips mainly because it's closer to the parks, besides that this hotel beats embassy in all other categories.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and our full kitchens!

Summary: The hotel had everything we were looking for: close to Disneyland (13 minute drive), clean, affordable, free wifi/breakfast, pool and kitchen. We booked it early and got a really cheap rate which helped make the trip to Disneyland achievable. Very adorable cute cozy hotel. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thanks for the thumbs up! Glad to hear that we were a perfect fit for your Disneyland getaway. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel was wonderful, the service good, the discounts on the Disney tickets appreciated.  My only complaint was the noise level in the room in the morning due to traffic.  The patio window was not well sealed and was only a single pane glass.  I would suggest these be replaced by newer double pane vinyl windows that are much more air tight and quiet.

Overall stay was ok, We went to the pool and it was not heated like they stated it would be. We told staff and they said they had not control and could not do anything about it.  What i did like however is that housekeeping doesn't bother you at early hours.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your room and the staff.  Our pool is heated to the standard temperature but will notify our pool staff regarding your comments. Thanks again for your helpful suggestions.

Summary: Room has a small kitchenette with full size refrigerator and stove with oven.  Market across the street makes it convenient to shop, although I didn't cook while there, but did fill the refrigerator with beverages and water.  Plenty of room for seating, chairs in room and balcony to enjoy a drink outside.  I would definately boot again for the price and ammenities.

Summary Heading: Love the studio, hate the WiFi
Summary: We had a great time, lovely pool,  but was an able to use the Wi-Fi even know they had multiple logins none of them seemed to give us enough bars.  Other than that we liked the patio and the kitchen (Bring your own dish soap)

Summary Heading: Worth the money for an extended vacation!
Summary: Very happy with our stay at Pepper Tree.  Friendly staff, great housekeeping and there is a restaurant available should you not want to use the built-in kitchen.  There is a minor issue.  Our room had no dining table.  You can make do on the coffee table.  Centrally located to Disney and Knotts.  Would certainly stay there again.

Summary Heading: A good value for the money.
Summary: This was our second stay at your facility and we were very pleased with the upgrades to the room.  In addition to the lighter walls and ceiling, the new cabinets and appliances really lightened up the room.  It would be beneficial to have a few more instructions for the air conditioning unit.  Also, a mattress topper would make sleeping much more comfortable, the mattress was extremely firm and made sleeping a bit difficult.  The staff were wonderful.  Friendly, courteous and very helpful.  A super group of people.  Thanks for everything you did to make our stay a pleasurable one.

Clean rooms and excellent service.Close to Disneyworld... but there is nothing sort of continental breakfast available as offered...read it as except bread and milk nothing good is available as part of their complimentary service
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed the room and our hotel staff. We are sorry that our continental breakfast did not meet your expectation. We will make sure the restaurant and our management team sees your comments.

Summary: Decent location, nice grocery store across the street, beds comfortable, nice balcony, 10 minute drive to Disney, Honda Centre, Angels Stadium and Disney. Older style hotel. Breakfast is just typical continental. They wouldn't change us from one king bed to 2 queens, the wifi was horrible. No lotion in the bathrooms. Average hotel. Nothing terrible, nothing great.
Manager Response: So glad that you enjoyed our convenient location. Do to availability, we were unable to change your room type from the original room you had booked. We are sorry for the poor WiFi you had and are making upgrades to our service throughout the hotel. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to us it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Absolutely loved our stay and got a great rate!
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised when we finally checked in, pictures did not do it justice! Very comfortable and plenty of space for our family of 4. Disappointed we were too busy to really enjoy it but will be back again!!

Summary Heading: Clean, family friendly! Stayed here multiple times for our Disneyland vacations! Love it!
Summary: Love the kitchenette, able to bring milk and fruit for our toddler. Beds are comfortable! We usually don't need maid service when we stay. They have always been accommodating! Always parking available. Quiet rooms, family friendly!

Summary Heading: Great little hotel with lots of charm
Summary: Love the atmosphere of this unique hotel. Wonderfully clean, with excellent service. Rooms are super, with private patios or balconies and full kitchen amenities. Bathrooms are a little small and tired but again, very clean. Wish they actually adhered to their own request to reuse towels as mine were changed daily despite hanging them up. Also no need to change out the soap every day. Wi-fi is painfully slow, making working from the room a bit of a challenge. Also, I would gladly pay for a better breakfast at the restaurant. Pretty meager as it is. Overall though, fantastic service from the front desk, especially Taylor, and I would recommend this hotel and come back myself.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our boutique charm!We love Taylor too. Thanks for the helpful feedback.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great location to Disneyland, nice big and clean rooms, very helpful staff members. Lovely pool and BBQ area. We liked that the supermarket is across the street, the kitchen is well equipped. It was really nice to have a balcony too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We are so glad you enjoyed your room and the helpful staff.

Summary Heading: Fun place, convenient location, great amenities
Summary: Got a hotel instead of staying with friends this time and this was perfect! Close to Disney, little kitchen for cooking, comfy bed, plenty of hot water in the shower, lovely homey feel. All I needed and then some!

Front desk asked for my drivers license twice. Did not return it to me second time. Spent 30 minutes looking for the next morning. Front desk could have let us know they had it. Would have saved us soo much grief and wasted time. Not a good way to start your day.
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the incident with your driver's license. We will make sure to talk to our front desk staff about this. We hop you were able to talk to our front desk manager about your complaint.

Summary: It was so nice to find this little oasis in the city. Not far from Disneyland at all. Also close to other great restaurants. The staff is so friendly and everyone I encountered at the front desk was patient and knowledgeable. Everyone was so friendly and now I know where I'm staying every time I'm in Anaheim.

Nice clean comfortable room with a full kitchen, even including dishes and pots and pans and a tea kettle, coffee maker, microwave and full size refrigerator/freezer. Big closets with mirrors which was really nice for getting ready for an event. Nice tile floors. Seating area was very comfortable and so was the bed. Pool area with a large grill for guests to use. We will stay there again when we visit Disneyland.  Nicer place to stay with a short drive to the park.  Love the little water features at the entrance.  Hope we get to stay there again SOON !  Thank You for a lovely stay.

Summary Heading: Will Stay There Again And Again
Summary: This place it truly a hidden gem.  The staff was amazing.  The rooms were nice and clean.  The decor and style of the rooms and the entire hotel looked really.  I felt like home there, not in a generic hotel room.

Nice spanish style hotel. Room was bigger than usual. Full kitchen with full size fridge and big size balcony. Really nice experience. Close too shops, supermarket,... breackfast is a little bit the cons of the stay. If you stay like me a whole week, you will have the same food everyday. Don't need to be fancy, but should vary more. But overall really good experience!!

My husband and I stayed a total of 5 nights at Hotel Peppertree and were very impressed. Its lush foliage keeps it secluded from the noisy Lincoln traffic, and the small fountain at the front of the building encourages serenity. Great place to stay, especially because of the price!  Only complaint is the thin walls and cheap bedding.

The huge we're really confortable, the room was big and clean. Really liked, the location is perfect for how is going to Disneyland. will for sure come back next time I go to Disneyland :) Thank you for the amazing stay
Manager Response: Can't wait to have you back again! Thanks for the great review. We are so happy that you found the room clean, comfortable and  convenient.

Summary: The staff were extremely friendly. The carpets and floors in the room were not the cleanest compared to other hotels. Room was a little "tired" but pretty good overall. Some updates should be made to the bathroom and perhaps new carpeting or a good cleaning would make this rating outstanding.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback.  We love to hear that our staff was friendly. We are inspecting your room immediately to make sure it is meeting our standards. We are in the process of making updates in our bathrooms throughout the hotel. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It was my second time at Hotel Pepper Tree and the staff impressed me with their professionalism and dedication to provide a comfortable and enjoyable experience. We chose the hotel due to their close proximity to Disneyland and reasonable prices. The rooms were large and well furnished and comfortable. More importantly, they have fantastic people working for them. From booking the hotel, several revisions to our plans, and finally staying there, everything was taken care of. I am most grateful that Misty spent hours, even after work hours, trying to get Disneyland tickets for us on a peak day so that our holiday would not be ruined. That's what I call service that is above and beyond. Once again, excellent service and a wonderful place in Anaheim. I will certainly be back.
Manager Response: Wow! We love Misty too. We so appreciate hearing from our repeat guests and are so happy that you came back. Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Unexpected how great this lovely hotel is.....the grounds are well kept, vibrant colorful flowers welcoming in front and on balconies, lobby and hallway decor nice, rooms accommodating and spacious , comfortable place
Manager Response: So happy you had a comfortable stay! Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Anaheim away from the Disney hotels
Summary: A very nice hotel that was away from the Disney crowds around the Park but still close enough to the convention center.  Nice room with kitchen facilities and pet friendly.  Enjoyed our stay.         xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Manager Response: Glad you (and your pet) enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the helpful review.

Summary: I had forgotten about this gem.   Rooms are spacious with a full kitchen.  Only couple miles from Disneyland and plenty of parking.  Front desk host was very friendly and helpful.  Upon arrival at our room the detector was beeping.  A quick call to the front desk resolved this in a timely manner.  Also the AC doesn't have those motion sensor devices on them, so our room was nice a cold upon arrival.
Manager Response: Thanks for coming back! So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Not close enough to Disneyland to make it worth staying here for that trip, but less than 10 mins from Knotts Berry Farm. Very charming hotel with large rooms. The free continental breakfast is pretty lacking though. Great Mexican market across the street.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are located right in between Disneyland (3.5 miles) and Knott's Berry Farm (3 miles).  We are working on some big changes to our continental breakfast. We hope you come again to see the improvements.

Summary: We would stay there again. Everything was very lovely. The staff was friendly and everything was great. Very close to the fwy and stores. We went to Disneyland and it was really close and covienant. Good price and great stay! Thank you.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and our convenient location.

Summary: Everything was great, only problem the wifi didn't work sometimes and the kitchen stove top didn't work or just didn't have gas.  But everything else was great and can't wait to come back. also would be great if you had waffles included with the breakfast.  But overal this place is the best.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for the helpful feedback. We are looking into your stove top issues immediately.

Summary: I was never informed that there was a $200 deposit for the room incidents and damages until I was ckecking in.  Upon getting this separate charge, I went to check the room and what I found was a door blind that had 1 blade of the blind cut off and hanging, so I went back to the front desk and advised them of what I found, they said they would make a note on my account.  I have not had any communication regarding my deposit, except that it will be refunded 2 weeks after my departure.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. Because the room was not paid with a credit card, a $200 security deposit was required. We do mention everywhere that a credit card is required to reserve the room.  The security deposit is refunded at the time of check-out.  We are sorry for any confusion that happened regarding our check-in policies.

Summary: The price was what got us here but we should have spent more and stayed somewhere else. The hotel is an old spanish style property which is ok but being old it feels dirty. It wasn't dirty but it could use a refresh. We came back late one night and found housekeeping had taken our towels and not left anymore. We called the front desk and were brought towels and told they had run out and were having to get them from other rooms. The breakfast was terrible. Very bland cereal and mini donuts. The front desk was very friendly. Parking was easy. The kitchen was lacking many basic utensils. If a hotel has a full kitchen I tend to expect things like measuring cups. It had place settings for 4 and a few very basic pots and pans. Luckily we didn't plan to cook much but the one breakfast
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your honest and helpful feedback. We are working on major changes to our continental breakfast. We will also work with our housekeeping team to make sure our rooms are being adequately stocked with towels and kitchen supplies. We are sorry that we did not quite meet your expectations but will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Front desk staff was friendly and helpful. Overall property was quaint/charming/enchanting with lush landscaping, trickling water fountains, and inviting decor. Building is older but has been updated. Room was spacious, functional, clean; spacious balcony overlooking the parking lot had table & chairs- able to hear the fountain downstairs. Kitchenette had older appliances, but they were all clean and functional; dishes & utensils were clean. There was a TV with basic channels- we would have liked to have a DVD player. Wifi worked well for simple browsing- did not try to stream anything. Bed was very firm, pillows were plush. There was also a large table useful for eating at or as a desk. Bathroom itself was small, but functional and clean; the area leading to the bathroom had a

It has a large parking lot. Pool is small. It is good for kids. Close to Target and Walmart. Just some of rooms have those pretty red flowers in their balcony. Totally, it is good place to stay with its rate.

Clean, parking area, location, laundry and supermaket near by, 10 min away from Disneyland and other interesting sites. Kitchen in the room just perfect with anything you need to cook, fridge, microwave.. Would recommend this hotel without hesitation to anybody.

Loved the patio, large room with kitchen, nearby amenities (market), and getting some distance from the main Disney location but only short Lyft ride away   Room/furniture could use a lick of paint.  Gave the continental breakfast a pass, too heavy on the starch food group. Overall very pleasant property, excellent service, and great value.

This was an easy pick for being so close to Disneyland. The drive to Disney is roughly two turns and your in the Disney parking lot. Knotts is just a couple blocks away. You can walk to the grocery store just across the street and load up on everything you'll need for cooking.

Summary Heading: Great place if you are going to Disney Land
Summary: We have stayed here 2x both times we have gone to DisneyLand. It is like 3.5 miles away. We always go to  Subway to get our lunch before we hit Disney. I am very sensitive to sound and the traffic noise could be loud but if the air is on the white noise cancels it out. The staff was friendly, the rooms have a stove, microwave, and large refrigerator. It does have free breakfast from the restaurant  in front of the hotel-not great food-but we all found something to eat.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We love to hear from our repeat guests! Can't wait to have you back again.

Summary: We have been back to Hotel Pepper Tree 4 times and it is our absolute favourite. The decor makes for a lovely atmosphere. The full kitchens are absolutely wonderful to have each morning. We were able to spend some time in the pool on our most recent trip, and it was so beautiful and peaceful; a perfect relaxation. The beds are also so comfy! The front desk staff is incredibly kind and helpful with anything we need. They also now offer a deal on DIsneyland tickets which we definitely used! The hotel is not too far from the parks at all. This hotel is so peaceful and lovely, we are already looking forward to coming back again.
Manager Response: Wow! Love that you have stayed with us 4 times! Thanks for the review. Glad you were able to use our discounted Disneyland tickets.

Summary: The hotel was really nice. The staff was friendly and the location is excellent. The Continental breakfast was good and was served at the restaurant located in the same parking lot. Overall it was a great stay and We will be returning.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We are so glad that you will be back again.

Summary: Check in staff was very accomadating friendly and courteous given great recommendations to enhance our Disney adventure and hotel stay would love to see a better contextual breakfast like previous years with waffles eggs sausage and possible until noon for late risers
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are so happy to hear that the front desk gave you helpful information.

Summary: I was overly impressed by the quality of customer service provided as well as the cleanliness of the room/hotel.  Thoroughly impressed and will recommend all friends and family.  Best hotel I have ever stayed at hands down.

The Hotel Pepper Tree is a beautiful hotel which feels like home.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The decor is beautiful inside and out.  I hope my travels take me to that area again so I can stay there again.

Summary Heading: Just the bathtub  they cam clean more better to make iit whiter they should put more clorox ar lime away
Summary: The carpet look old neighbor is that great  but is close to disney land  the people who work there are very nice  there very helpfull  there very accommodating  the room was big i was surprise  and the free breakfast i like it  is nice I consider to go back to this place  definitely

Summary Heading: Pretty decent overall for the price!
Summary: For the money this is quite a bargain and great for families that want to save money on eating out. Although older style it was clean, roomy and had a nice private outdoor patio. The extra bed could have been more comfortable and the wifi was poor but would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and full kitchen! We are so glad that you will stay with us again. We will make sure to check the WiFi connection from your room to make sure it is working properly.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree.  The staff was friendly and helpful! The rooms were ok, clean, but nothing fancy. The continental breakfast wasn't that great, very basic. If you wanted anything like eggs or hot cereal, you have to pay for it.  Other than that,  it was good. I'd stay again if I needed to.

I loved everything about this hotel except the bedding.  I felt like I got rug burns from the sheets.  If staying again I would probably bring my own sheets cause I just prefer to sleep on cotton.  That being said, we really enjoyed our stay.  Spacious rooms, plenty of storage, free parking, quick and easy 8 minute or less drive to Disney.  Breakfast is donuts.  It is what it is, but I would definitely stay here again and feel it was a great value for the amenities if you don't mind a hotel that is not walking distance to the park.  The kitchen and the patio really made this a wonderful stay.  My only other add on I would like to see is Disney jr channel for my kids.  Thank you Peppertree! We had a lovely time!

Front desk were great! They were really friendly and helpful. The only issue I have is the first room we were in wasn't cleaned properly. The 2nd room we were moved to was much better. I appreciate David's help
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful feedback. We are happy to hear that the front desk was able to help you out. We are so sorry for the  issues you found in your first room.

Summary: I read most of the reviews and designed to go with pepper tree.  Nothing worth $150.00 a night, my family was disappointed and I felt bad because we stayed a night in Vegas on the way to Disney and they are the best because it is exactly what said on reviews with less money.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. Our prices will vary depending based on the season but are very comparable with the hotels in the area.

Summary: Perfect location for our needs.  Suite with kitchen and private patio was very nice.  Enjoyed pool, but  hot tub would be a cool addition.  Service and Overall experience was very good.  Would recommend to a friend.

I loved this hotel! Friendly people and the room was amazing they have cooking utensils and a whole kitchen for all your needs the only thing is that there was hair in my sheets and in the bathroom...

Summary Heading: Overall ok but wouldn't stay here again
Summary: The hotel staff was amazing and the bed was very comforable. However the rooms could use an update and the pool was not the best. There is also no hot tub and the continental breakfast was not worth the walk across the parking lot. For those reasons I would not stay here again. Also we had very noisy neighbors and when we informed the front desk they did nothing 😒
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and use them to better our hotel.

Summary: I only stayed here for 3 nights and was busy throughout my entire weekend so I never had a chance to swim (although I brought my swimsuit) or eat the continental breakfast. Hotel Pepper Tree was truly just somewhere for me to crash at night and sleep. The hotel was super cute with the flowers out front and the pool, although I didn't swim, looked very nice and the setup for it was cute as well. The bed was really comfortable and the AC worked amazingly, however I was pretty disappointed with the WiFi and TV. I brought two DVD's for my friend and I to watch at night but there was no DVD player! I was shocked! First hotel I've ever been to with no DVD player, but it wasn't that big of a deal. The only really bad thing I have to say about the place is that during my last day there,

Only issues with this hotel was, the kitchen cabinets have no latches, so dont shut, the side of the refrigerator that sticks out a few inches was kind of gross, dirty.  The breakfast was aweful. But the rest of the room was perfectly clean with a comfortable bed.

Getting in late from Disneyland we asked if we could check out late the next day. In the morning we got a call asking when we were leaving. We felt unwelcomed and kicked out. They still charged a late fee even after we were told it wouldn't be a problem as long as it was before 1 p.m.  Never going back. Also, the breakfast isn't all that great. There are better hotels with late check out and breakfast for a lesser price!
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are sorry for the communication issues about your late checkout. We did not charge you a lack checkout fee. We are sorry that this situation ruined your stay with us.

Summary: The Hotel was awesome but the breakfast could use a change, paying for hot items not so good when i can get hot food at a regular hotel at no added cost. My kids have a lot of allergies and the cold food was not sufficient to feed them, We had to go off site for breakfast every day

Lovely people working at hotel Peppertree, the rooms were great and we had a veranda. The breakfast was nice and everyone were very nice and accommodating. We would definitely visit again! Great value for money.

Summary Heading: Very good and comfortable place for visiting Disneyland
Summary: Nice clean and spacy room with kitchen. Liked the interior. Continental breakfast good for people who are in a rush going to Disneyland. You can order warm menus for extra charge. I forgot and left some of my belongings in the kitchen and I hope they find it not too late.

cost-effective, clean,quiet,kitchen, friendly staff,24 hours service,supermarket and restaurants nearby, free parking , room for three people .weak points: far away from LA center,refrigerator is noisy

Everything was great! I liked the location. Daisy at the front desk was exceptional and so helpful with helping us with activities. I only problem we had was getting a good wifi signal; it was really spotty.

The ground floor patio was fabulous, peaceful and quiet. It even had its own lionhead fountain spilling water into a bowl. Open the sliding door from your room and you feel like royalty. Very tastefully decorated, in impeccable condition and cleanliness. The FULL kitchen was cleverly tucked away so you don't see it from the bed. I appreciate that so much, I hate waking up in a strange bed and feeling like I spent the night in somebody's kitchen. The front desk staff was as cheery and helpful as anyone could ever ask for. Continental breakfast included, in the adjacent restaurant, was perfect. I truly regret I had to leave early, due to a change in personal circumstances. I highly recommend Hotel Pepper Tree.

Great Value. Great Location. Although I did not use the kitchen to cook it was nice having a full size refrigerator and microwave for use. The only bad thing I could say is that there was no filtered water or ice machine available for guests.

Great location. close to everything. Bed wasn't too comfortable. Plastic still on it. So you heard it while moving. Blankets & linens were itchy. Walls are too thin. Heard kids screaming and the rollers on suit cases all night. I wouldn't stay more than one night here if you want a good nights rest.

While I understand the request that occupants reuse towels, it would be nice if a place to hang them to dry for reuse and a way to tell them apart we're provided. Otherwise the stay was very nice and location was great!

If you are tired of the hum-drum hotels and want a kitchen in a quaint hotel, this is a great one.  Short drive to Disney and to the convention center, welcoming staff, and easy to park.  They were very accommodating with our extra luggage and called me immediately to let me know I left something in the room, and even mailed it to me.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your great review! We are so glad you enjoyed our boutique charm and helpful staff.

Summary: Internet no good. Need pot holders and kitchen towels. Pool luke warm. Loved the grill and the cleanliness. Very nice staff. Convenient grocery store across street. Take uber to disney. Bus stop is about 1/4 mile. ..not one block. Lol
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback and suggestions. We will make sure to check the internet connection from your room immediately.

Summary: Was in close proximity of major amusement parks but lacked cleanliness and was unaccommadating to our needs and refused to refund our money even before a 24 hour checkout time. Shower was dirty and frdige had other occupants things left inside.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We did refund you for all of the nights that you did not stay with us, and we are sorry that you did not want to comply with our pet policy. We will make sure to talk with our housekeeping staff immediately about the issues you saw. Again, we are sorry that we did not meet  your expectations.

Summary Heading: Decent price and fairly close to Disneyland
Summary: We are repeat guests. Decent price and not to far from Disneyland. Nice Hotel. Love the Kitchen the rooms. This will be our "go to" hotel when we come to Anehiem. The breakfast is a nice bonus too. We will be back for sure.

Enjoyed my stay, this was a last minute pick as it was spring break and NASCAR weekend so was hard finding a room. Everyone was nice and helpful but Hopefully they will consider breakfast in the hotel
Manager Response: So glad you found us last minute! Thanks for the helpful review. We do have a continental breakfast located in the adjacent restaurant. Hope to see you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: I would say this was a good stay. I like the feel of the hotel, like a timeshare. Location is close to everything I needed. We enjoy the courtyard, nice area for us to enjoy a coffee and breakfast. Only bad this is that at the courtyard, I notice a roach and mice running past by. Good thing there was non inside the room. If I didn't see that, I would have rated the hotel 5 stars.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback. We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel and convenient location. We are working with our pest control vendor immediately about the issues you noticed. We are very proactive in making sure our property and rooms are pest free. Thanks again for your comments.

Summary: The staff was wonderfully friendly and helpful. The grounds and rooms were in excellent condition and the decor was lovely. Our only complaints were the continental breakfast and the fact that the pool was pretty cold in spite of being heated.

The room was surprisingly bigger and more comfortable then expected. We loved our room. We loved the air and private patio. The only complaint was a barking dog across the hall and poor wifi and maybe the old dirty sock I found while making sure we didn't forget anything behind the bedstand. Over all it was a pleasent experience with great customer service and very well maintained grounds.

Summary Heading: Very Clean and Top Notch Management
Summary: The rooms were very clean and the manager and staff are just awesome!!  If we ever return to the area, we will definitely be looking to stay here again.  Very easy, 10 minute, drive to Disneyland without the need to use major highway's.

The beds were very comfortable.  Got a good night's rest after a long day at the park. Did not have any outlets in the vanity area which would have helped to plug in blow dryers and curling irons. The continental breakfast was not very appetizing.  Did not eat there on the second and third days.  The price for the room was reasonable and they were clean.   .

Nice hotel, but the neighborhood was not reflective for the hotel caliber.                                                                    The hotel needs updating, but has that Spanish rustic feel.                                                                                Hotel staff were amazing and the kids loved the pool, which also had a BBQ beside it.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and our customer service.. We are in the process of making upgrades throughout the hotel. Hope you come again in the future to see our changes.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel with a friendly staff.
Summary: Everything was acceptable except for the noise up above our room. We did have some gnats flying around. The value of the rooms, the kind staff and pretty atmosphere of the hotel were great. I would recommend to others. Thank you!

Kinda defeats the purpose of bringing food when the stove/oven does not work.  Brought pizzas for the oven and chili and stuff.  The front desk guy let us use a oven in another room one time.  We are repeat customers and this has never happened.  Kinda a bummer.  Will be coming in a couple months and again in Sept and once more for three rooms in October.  Hope this doesn't happen again.

we stayed for 7 nights. staff were friendly and helpful. room was a little dated nut comfortable and had everything we needed. Continental breakfast was adequate, but the same everyday.a little variety would be nice, but there was a menu to order from if you want to pay for breakfast.  will likely stay again as it is so convenient to our relatives in the area.

Other than the "light" continental breakfast our stay was outstanding.  The rooms were very clean.  The pool was well maintained.  The appliances in the rooms were clean and relatively new, which is not always the case with in room appliances.  We would recommend your facilities to our friends and family. Thank you.

The walls are very thin so we could hear the people next store playing with the children very late in the evening  and early in the morning.  Overall the hotel is very nice and the staff was very nice.  I would stay there again

Staff was very pleasant and hotel lobby is nice. Rooms are dated and could use some remodeling. They were installing all new draperies. Kitchens and bathrooms are due for new cabinetry.Decor is nice. Odd layout for bath vanity area.

I've stayed in many hotels that looked nice on the website and was disappointed upon arrival....not this time. The room was clean and super cute. The patio was an extra bonus. The continental breakfast wasn't much but there were other options to choose from at an extremely reasonable price. The location was the best part as it was super close to both parks. I will definitely stay here again.

I'm not your average visitor. I grew up in the area and come here to visit a family member who doesn't have space to put me up, I never visit the parks or other entertainment. The location is great for me, not the handiest for Disneyland but pretty good for Knott's if that's what you want to do. It's safe and quiet and if you have a car you can get around just fine. Parking is free at the hotel.

Disappointed , sheets was requested to be changed but was not changed they just fix the bedding. The front desk was good. Breakfast nothing special. Bathroom kind was ok but not what im expecting. Overall hotel was fine.

fast friendly check in/out service. pool was open late wasn't war like it said heated but it was cool not cold. they had yummy fruit detox water at the front desk different flavor everyday. first family trip to Disney parks and everything including the parks were close and convenient. the prices were great we saved more then the Disney resorts. the kitchen is so convenient but we were out most of they day only cooked 2 times. would definitely recommend.

Great place for any size or type of group. Very friendly staff, full kitchen in our room, great breakfast, free parking, free wifi - perfect! And there is a pool which we didn't use but in warmer months it would be great.

Summary Heading: A beautiful oasis in a sea of concrete
Summary: This is a beautifully kept hotel, the staff is awesome. We loved the spacious room with a full size fridge and stove. Not far from Disneyland and lots of shopping. You won't find another hotel like it in the area.

Enjoyed our stay... everyone was very nice and enjoyable.we were gone most of the day but when there everything was nice. We had to leave early due to a problem at home and they were so understanding. We will definitely stay there again.

We have used the pepper tree before. We tried another place last year and decided to go back to pepper tree. Why we tried the other place is beyond me. We will continue to go back to pepper tree on our yearly vacations. We like the value of the rooms, they are always clean and well kept. The front deck is always very friendly. Thank you

My third visit to this hotel, sadly not as great as usual. Arrived at 10am, understandably our room wasn't ready yet but we had just flown in and wanted to check anyways. Was told I would receive a text when it was ready but never did, didn't end up returning until after 9pm hoping a room was ready. I found hairs in our towels before using them and the floor needed some serious cleaning. I'll cast this as a one off and will definitely return as the oom is comfortable and the price is excellent for all that you get! The staff are typically very welcoming and made sure to tell us that they were available 24/7.

Summary Heading: Cute hotel, but no hot breakfast and no maid service.
Summary: We stayed for 3 days and didn't receive maid service at all while we were there. Didn't get a chance to swim but the pool looked nice. Not a great neighborhood but very close to Disney. Not bad, but not amazing. As long as you don't care about a view or a super comfortable bed and don't need more than cereal and mini donuts for breakfast, this place is cute and will allow dogs.

I loved the whole vibe of this hotel. It's very quiet and has a vintage type of style. Every room has a balcony or private patio which I think is beautiful to enjoy. The Mexican decor is gorgeous and the price is to die for! It's only a few blocks from Disney and close to convenient stores. Would stay here again for sure!

Lots of space.  Good Customer Service.  Great location -- close to everything Anaheim.  Breakfast was a bit lacking in protein options.  Advertising that breakfast is included and online reviews did not indicate that there is an additional cost for an egg or sausage.  Most other hotels we've been to at least include a boiled egg and sausage in their breakfast line up.  Other than that small disappointment, all was great.  Enjoyed our trip and stay.

Summary Heading: spanish style with a modern twist
Summary: Looks old and rustic but with all of the modern amenities. Very clean and ok king bed. Kitchen is clean with pots and pans and and cleaning stuff. Front desk is very accommodating. They were able to switch us to the bottom floor for someone like me with difficulty in walking.  Would like to stay in this place again.

Lots of space .loved the  old world  feel. Kithen and sitting area in yhe room gove you spade to unwind.close to everything.the continental breakfast in the resturaunt was a nice surprise. We would  definately come back

My boyfriend and I drove all the way from the Bay Area so we could spend spring break in Socal and go to Disney Land. Trip was awesome everything was great, but when I found out my car wouldn't start I was panicked! But I asked the hotel front desk if there was anything they could do they quickly responded that they had a person that could jump start my car. The whole ordeal took maybe 30 minutes. Thank you Hotel Pepper Tree.
Manager Response: We were happy to help! Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place For A Home Base
Summary: This place was perfect to come home to after being out and about all day.   Staff were very accommodating from the moment we booked until we left.   Breakfast was very basic in terms of variety but it suited our needs.

Very happy with the service, was very clean, very friendly staff. Will be staying there aging. Restaurant was very good if you like see food. Grocery store across the street. Every one there was very nice.  Loved it.

Summary Heading: Simple and charming - close to Disneyland Parks
Summary: My family stayed at the Pepper Tree and were happy with the rooms as well as the proximity to Disneyland.  The prices were reasonable and we had a great time.  It was short drive to the parking structures at the parks, and the customer service people at the Pepper Tree were great.

Hotel Pepper tree was very clean. The staff was very friendly. Cool atmosphere. The pool area is very nice (awesome that they had a grill by the pool.) Cheap uber ride to "downtown" area. Overall good experience.

Summary Heading: Good value for money, especially at busy convention times
Summary: Spent 2 nights during Expo West, one of the largest exhibition at Anaheim Convention Centre. Pepper Tree still is reasonable priced and gives good value for money. Bedding I really enjoyed. Breakfast one could think of improving.

I stayed on the first floor in a room with a large patio.  Room was clean and staff was very nice.  Just would have liked breakfast to be in hotel or be able to take to go. I will stay here again- great price for type/size of room

For the price and package it was a good deal,  The area that the hotel was in was a little questionable, and the continental breakfast was a one and done type of thing. It's only dry cereals and fruits and even at that there was a bug in my fruit. Very unappetizing. The hotel room was nice, I loved the kitchen and all the kitchen tools that were supplied!
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed the room and full kitchen. We will make sure the restaurant sees your comments regarding their service and breakfast.  Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary Heading: Good Budget Hotel with Awesome Location
Summary: I recently stayed here as a solo female traveler; the location was excellent!
