We will definitely use this hotel again. It's off the beaten path but a hidden gem. Very nice and clean. Super cozy. Beds were comfortable and bathrooms very clean. Lots of parking and grocery stores within walkin distance.

This hotel is very nice and the staff is very helpful. The rooms were nice and clean and tastefull. We had an emergency back home which caused up to cut our trip short so they credited us back the day we didn't need. Turned out we didn't have to go back after all but now our room was booked by someone else :( turned out the gentleman at the front gave us their backup room which was even nicer for the same rate. In a world of poor customer service they were amazing! Even the contential breakfast across the street was good.

Summary Heading: Comfy hotel with lots of character.
Summary: Great place to stay, nice neighborhood, close to Disneyland. Needs a little updating here and there, the bath sink had very slow flow, not sure if it was clogged? For the most part very nice little place for the money very spacious and clean, I din't use maid service, basically just checked in, was out all day and just slept there, checked out.

Summary Heading: Decent stay but rooms need updating
Summary: Stayed here recently for my son's hockey tournament in Anaheim and picked this hotel for it's close proximity to the ice rink. It's nice having the kitchenette's but the cabinets/counters could definitely use some updating. The bedding was nice but the mattresses were way to firm.  Like  . . .uncomfortably hard. The room was spacious and well appointed but the main issue was the carpet. It was old and musty.  They need to spend the money on new carpet before I go back there. If that gets done, we will definitely be back for next year's tournament.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Pros: Location was great, supermarket opposite, good Thai restaurant and coin laundry close by. Cons: Not good internet system, stayed 9 nights but was able to get only the last 3 evenings hot water in room. Request made during the initial stages of stay as family likes to shower after returning from a long day shopping/sightseeing/visiting Disney etc.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel and your helpful feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location. We are looking into your room and why you were having hot water issues. We will make sure to use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Feels like a home away from home.
Summary: Great "apartments" in a great location. Love the neighborhood - close to supermarket, Starbucks, 7/11 just across the street. Do spend a little ekstra for a room with patio (smoking is allowed there). Lots of privacy.
Manager Response: Love to be your home away from home!! Thanks for the great comments. Come back again soon!

Summary: Everything was great, until I woke up with rashes and bite marks on my arms and shoulders. My fiance was bitten so badly, we had to take her to the hospital. Had to sleep on the couch. Mattress cover not cleaned. Spots of blood on sheets. Only because of this, our stay was bad.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you had a poor experience at out hotel. We are looking into your room immediately and making sure to address any issue that we find. We take these comments very seriously. We are very proactive in making sure that issues like this do not occur at our hotel. The comfort and safety of our guests is always our top priority. We will have an inspection of our rooms from our pest control provider immediately. Please contact us directly so we can further discuss your stay with us. Again, we are so sorry that you had issues during your stay and wish you would have notified us immediately.

Summary: This hotel is very charming!  Note that check in as at 3pm, but they will allow early checking at 1pm as long as room is ready. Anytime before 1pm will have a $23 charge. There is also a $5 per day resort fee when you check in.   We had a king size bed room on the 2nd floor. Room 205. Bed was comfortable. Room also has a kitchenette with an apartment sized refrigerator/freezer, coffee maker, microwave, basic utensils, plates, mugs, cups, dish soap and a small stove. The decor is Spanish flare. Maybe a little dated, but it's clean. The bathroom is probably the most dated, but it is clean and shower has good water pressure. There is a small 'living area' with TV and couch. Also a large balcony or patio. Large closet. Bring a power strip if you have more than 1 gadget to plug in by
Manager Response: So glad that you will stay again and enjoyed our boutique charm! Thanks for the helpful and thorough review.

Summary: Hotel flooring very bad to move luggages. Lift very slow. Bathtub water flow very bad. Housekeeping never washes used plated and cups. Breakfast was bare minimum. We stayed at super 8 they served hot waffles. Over here had to pay additional for waffle n eggs.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to address your housekeeping concerns with our staff. We are working with the restaurant to improve our continental breakfast selection. Thanks for your comments - we will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: We were very comfortable here.  We arrived before check in.  They were able to get a room cleaned and ready for us quickly.  The pool was wonderful.  The kitchen was well stocked.  This was a good home away from home while on vacation.
Manager Response: Love to be your home away from home while on vacation! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We have stayed before and we really like staying here.  We stayed for over a week both times and it is a great help to have the extra room and especially the kitchen--which was well-supplied--and the closet area.  I really enjoyed and used the balcony every day.  Our review isn't high because we feel that the hotel needs a bit more upkeep. It's become worn.  I think that you are working on this because our cousin's room was much nicer.  Everyone who works there is great, helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks for returning. We appreciate your helpful feedback. We are continuing to make upgrades throughout the hotel. We do hope to see you again soon1

Summary Heading: Verified CC but still can't cancel
Summary: I deleted my previous review because I couldn't make changes to it.   I never made it to my stay out here but the one thing that stood out to me was the difficulty in cancelling the reservation - I needed to have the person who made it with me in order to cancel because having his card to make the reservation wouldn't suffice. If I remember correctly the agent who had assisted me wasn't the most pleasant either via telephone.
Manager Response: We are sorry for any issues you experience over the phone a year ago. We take the credit card security of our guests a top priority and are sorry for any inconveniences you had while trying to cancel. We will use your comments to better train our front desk staff.

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay - great little hotel - room was tidy and huge - comfy chairs and big comfortable bed - well placed with great little supermarket across the road - very helpful staff and good pool
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad you enjoyed our boutique charm and spacious rooms. Come again soon!

Summary: We were in Anaheim for 5 days and were looking for an extended stay hotel.  This hotel was perfect for us and at a rel good price.  The customer service was wonderful, and they were a big help in obtaining Theme Park tickets.

The wifi log on instructions were not adequate. Wifi drops every second, basically useless. The wall or trees blocked the 4g in all directions.  The room was nice with a full kitchen including a microwave, frig, stove, and all utensils. They also upgrade a king size to a double without any charge on thanksgiving. Thank you. The breakfast was good too. The restaurant hosting it was great and they charge very little if we want meat or eggs.

The hotel was very nice, had character.  I would definitely stay there again. The room was very nice and the kitchen was very nice. I liked that the continental breakfast was in an actual restaurant and we took advantage of the menu for breakfast and it was very reasonable priced and the food was good.

Summary Heading: The front desk staff needs to be retrained , they don't have good welcoming and sometimes the show that they don't care
Summary: I was really disappointed the way they checked me in, showing nothing like professional and respectful service  We had shortage of water from 11:00am to 5:00pm without any kind of professional apology or credit for us for this really inconvenient manners

Really great room. Awesome a/c. Comfortable. Great value, nice location. Went there on a referral from a family member. Very close to disnelyland (which is why we went) Will definitely refer other people.

This Boutique hotel is very nice and cute. There is great bbq in pool area, we like large balcony and good wifi. Good supermarket across the street.  Unfortunately they have no guest laundry and no dishwasher

This hotel is great for the location and service, but the rooms could use some help. We paid a little extra for the kitchenette, but the appliances were outdated. The cleanliness could also be better as several dusty areas were discovered throughout the day. For the bed, they could also invest in sheets that fit as ours kept rolling up throughout the night. An extension cord was used for one of the light fixtures and tucked underneath the bed. We felt this was very hazardous and immediately unplugged it.   Overall, the rooms have all of the amenities that you would need. Iron (board included), hair dryer, plenty of closet space, drawers, desk, balcony, etc. The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly. Kudos to David for his excellent customer service!

There is nothing to complain about for this hotel. The room (king kitchen, fridge, microwave) was nice with a patio (we did not use though). Location is great and v close to Disneyland. They offer free continental breakfast with limited options, but the restaurant offers many other paid options.

I must say I've stayed at many hotels throughout my life so I can easily say it was an ok hotel, had to kill 2 spiders while I was there, water wasn't too hot, you still felt sticky after you came out. The location is good if you are going to Disneyland but too far out from LA, Universal etc..

Summary Heading: It was perfect for a family stain we went to Disneyland we stay at the hotel it's not too far from there there are a lo
Summary: We loved it I was so nice The kitchen and the  patio outside was perfect the  bathroom was nice my kids love it   I will recommend this for anybody who wants to stay close to Disneyland  we're thinking to go back in a couple months and I'm pretty sure you stay on the same hotel it is the bar cross the street big grocery store 711 tacos

The staff was friendly and helpful. The hotel was clean, the room had everything we needed. The kitchen was nice and we enjoyed our stay. We will be returning to the Pepper Tree in Anaheim for our next trip.

Quiet area of Anaheim but quick drive to freeway, shopping and all theme parks. Staff were friendly, courteous and helpful. Hotel isn't brand new but everything was clean everything worked. We would stay again.

This was our 7th stay at the Hotel Peppertree each trip to the USA after touring the USA our last few days in LA we stay at Hotel Peppertree, we find the rooms clean, spacious the staff are friendly and helpful. Good location close to food places like IN N OUT burger and the bowling alley I would recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Front desk was awesome! Super friendly and was very accommodating!! The room was clean and cute with a huge balcony.
Summary: My trip overall was great!! The only thing I would change is the breakfast as far as the quality of food but to offer the option of a breakfast is a great start! Thank you Pepper Tree staff for being so professional.

We enjoyed our stay Hotel Pepper Tree, the location was good, the rooms were clean and comfortable. The free breakfast each morning was plentiful a good start to the day. All staff were helpful and friendly and nothing was too much trouble.

The beds need to be updated. The room overall was good, I mentioned that it was a trip for on of my daughters birthdays trip and there was birthday  balloons in the room when we walked in. I will come back, price was well worth it.

Was surprised by the beauty and customer service. Very clean and really big rooms. Quiet area close to Disneyland and the freeway. Continental breakfast not the best but it was free so can't complain.

Need power outlets near the beds to charge phone overnight. Sink in the bathroom could be bigger and located outside of bath/flush area. It will be better to have rooms without kitchenette so that people who do not use kitchenette do not have to pay for it.

The price and the location were right.  The front desk staff were very helpful as we had to ask them for towels or toilet paper every evening as the cleaning staff kept forgetting to fully restock the bathroom.  Overall, we rate the hotel as average.
Manager Response: Thank you for the honest feedback. We will make sure our housekeeping staff sees your comments and will keep working with them to improve their service. Glad the price and our convenient location were right!

Summary: I have been recommending this place to anyone who has been planning a trip to Anaheim! Best value for all the amenities and cleanliness the hotel offered. Such a unique and quaint place to stay. We absolutely loved the layout and decoration of our room. We will definitely come back for our next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations and great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm. Come back soon!

Summary: We took our very first family trip to Anaheim this year with our 2 kids.  Your hotel was perfect for our needs!  The room was very clean, and kept clean by your wonderful cleaning staff.  I hope they got our note of thanks!!!
Manager Response: So glad to hear that your stay was perfect! Thanks so much for the review and your kind words.

Summary: We were not expecting this hotel to be as good as it actually was. We only stayed one night but I would of happily stayed here for more. Nice little pool and a 20 min drive from Disneyland. The only thing to be weary of is the patio doors on your balcony. Ours didn't lock and there was no safe in the room so we had to take our valuables out with us as we didn't trust them to be left in the room. Highly recommendable hotel.

Staff was very friendly. They went above and beyond my request and left a very nice surprise for my daughter when we arrived and checked into our room. Room was nice and cozy, a bit run down but love the outside patio of 1st floor with the vines and water fountain. Only disappointment we had was being on the first floor, we got awoken by the footstep sounds of above floors starting at 5am. Also by the fridge that would make a very load humming sound when it comes on. The very weak Wi-Fi signal was a bummer too because we couldn't get on our tablets but we kept occupied. Other than that, it was a pleasant stay and I'd still recommend it minus staying on first floor.

The place was decent. Didn't care for the scary Halloween decorations,but I'm not a fan of Halloween. It was helpful to have a full size refrigerator. The water is terrible so we went to Costco and there's plenty of room in the refrigerator.

Location was good- a quick drive to Disney.   Front desk personnel were attentive and friendly.  Loved the restaurant where the breakfast was, they went out of their way to accomodate us when we arrived after 10pm and were hungry.  Genuinely nice people, and very caring!   Maids were good, but I was confused as to why they kept taking our towels that were hung up and replacing them with clean towels, since we were trying to do our part to use less water…? The room was laid out well and very comfortable, just a tad more soundproofing would help between the hall and the rooms, but other than that, this place was great due so much to the wonderful staff and people who worked in and around the hotel!

We will be back!  Great location. Kids loved this place.                                              We liked the staff    Pizza down the street was amazing. Close to Disney and Knotts  Plan to stay here again. Loved the balcony.   I recommend this Hotel

Referred by a friend and I recommend it too. Great people working the desk, clean, and close to Disneyland! It has a more rustic feel with stone floors so if you like modern this isn't the place for you. The kitchenette is a nice touch with a good size fridge with freezer (not a mini).

Summary Heading: Good inexpensive place to stay close to Disney
Summary: The room we stayed in included 2 queen beds, large bath and dressing area and a kitchenette. The room was clean and well maintained, even if it was a little dated. My reason for giving 4 instead of 5 stars is there wasn't a dresser and only 5 hangers in the closest. We were forced to live out a suitcase. There were 4 people staying in this room for 5 days, a place to store our clothes would've been a nice addition.

My only complaint would have to be i couldn't get any cell service and the WiFi would always cut in and out. However I would come back to this hotel everyone was super friendly. I will also recommend this hotel to anyone

I was pleasantly surprised, the place was nice and clean with spacious rooms.  The continental breakfast was meh, but the breakfast you can order was very reasonably priced and well done.  About a $10 uber fare from the Anaheim convention center.

Enjoyed my stay, breakfast was average since it costs extra for hot food. Wifi service was good, did not go into the pool but from the looks of it, it was quite small. Front desk was vey helpful and friendly.

As repeated guests,  the service was still exceptionally great. We love coming to this hotel for the nice cozy home feel to it and how conviently close it is to everything, 10 minutes away from Disneyland and 15 minutes away from Knottsberry farm. Only downfall was how our last morning there, someone was able to unlock our door but once I told the receptionists about it they were very friendly and got to investigating it. We will be coming back again.

The staff was great and attentive. Property nicely decorated and clean. Can't beat the location to Disneyland. Beds were however very uncomfortable and the walls super thin. If you are a light sleeper, not the hotel for you. If you can sleep through anything than go ahead.
Manager Response: So glad to hear that your experience with our staff was great and that you enjoyed our boutique charm. We will check the beds in your specific room... most of our guests enjoy them. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: We had a great stay at the hotel! The breakfast was very good, the beds confortable, the hotel accepted packages and the location was also near where we were planning to go. We didn't have any problems during our stay, everything was flawless.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! So glad you enjoyed your entire stay.

Summary Heading: Clean, fresh fruit breakfast, cold showers
Summary: Bed was comfortable, everything was clean, fresh fruit and yogurt, cereal, toast, coffee, oj on buffet, grill by pool, good size room, outdoor deck.  Decorating in bath and kitchen 1980's, they paint anything out of date.  No kitchen/dish cleaning, no paper towels, full size fridge, sink etc.  Could work for family who needs space, pool and grill, but you will have to bring everything for cooking.  Not the standard hotel experience, spanish style decor, only coffee cups in kitchen, no glasses, no ice bucket, no business center for printing (internet was fast and reliable), pretty fountains.  hard to review.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest feedback. Glad you enjoyed the pool and the large rooms. We do have dishes, pots/pans, paper towels, etc in all of our rooms. We are sorry that you did not either see them or was missing something. We hope you were able to talk to the front desk regarding this. Plus, our front desk is happy to help print out anything that you need. Again, we are thankful for your comments and will make sure to use them to better our hotel.

Summary: We had a great stay with Hotel Pepper Tree!  The front desk was great with letting us check in early. When our shower was leaking they had maintenance in fixing the problem that same day. The kitchen was a great feature to have.
Manager Response: Happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the full kitchen. Thanks for the helpful comments.

Summary: Decorate the hotel I like it very much, also more quiet. My favorite is the hotel bed is very comfortable. At the front desk service is very good, room service is also very good. Is a supermarket across the hotel, must buy things convenient. Next to Allah, I still will choose to stay in the hotel.
Manager Response: So glad you will be back. Thanks for the great review!

Summary: Definitely will stay here again. Perfect go to get away spot. The pool is warm and we'll maintained. The room was perfect with a large balcony and full kitchen. Wish I would have found this place sooner!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad you found us and can't wait for you to come back.

Summary: A nice, affordable option with close proximity to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. We had noisy neighbors and trouble finding healthy options in the free continental breakfast, but it was great to have an in room kitchen, the pool was nice, and the lobby was very welcoming.  The hotel manager went above and beyond to help us get our Disneyland tickets - even meeting us at the park to make sure we got them OK! The staff was outstanding. Thank you for a comfortable stay!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the great comments. We were happy to help you out!

Summary: Close enough to Disneyland and restaurants to be there in a flash, far enough away from all the crowds and congestion, yay! Loved sitting on the balcony in the evenings and the fact that the room was more like a studio apartment than a cold corporate hotel room made it a pleasant place to come back to at the end of a long day of theme park hopping. Bed was extremely comfy, bath and kitchen sparkled. Thanks for a lovely stay!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So happy you enjoyed our boutique charm.

Summary: Very pleased with our room that was more like a good sized studio apartment.  My only issue is that we had a king bed with a single and for my daughter, granddaughter and myself it would have been preferable to have two double or queen beds.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay! We do have rooms with two queen beds available but the room you booked included a king and a single. Come back again soon to try our other room types!

Summary: The bed was not good. Sunk in the middle. The bath tub had some sort of paint inside and the shower did not work properly and the water pressure was low. Besides those issues the room was nice. The kitchen could use an update but over all good
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will inspect your room immediately. We hope you will come back again.

Summary: Very nice hotel close to Disneyland, supermarkets and restaurants. Large comfortable rooms. Definitely recommended. Breakfast included. Excellent service and very clean rooms. We had some problems with the refrigerator and toilet but it was fixed immediately...
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! Come back again soon.

Summary: Spacious room, king bed plus a twin bed, nice kitchenette, convenient access to Disneyland parks and Knotts Berry Farm.  Great customer service, very friendly and professional staff.  Room was clean and comfortable.

Summary Heading: Outdated facilities yet excellent front desk service
Summary: Important note that the house keeping never cleaned the dishes and one day we went back to the room to find that the collected all the trash, put it in a bag and left it right in the middle of the room! When we called front desk, the guy immediately said he would come and collect it but of course I didn't let him do that because of how nice he was. But again room service was terrible !! And the facilities are out dated but that wasn't the worst thing about it so cool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest and helpful feedback. We are so happy to hear that our front desk responded helpfully and responsibly during your stay and are sorry for the housekeeping mistakes you experienced.

Summary Heading: Great stay we will go back again.
Summary: We will be back for a stay at this hotel for our next vacation. They do need to work on the noise from the elevator/street. The staff was super friendly very helpful. The food at the restaurant was amazing. 😎

The room amenities provide great alternatives to going out every night for dinner and I was surprised to know you could obtain a DVD player from the front desk by just asking! That was a great incentive, only thing lacking is a shuttle to some of the immediate entrainment in the neighborhood. Other than that, my family and I plan on returning!

Since we were visiting both Knott's and Disneyland I wanted to pick a hotel in between both. This was such a cute, peaceful hotel. It was quite and we could come and go without any hassle. Parking was perfect for in and out. This will be our go to hotel for our Anaheim visits.   I also generally have a hard time sleeping at any hotel and I fell asleep so quickly.

Exceeded my expectations and I was very pleased with everything. I will be returning soon. And I will also refer friends and family to this hotel. A truly great experience and service was great and prompt.

I chose this location based on the proximity to amusement parks such as Knots Berry Farm, Disneyland and Six Flags as well as being in the are for business and a trade show in Los Angeles (Downtown, West Hollywood, Burbank).  It's a gorgeous hotel for the price.  The breakfast was cold continental but you can upgrade for a heartier hot breakfast for about $6.00.  The food was good and fresh.  The employees are happy and attentive.  The kitchen/kitchenette was perfectly adequate to cook if you so choose and even for a family of 6 or more.   The beds were comfortable.  I was on the first floor which gave me a totally private outdoor space with my own fountain.  It was wonderful!  I can sit outside and get my work done.  It was heaven.  As for someone traveling on business, I would
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our boutique charm and our convenient location. Thanks for the great review and helpful tips.

Summary: Was perfect for my girlfriend and I. Positives were the great service at the front desk, and the room size itself was great. Really enjoyed the seperate area for bathroom and closet area and the couch as another sitting option as apose to just a bed to sit on. Liked the kitchen and the large fridge. Negatives were the oven did not work, and if there was a special way to do it or whatever a information sheet would have been helpful. One side of the bed had a small dent in it which made it uncomfortable for my girlfriend after a while. Also the neighbors were a little noisy but not really a big issue. All in all we will return to this hotel. Great staff, Great Location and a great place to stay! Loved the patio too.

Customer service was faultless but we had noisy neighbors .kitchen was very old and walls and window drapes grubby but hey what can you expect or the price. Don't hink I'll be staying here again next I'd spend a little more.

We stayed 10 nights, hotel staff and amenities very good. Good customer service. Friont desk always happy to help. Room clean when we arrived. My only negative will be daily housekeeping. Not always up to standard, toilet was always cleaned but not the bath, also the stand our TV was on was never cleaned the whole time we were there. By the time we left it was very dusty. It's 10 minutes drive from Disney. We rented a car so no problems about transportation. Overall good hotel, will definitely recommend  and will stay again

We loved this hotel the first time we staid there and that is why we chose to stay there again this time even though our destinations where pretty far away but we liked it so much we didnt care. Too bad for us!! We had a poor welcoming and housekeeping was TERRIBLE! Pretty pricy to have them skip our room or not clean it well at all and got a forced apology after they were blaming me for not putting the sign which i did!!!  Overall not coming back here!!!

Summary Heading: The best Mexican Hotel in Anahiem
Summary: The breakfast is amazing! (and included)  The pool was amazing, The room was amazing. They're were very nice restaurants nearby, and of course Disneyland! Desk service was the polar opposite of terrible!

Everything is wonderful. The decroration is unique, and i like it very much. We can cook ourselves. There is one big super market oppsite.The yard also is beautiful. The only thing is not very good that there is disinfectant fluid smell.

My partner and I chose this hotel on a whim, little did we know we found our new favorite place to get away for a weekend. The aesthetic is funky but awesome. The rooms are homey, clean, and relaxing.

Great stay in this charming hotel. Free breakfast. Free parking. 10 min's drive to Disneyland. 45 min's drive to LAX (depending on traffic). 30 min's drive to great beaches. Triple room was one huge king size bed and one single-bed. Only negative is we didn't have duvets, only sheets and blankets. Never the less - will definitely stay here again. If you are fanatically against cigarette smoking - be aware that smoking is allowed on balconies. Then choose another hotel for inhaling just smog.

Summary Heading: The May Family Favorite in Anaheim
Summary: We always stay at Hotel Pepper Tree when we visit Anaheim.  We have family in California, so we visit when we can afford it.  We would love to stay for a week sometime.  The kitchenette is adorable and has saved us hundreds of dollars on eating out.  To have a microwave and a frig when you have kids is perfect!!!!  The hotel should really emphasize that they even have it stocked with dishes, sponges, mixing bowls... even a wine opener.... home away from home.  Thank you!  The only thing that might need a touch of improvement would be how much light there is when trying to sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great and helpful feedback! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and love being your home away from home. We hope you can come back soon.

Summary: great location, very good value, very clean, having a kitchen a very big plus, excellent customer service, and excellent attitudes displayed by staff; Only complaint and the front desk staff took care of it, immediately was a either dirty or stained bedspread. Employee Ben stood out as one of the most helpful and courteous hotel hosts, front desk personnel I have ever encountered. I can't say enough about his excellent customer service attitude
Manager Response: Thanks for the great comments! We love Ben, too! So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: The hotel is clean and appears to be well-maintained. However, it is extremely outdated. The hotel is like walking into a mediterranean lodge trapped in the late 60s. Furniture is dark and clunky and well-used. Tiles in the hallway make rolling luggage difficult (especially when trying to be quiet at 2am). Overall, a decent place to stay for the night and customer service was excellent. If you're looking to feel like you're a star in the Three Caballeros before heading to Disneyland, this is the place for you :)
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are glad that you found us to be a good stay and that you enjoyed our customer service.

Summary: As a cast member visiting California Disneyland, I was referred to this hotel by a friend and coworker. I heard wonderful things about the rooms, grounds, and service and my expectations were met and more. I would stay here again without hesitation!
Manager Response: So glad you will be back! Love to hear that you were recommended to our hotel. Come back again soon.

Summary: Photos of this place make it much more appealing than it really is. I would have much rather spent the extra money and stayed at a larger chain hotel. The only reason this should be on your list is the price. Housekeeping missed our room the first night and the following 4 nights never gave us fresh towels or small hand rags. I wouldn't stay here again and would not reccomend anyone stay there unless they are on an extremely tight budget.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you did not receive our best service during your stay. The poor housekeeping you received is not the standard we expect our housekeeping service to provide. We are working with our team housekeeping team very closely and will use your comments to better our hotel. Again, we are sorry and wish you would have notified us of the issues you were having during your stay.

Summary: The room we were in,302 should not be used for guests. The elevator is right there and makes a horrible noise whenever in use. From approximately 11-1130pm to 6-630am is the only opportunity to sleep.
Manager Response: Thanks for the honest and helpful feedback. We will make sure our management team sees your comments about that room.

Summary: I'm a repeat guest many times over. This trip, there was a howling dog, and kids running everywhere. I was on the second floor and it sounded like a bowling alley upstairs. Kids (and parents) yelling in the hallway and pranksters even knocking on my door at 10:30 in the evening. I'm not sure I'll be back to stay next year due to the noise.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you did not have the best experience during this visit. We do hope you come back and are sorry for the noisy guests that were around you this last stay. We are updating the doors to help prevent any extra noise from the hallway. Thanks again for being a repeat guest and we hope to see you again.

Summary: Old hotel, front desk guy is rude. Torn dirty curtains and chairs type of hotels. Very Pricy for the poor quality and maintainance. There are much better options in the area I believe. They also charge your CC once you book.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and that you did not have the stay that most of our guests have. We will make sure to address and look into the issues that you mentioned immediately.

Summary: This was a last minute trip that I was able to find and book with no problems at all. Great location. Quiet and private. No hassle. I will definitely be returning and will recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: So glad you will be back. We are thankful you found us and enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Loved the private patio, pool area and kitchen in room! Great price and convenient to Buena Park and Disneyland! wish the water of the shower was a tad bit warmer but that is something to easily get over. Breakfast is decent enough.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. So glad you were able to enjoy your stay even if in the area for a difficult time. So glad you enjoyed your courtyard studio room and full kitchen.

Summary: Comfortable and large. We stayed 2 nights. There are several schools nearby.  When we went to Disney land around 7:30am. The traffic congestion occurred,because of the school run. If you want to be on the time,please  keep the track of time in rush hour.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are glad you enjoyed our large room. Thanks for the feedback about travel time. It is usually less than 10 minutes drive to either Disneyland or Knotts Berry Farm.

Summary: Older hotel but remodeled well and very well maintained. Everything was better than very good except for the continental breakfast. The hotel room was very spacious. The amenities were excellent. I'd stay again
Manager Response: Love to hear that you will stay again. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: We like the hotel and definitely will be back. The only problem was the bathroom. I found hairs on the wall in the shower from prior guests.  Even though we stayed for 4 days. Those hairs stayed on the wall the whole time. Other than that the hotel it's nice and the bed very confortable.

Everyone one was friendly and the kitchen was clean. It had dishes, full size fridge, microwave, toaster, sponge, dish soap, paper towels - I was very happy. You can open the sliding glass doors off the balconies to let the fresh air in and the wi-fi was always working. The shower pressure was slightly lacking, but that is really the ONLY negative thing I can think of and it wasn't even that bad. The one thing that sold me on the customer reviews was there were NO reports of bugs! I didn't see any during our 5 day stay either. I enjoyed staying here very much and will always book with them from now on.

Front desk and my was very nice and professional,good job,I would recommend it to everyone,I enjoyed the stay ut was safe and clean,no problems and plenty of safe parking my kids were happy also,next time I will use the pool and breakfast

The Staff takes excellent care of their guests. The Hotel is family friendly.  The rooms are spacious and with the private seating garden, quite comfortable.  The restaurant next door has excellent Mexican food at a value price.

In town for a convention, but decided to escape the convention area hotels.Really enjoyed this facility.Loved the balconies and old California atmosphere.Close to good restaurants and grocery stores.Very clean and comfortable.Hotel is older,but very well kept.Great staff and we experienced no problems.

The staff were friendly and helpful, bed sooo comfortable and room quiet. The continental breakfast was adequate. Had a full kitchen so could cook our own meals. The rooms were very clean. Should stay there again anytime.

I really enjoyed staying at this hotel. The people working at the front desk were very kind and accommodating. The room was beautiful and I loved the kitchen, as it has a full size fridge and all the pots and utensils that I needed.  It was a delightful stay. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Cozy yet affordable hotel in a great location.
Summary: A cute little hotel in a convenient location between to amusement parks and lots of other sights. The price is affordable and the stores and resturaunts surrounding are both amazing and well priced! The heated pool is a nice touch as well as the free wifi and the nice little kitchen where you can store your leftovers/extra food in case you don't want to go out.  My main warning is that the walls to the hotel are very thin so you can practically hear everything going on around you. I think someone was doing construction throughout the week, so we constantly heard banging noises. They were fairly easy to drone out though. Also when requesting no room service be sure to do so at the main counter. We put a do not disturb sign on our door one day and they came in to clean up the room

Room was very uncomfortable, they called it a mini-suite, I have stayed at better, cleaner hotels in Mexico for a 1/3 the price. Who ever designed the layout of those "Mini-Suites" should have hie butt kicked and fired, the kitchen area was filthy, cabinet doors would not close all the way and were barley hanging on, the bathroom layout is a joke, comes complete with a miniature toilet
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We did refund you for all the nights you did not use since you were unhappy with your stay. Our rooms are classified as studios- not suites. We are sorry that you did not have the experience that most of our guests do.

Summary: I've been here plenty of times..but my last stay wasn't the greatest...we had loud kids screaming in the room next to us at 6 in the morning..I can literally here there conversation...sounded like a bunch of spoiled kids to me..and when I called the front desk to call them in the room those people were ignoring the phone calls...I have a kid to but I know how to tell him to be quiet especially in the morning...and a spider crawled on to the bed luckily we caught it..but that wouldn't keep us from coming back because that can even happen at hm..it's not like there were a lot of bugs or anything...but over all I like this Spanish feeling hotel and I like the kitchen part to..it's convenient so I can't cook for my family...I'll be back next year

Breakfast quality food very bad, Internet the worst I have ever seen in my life, not even in Mexico we have such a bad internet service, I had to use my celphone internet connection that alza was bad because in my room there was a very poor signal. The room was dirty (shoes and socks of previous guests under the bed and under the sofa). It looks a old hotel with poor maintainence and pictures in Bookings reflect a nicer place. I think Price is too high for what you get (140 usd/night). I have request in my reservation a big size bad an at the end the room you gave me wos two small beds!!!!
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet our expectations and sorry about the confusion you had with your room type. You did book our Queen Kitchen Studio which includes two queen beds. We will look into your WiFi issues in your specific room since our other guests were not experiencing the same issues. Again, we are sorry that you did not have the experience that most of our guests have.

Summary: Overall, the hotel was clean and the Personnel were courteous. The kitchen utensils were very limited and the oven did not work. A place in the pool was clean and the bathroom amenities were also good. Otherwise it was a great location and an enjoyable time.

Excellent stay at Anaheim! We stayed here while visiting Disney and would stay again if we ever came back. Decent continental breakfast with good options for add-ons. Place was clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: So glad that you enjoyed your stay and that we were a great fit for your Disney trip. Hope you can come back soon. Thanks so much for the review!

Summary: this time there was feces on the toilet seat. there bathroom was very dirty. there was also a pubic hair on the seat itself.  It was obvious this was poorly cleaned  we could hear everything that our neighbors were doing. we were woken up at 2am and had to contact front desk regarding the noise complaint. we were then woken up multiple times early in the morning as well due to chatter and doors in the hallway. everything sounded like ti was happening in our hotel room
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being repeat guests. But, we are so sorry that you did not receive our best on your second visit. Because of your comments, we are working closely with our housekeeping staff to ensure they are maintaining our standards. We are also very sorry that you experienced some very noisy neighbors. Again, we are sorry that your second visit was unlike the first.

Summary: Check in staff didn't know what she was doing.  Had to go back downstairs because the keys didn't work/she forgot to activate the keys. She didn't tell us anything instead we had to ask for every tid-bit of information. The room was so hot and the fan didn't work. Had to open the slider and listen to traffic and it still didn't cool off the room..  Dishes/silverware were dirty.  Ie  a joke! You need an ice machine.  Toilet seat didn't fit the toilet.  It was a child size seat on a bigger toilet! Spend some money on updating the worn out areas.. The futon couch was so low to sit on and the cover was dirty.   The one chair in the room was so dirty and stained we didn't want to use it.   We had two regular size pillows on one side of the bed and one regular size plus some weird

I got to say this was a nice place to stay & I'm usually picky & for the price can't complain. Everything was clean. Housekeeping was awesome. Great neighborhood. The kids & wife loved it. Would return!

If u r looking for good food and good Ambience this place is perfect ! We oder multi cuisine... Chinese Punjabi great taste...good service love the sitting arrangements..a must visit if in surat... We loved Subzi  Falguni !

Hotel is very nice All the staff is friendly, mindful and helpful Facilities in the rooms are highly sufficient and comfortable Very close to mainroads Very big market and small restaurants nearby Calm, silent and original rooms

Summary Heading: Worst place to stay at by far in Anaheim CA . Over priced, dirty , out dated , rude staff & over all my worst hotel expi
Summary: I stayed in this hotel for 2 days . First night got eaten up by bed bugs. Then I go to ask if I can get a different room & the associate at the counter didn't offer to change them. He had me change them
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. Most of our guests do love our staff and our hotel. We did inspect your room thoroughly and did not find any sign of any insects or bed bugs. Again, we are sorry that your opinion of our hotel is so different than our other guests.

Summary: The room was very nice especially for the cost compared to other hotels in the area.  This is our second year in a row staying here for the first night before our Disneyland trip, and plan to return again next year or shortly thereafter.  I slept alright, but my daughter and her friend said they didn't sleep well as their mattress was uncomfortable.  Other than that it was great!

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel, close to so much
Summary: The whole atmosphere and property is amazing. It is close to Disneyland, and lots of restaurants and shops. The room was clean and spacious, with a personal patio and full kitchen. The bathroom was separate, the bed was comfy, and even a sofa to watch tv.  I would definitely recommend and will be coming back for sure.

The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful although the receptionist failed to tell us we had to preorganise the tickets for Disneyland, which we were there for specifically, and they knew that, we found out in the morning when we went to purchase the tickets that we would have to wait a few hours for the tickets. Therefore we had to get the tickets at Disneyland itself and not get the $15 off per ticket. Was not impressed. Other than that, the rooms were nice and roomy, the cookware wasn't much to be desired though. I would suggest bringing your own if you want to cook. Parking was very easy. We enjoyed our stay and may stay again if we are in the area.

Nice hotel in a great location close to the places i wanted to go. Easy to get to from John Wayne Airport. The beds are comfortable and the kitchenette provides everything you need to make simple meals. This is a great place to spend a week.

This hotel is situated  on Lincoln avenue. Little far to attractive destination , for example to Disneyland 6.7 miles ,and to ocean shore 22 miles! Half hours of drive if you lucky  and traffic smooth! Pepper tree hotel should be little bit cheaper so far.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: From start to finish this hotel was great. Everyone working here have customer service skills to be commended. From the accomidating manager ,to everybody at the front desk,to houskeeping ,all made an effort to make are stay wonderful. The rooms are clean and quaint. It really does feel like a boutique hotel. Other guests are also friendly and family oriented. Will most def stay again !!!! Thanks Hotel Peppertree!!!

Summary Heading: A very clean and comfortable place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: We stayed here for 4 days and I was so pleased with the hotel. The bed was extremely comfortable. Lots of pillows!! The pictures on the website 100% match what you see and what you get when you stay. I will for sure stay here again when we come back to CA for our Disney land vacation next year!!

Stayed in early October-close to Disney, Knotts, and all southern California attractions.  Rooms were clean, decent sized with a kitchen, and comfortable.  Easy access to hotel and parking at no charge.  Will definitely stay again.

Though the wi-fi can be hard to connect to, the continental breakfast has no hot food and the hallways are super noisy in the mornings, I wouldn't stay anywhere else. Hotel Peppertree is in a great location (6 min from Knott's and 9 min from Disneyland). The cost is exceptional for the room size, full kitchen, pool, cleanliness and guest services willingness to help.
Manager Response: So glad you won't stay anywhere else when visiting Anaheim! Thanks so much for the helpful feedback and tips. We will make sure to use them to better our hotel.

Summary: Hotel was very good, just one strange thing... out of three night we stayed there, two of the nights there was a strange odor of fish... the third night. no fish smell. We opened the sliding glass door to the lovely patio and the smell went away and didn't come back the whole night.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay! We are unsure of the fish odor you experience. We hope you contacted the front desk so we could try to help the situation. Hope you come back again soon.

Summary: Requested for adjoining rooms and ones arrived was told that it's not guaranteed.  This is the reason I picked this hotel to have family next-door so the kids could go room to room . No help by my front desk. They said  would contact the manager but nobody showed up. Reservations under Joshua Story  for two rooms  October 7 and 8 2016.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your honest feedback. We are sorry that we were not able to accommodate the adjoining room request. We can never make a guarantee but are also sorry that our front desk manager did not contact you to explain the situation further. We value you and your family, and the many times you have stayed with us in the past.

Summary Heading: Very Nice place for the Price
Summary: Was very pleased with this hotel.  It was clean, very reasonably priced and located close to a lot of attractions.  The breakfast could have been a bit better, but it wasn't terrible.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: So glad you will stay again! thanks for the great review.

Summary: The first impression of the hotel was total charm. The decor and building took us back to old California - it was very enjoyable. Once we were in the room, we continued to be amazed with the size of it and its comfort. Soon after we received a phone call from the front desk: the receptionist wanted to know whether we were satisfied with the room....that's a first for us! All in all, we were very pleased with the hotel and would happily return.
Manager Response: So happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm! Can't wait for you to return.

Summary: Room was very comfortable, and the staff was very helpful and friendly.   Continental breakfast would have been better served with in the hotel itself, but the kitchen was a nice feature in the room-- I would definitely stay here again.

The room was comfortable, staff was friendly, breakfast was not that great but doable. For the price it OK close to Disneyland and that was great, wish they had a shuttle. Would stay here again on another trip.

Everything was great, from the welcoming front desk, to the room. We will definitely be back! The hotel staff were helpful and nice. We didn't use the pool, but it looked inviting. Great service all around.

Beds were super comfortable. And the room was the perfect size for the both of us. We were very happy with our stay. More food choices for breakfast would be ideal. But we ate at the actual restaurant for lunch and it was very good.

Summary Heading: Nice boutique hotel with excellent customer service
Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree while visiting Knott's Berry Farm and Long Beach.   The front desk staff went above and beyond, first calling us to confirm the details of our reservation and also checking in with us after we settled into our room. Although the hotel is older, it is well-maintained and the rooms are clean and spacious. For the price we paid for the room, we felt like we got a really good value.  The continental breakfast was OK, but was overloaded with carbohydrates such as bagels, cereal, toast and donuts ... it would have been nice to have some kind of protein to choose from, although they do offer hot breakfast items for a very reasonable price.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay and the Hotel Pepper Tree and would definitely return if we're back in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: I chose it because of the reviews
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for my first Disneyland trip. For the price is great but I have to mention few things that were uncomfortable: thin walls, I had a pretty bad neighbor who was shouting at midnight or maybe he was just loud but you could hear everything; the bathroom door could use a fresh paint; the bathroom sink needs urgent remodeling, its old, ugly, stained, and the cabinet is falling apart, please remodel the sinks; the shower handles were loose, and the cleaning staff left a considerable amount of hair in the tub, good thing it was my own but still this doesn't happen in a Hilton, so that's why I say it's great for the price but if the staff wants to grow and keep getting nice reviews you should do better.  Free parking is great, the breakfast is light continental so
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a helpful and thorough review. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and will use your feedback to better our hotel. We definitely talk to the management team about your bathroom suggestions and make sure to check your room personally to make sure it is meeting our standards. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Charming and cozy place to stay when visiting Anaheim.  Excellent staff are courteous, friendly and helpful.  It felt like we were staying with family in their extra room.  Not luxurious by any stretch but provides great value.  Couldn't have been happier!
Manager Response: Love to hear that is was like staying with family! Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Great Place and Great Location. Staff is Fantastic!!!
Summary: Place is great and the staff goes out of their way to help you. Great location if you are going to Disney, Knott's Berry Farm. We will definitely stay here again if we return to this area. The rooms are clean, the bathroom area is a little small.
Manager Response: So happy that you will be back! Thanks for the great review and helpful feedback.

Summary: Enjoyed a fun weekend with family at the Hotel. Loved having a kitchen, helped us save some money over our 4 day stay. Grocery store and plenty of good options were within walking distance, which was a plus. Short drive to Disneyland, which was the point of the visit. I will absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: So glad we were a great fit for your Disneyland trip! Can't wait for you to come back again.

Summary: Very good service, nice clean room, near amuzement parks, good neighbotrhood very serviceminded personell, easy to park, nice breakfast (you have to buy wsrm breakfast), etc I can really recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Diamond in disguise! First time here! Alot of the reviews made me question things here. Even when I got here I questioned the exterior. This place is awesome! The Free Breakfast was good! They had cold cereal 4 kinds, watermelon, honeydew, cantaloupe, yogurt. Four different kinds of bread to choose from not including the bagels, cream cheese, Orange Juice, coffee, jam, peanut butter! It was good! We got a King Courtyard room it was nice and spacious! We love the full kitchens here even with a stove! Fyi there is a Supermarket right across the road which is very convenient!
Manager Response: Thanks of the great review and helpful feedback! So glad you enjoyed your stay and the full kitchens in our rooms.  Come back again soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel with a lot of personality, if you want to get out of the national chains and into a unique locally owned hotel.  The staff was friendly and it was a pleasure not to be in a cookie cutter type of hotel.  It's nice that there were balconies and the rooms were a good size.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great comments! So glad you enjoyed our boutique charm and large rooms.

Summary: Enjoyed the property and employees were friendly and willing to assist my needs. Would return of the wifi was better and better improved. Was easy to get to Disney from the hotel. Just a short lyft or uber away.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed the staff and hotel! We will look into the WiFi connection from your room... we do not normally have any wifi issues throughout the property. We do hope you come back again.

Summary: Great hotel. The did try to charge us $150 for "smoking the room" when all we did was dump the ashtray in the garbage but after talking with the manager i agreed to pay $50 because i do understand there side of it. Everything else was great.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest and helpful feedback. So sorry about the confusion and thanks for being so understanding. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope you come back again.

Summary: This was a great place to stay, the staff was amazing!  The breakfast is nice.  The doors on the rooms let some noise in but it was still an amazing and nice clean hotel.  There is no hot tub but a nice pool.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. So glad you enjoyed the staff!! We will make sure they see your comments. We are working on making the doors more soundproof.

Summary: Very Very Very old kitchen cabinets and dishwears Needs a lot of upgrades They should not use paint to cover all issues, specially rusted tub and bathrooms hotel rating is not accurate and should be rated considering all aspects. in our arrival just at the front desk when we were checking in we asked for drinking water and they told us to use the vending machine with fees to getting water.   Woow, what a welcome!!!!!!!  I hope the property management consider gusts request more serious as these trips are for families to have fun as they wait years to take their vacation and they do not want any disappointment once they arrive to their destinations  Never, Never,Never come back again.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. Since you were not satisified with your stay, we did give you a refund of all the nights that you did not use. Most of our rooms are recently renovated with new kitchens and granite counter tops which our guests love.  We do also have water available at the front desk for all our guests when they checking. Thanks for your feedback. We are again sorry that our property wasn't what you were expecting.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Pepier Tree vey much, very happy with all aspects of the facilities, could possibly upgrade to sun loungers rather than chairs, the only criticism we would make is the lack of safe in the room, we were out on road trips most days and had to take all of our valuables ekectronics/ passports with us, these we would normally leave in a safe
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback. So glad you enjoyed your stay. We will your comments and suggestions to better our hotel.

Summary: stayed 11 days. good room, really bad refrigerator, it was old and made a lot of noise, nice big room. had a room with patio, nice clean hotel. Easy acces to all the room. Free parking, and shopping near the hotel. Very friendly staff

This hotel is very clean! Very basic looking but what matters to me is CLEANLINESS! Location is super convenient as well, whether you're driving or using uber, all main attractions are 15min away (Disneyland/Knott's) and Hollywood (Universal) is about a half hour away. Customer service was great too, very helpful and welcoming. I will definitely be coming back on my next disney trip.

Beautiful granite kitchen and bathrooms. Very comfortable bed, everything was spotless. Great continental breakfast included with fresh fruit, cereals, toast and pastries. Very friendly staff. This hotel has style! I will stay here every trip to Disneyland!

Our room was like a studio apartment with a kitchen, balcony, sitting area and big closet. Everything was nice and clean and the bed was super comfortable. I loved the pillows and the bedding and that we could have the ac fan pointed towards our bed at night. There's lots of dark wood and really unique furnishings. It felt like home; I'd move in if I could. My only complaint is that the continental breakfast and coffee could have been better and the bathtub needed re-caulking, but those were so minor and everything else more than made up for it

We only stayed briefly overnight and left early so we didn't really use any of the facilities. Everything was clean and well prepared. We were happy with the accomodation and would use it again if we were ever in the area again

Summary Heading: Very good stay at the pepper tree
Summary: We enjoyed our stay. A little more variety at the breakfast would be nice. Overall I would recommend sstaying at this property. It would also be nice if there was some sort of shuttle for Disneyland from this area.

Needed a place to stay close to work with a kitchen while my house was being tented. it is a nice place to stay it was  quiet and clean. the room was comfortable the staff was very helpful and nice we enjoyed our stay and will stay again
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We hope to see you again soon. So glad you enjoyed the room and helpful staff.

Summary: Very Nice place  Room is spacious and well equiped  Nice kitchen  If you want to buy food there is a mexican supermarket on the other side of the road. We Will return if we have a chance to come back to LA👍 Small désappointement : pool was a little bit dirty (dead flies...) and should be cleaned more often.  Définitly a great place to go!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful tips and feedback. So glad you enjoyed the full kitchen during your stay. We do clean the pool each morning but will let the maintenance staff know about the issues you encountered.

Summary: Hotel is located in area not good for going out by walking at night with family. You have to do it by car. If you want to shopping, there are Ross & Walmart very close. Disneyland park is 20 min away thru freeway.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are located only 10 minutes away driving from the Disneyland resort. Our staff will help give directions that avoid the freeway and make the drive very quick. We do have lots of shopping with 5 minutes also.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights. Were not given enough linens.   Even after leaving a tip for housekeeper we were only given one wash cloth for two people.  Air conditioner was great.  Beds were fair.  Grounds well kept for an older hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful and honest feedback. Glad you enjoyed the grounds and room. We will talk to the housekeeping staff immediately. We are sorry that they failed to correctly service the room.

Summary: Nice place to stay , near to Disney land , reasonable price for the stay at that time of the year,the wifi is excellent,parking is free of charge and wide enough,overall the stay was very good experience.
Manager Response: So glad you had a great time at the hotel during your Disneyland visit! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: I thought for my daughter's 21st birthday, with the request to spend it Disneyland, I made reservations for 3 nights at The Hotel Pepper Tree boutique-styled hotel.  When I made the reservation, I told tthem it was my daughter's 21st birthday and that she was also a dual citizen of America and Australia.  The hotel is owned by Australian families.  We checked in after 9pm and when we got into the room there was not only a beautiful amenity for her birthday, but a card and VEGEMITE!!  We forgot to bring ours.  What a welcome.  The staff was so helpful and the rooms was wonderful.  You will not go wrong booking this hotel.  You couldn't aske for better!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for choosing us for your birthday celebration! We love Aussies!!  Thanks for the great review.

Summary: I almost passed the place. There is a Mexican seafood restaurant in the front parking lot. If you blink, you'll miss the hotel. The room could have been cleaner. I did not wish to walk on the floors with bare feet. There was lots of lint build up in the exhaust fan in the shower area & the bath water continuously dripped. The beds were hard & the towels were obviously old, stiff & worn out. Not worth the $209.00 a night, but stayed there due to limited availability elsewhere. The pictures online were much nicer than the hotel! I would not stay there again.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and have the same experience that most of our guests have. We will make sure our housekeeping sees your comments immediately. You did book the room last minute on a very busy weekend which did make the rates higher than normal. We always recommend booking early for the best rates!

Summary: Property was nice, clean and enjoyable. Our room was huge with a kitchenette. Staff were wonderful. The place was really affordable, much cheaper than staying near Disneyland. Disneyland is a 10 minute drive.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Everything was excellent  I really like it i will come back
Summary: Was excellent service I really recommend to  my friends they have really nice service, next time I will go back to the same hotel everyone was to friendly my family was so happy  with you guys I will to recommend to everybody
Manager Response: So glad you will be back. Thank you so much for the great recommendations and review!

Summary Heading: LOVE IT!! Want to use as permanent family vacation hotel.
Summary: The Hotel Peppertree was just overall AMAZING!! Everything was better than we expected. Reasonable price for the location and luxury. We hope to use this hotel every year for our family vacations.  Only problem was our card key wasn't working while we were getting our stuff in the room. It was apparently fixed over night while we were asleep. When we woke up it was working.  Also there is a problem with my deposit refund. I used a debit card and they needed a $200 deposit and it will be refunded after check out. They did inform us it takes about 3 business days..understandable. Yet it has been over 2 weeks since we checked out and I still have not received it. I'm not sure where the problem is but I hope it is resolved because I would love to come back EVERY YEAR.
Manager Response: We do hope you come back every year! Thanks so much for the review. We did make the refund to your debit card which you will hopefully see soon. If not, please let us know immediately. Thanks again for the great comments.

Summary: This place was out of the way of the hustle and bustle of LA and Disney, yet close to everything.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  It was comfortable and clean.  I couldn't give it 5 stars because it's a little dated.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback! So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: It was fine for what it was. It is in a convenient location for where I need to be for work. The sheets were not in the best condition and had holes and such in them. The breakfast was really bad. and don't recommend eating it.
Manager Response: Thanks for the honest feedback. We are happy that we were in a convenient location for your. We will make sure the housekeeping staff sees your comments about the sheets. We are also working on some big updates for our continental breakfast.

Summary: Excellent Great value for the money cooked every day-wonderful decor and vibe! Mattresses a little hard but great housekeeping and service. We really loved this spot. Nice and casual with great touches.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad you enjoyed our service and style.

Summary Heading: We WILL be back!  Very clean and comfortable.
Summary: The full kitchen was the best.  Housekeeping was excellent.   The staff and maintenance were also top notch.   The only thing that I  would take off points on was that the bed was hard and creepy, but that will not keep me from returning.  Oh, also, the a/c unit was the best I have ever encountered.   Very quiet.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed the room and full kitchen! Thanks so much for the review.

Summary: Good location, bit far from los angeles but close to theme parks. Would have shortened stay, once theme park done, would have liked to be abit closer to LA.  Traffic can make an hour trip into 3hr trip from la to anahiem.
Manager Response: So glad we were a good fit your time at Disneyland. Anaheim can be a bit of a drive to LA depending on traffic and time of day. Our front desk staff can always offer tips on the best ways to see the sights in the city.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel spoilt by slipshod maintenance
Summary: Cooker gas supply turned off and nobody around to turn it on.  Extractor hood in kitchen didn't work and filters also missing. Otherwise room excellent and staff very helpfull. Nice swimming pool and ac worked very well.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the staff and room. We will make sure our maintenance team looks into your stove immediately.

Summary: We have stayed at the Pepper Tree in the past and enjoyed our stay(s), thus our decision to return.  We love the idea of having a balcony and of course a kitchenette in the room.  The full refrigerator is a wonderful addition as we usually have some things that we want/need to put in it.  Comes in very handy.  We always ask to have a room overlooking the pool and they do the best they can to accommodate and have always succeeded!  We will definitely return in the future!
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks so much for coming back. So glad you love the full kitchens and big balconies! Come again soon.

Summary: Love the location with grocery stores just across the street and seafood restaurant just in the parking lot.  Very courteous staff and clean room.  Enjoyed my stay as I was a Newly Wed  and with my husband this was his first stay.  He loved the kitchen and all its amenities.  Very comfortable and clean room
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great feedback! Love to hear that you enjoyed the room and full kitchen.

Summary: Front  desk weren't very friendly seemed like they did not enjoy their job. When checking in, it seemed as if we were an invonvenience to the front desk staff's  current vonversation or tasks at hand. Beds were comfy, but kinda grossed out by latex glove under our mattress for what reason I do not know . The outside patio was pleasant , however, the lion waterfall was not running/working, stale water. The overall stay was pleasant until the roaches started appearing which turned us off from staying here again!
Manager Response: We are sorry that you did not seem to receive our best service. We are thankful for your feedback and will look into the issues that you mentioned immediately. We will make sure our management team sees your comments and addresses the issues.

Summary Heading: The best value for your money!
Summary: I traveled with my boyfriend in a rental car. We had plans to go to Disney and to do different activities in Los Angeles and we decided to stay in Anaheim, because let's be honest, staying in Los Angeles is crazy expensive. We came across this hotel thanks to TripAdvisor and decided to give it a go. From the moment we booked our room the staff was attentive to our needs, sending me an email to confirm if I had any special requirements so they could prepare for our arrival (Who does that?). We arrived a little early to the hotel, but they let us check-in without any extra charges. The room was very spacious, with a roomy closet, a dressing table, a spacious enough bathroom and a kitchen very well equipped. It had a fridge (the ice tray was filled!), a stove, pots, pans, plates,
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay. Come back again soon.

Summary: Great room for the buck, convenient to everything, staff was very friendly and our room was clean and spacious.  Did have a back up of water while taking a shower, and the toilet backed up as well but other than that was a very nice place and it was taken care of quickly.

Summary Heading: A very good hotel for a low price
Summary: Large room, decent kitchen, comfort bed, overall its a good hotel for the price that we paid.  Fan in bathroom doesn't work. TV should be bigger.  We stayed for 14 days. And we found everything to be good.

Finally after years of staying in various hotels in anaheim we found the pepper tree.  It was the best place we have stayed to date and I have stayed at all the major chains along harbor.  I will revisit this hotel because of the location and service.  It is an older facility but was better maintain than some of the newer establishments we have stayed.  The weak link is the bathroom area but on the whole I dont stay in the bathroom more than an hour for the 4 days we stayed.   The people were excellent and the parking is easy, plenty and free which isnt the same at other places that love to charge for everything extra like parking and wifi,  hope to see you soon.

We had an awesome stay, everyone was friendly. It was very clean and well organized. I would recommend this place to all my family and friends. It's also very close to the Disneyland theme park. I would definitely come back!

very Good places. Good position . very Good Rate. Poor breakfast. very Large room and bathroom excellent for family Complete kitchen e good supermarket across the street. Beds very comfy. Front desk peeps very friendly and kind

Low budget hotel with full kitchen; the stove was gas and some of the burners didn't work. Full fridge, microwave, coffeepot, pots & pans, utensils. The tub stopper didn't work in the tub, but the shower had lots of hot water. There are stairs, and we were on the third floor. Ok for us but maybe not less ambulatory folks. The continental breakfast wasn't very good.... we chose to eat elsewhere after the first morning. Good stores nearby, within a mile or two. we paid for late checkout ($23) but Housekeeping wasn't notified & still knocked on the door, then our room keycards were de-activated at 11:00, though we paid until 3:00. Thin walls...
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to look into the issues you mentioned in your room immediately. We do have an elevator in the hotel for all of our guests to use. We will also work with our housekeeping staff regarding the late checkout issue. Thanks again for the helpful feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: My family enjoyed our stay at pepper tree the kitchen is a major bonus and proximity to Disneyland is great ease to get there from hotel plus having that great supermarket across the street was great and kids love the pool we will make sure to come back in a couple of years and look forward to book at the pepper tree ☮

As we walked in we could feel this was going to be a great stay! Customer service was awesome they front desk peeps were so nice and friendly.. The room was super clean and the beds very comfy! For sure we will be staying again whenever we come back! Super close to all theme parks and major highways.. We definitely loved it! 💕

Summary Heading: A good hotel to stay in Anaheim
Summary: This is a good hotel in a good location. Rooms are big and have kitchen. Breakfast is good too. Rooms are clean and maintenance staff is doing its job. They have a small pool also which we didn't use. Location is great and you can find stores and restaurants around the area.

This hotel has a shared BBQ which we used and was ideal to save a few pounds from eating out all the time - there is a supermarket straight opposite. The room also has a small kitchen equipped with a fridge/freezer and oven so again we were able to make our own breakfast, dinner and picnics. The beds are comfortable and the room is clean. The TV's not great and neither is the WI FI but this can be overlooked. The pool area is clean and quiet. A sun lounger bed wouldn't go a miss as there are only chairs.

We have been to the Pepper tree a couple of times, it is our go to place on our stopovers between UK and NZ.  It is nice to have decent sized room, outside sitting area and full kitchen. We always find the staff friendly, professional and attentive. We don't come here to visit Disney, you definitely need a car as the area is some distance.

Comfortable, good service. Only complaint while we were there was the noise from a construction project, very loud and made it difficult to rest that day, however was not an ongoing issue. Overall would stay again.

I knew this was going to be a great place to stay when I made my reservation over the phone, and Angel was so warm and friendly. The level of customer service is that of a 5 star hotel. A special consideration was made to welcome my friend who was celebrating a birthday, and our room was absolutely perfect! I loved having a normal size refrigerator and kitchenette, the furnishings were tasteful and didn't feel like a generic hotel. There are amazing huge down pillows and the beds are firm and GREAT. Even the bath products are really awesome!  There are water features everywhere with fish, the pool is really beautiful. You can park where you can see your car, I'm fairly certain all rooms have a balcony. Many restaurants of all persuasions within a square mile (recommend Thai
Manager Response: Couldn't ask for a better review! Love to hear that we are as comfortable as home. So glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you can come back soon!

Summary Heading: Another good stay at Pepper Tree !
Summary: They were able to give us the room we requested. The room was clean and the free breakfast has been upgraded some since our last visit. Real orange juice! Will definitely stay again. Had s great stay.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for being a repeat guest! So glad you enjoyed another stay at Hotel Pepper Tree.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: Great condition, vintage room, nice service. Easy to access other places in Anaheim, such as Disney, Packing District. Breakfast is the only terrible thing in this stay, which is even not a half course of continental breakfast. Basically it is just breads, cereal, coffee.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback! We are working on some big changes to our continental breakfast. Hope you can come back soon.

Summary: I stayed for a week at Hotel Pepper tree  and everything was really fantastic.
