Ffrom the front desk to the pool and room.The only issue was my stove didn't work bbut the cutie at the front desk was so nice he moved us into another room, actually aan upgrade! The hotel is so clean and beautiful. I loved sitting out on the balcony every day.

The hotel and room was very clean. The room came well-equipped with a full service kitchen (including full size fridge, stove, microwave, utensils, dishes, cookware, etc).  Room was also spacious and very comfortable, with a separate seating area. Linens were clean and modern; Spanish style was very aesthetically pleasing. The continental breakfast was better than average and within a full service restaurant, offering additional options for ordering (at an additional cost, but reasonable). Overall excellent value for the money.

Everything was great. Great room to stay in for a trip out to Anaheim. It was a pretty decent size room.  It had everything that you need in the kitchen which made it awesome. The breakfast was not so great.  I wish they had real breakfast not just donuts. I would definitely recommend for anyone one to stay in this hotel.

we loved everything, quiet rooms,great people at the desk.surroundings actually nice,poolarea great but maybe missin some beds so you could lay on your belly as well =) breakfast ok,missing some ham maybe.......

We had a great stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. It was our first time and we will be back. It's close to all the attractions. The beach is about 20 minutes away. Which isn't bad. They only complaint we have is you could hear people in the hallway at night. And our neighbors above sounded like they were moving furniture around. Staff was very nice and very helpful.

we were greated and assisted on a timely manner great staff . Pool does not have outside shower and people just jump in to the pool without showering first ... housekeeping staff are nice ... front desk staff excellent

Had a great time, staff friendly, room and pool fantastic. Breakfast not the best but you can't have everything. Really easy to drive to Disney (about 10 miles). Shops close by for anything last minute. Would definitely return!

Great location and large rooms. It felt like w had our own apartment! Staff were friendly and the property was well cared for. The included breakfast was the only dissappointment. It would be nice to see more fruits and more than strawberry yogurt. The oastries were out of a box but there was always ample amounts of food available. Met the basic needs for breakfast. In fairness, the restaurant is independent of the hotel
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback. So glad you enjoyed the large rooms and the rest of our property. We are making some big changes to our continental breakfast. Hope you can come back again soon.

Summary: This hotel was great for our needs. Super friendly reception, with helpful tips about the area. The hotel room was very comfortable and spacious. Very close to Disneyland, about 10 minute drive. 20 minutes to Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Glad we were a perfect fit!! Thanks so much for the review.

Summary: Everything is good, service is good.Facilities is good. once  I met problem, hotel works help me. I like your hotel.It gives me good impression.The workers help make a lot of service,such as looking for some seeing sight, shopping, booking universal studio ticket and so on.I feel I am at my home.
Manager Response: So happy that you felt at home at our hotel! We couldn't ask for a better comment. Thanks for the review.

Summary: Stayed there for 3 nights. Pretty close to Disney Land Parks, you can see the fireworks from here, it's that close... Spacious rooms and patio, super friendly front desk guys!!! Breakfast is provided at the restaurant which is adjacent to the hotel. There aren't too many options though, but on a overall basis it was good. If you have expectation like Extended Stay or Candle-wood suites, then you would find this better than those. Our primary objective was to get a decent hotel near Disney having kitchen and utensils, with my little son staying with us, considering that aspect, it met our expectation.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review! So happy to hear that you used and enjoyed the full kitchen in your room.

Summary: A nice comfortable setting. Loved that it had plenty of space for our clothes. Didn't like the fact that when we needed maid service an hour after they stopped cleaning and couldn't get it. Had problems with guest above us making loud noise so I called the front desk and they took care of it.
Manager Response: We are happy that you enjoyed our boutique charm and large rooms. Thanks for the feedback about the staff - we will use this to better our hotel.

Summary: nice hotel for extended stay of more than a few days .Hotel was  clean and fairly quiet not a fan of Breakfast but you had the option of cooking your own which we did .Room was Nice size and had everything we needed.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and full kitchen! We are making some big changes to our continental breakfast service soon. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: This hotel is pretty, quiet, safe and loveable. I literally have no complaints whatsoever. I'm shocked to see any negative reviews at all! My family stayed here for four nights on our first trip to Disneyland in California and couldn't have asked for a better hotel. Everything was perfect. The staff were lovely, the rooms were perfect and the pool was clean and never busy. You can get food delivered to the rooms or visit the supermarket across the road which is barely a two minute walk. There's a strip mall to the right of the hotel with a laundrette, Subway and others for further needs. Disney is around 10 minutes away! No complaints, would love to return!
Manager Response: So happy you will return! Thanks for the great recommendations.

Summary: Centrally located easy to get to the sites we wanted to go to.Room was Nice and clean , quiet and better then I thought it would be, the continental breakfast had some pretty good choices to chose from.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations! Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel and Room, not great neighborhood
Summary: We would have loved this hotel a lot more if the maintenance guy hadn't been pounding on equipment the entire morning. If they needed to work on that equipment they shouldn't have put us in the room directly next to it. The neighborhood isn't great but it's close to a lot of great stuff. We loved the covered patio and the room was very nice. The noise was my biggest complaint.
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your room and courtyard patio but are so sorry for the noise issue you experienced. We will make sure to work with the maintenance staff. We hope you do come back again.

Summary: The hotel is cute and located very near to the Disneyland parks. The room was huge and well maintained. The balcony was also quite large. We loved it here. My only complaint would be that the continental breakfast was very limited in options. However, I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed our boutique charm and big rooms! We are making some big improvements to our continental breakfast soon. Thanks for the review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Cute and confortable! Vert near Disneyland! We appreciated the balcony.  Staff very friendly at the front desk.  Comfortable beds!  We appreciated the grocery store and the 7& 11 in front of the hotel. We would recommand this hotel to families.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendations! glad you enjoyed the room and staff.

Summary Heading: Spacious room, great for a couple of days stay
Summary: Spacious room, great for a stay of 1-3 days. Had no complains except that there was no way to turn off the balcony light. The location of the hotel was just a tad shady though. Around midnight, saw a guy loitering on a bicycle asking for smokes.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback! Glad you enjoyed our large studios. We are located right between Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm in a  more residential area of Anaheim. We have a golf course next store and very close to grocery shops, Target, etc.

Summary: The location of the hotel is very good. There is a supermarket at the door. The room is very clean. The kitchen is well equipped. The bed is very comfortable. It will be a good hotel.nice.I like it.verygood.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! Glad you had  a great experience.

Summary: we enjoyed the stay, good location and satisfied service. The room is clean and confortable. It's a good place for Disney visiting. Good kichen and valueable hotel, strong recommond to visitors. good stay!

I would recommend this hotel.  The kitchen is adequate for cooking quick meals (though the grill at the pool takes a while to cook food) and the room is quite comfortable.  Though I did not think the hotel necessitated a resort fee as the pool was small and there are no resort amenities.  Overall if you are spending most of the time doing things the hotel is perfect

Summary Heading: Nice stay at hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: Great location (with car), nice, clean, quiet and confortable room with a kitchen, and good service.  We would return to this place, in case there's a need to visit Anaheim/Los Angeles again.  Pool was nice and complementary breakfast ok...possibility to do your own breaky in your own kitchen. Supermarket was on the other side of the road. Nice shops/restaurants near by too and Disneyland plus Knott Berry's farm.

I love that the room we had was comparable to a mini studio apartment. There was a kitchen, mini living room area, and even a patio that was closed off from the public. The overall value and quality of the room and pricing is unbeatable. We had no issues with our stay here.

Good location just a short drive from Disneyland and California Adventures. Kitchen amenities were a nice bonus. Bed was fairly comfortable, but the chairs were not, they felt very old. Found a candy wrapper near my nightstand. But it was an affordable stay and I definitely enjoyed it.

Summary Heading: Great Family Option close to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel served us really well for visiting Disneyland and Universal studios . We asked for two rooms side by side for our family which was arranged by front desk plus we got an earlier check in  after arriving on the early morning flight. The breakfast is basic starting at 7am, but with the full  kitchen in your room it's  easy to grab supplies and look after yourselves.  Love the decore, a quiet relaxed atmosphere. The front desk are super helpful  and house keeping keep the rooms clean and are low key . This hotel is a good affordable option for families traveling to Disneyland , a 10min drive away. Tickets can be purchased at front desk. Also there is a pool but we where not around to use it . Just really easy stay, thanks.

We have stayed here at least 6 or 7 times now. Nice place, good sized rooms, full size fridge, cooking facilities. Great handy location. Clean & tidy, staff helpful. Wifi can be unreliable is my only concern.

Very nice solution to stay in Anaheim area. Comfortable rooms, nicely decorated. Overall a very nice . Pity for  the breakfast served in the nearby restaurant, definetely not up to the level of  the hotel

This hotel is hidden  gem..  Love love love this hotel stay here with my fiance  for a getaway  .. Didn't  want to leave . Halls where nicely  decorated .. The room was quiet and comfy..  A Minnie  apt..  The front desk was magnificent  .. Couldn't ask for more

The Pepper Tree is as advertised. Friendly, helpful staff. The rooms are a good size with a sitting area and a kitchen, with all the necessary items to go with it - although I don't think we had a toaster. The continental breakfast is good and there is a 7/11 and a supermarket just across the street. Close to everything and good value for money. We enjoyed our stay.

Summary Heading: Lovely Stay at Hotel Pepper Tree!
Summary: Hotel Pepper Tree seemed to be in an older part of town, so we were a little skeptical when we drove up, but we were pleasantly surprised at this unique hotel! It was clean, the staff was friendly, and we enjoyed having a little kitchen in our room (I don't recall reading about it). I thought the place was a nice change from the usual "hotel decor". The continental breakfast was sufficient but a little crowded, as guests were all hungry and in a hurry to get their day started. :) The only thing I would change was the beds: they were pretty hard. Other than that this was a great stay!

We really enjoyed our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree. The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. It has a nice atmosphere and the continental breakfast was great to get our sight seeing trips off to a good start.

Made a trip to Disneyland for my fiances birthday. When going to Disneyland of course, there are so many options in choosing hotels. I wanted to stay at a hotel we haven't before but was still in great proximity of everything. Not only was the location just a stones throw away from Disneyland but the hotel itself was great! Really cool vibes with classic movie posters in its hallways. The hotel itself has a Spanish antique vibe to it which matches our styles. We loved our studio room, felt like we were in our own place that was ours. Never been to a hotel quite like it! I'd say it's one of a kind and at a good rate! Highly recommend staying at this hotel!

This is an excellent place to stay in terms of money, location and amenities. I liked the kitchen with all the utensils. Room was pretty big and had good bed and a small balcony. There was plenty of parking available in front of the hotel. Breakfast was also decent. Overall, awesome hotel!!!

Can't say enough about how much we loved this place.  The customer service was the absolute BEST!!!  The pictures don't lie, what you see is what you get.  It was great to have a full kitchen and BBQ.  This will be our place to stay any time we are in the area from now on.  Next will be for FUN!

The hotel was very nice. Employees and room were great. Kitchen was a little small but it was perfect as not many hotels offer that bonus for the price of the room. Views were great, hotel look was very nice.

The breakfast very poor and plastic. They should add some vegetable. There was a big room and a lot of space, just the bathroom was dirty and sink was stuck. It would be a good idea to change some furniture there and those dirty and stale carpets aswell.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will use your comments to better our hotel. We are making big changes to our breakfast. We hope that you will come again to see the changes.

Summary: We usually stay at this hotel whenever we head to the LA area.  It's close enough to Disneyland where you can get there in a few minutes.  It's also nice to have the full kitchen should we decide to not eat out somewhere or just need to re-heat some leftovers.  The rooms on the ground floor are nice because you have a nice patio with a small fountain.  The wall is high enough to give you some privacy and it is very relaxing.  The only negative things I have to say is that the breakfast was a little disappointing, but we did get there late so it may have been better if we got there earlier.  Also, the bed was a little too firm for me.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your helpful feedback and great review! We are working on some huge changes for our breakfast which will be announced soon. Thanks for being a loyal guest.

Summary: When booking hotel pepper tree our expectations we pretty low since it was so inexpensive but they blew us away! Our room was big and very clean, and the breakfast was very satisfying with fresh fruit and tea. We will definitely be staying there when we go back to Anaheim and recommending them to all our friends and family!!
Manager Response: So happy to beat your expectations! Glad you will be back again.

Summary: When choosing this hotel I decided it would awesome to get a free breakfast every morning, but unfortunately it was a continental breakfast.  I'd say it was more of "county breakfast".  On the booking it was said to be a breakfast, not continental.  It is what it is and it was an average hotel.  The worst part of this place was every step or sound that you could hear.  This isn't the place to go if you want quietness or sleep.  The pool time ends at 10pm?? No pool after 10 in California??  The people were nice here but the facility is what it is.
Manager Response: Thanks for your honest and helpful feedback. We do advertise on our website that we offer a continental breakfast each morning. Sorry that you saw something different. We do close the pool at 10pm to quiet the area quiet especially since some of our rooms have private patios or balconies facing the pool area. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations.

Summary: Charming, retro decor inside. The outside of the building looks a little run down but the inside of the building is well kept. The room was comfortable and a great size. The gap under the door means you can hear everything that happens in the hallway but with quiet times, it was not an issue in the evening. Wish the breakfast was available earlier than 7am since I had to leave at 6:30am.

I arrived earlier than expected. The charged me 23$ for early check-in. Maybe it is according to regulation but certainly gives you a bad taste, not to return again...! The noise from the fountain can drive you crazy...

It has a lot of space in the room and in parking area. They were very gentle with our packages, really clean rooms and in a very good location to go Disneyland. Rooms are very clean and they have a restaurant in the same location and also are some place with food xsing the street.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review and helpful feedback. We hope you can come back again soon!

Summary: This hotel as a general is good and suitable for family staying in Anaheim , good location and services as well . Price is slightly high but as a general it's okay for the other features offered by the hotel .
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. Our prices will vary greatly depending on season. Make sure to talk to our front desk for best tips on prices and the best times to visit the Anaheim area.

Summary: We needed a place to stay for one night only. So there is lots I CAN'T tell you about this inn. I did NOT make use of the WiFi, the kitchen, the continental breakfast or second day maid service. I can only tell you that given the relatively reasonable price, I was pleasantly surprised with the location, the outside and inside appearance, the sleeping area and the bathroom facilities. I felt safe and our stay was comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Glad you will be back! Hope you can stay longer next time to take advantage of all of our amenities.

Summary: Our hotel room was beautiful. It was spacious and 100 times better then I expected. The kitchenette had a full size stove and refrigerator and there were even dishes and pots and pans for cooking. Only thing missing was a baking sheet. lol The room was emaculet and that was the most comfortable hotel bed I have ever slept on. The staff was great and friendly and knew the area and always answered our questions. The private patio, where you could smoke, was a great bonus. I absolutely loved our room and our entire stay and have told everybody how wonderful the hotel is. EXTREMELY SATISFIED AND WILL BE RETURNING!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review!!! We appreciate the kind words and helpful feedback. Come back soon!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, spacious room, clean
Summary: It is a mini house 👍🏻 very nice. There is even a kitchen. The hotel is nicely decorated. Good location. friendly people. We stayed here because we wanted tp visit Disneyland. This is about 8 minutes driving.
Manager Response: Loved being your home away from home. Glad to hear that you enjoyed the full kitchen! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Found this unique, spacious, clean and fully equipped hotel via booking.com.  Reasonable pricing.  Loved our 5 night stay there.  All the staff we encountered were courteous, friendly amd helpful. Already been telling friends and family about this hotel.  Definitely will stay here next time in LA/Aneheim area.  Only wished that breakfast had a bit more substance such as sausage, eggs, pancakes :-).

The staffs were very kind.  The pool also was good, and breakfast was delicious.  There is a mart across the hetel.  And the hotel is near from Disney Land.  Free parking, and free wifi available.  Everything was excellent.

This is a very beautiful hotel, especially for the price. This is our second time staying here. The beaches are about 30 minutes away, and Universal Studios about an hour away. My husband, kids, and I also really enjoyed the outdoor pool! They have kept up the grounds beautifully and we will definitely be coming back. The only complaint I have is that the mattresses are quite hard.

This is our second trip staying with hotel pepper tree. I have 4 children and we love it. The kitchen is great as well as the full size refrigerator. The beds are comfortable and the kids love the pool. Front desk staff is always very helpful and never rude. This trip was kinda pricey compared to our last, but I guess that's to be expected in the middle of summer. We will definitely stay again

Hotel Pepper Tree has a nice pool and is close to Disneyland.  The light continental breakfast is very limited (bread, juice, coffee, fruit.)The front desk is friendly and it is a good value.  The rooms are large and having a kitchenette is helpful.

Everything I expected at a very affordable price. The place was clean, spacious and service was excellent as well. A few things I would like to note: 1. Wi-Fi was slow 2. Kitchen frying pan was too small. I would definitely recommend Hotel Pepper Tree to family and friend and return on my next visit to the OC.

I only stayed one night here but I would go back without a doubt. I would only add a jacuzzi.... ☺ but other than that everything was great. The guys at customer service were really nice and friendly and very helpful. The room was clean and very well decorated it had a nice vice to it. Thanks.

Over priced needs updated poor amenities, ragged towels, awful air conditioning, very noisy  I would recommend to my friends and family avoid this hotel. There are many others in the area that are much cleaner and a much better value.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We wish you would have told us about your AC issues immediately. All of our rooms have brand new AC units that are very quiet - you must have put it on a wrong settting. Again, we are sorry that you did not have the same experience that most of our guests have with us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a long-term stay
Summary: Great hotel at a driving distance from Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and other attractions from the area. The hotel has a rather extensive kitchenette and one can cook or even bake in the room (we had the biggest room at the hotel)!  The people working at the front desk were super friendly and quickly responded to any requests. Breakfast was basic but satisfying. If you prefer to have an extensive breakfast, then you can easily cook in the room. There are a lot of grocery stores and restaurants near by as well. If I ever go back to Anaheim, I will consider stay at Hotel Pepper Tree again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback! All of our rooms do have full kitchens - so glad you enjoyed yours! Thanks for the great tips.

Summary: Good hotel for Disneyland. Free parking, free wifi (not stable but ok), breakfast is plus, resort fee is reasonable. Should have shutle to Disneyland. Room is ok. Service staff was friendtly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We appreciate your helpful and honest feedback. We will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: not well cleaned toilet made me sick. In addtion, There were two dirty cotton swabs was on the floor until I took away them by myself. I NAVER used cotton swabs while I stay Hotel Pepper Tree so I don't know who used them...
Manager Response: We are so sorry that we failed to clean your room adequately. We will talk to the housekeeping staff immediately regarding the issues you had and will make sure to correct them.

Summary: The main purpose of our trip was to be with my dad and to be able to cook the food he is longing for as he is living in an assisted living facility.  I called ahead of time as to the importance of having a room for a wheelchaired guest and with sofa.  When we checked in, I was told that there is no available room for what I requested.  Of course, I was disappointed as I was worried about the safety of my dad.  But the front desk was able to handle the disappointment and will hold the room after 2 days. About the WIFI which is very important for my teenage son, the first night was great, he was very happy but after the  succeeding days, he started complaining.  As per sleep quality,  since we got a room near the elevator, maybe because it is an older building, we can hear the

Me and my family had a great stay! I will definitely stay here again. My kids had blast and the private patio was a big plus for the kids. The bed was very comfortable and there were plenty of towels so I did not have to ask for extras

Summary Heading: Good swimming pool and good services
Summary: Very nice swimming pool and good services. Very close to Disney and there is a super market opposite the street. Most importantly, we have the kitchen to cook what we want to eat. If I had the chance to visit Anaheim again, I will definitely choose it again.

The hotel was amazing the beds really comfortable. I liked how clean it was and it was close to disneyland. I will return to this hotel in the nearby future. The pool was also clean and nice to swim in.

I enjoyed my stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree.  The staff were very kind and helpful and the hotel amenities were good.   I just hadn't worked out properly how far I was from the main part of Anaheim - and being a woman travelling alone felt bit isolated.

The hotel is nice, clean and well-kept. Staff in reception is friendly and helpful. When we wanted to change room from first to third floor to get a better view, there were no problems. Our room was large and cosy, and kitchen facilities were OK. Only downside is the breakfast which is served in a nearby restaurant. There food was cheap and the place smelled. Appears completely different from the hotel itself.

This is  a great hotel to stay at. especially for extended stay. Couldn't really find anything wrong with the stay at all. The hotel does not have a gym was a down fall for our son. But, we really didn't stay to long in the room. We were there for vacation. If we are ever back in that area we would stay again. The wifi if again is a priority then I would suggest maybe buying a hotspot. It is weak. We didn't take advantage of the kitchen as we thought we would. Just fyi.. our room was supplied with kitchen essentials that a person could cook with.

We were staying there  with the family. We will recommand it . The barbecue at the swimming pool is an advantage. Everyone at the hotel was very friendly and helpful.  The location is excellent to visit  disneyland.

Great hotel friendly staff close to many places including Disneyland ! The pool was perfect! The bed was alittle uncomfortable but I think it's because we are use to our bed at home! Will definitely chose this hotel again

The Pepper Tree is a nice hotel. Excellent and very friendly staff. Our room with kitchen was, however, rundown and the kitchen was not very clean. The beds are good.  The breakfast was horrible. Poor selection and looked very unhygienic. We left and enjoyed our breakfast elsewhere.

This was our second stay at Hotel Pepper tree and we will sure stay there next time we visit Anaheim also.  With there super friendly staff it is perfect for familys along with it's pool area and a short driving distance to disneyland, and if you need anything there is a good market right a cross the street (even if you don't need anything it's worth the visit to see the mexican specialities).

The lady at the front desk was apprehensive and unfriendly when I complained about the room size. We booked a 650 s.f.room but got a room less than 400 s.f.  We did not get our money's worth! Will not visit again

Was in Anaheim on business, but hope to return with the family in tow in the future. I would def consider staying at Hotel Pepper Tree. Great location. Quaint hotel grounds and accommodations. Spacious room with a wonderful patio. I was on the bottom floor so I had a closed-in "courtyard" patio and it was very peaceful. Fairly close to the beach and only 10 minutes from Downtown Disney. Unless you are looking for a hotel that is modern & trendy, I'd recommend this quaint, charming hotel. Only potential negative is the bathroom needs to be updated, but I assume that is on their radar.

For the amount of money I payed I DEFINITELY would have expected a better continental breakfast out of it. Preferably one that was hot instead of the old-tasting donuts with cereal. For the second and third days I stayed, I even considered going to a breakfast resturant instead of paying extra for a hot served breakfast with the poor customer service in the resturant.

The hotel was easy to find and only a few minutes away from Disneyland and California adventure! We loved everything about the hotel and we will stay here again in the near future when traveling down to LA!

This was my second stay here. Very nice accommodations. The kitchen is great for making meals so that we didn't have eat out everyday. Saved money and a healthier option. The Supermarket across the street is wonderful! I prefer the first story rooms as they have a courtyard vs. a balcony. It's private and great if you have younger children. The only negative I had was that our room was next to housekeeping's room so between 6:30-7:00 every morning you could hear timers going off. If you're an early riser, no issue. If you are not, don't get room 118.

Summary Heading: Great room facilities. A recommendable family hotel.
Summary: Re-locating the air conditioning to the other side of the balcony door so that the air vent is not directly over the bed would make it perfect. Except the breakfast has a lot of room for improvement, there's not much negative feed backs.

We thoroughly enjoyed out stay at Pepper Tree--The whole Spanish Hacienda look--Paintings, furniture, Floor tile and overall structure was beautiful.  The room was spacious including a large kitchen area.  The room bacony was large and the patio funiture allowed for outside relaxation with privacy.

This hotel was not a horrible place to stay in. Upon checking in I did see two large roaches that made me very uncomfortable with staying at this hotel. Not to mention how this hotel isn't in the best area of town. It is close to Disneyland and it was one of the more affordable places to stay. The overall check in and check out was easy and the staff were friendly and professional.

Since staying at a genuine Disney Resort would break the bank twice over, we opted for this Boutique Hotel in Anaheim. It's conveniently close to the themepark but offers affordable luxury. The staff is very helpful and friendly, the rooms clean, spacious and very well equipped: they even threw in the kitchen sink 😊. The pool was well maintained. Breakfast was included but you have to go to a restaurant a small distance from the hotel. The brekkie wasn't the strongpoint but it suffised.  The attention to detail and the friendliness of the staff really stand out. I would recommend this hotel very much!!

Huge room, big beds, nice equipped kitchen, nice hotel style, proximity to a lot of things by walking although a car is best in Anaheim. Nice staff.  The only downside for us was the pool area. It is smaller than the pictures, not a lot of room around the pool so it doesn't fit more than two or three families which take all the place, the chairs, the tables... No long chairs too and you cant lay on the sidewalk. So it is clearly good if you have kids that want to jump in and out of the water.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review and helpful feedback. Glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at this hotel. The Spanish style of the room was gorgeous and really made you feel like you were on vacation. The room was comfortable with the bed and the couch and was surprised at the full kitchen provided.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed the full kitchen! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: It's a nice suit cozy and with kitchen supply's provided made it waaaaaaaay better will definitely come back , balcony was nice gave us enough room for two to enjoy lunch or dinner outside , gf loved it
Manager Response: Love to hear that we were a home away from home! The best compliment we can get! Come back again soon.

Summary: The customer service at the Front desk was exceptional but the housekeeping needs some work.  Each day we stayed we always had to call front desk for the items housekeeping forgot to leave.  Loved having the kitchen though it was very small with little counter space.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to notify the housekeeping staff of your comments and work with them to improve their service. Glad you enjoyed the full kitchen!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. Property was very cute and conveniently located. Our room was tidy but dusty. Lamps and mirrors could use a good cleaning. Staff was excellent and very helpful. Swimming area was nice.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We will make sure our housekeeping staff sees your comments.

Summary: We received a very warm welcome from all the staff at the hotel. Although we were out and about most of the days the pool area was great and on our last day we used the BBQ facilities for our party of seven. Would defiantly recommend the hotel as a base to travel to the various beach locations and theme parks in the Los Angles area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Glad you family enjoyed that property and staff. Please come again soon!

Summary: We had a lovely time at Hotel Pepper Tree. Staff members are friendly and accommodating. The pool and hotel environment are very clean. Location is so not too far from Disneyland. All of our needs were met.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and our helpful stay! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Upgraded since our last visit. Spacious room with kitchen. The AC was great. Very quiet. The location is central to a number of attractions but not right next to Disneyland. The grounds are very attractive.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for being a repeat guest! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the upgrades we have made throughout the hotel. Thanks for the great review and feedback.

Summary: The hotel lacks proper lobby, buildings and environment are old, however some people may like this. Surrounding services are good. It close to Disney and orange outlet  but far from Los Angeles. People on front desk are very helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We are happy that you gave us a 4 out of 5!

Summary: Everything was Great from the first moment we arrived to the last minute we left! Great price and awesome Pool,Very Nice Staff, Super Clean,quiet A/C, great point to travel throughout California from!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad you enjoyed every moment.

Summary: Absolutely love this hotel. Great price and awesome ambiance. My only complaint is the continental breakfast. Not the best. My father stayed with us and his only complaint was the concierge service. He felt the staff wasn't as friendly and welcoming as he had hoped. But those two things aside it was a great room, awesome pool and beautiful decor. Looooved the quiet A/C as well.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review. Glad you enjoyed the hotel. We will use your feedback to better our hotel.

Summary: Hotel stay was good would've been better if had better continental breakfast mostly had nothing but pastries and cereal unless you ordered from restaurant at an extra charge.Towels for swimming pool area could be of better quality too small. Overall I would still recommend this hotel which I did to the in-laws which will be taking a trip soon and staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: This was a great place to stay at with a great location. The balcony was amazing and the air conditioner was on point. My only complain would be the towels were stained and the shower curtain was a cloth material and was stained as well. It was a great place for a quick trip.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay and the hotel. We will make sure the housekeeping staff sees your comments immediately. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary Heading: Best place for a family vacation.
Summary: We stayed at the suite room and we love it. Comfortable beds and good wifi. The continental breakfast we ok but you can get good hot breakfast for about 5.99. The service was great and the customer service superb.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great comments! So glad you all enjoyed your stay. Come back again soon.

Summary: Hotel was nice. Customer service was excellent! Room was spacious and clean. Kitchen looked shabby and out of date and appliances and dishes were old and very used. We did not have a need for the kitchen though. AC in the room was amazing, but the rest of the hotel was hot and not air conditioned. Our beds were made each day, but it did not seem like much else was cleaned. All in all, I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful comments. We will make sure to use them to better our hotel . So happy to hear that you enjoyed the staff and room. We are making upgrades in the kitchens throughout the  the hotel - we hope you can come back to see them soon!. Our housekeeping staff does clean the rooms daily but only changes the room sheets every 4 days to help conserve on water since CA is in a drought.

Summary: Confortable, cozy and practical. Good breakfast. Frontdesk was helpfull and polite.  In my experience I spent in average U$ 6 to 8 dolars to go to Disneyland using UBER. Unique deception was related to the dirtiness bellow the beds when I was looking for possible forgotten stuff in the last day.

Will definitely recommend to anyone and will definitely will stay there again. Great customer service , the continental breakfast was great and the area was really good ! Great price what I paid for, for A week of stay
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great recommendations! Hope you can come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Convinient and short distance to activities
Summary: Short drive to disney land, supermarket and huntington Beach. Helpful and good service from personel at hotell. Quiet area. Skate park also Close to hotel. Restaurant NeXT to hotell, and laundry.  Tickets to Disneyland can be bought at hotell. Good Food, The included Breakfirst could be better. But you have the oppotunity to buy breakfirst also, and that one was very good.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: the breakfast at the hotel peper tree was very poor because they didn't have a lot to eat unlike other hotels that we've stayed in, they have more to eat. Then the good thing was that the hotel was near both parks that we went to. like disneyland and knotts berry farms, so that was a good thing, but overall the hotel was great!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful review. So glad you enjoyed your stay. We are working with the restaurant to add some more items to the continental breakfast selection. Come again soon!

Summary: Convenient location within 5 miles of Disney. Room was tidy and comfortable with kitchenette. Loved that we were able to cook some meals! Kids loved the pool. It was well maintained, clean and heated. Would stay again in the future.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: The place is sooo spacious. We had our own little kitchen complete with kitchen utensils and oven...big fridge and our own little veranda. Spacious parking area. AC is  really good, comfortable and very spacious bed. Bathroom is clean and water supply is good.   There's a mexican grocery just accross the street  and has basically every kitchen ware or ingredients you need. This is if you prefer to cook your own food.  They serve complimentary breakfast and you can upgrade for a very cheap price.  Staff were very polite, friendly and helpful. They were very attentive to each request we made.   Hotel price is very acceptable. Cheaper compare to nearby hotels.  Would definitely stay again if I am in anaheim..
Manager Response: Love to be your Home away from Home! Thanks for the amazing comments and helpful feedback! Come back again soon!

Summary: My family n I loved our room n the patio was amazing. Wish the bathtub was cleaner looking n feeling. Also our room was next to the pool which and a bit noisy. Distance from Disneyland was great! Thank you
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed the Courtyard Studio with the private patio! We will look into your bathroom concerns immediately with our maintenance and housekeeping staff. So glad you enjoyed our location and we hope to see you again.

Summary: The location, room, bed and kitchen were really good but they recycle the towels and only give you one set. I found three of my towels used with pieces of long and short hair, I put them at the side without using it, but the housekeeping personnel put them back with the reading sign to reuse my towels because of the California's water conservation program. I request new clean towels from the front desk and they handed me new clean towels, but for me it was a bad experience because I only want the hotel for the night to sleep and shower for three nights and I did not rest well due to the idea that they do not wash the bed sheet or towels to conserve the water.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. While we are very happy that you enjoyed the room and our hotel location, we are sorry that our housekeeping staff did not meet your expectations. We are sorry if the housekeeping staff was confused about the towels. If the towels are left on the ground, they will always replace them like the sign instructs. We do only wash the sheets every 4th day of your stay since we are working with a program to help CA conserve water.  But, we will always change the sheets if requested. We do hope you stay with us again. We are sorry for the confusion with the housekeeping staff and will work with them to ensure there are no more issues.

Summary: I was very  pleasantly surprised. It was very affordable but by the looks of it it should've cost more.  I love the Decor, the balcony and the fully stocked dishes in the kitchen. I had everything I needed right there.

Everything was great! The front desk was very helpful. The room was very clean. The hotel is near all necessary locations, such as grocery stores, retail stores, the beach. I would love to come back and stay again.

Very nice place.  Very very friendly staff.  Cheap rate.  Plenty of Parking space,  for free.  Close to so many attractions. Free Wi-Fi. You can do your laundry in the nearby washing place,  they can actually do it for you and pack them. Supppper.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! It wasn't bad at all! ;) We really appreciate your helpful feedback and tips.

Summary Heading: Stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: Didn't have any issues. Wouldn't mind staying longer it was very comfortable. Will definitely be going back. I would recommend this hotel to anyone that plans on staying in the area. It's great that it's has a kitchen and the bathroom is separated by a wall.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great recommendations! Love to hear such positive feedback. Come back again soon!

Summary: The beds were hard as a rock could not sleep for the 3 bites we stayed, cochroochs in the kitchen and door ways. Holes in the hall ways. Management was terrible, rude, uncaring. Do not stay here with special need child or if you are terminally I'll or pregrant..
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and that you had a disagreement with our management team. We have worked with you to help resolve your issues over the pet fee and extra cleaning fee that was charged and have refunded them. Again, we are sorry that we were not a good fit for you and your family.

Summary: The lady the was helping us first was not very nice.She look mad,bunt when Angel star it to helping us he  was very friendly.We love the enjoyed the pool the room was very comfortable everything was super clean
Manager Response: Thanks for the honest feedback. We will make sure to talk to our front desk staff regarding your experience. So glad you enjoyed the room and pool!

Summary: It was very nice and clean,  guest services was always pleasant.  The checking in and checking out was fast and easy.  The rooms were quiet,  the patio was spacious!  They had a great kitchen set up and supplied pans and dishes in case you wanted to cook at the hotel.
Manager Response: So glad you will be back again! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Staff were lovely really helpful ,Excellent location , continental breakfast ideal for busy day out to get you started . Kitchen is handy with a supermarket opposite to stock up .Small pool great for a cool off in the evening, clean with a bar b que available to use .Rooms very comfortable . Biggest bed I've every seen . Massive wardrobe loads of storage space . Only down side the wi fi was really bad kept cutting out couldn't FaceTime at all . But to be fair it was like that most places . ( McDonald's was the best wi fi ) .when someone had a bath or shower upstairs sounded like a tank was coming through the room ... New plumbing would be a big bonus. But despite that I would definetly stay there again .
Manager Response: So glad you will be back again!! Thanks for the great feedback and description of the rooms. We will make sure to check our WiFi from your room.

Summary: We stayed two nights, and due to the noise, we were unable to sleep at all. The second evening, we called the front desk to complain about the kids yelling and cursing in the hallway outside our room. The clerk said he would take care of it and apologized for the noise, but ultimately he did nothing to solve the problem. My family and I explained how we were driving 14 hours the next day, but the noise did not settle down until after midnight. I really think that if they were not going to take care of the noise, they should have at least offered to move our room away from all the ruckus.  I have never felt so dismissed. If you need sleep, do not stay at this hotel!
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the unusual amount of noise you experienced during your stay. We did respond to your complaint and worked very hard to quiet down the group during your stay. We are sorry that the other guests were so inconsiderate and difficult to deal with. This was definitely not a normal experience at our hotel and are again sorry that we were not able to help you as you wished.

Summary: Staff was friendly. Rooms are comfortable but the property was very loud. Could hear every step and word spoken by other guests in room above and in hallways. Difficult to sleep because of this. The breakfast area is not very good
Manager Response: We are happy that you enjoyed the room and staff but are sorry that you found our hotel noisy. We work hard to enforce quiet hours and are working on upgrading our doors to help prevent any outside noise. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Had a great time, kids enjoyed the pool, room was really nice in room size, thumbs up, bathroom really clean will stay again...came out for a little shopping an beach had so much fun, will stay at this hotel again when I return to California
Manager Response: So happy you will be back! Thanks for the great review!

Summary Heading: Memorable stay but for wrong reasons
Summary: We fell in love with the property as soon as we reached. It has the aroma of old wood. Kitchen was good and a big respite if you are a vegetarian.  Unfortunately, things went south from there. The toilet was choked 3 out of 4 days we spent there. I had to call housekeeping every morning to flush it somehow. Having said that, the staff if very responsive and come immediately to rescue no matter what time of day or night.  Memorable stay but for wrong reasons.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our boutique charm but are so sorry for the issue with your toliet. We will make sure to have the maintenance team look at your room immediately.

Summary: Excellent place to stay, the only issue we had was that the bathroom was continuously being clogged. Breakfast is not that good but it's not that bad we stay here again !!  We enjoyed our stay and will be back

Got a much larger room than I though, AC was great, blankets were thin like most hotels, but I like them fluffy so it might be a preference thing. Totally coming back though. The breakfast wasn't much, but there is a great breakfast place across the street.

Had a great time staying here while we were there to visit Disneyland.  Small hotel with great customer service.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Love supporting smaller businesses and this was right up our alley!  Love the small kitchen and met our needs while we were there.  Pool was nice and great for our young children.  Close to many stores and easy to get to from the highway.  Love the older details and decor.  It felt very Spanish to us.

Not bad location and hotel but house keeper only gave us 1 hand towel when there are 2 of us and the closet has a musty smell like no one has been cleaning the carpet for awhile, free parking was great but wifi is so weak.

This is a great place, at a fantastic value! We stayed here one night and at the Marriott at the convention center for another on business and Hotel Pepper Tree was much, much better! I wish I could have stayed there the entire time. We will definitely be back if we stay in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Family vacation at a hidden hotel
Summary: We have stayed here before...it is between Knots and Disney...the hotel itself will make you think you are in Mexico.    They keep it spotless and the front desk all the way to the General Manager are extremely helpful...great sized rooms, a nice kitchen and wonderful beds.  The hotel is quiet and just a really nice find...can't wait to go back!

This was our favourite hotel out of 5 on our recent California road trip. Great location-near Disney and plenty of supermarkets/restaurants. The staff were lovely, really helpful and nothing was too much trouble. Lovely big rooms with a small kitchenette, big windows/balcony overlooking the pool. Lovely big beds that were very comfortable. The pool was great (maybe some lie-down sunbeds would make sunbathing more comfortable?!) Breakfast was ok, plenty of choice. Just wish we'd stayed longer.....

Have been staying here twice a year for the past 5 years. They are improving their services and everything is great except their breakfast. It could be better- especially the quality of fruits they have. This time we stayed at a room closer to the side entrance so the door sound was kind of noisy and woke us up couple times in the middle of the night but besides this everything was good. We'll definitely keep coming back.

It was our first time staying at this hotel that by the looks of the pictures on their website, it looked beautiful. It definitely did not let us down. The kitchen, bathroom, and room were very clean. The only problem was when on our second night we realized that there was a water leakage on the patio's water fountain. The leakage went through the wall and into our room. I had my laptop and all my paperwork in a backpack laying on the floor. As I was picking my belongings up I came to realize that all of my things were soaked. Paper work worth 2-3 months of work had been destroyed due to water. Thankfully my laptop was not damaged. After I made the complain, I would have expected a returned call from the manager as well as a refund that was promised by the desk clerk. it was

We really enjoyed our stay. The customer service was excellent. The rooms were also comfortable with a rustic Spanish flair. Our kids enjoyed swimming in the pool. The only thing I would improve is the breakfast. Needs more options, more protein. But overall we had a wonderful time! We will be back.
Manager Response: So glad you had a wonderful visit! Thanks so much for the helpful feedback. We are making some upgrades on our continental breakfast and there are always hot options available at the restaurant for a reasonable price. Hope you come again!

Summary: Booked last minute for the 4tj of 4th of July weekend , always check places for cleanliness and it was very clean , comfortable and very customer service friendly , would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great recommendations! Come back again soon.

Summary: This is a nice hotel. The pillows and the bed were excellent. The kitchen facilities and the bathroom facilities are good. I like a bathroom which is private and separate from the main room as is the case here. The cupboard space was adequate too. The wi-fi service needs serious improvement (very slow).
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad you enjoyed the room and the bed. We will check into and fixed the isolated WiFI issues from last weekend. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Everything's was very nice, except for the wifi and maybe an upgrade for the continental breakfast. Other than those two fixes it was a very enjoyable trip that I made with my friends. We're very understanding on how we were below the age of 25, and allowed us to us a debit card instead of a credit card.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We have fixed the isolated WiFi issue that you experience. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Loved having a kitchen and a fridge.
Summary: Went to Disneyland,  loved being able to bring leftovers and water back to the hotel to put in our full size fridge.  Rooms were very quiet.  Will stay again! The newer AC  units were very nice and quiet  as well!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed the full kitchen! Come back again soon!

Summary: The hotel is in a great location for Disneyland visitors and has comfortable spacious rooms. The boutique hotel and its rooms are nicely furnished and decorated. A light continental breakfast was available in the restaurant next door.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that we were a good fit for your Disneyland vacation and that you enjoyed our boutique charm. Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Our vacation stay at hotel pepper tree
Summary: We stayed here twice now, very clean, beds very comfy, staff very friendly, very quiet nice atmosphere,  lived the pool will stay again next summer, the WI first was in n out but overall I give this hotel a 10 very nice home feeling we had friends and family come to  is it us here love the patio they all felt  comfortable  too

Summary Heading: Great room, but hard to sleep.
Summary: Beautiful place, nice kitchen but too noisy, hard to sleep.  Noise easily travels from halls and between rooms due to all-tile flooring.  A noise barrier under the door would do a lot to help.  Also had a patio light just outside the room that couldn't be turned off and light came into the room at night.  Without a mask, I wouldn't have been able to sleep at all. Otherwise, I would've rated much higher.

We enjoyed our hotel stay at Pepper Tree. A few minor updates to the rooms would be nice. Loved the Spanish theme, but updating the bathroom/kitchen counter tops and bedding would be great! We loved the "homey" feeling you get from this hotel. Makes it nice when you travel a lot and are away from home.

Summary Heading: Nice and cozy little Mexican type hotel
Summary: Very cozy and clean Mexican Means of the hotel. The spacious rooms and large and comfortable beds. The rooms have a small kitchenette and fridge (which, however, keeps a fairly loud noise, especially at night). The hotel is well located, good access to highway 5 and Disnelyland. Breakfast was served in a restaurant located in the front of the hotel. In terms of choices we would liked to have a little more variety. During of our 8 days stay the same range did already started to taste slightly the same, even though the food was reasonably good. There is also a secluded heated swimming pool, which we did not use. The service was very friendly. Additional points free parking and free wi-fi. Minus for missing the secure deposit box in the rooms (this was available at the front desk

The hotel is in a good location, and easy to access. The kitchenette is great but even though there is a full size oven, there are no cooking dishes, hot pads or other oven accessories.  There is also no dishwasher or drain rack. The shower rod was rusted and it needed to be curved. Room servicing was sporadic and when done, all opened items were removed and new left (soap, shampoo, etc). The only table for eating was on the patio.   The pool was smaller than expected and there were few lounges. It was not an inviting comfortable space. A single family monopolized the area and left little room for others. The pictures made the pool area look much larger and more inviting.  Mattress was on the hard side causing my spouse to toss and turn a great deal.

I was just looking for a nice quiet place to relax and did I ever. After checking the rates and seeing the pictures of the hotel I'm thinking this is too good to be true. The second I arrived I had a smile on my face that stayed until I had to check out! 1st class all the way. Will be back again and again.
Manager Response: So glad that you will be back. Loved to hear that you had a relaxing stay!

Summary: It was a comfortable stay, it could use some updating. Wouldn't mind staying here again, since it was good value and still pretty close to Disneyland (about 7 min drive). The staff were friendly and the room was spacious.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the helpful feedback! Hope to see you again soon. We are making many upgrades throughout the hotel and rooms.

Summary: The hotel wasn't terrible. Room wasn't bad. The mattress was I hate to say he worst thing I have ever slept on. I already have back problems and after staying there one night I feel my back problems become so much worse. My boyfriend and I spent most of our night tossing and turning all night trying to find a comfortable position to sleep. I never do surveys or write reviews unless I had an excellent experience or a terrible one. And I'm sorry that this review is a negative one. But I would not reccomend staying here if you actually want to sleep. Cause I got maybe 30 minutes total of sleeping. After sleeping on a heating pad for the last few days my back feels better but I wouldn't wish anyone sleeping on that mattress. Not for $140 a night! Sorry. Upgrade the mattress and your

My kids and I came out to Anahiem for a convention. The room cost was $684 which I thought was a great price being it was summer and we stayed 5 nights. Was was upsetting is my card was ran twice! The manager blamed my bank right away. When I called the bank, they told me they saw the card was ran twice within a minute of each other. I walked down to let the manager know it was not my bank and he acted as though he was not interested in what I had to say. Normally, I would not be upset and I understand mistakes happen, but for the manager to seem out off and felt as though he need to blame everyone else was frustrating. We won't be back.
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the bank error that happened during your stay. We did not run your card twice but the credit card company somehow duplicated the transaction. We have been working with them to make sure this does not happen again. We are sorry that this incident left you with a bad impression of our hotel. We do hope that you would stay with us again and are sorry for the frustration that this caused.

Summary: Had a great time at our stay. The hotel has a kitchen and fridge, felt like a apartment. The location was in a odd area and the bathroom was small and the water was consistently changing from hot to cold. That's was the only thing that was disappointing.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and the full kitchen in your room. We will make sure to look into the shower in your room immediately. Thanks for the helpful review.

Summary: Wonderful rooms with lots of space. Very reasonably priced. The best part was the helpfulness of the front desk in suggesting places to go, directions and all around friendliness. If coming to the Anaheim area I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: So glad that you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Great accommodations, with fair and semi-consistent pricing, and easy to find location. Service was excellent from check-in through departure. Any issues (loud, obnoxious neighbors,  need for new linen, etc.), were handled quickly, efficiently, and professionally.
Manager Response: We love to be your home away from home! Can't wait for you to return. Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: Welcomed our two small dogs with open arms.  Very roomy.  Full kitchen.  Very hot while we were visiting.  Outstanding air conditioning.  Great staff.  A little bit noisy when new guests were checking in late.
Manager Response: So glad that you all enjoyed your stay with us! Thanks for the great review. Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Good area. Close to many ammenities
Summary: Good area. Close to many amenities. I will recommend this Hotel for your visits to Disneyland. It is good for families. Their personnel is really helpful and courteous. I come every year for 4 nights and We always enjoy the visit.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your recommendations! We love when you visit.

Summary: After returning from our stay at your hotel we discoved my daughter's hair became infested with head lice while at the hotel. This was the only hotel we stayed at and her head was filled with them. Prior to our stay she had no problems at all.  The last day of our stay she started itching her head and after returning home we foubd lice. The last two days we have be de lousing our house and our daughter. Not how we wanted to end our vacation.
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the bad ending to your vacation. Unfortunately, lice can come from anywhere and prefer to be on humans - not in an empty room. We are inspecting the room now to make sure there are no issues. Again, we are sorry that this happened to you but do not believe it is an issue caused from our hotel.

Summary: Nice enough neighborhood, short drive to Disneyland and other vacation goals. Pool is very nice. The front desk is very friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and very comfortable. The grounds and overall atmosphere is very nice, pretty. The least thing is the continual breakfast but that is typical for me...I have yet to like one and the restaurant is convent for ordering a real breakfast. There is a great pizza and salad delivery, see the white flyer at the front desk. I love the room and the pool.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! So happy to hear that you enjoyed the pool and room. We are working the restaurant to improve the continental breakfast selection. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Very Nice rooms...  Great kitchen... Very clean... Cute decor... Under 10 drive to Disneyland! Really nice place to stay. The staff is really friendly.  Will definitely come back for another mini vacation!

We love going to Disneyland but our grandkids love the hotel more. This hotel is perfect. And saves money because you can cook.  I highly recommend this hotel and I will stay again and again. Good location and food in all directions if you don't want to cook.

Bed had a ciggarette burn in it the whole time we were there.. That wasn't from us. Their was a kitten dying outside our room, called 2 times asking front desk to take care of it nothing was done. Couldn't sleep whole time there. Front desk didn't answer the phone a couple of times. At 10 am the maids were asking if we were done yet an hour before check out. And then the front desk tried to not give us our deposit back trying to say we were smoking in the room when we weren't (and we asked at check in if smoking on the balconys was okay and they said yes). So I don't see why they would try to take our whole deposite back and never once said anything before

This place is wonderful for families! Having the kitchen in the rooms made it so easy to whip up breakfast in the mornings, or just to have a snack when we weren't out and about. It definitely help with not spending too much money going out to eat everyday. I loved the balcony, the beds were great, I really don't have a bad thing to say about this place. My family will DEFINITELY be returning to the Pepper Tree on our next vacation!

Our family loved this hotel. It's not the fanciest hotel but we were very pleased. The room was bigger than I thought. We had a 2 queen bedroom. The bathroom needed a few updates like the tub and the water pressure is not great but even with those downfalls we loved it. The grocery store across the street is great for food. The breakfast at the hotel is not much but it's ok for kids.

We had a ground floor King room for the 3 of us.  Plenty of room and included kitchenette.  Finally a bathroom with an exhaust fan so we could use the mirror 👍. The shower head does need replacing though. Not close to Disneyland, but a cheap uber ride there.  Shops and laundry very handy across the road and a barbecue in the pool area if you want to eat at home.  Very helpful reception staff.  Would stay again.

Great overall hotel.  Surrounding area is ok.  Continental breakfast and service could be a bit better but not bad. Rooms are great size for a family!  Centrally located.  Close to Knotts Berry Farm and 10 min to Disneyland

Not too bad of a place - not as close to Disneyland, but not that far either.  Refrigerator wasn't as clean as it could be, but all in all, it was a good place. Quiet and calm, with enough room space for the kids to spread out. Beds were comfortable.

Summary Heading: Great location. Well maintained but poor customer service.
Summary: Arrived late at night with a young child following a flight from London. The patio door would not lock which was on the ground floor. Asked whether we would stay  in there for the night and was only moved at our insistance of safety. This meant relocating all our luggage and taking our little girl out of bed to a smaller room with no addtional bed for her. There was no acknowledgement or apology the following morning  ( we were told management would be in by 09.30).  We then requested to stay in the smaller room rather than wait in for this to be resolved on the first day of our holiday! No additional provisions were allocated despite the room set up for two people.  The bed was not changed for a week and, when this was requested at reception, this was still not done despite

The hotel is located near a supermarket and other basic facilities. Also near Disneyland.  Friendly personnel, nice room with kitchen and balcony. Liked the atmosphere. Only the breakfast could be better.

Really nice amenities, minus the garbage wifi. The pool was clean, they were definitely doing some major updates to the sidewalk and exterior, so there was a little mess from current construction. The area is perfect, like 5-10 blocks from Disneyland and right across the street from a Mexi-mart (Vallarta Mart) and convenience store. Both had excellent food, snacks, and beer. The grocery store even had liquor. It's also only a few miles from some really nice family restaurants (Bubba Gump, Cheesecake Factory, etc.). The staff was really nice and helpful and the rooms were each unique in setup and design. Very neat, Spanish style exterior and interior.

I was a little sceptical of this hotel as I thought it would be like a classic American motel. However I was pleasantly surprised! It was beautiful inside. Myself, my partner and my friend stayed here for 2 nights while visiting LA. We had a queen room and it was huge! Nice sized bathroom and 2 double beds and plenty of room around us. We had a kitchen and balcony too. We had breakfast included which was all you can eat continental; cereal, fruit and donuts... so nothing fancy.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to stay in the area for a good price.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the great review!

Summary Heading: First time to CA, 5 night stay in Anaheim
Summary: This was a family vacation with our first time visiting California.  I did a lot of research and checking on reviews before booking Hotel Pepper Tree.  The rate was reasonable for our 5-night stay.  We liked the close proximity to all of things we did in the area.  The front desk staff was excellent every time we visited with them.  My daughters enjoyed the pool.  We liked the Spanish décor and the balcony to the room.  There is no laundry facility on the premises and you have to use the laundry mat across the street, which was interesting.  We were on the second floor and even with our box fan on, we could hear every footstep the people above us made.  The free (average) breakfast is in the restaurant in another building on the property.  Would we stay here again...probably
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review. So glad you enjoyed the staff and the hotel.

Summary: The hotel was charming and very cozy. The rooms were clean and the kitchenette was very handy to have.  The plumbing in the room was not the best.  The tub was not draining well and the tub facets were leaking.  Otherwise, the Mexican store right across was the perfect place to stock up with all kinds of goodies.  Shopping was also very close by.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our boutique charm and room! We will make sure to inspect your bathroom immediately. Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Greta value for the price! Wonderful front desk
Summary: Stayed 5 days for Disneyland and this was a family friendly great price for our duration. Cleanliness needs improvement we could feel the floors had debris that's stuck to our feet, housekeeping never left enough towels or any toilet paper, and were beds sorta hard and squeaky but kitchenette is a money saver and front desk is so nice. Overall wonderful value for the price! I'll be back
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! So happy that you thought our hotel was a great value. We will make sure to talk to the housekeeping staff about your comments immediately. We are sorry that their service did not meet your standards.  Glad that you will be back.

Summary: Very good hotel. I really enjoyed the stay. Very clean rooms and the view was amazing. The pool was beautiful and all of the staff were very nice. Great to stay at close to theme parks! Will definitely be staying again!
Manager Response: Can't wait to see you back! Thanks for the great review!

Summary: This hotel was average. No shuttle available to Disneyland Park but if you have a car, the park is close by and hotel provides easy directions. Staff were nice. Bed was comfortable. Mini kitchen with all accessories. I would consider staying again.
Manager Response: We hope you do stay again! Thanks for the helpful feedback. The ART shuttle is located just one block from the hotel.

Summary: I didn't do much research prior to our trip and we were pleasantly surprised in the neighborhood the hotel was located in. The restaurant on site is 99% seafood, which I didn't realize. But we enjoyed dinner there our first night. The grocery store across the street is a well stocked, primarily Mexican, store and I highly recommend the pre-marinated meat in the butcher area. We loved the chicken and pork and enjoyed some of the sweet breads with our coffee. The hotel pool is always kept clean and the pool towels from the front desk were a great convenience! The kitchen in our room was a little understocked on silverware but served the purpose. I would have loved to see an ice machine on premises. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend Hotel Pepper Tree!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! So happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Nothing like relaxing on a private patio after a stressful day at the park. My home away from home when we travel for vacation. Recommend to all of our friends with children. Can't wait to come back again!
Manager Response: Love being your home away from home. Thanks so much for the recommendations!

Summary: The rooms are a great size with a full kitchen and are very clean. If you rent a car this is a great place to stay but if you don't have a car DO NOT STAY HERE. They don't have any shuttle services, which was a big problem for us and it cost us tons of money to get to Disneyland and the airport.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. Glad you enjoyed the full kitchen and larger room. We do have the ART shuttle located one block from the hotel which will take you to/from Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm. Plus, we are also working with ART to make the stop even closer and more convenient for our hotel guests.

Summary: Kitchen was right next to the bed. It included a full size fridge, four burner stove and a microwave. The rooms were easily accessible with an elevator available. On a busy weekend parking was barely adequate. When we had a problem operating the AC were helped within two minutes.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad you enjoyed the fill kitchen.

Summary: We really enjoyed staying at this hotel, everything was beautiful from the furniture to the property, having a full kitchen with bowls and silverware was perfect for our kids who love cereal in the morning
Manager Response: So glad your entire family enjoyed your stay! Come back again soon.

Summary: Had a great stay. Out side patio table needed cleaned and floor mopped. Some one spilled something stickey. We enjoyed having the kitchen to use and eat what we prepared for ourselves. Also to keep left overs. Drinks to have onhand.

Nice and close to Disneyland for our son and his family and us the grandparents.  Didn't get to use the pool as we were out late every evening.  I especially liked having the kitchenette and the Spanish decor.  I liked the bathroom and also the room leading to the bathroom with the very large closet to put our suitcases and clothing in so as not to have them strewn around the main living area.

we had a recent vacation there, it was great! the staff was friendly, the kitchen was a huge money saver as well as the grill at the pool, the rooms were mostly quiet - you could hear luggage going over the tiles out in the hallway but that was the only downside we had :) we will def stay here again

The grounds are pretty, quaint, felt like I was in a Spanish villa.  The front desk guys were always friendly, helpful, got what you wanted,  i was a little nervous that the doors did not have extra hotel locks, but there was someone at the front desk 24/7, so that sort of mitigated my fears traveling alone.

Overall a very well kept hotel with charm and character. Very friendly staff. Great location near to many places to visit. Only negative was mattresses were not very comfortable. I would otherwise recommend.

When we decided to book the hotel pepper tree we weren't sure what it would really be like. But it was wonderful. The pictures didn't do the hotel justice. It was beautiful and romantic and just the perfect place for our first trip together.
Manager Response: So glad you had a wonderful experience! So glad it was better than the pictures. Love hearing about your experience! Come back again soon.

Summary: Great & clean rooms. If you looking for great rooms in the near of Knott's Berryfarm or Disney is this the place. Very nice interior. Staff very friendly. Convenient kitchen, only the refrigerator a little bit noisy.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! So glad you enjoyed your stay. We will check out your fridge right away.

Summary: Read many reviews prior to going about the continental breakfast being weak. I think HPT listened to that feedback because it was very nice during our stay!  Fresh fruit, cereals, donuts/danishes, coffee/juice. Pool area is nice and rooms are wonderful for families. Can't beat having a full kitchen with couch for a sitting area. Nice little patio, too. Staff was helpful and friendly. Would return.
Manager Response: So glad you will be back! We have been working hard to improve the continental breakfast. Glad you enjoyed it.

Summary: Flew out to meet my fiancee's family and make the engagement official. Used the full size refrigerator in the room to chill the mineral water and lemonade for the engagement party. Very useful. The location was very close to all the amenities i needed.
Manager Response: Congrats on your engagement! So happy to hear that we were able to help make your weekend special.

Summary: If your looking for a reasonable, mostly quiet place with a convenient kitchen this is the place.  Not in a great neighborhood and this visit the hotel was a bit noisier than usual, but overall great bang for your buck!  The bonus is the great Mexican market right across the street!
Manager Response: Love to hear that we are a "bang for your buck"! Thanks for being a repeat guest. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I will return in july I love this spanich hotel decorations very Happy to stay there with balcony, big rooms and very clean and good employees, I enjoy my stay and will stay there again every time I go to Anaheim that's the hotel
Manager Response: So happy you will be back so soon! Thanks for being such a loyal guest. We love to be your Anaheim home away from home!

Summary: Very good location, comfortable, clean and friendly hotel. Full kitchen inside the room. Close to Disneyland, good and various restaurants and stores. Near several ways to go out to LA and beaches. Bad traffic to travel to LA.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our convenient location! Sorry for the LA traffic. Come back again soon!

Summary: Big rooms with a kitchen stocked with everything you'll need.
