Summary: Very friendly staff. Beautifully decorated. Great value. The kitchen was a little older but everything worked great. It was a spacious room with patio. It was near Disneyland and offered ability for us to go back to the room and prepare some meals. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your full kitchen and some "home" cooked meals on your trip. Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with kids
Summary: We stayed here with our 2 young kids when we went to Disneyland and it worked really well. We needed a place where we could cater our own dinner and had breakfast included. The kitchen was good - had an oven which was a surprise! The breakfast was very basic but all we really needed before a big day at Disneyland!!
Manager Response: So glad your whole family enjoyed their stay and trip to Disneyland! Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for Disneyland.
Summary: Hot Pepper Tree was just a short ride away from Disneyland, and was very affordable for my husband and I.  We stayed there for a full week and was happy with it.  Too bad it was chilly and rainy when we was there so couldn't try their pool out but it looked very nice!  Highly recommend it :)
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your week stay! Sorry it was so rainy. We hope you come back again soon to enjoy our usual sun.

Summary: Hotel was nice and roomy, only thing was the small gap in the giant glass balcony doors let some noise in and the breakfast isn't the greatest. Other than that it was an excellent bargain. Unless I shell out the excessive money to stay at the Disney resort, I'd stay here again on my next visit to Anaheim
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will stay with us again! Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are making many updates and renovations throughout the hotel and will be replacing our patio doors soon. We are also working with the restaurant to improve our continental breakfast. The restaurant also has  many great hot dishes for just $5.99. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay at this quaint little hotel. It was only 5 minutes to Knott's Berry Farm and a mall.  Cleaning staff did a great job  and the room was a good size.. Only wish the wifi had a stronger  signal and that the bathroom had a separate switch for the light and the fan because if the light is on then the fan is on. Not enjoyable when putting on makeup and getting ready but even so we would love to  stay again.
Manager Response: So happy that you will come again. Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are in the process of updating our WiFi, and it will be stronger on your next visit.

Summary: this was a great room great kitchen good customer service from the employees. smelled great close to store and Disneyland. would come here again. kitchen was excellent as well great balcony for smoking if needed
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Beautiful little spot with thoughtful touches and tasteful decor. The bed was comfortable, shower head was nice, everything was clean and it was surprisingly quiet. Staff was friendly and efficient. The downside was the breakfast. Not much other than cereal, pastries, coffee and juice. You can order from the menu at the Mexican restaurant where the breakfast is located though. Close to Knott's Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Loved to be called a hidden gem! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We had such a pleasant stay here. We had to check in late and the front desk staff were so sweet and attended to all of our needs. The room was quiet, clean and I loved having a full kitchen in the room. It made it so that I could make meals without having to always eat out. A great place for couples and families as it is like home away from home. Such great value too! I highly recommend the Hotel Pepper Tree to anyone who is working on a budget but doesn't want to compromise quality!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Come back soon!

Summary: I did not know the area but the place looked fine on the website, so I booked it. It was more than adequate. It was clean, quite, and comfortable. I did not need the kitchen or pool, but it s nice having the extra space in the room. Good value, good location and the staff was great. The continental breakfast was in a separate restaurant in front of the hotel, and is pretty basic.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback! Glad you enjoyed your large room and the value of our hotel.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights.  1/5 - 1/10.  Continental Breakfast served at the restaurant in the parking lot (I don't believe it's owned by the hotel), was nothing special.  For extra, you could order a whole meal. But with a full kitchen in the room.....we made our own!  Great savings.  The rooms had balconies that had a light that came on each night.  It would have been nice if I could have turned that light off, but I'm sure it makes the hotel look nicer from the street, and might have been a security issue as well.  Our first room was 204.   Pro:  Very large room with King Size bed, TV, two upholstered chairs, coffee table, gas stove, micro-wave, full refrigerator.  Nice BIG and clean room. Con: Bathtub was not dirty, but needed to be resurfaced.  A/C looked updated, but with a

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Pepper Tree
Summary: We've been staying here during visits to Southern California for years. It's an comfortable studio property with a rustic Spanish feel, and the best value in all LA. If you prefer discovered European neighborhood gems over shiny modern impersonal towers, this is the place for you. The full kitchen gives you the option of eating out only when you want to. The kitchens and bathrooms are being updated, which makes it even more comfortable. We love the ground floor courtyard units that have the patio with tropical plants, fountain, and bistro seating area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us since 2007! We love having you. Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: I loved the decor and ambience at this hotel. Super friendly staff and very knowledgeable about the surrounding area. Had a wonderful stay here. Its like a small studio get away in the heart of Anahiem. We booked this hotel using a third party website and the hotel does charge additional fees. There is a 15% room/bed tax as well as resort fee. It is indicated in small font on the booking website we used. I just missed it. I will recommend this hotel to others. Enjoy your trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recommendations! So glad you enjoyed our hotel. Our room/bed tax is actually less than the hotels nearer to Disneyland. We do have a $3 resort fee but there are no other charges (free parking, wifi, and continental breakfast). Book with us direct to receive even more discounts. Thanks again for the helpful review.

Summary: Happy to have choosen this hotel.Room very comfortable but the bathroom was so small.Why in American hotels it is impossible to find bath foam but only a small soap??bath tub is not comfortable.The hotel is good for visiting Disneyland

Good hotel,  the bathroom was not the best.  It is average but good room. The size of the room is also good,  the esthetic of the hotel is good as well.  The restaurant and the continental breakfast is poor.

The staff was really nice but room was awfully cold, and the heater wasn't working properly, the facilities are very old and you can hear everything through the wall I wouldn't recommend staying there.

I love the staff,  the room set up,  the area surrounding the hotel.   It's a great place for long stays, very affordable and huge rooms.  We appreciate how well management assures that you like your room and make any necessary changes.

This is our second stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree. The rooms are spacious with a kitchen (refrigerator, stove, sink). The rooms and bathrooms are clean and spacious. The bedding is nice. The first time my husband and I had a king bed and it was perfect. The second time we brought two of our grandchildren, we stayed in a room with two queen beds. Our bedding was nice but our bed sank in the middle and my husband and I both woke up with back aches.

We have never stayed someone where the room and bathroom were so clean! We also enjoyed the use of provided kitchen and supplies for our breakfast before we headed to Disneyland. Front desk staff very helpful and offered travel tips to and from Disney. Pool was a little chilly. Great experience overall!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great comments! Glad to hear that you found us clean and convenient. Come again soon.

Summary: We loved our recent stay here, our room was just like an apartment and much more practical especially with a 7 month old. All workers were extremely nice and the room was super clean. Definitely will be staying here again(:

Friends and family had ants everywhere in their rooms on different floors of Hotel Peppertree in Anaheim. When I reported the pests to the front desk, he almost did not believe me. He questioned my opinion. He went to look for himself. When he did find an ant,  he gave me $10.00 off my bill and said " ants come out as certain temperatures " I replied with, pest control can help, hotels should not have this problem. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. Free breakfast is cold cereal only. Parking is fair. WiFi is good. ANTS on your clothing and counters are never ending  relentless.

The hotel is a bit old but you got everything you need. The room is big and there is fridge, microwave and kitchen. The breakfast was so-so compared to the standard of this hotel. Location was closed to Disney.

The Hotel Pepper Tree is the only hotel we stay at when we go to Disneyland and since my family are annual passholders, we go a lot and we will only stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree!! All of the staff members are extremely nice and helpful and if there is any issue, they are soooo quick to fix it!!! I would recommend this hotel to everyone!!!

Very convenient for Disneyland. Safe area with all amenities which include laundry facilities, supermarket and plenty of Restaurants all with ample parking.  Good sized rooms with everything needed for a comfortable stay.

Summary Heading: Lots of bang for your buck
Summary: This property is near Knotts Berry.Farm but is also very close to Disneyland. The rooms are large with private balconies. The pool/bbq area is  lovely. Breakfast is fruit, cereal and breads. If you wanted something hot you had to pay for it.

Pepper Tree Hotel is a nice hotel to visit and stay in.  I really appreciate the front desk staff.  Everyone was nice and friendly.  The room was really nice equipped with what every member of a family needs.  Because I like this hotel, I will recommend it to all friends and family members.  I would appreciate giving more attention to the continental breakfast. Eggs and cheese are welcome.  Finally, I would like to say that I spent a short vacation of two days  with my wife which already graved in our happy memories.

I truly enjoyed the stay and will stay here again in the future. The kitchen was stocked proper utensils and coffee!! The only complaint I have is that outside of room 119 I heard beeping sounds in the morning. Not sure if it was the vending machines or an elevator (didn't see an elevator though while walking out). Overall it was a comforting stay and the room had great decor.

Needs some serious sound proofing. Family didn't sleep well the entire time at night or for naps. We went here for Disneyland and the kids needed rest but it didn't happen. No hot tub means we don't use pool also

Very nice and quiet. Well equipped for all out needs. Wish we had found out we were closer to Disneyland and the shuttle. The pool area looked appealing, but it rained when we were there. It had a nice grill and eating area.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed our hotel! Thanks for the review. You will need to come back when it's not raining.

Summary: Love it the front desk and how the sfatt are friendly the nosie shut off at 10 love the heated pool but the shampoo n towel the ones we didn't use they took it back n we have to call for more every morning.

We have stayed here before and will hopefully continue to do so. I cooked during our trip so the kitchenette was perfect. I only wished that the knife that they provide was better. It was very difficult to cut veggies with a thick steak knife. I have no complaints other than that.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great feedback. We love to hear from our repeat guests. We will make sure to look into the kitchen utensils in your room.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. Very comfortable petit hotel with everything you need to spend a great vacation. The room was fully equipped, clean, bed comfortable and internet speed was good. Staff and front desk were very nice and helpful. There is a grocery store just acrods the street whick is great and the food places on the corner are also convenient. I would definitely come back to the Pepper Tree
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. So happy you enjoyed your stay and hope you come back soon.

Summary: We only stayed one night but was pleased with the hotel. I lived the Spanish decor. The room was nice. Carpets worn, beds were ok.  The kitchen was fully stocked which was nice. The rooms are large. The lighting wasn't that great though in the bathroom.  It was clean and we would stay again.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed our boutique decor. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Beautiful and unique. We enjoyed our trip. It felt more like a small apartment than a hotel, and it was clean and the staff was excellent. The only negative was breakfast. We ordered the hot breakfast and it was one of the worst breakfasts we've eaten.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you loved our hotel and staff, We will make sure the restaurant sees your comments. We are sorry for the poor experience you had with them.

Summary: If you're looking for a hotel while going to Disneyland, you'll want to pass on this one. It's very far away from the parks. We ended up using Uber to get back & forth every day. ART isn't a good option due to the stop location. Too far away. A guest had a barking dog one night & the front desk took care of it right away. We didn't eat the continental breakfast they had because we left early for the parks each morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to review the hotel. We do always suggest driving to Disneyland since it is a very easy 10 minute drive and parking is free at our hotel. Glad to hear front desk was able to help you.

Summary: Had an amazing time, loved the room and patio area. Great location, close by Disneyland since that was our destination. It's near many other restaurants if you chose not to do the continental breaskfast or you can always stay in and cook anything since the room is equipped with a full functioning kitchen.
Manager Response: Love to hear that you had an amazing time! Thanks for the review.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here,  family of 4. Love the full size coffee maker (good thing I brought my own filters and coffee).  Room was clean and spacious so that we weren't tripping over one another.  Had room with two comfortable queen beds on second floor.  Bedding and pillows were ample and quiet.  Slept like a rock.  Climate control (a/c and heat)  worked well.  We had the opportunity to try both! Parking is ample.  Nice patio to relax on.  Pool was open and heated.  Staff was very pleasant and helpful.  Our toilet was not working properly. Told the front desk and they took care of it by the time we returned a few hours later. Easy to get in and out of property and find parking,  which is opposite of what we found with hotels surrounding Disneyland.  We enjoyed the continental
Manager Response: Thanks for the very helpful feedback! Glad you enjoyed your stay and will be back.

Summary: Check in/out was very smooth. They were kind enough to give us a late checkout FOC as my flight was not until later that afternoon. The room was much larger than I expected it to be with a full kitchen which was a huge plus. A lot of reviews state that it's a bit outdated but that didn't bother us in the slightest. The location is amazing, very close to Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm & close to a lot of great restaurants and cafes. There is a mall about 5 minutes away for any amenities you may need. My husband and I are already planning to stay here again when we head back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you will come back. Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: Did not like the housekeepers did not wash our dishes all 8 days!  The longer we stayed the more ants we saw. Crawling on the bed, in the bathroom in the closet...they were on our clothing. Huge turn off. Breakfast was served til 10 am however if you showed up after 9am then you were left with scraps of the trays and bottom of the milk, no forks, no bread, hard butter--very disappointing. So we jus purchased food elsewhere instead of making the effort to get up and eat before 10 am.  Front desk Guest Services was OK only thing was the guy didn't know how to help with the air conditioning and said he'd come back and didn't return.   Cleanliness? Huh, who wants to stay wth ants??? NOONE! Gross  Value...I paid a lot more then other guests; hotel says it's because I booked with

-No soundproofing whatsoever!  We were kept awake by screaming guests next to our room almost every night during a week's stay.  It was either children crying or people partying and yelling to each other.  Seriously the loudest hotel I've ever experienced. -The free breakfast is basically pre-packaged mini donuts and danishes, no name cereal, and really sugary sunny-d type juice. -Beds were not very comfortable (they moved and squeaked throughout the night keeping my wife awake), pillows were lumpy -Kitchen cupboard doors wouldn't close, sliding door to outside balcony wouldn't close all the way resulting in very high noise from the outside streets. -Shower head was very low pressure and had lots of calcium/rust buildup.  Bath tub surfaces were old and cracking. -$3/day resort

Summary Heading: Great place to stay close to Disneyland
Summary: I love the front desk people. They were very informative and friendly. The room was big and cozy. Heater worked great. I would definitely be back. Hotel has good stores close by and great  Resturants. Disneyland is only a short drive away. The hotel did not have a shuttle but that's was ok.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. So happy you will be back!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Pepper Tree. It's an amazing deal and is quite spacious, super clean, and a short drive to Disneyland. Our only complaint would be that the breakfast was subpar, but you get what you pay for (free). We would stay again in a heartbeat.

When we pulled up, I was a little nervous by the size of the hotel. The inside of the hotel has so much character. It reminded me of a Spanish hacienda  Once inside our room, it surpassed my expectations! The room has a tiny yet FULLY functional kitchen complete with pot, plates, cups, knives and utensils. The continental breakfast was very basic, but that would never deter me from returning. If/when we return to Anaheim, we plan on staying there again.  PS- It only took us about 8 minutes to get to Disneyland!
Manager Response: So glad that you enjoyed our boutique hotel! Thanks for the great and helpful review.

Summary: Would recommend this hotel, very good for price.  Beds were very comfy, clean, full kitchen, plenty of parking available and free. Very close to Disneyland if you are driving. Many restaurants around area to choose from.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. Glad you found a our hotel a great value. Come back again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Price for a Great Stay
Summary: I've stayed at the Pepper Tree twice. Once for a convention and the other time to take the family to Disneyland. While the hotel is relatively inexpensive for the area, it is really nice and very quite. The WiFi easily streamed Netflix so my family was entertained for the evening. My in-laws stayed in a separate room and love it. I will absolutely be staying at the Pepper Tree the next time I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your comments - we love to hear from repeat guests! Glad you whole family enjoyed your stay.

Summary: I really like this place. I'm not a fan of the firm bed and also I could easily hear the people in the next room who came in in the middle of the night and made a ton of noise and woke up both of my kids😤.  I realize that is not entirely the fault of the hotel more a combination of thin walls and rude people but it did ruin our experience. I would however stay here again because it was convenient having the kitchen and it was close to Disneyland.

The room was nicely decorated, clean and comfortable. The wifi was terrible, we couldnt let our child stream youtube and end up using our costly data plan. The continental breakfast was poor as well. There was no egg. One morning there was no jam or cream cheesse or juice. The restaurants staffs were not friendly as well. The front desk staffs were friendly though.

The kitchen was a plus for me in the case that i brought my kids. I have no problem preparing midnight hot snacks. But the unbearable noise from the cleaning carts being dragged the hallway and neighboring guests so early in the morning is what i cannot take. No person can take any rest nor comfort hearing all these. They facility needs upgrade.

Summary Heading: We are glad that we found this hotel
Summary: We got to stay at the back side of the hotel building. The view was excellent on the third floor. The room is very big and the best part is the kitchen which has everything you need to make yourself a nice breakfast. The only issue we had is that the bedside tables got very dusty for some reasons. Also the bathroom tub is a little out of date. But we were very pleased with the overall facilities.
Manager Response: So glad you found us! Thanks for the helpful feedback. Come again soon.

Summary: I want to thankveveryone is working here because they always need to satisfy the guest needs over themselves.  all the people here helping me in all things beginning from the room till fixing my car. you have avery professional manager rick he knows how to deal with every guest with appropriate way. he took some notice about things in hotel to become better. thanks to everyone here. pepper tree is my home in anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We will make sure all the staff sees your review. It is such an encouragement to us.

Summary: My family and I just stay for a night but that was enough for see how you care about us when the receptionist call us to ask if everything was ok we felt special... The room is so comfortable and big is not like most of hotel rooms when you get in you feel like you are at home
Manager Response: Love to help you feel at home even if it is for one night! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, only had one issue. The lights kept flicking on and off. Room was clean and beds were very comfortable. Will definitely stay again in the future. Would recommend for those with pets since the outdoor patio was great!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We made sure to fix the light issue in your room and appreciate your patience. So happy to hear that you will stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Our Family enjoyed our stay at Pepper Tree Hotel. The Staff was  courteous. The Christmas Tree in the lobby smelled so good upon entrance. it was Beautiful. we took Family pictures in front of the Christmas tree for out special memories. Our breakfast was the great meal of out busy day. very enjoyable. The pictures in the hallways were fun to stop and look at.   "we will be Back".' Thank you Pepper Tree Hotel. Blessings ! : )
Manager Response: So glad you will be back! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Angel help with our reservation in Sept we had 5 rooms. He was super helpful and I was sorry we didnt get the chance to meet him. However all of the front desk.staff we all  found helpful. The manager was exceptional.  The Hotel was nice what we expected and clean very pleased. Location was also great next to.stores. free breakfast was a plus for 16 people , our wish was bigger coffee cups. Resturant staff not friendly that was only doen side..  Thanks Hotel Pepper tree.
Manager Response: So happy that all 16 of you enjoyed your stay. We will make sure the staff and Angel sees your great comments about their customer service. Thanks for the great and helpful review.

Summary: I used to LOVE this hotel! I recommended it to everyone! I haven't stayed here the last 5 times I was in Anaheim because of how I was treated by a front desk employee (I've never been treated this way before at this hotel or any other). Ive stayed at cheaper, but a little bit farther from disneyland hotels. They were just as great. I decided to try the Pepper Tree again in December because my daughter likes the kitchen. It was a nice stay like it used to be.  I'll might stay here again, but maybe not as often as I have found a cheaper alternative and I don't feel like the management or customer service is the way it should be when something goes wrong. If your room is  as it should be, and you don't request a manager, you'll have a nice stay, though. And it is cute.  The issue I
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the experience you had months ago but are glad that you came back again. Our general manager will call you regarding your previous stay since he was not aware of the issues you had then. Customer service is very important to us and are again sorry that you did not receive our best.

Summary: We took the family here for a surprise holiday weekend to visit Knotts Berry Farm and the beach.  Though it was close to Knotts and Disney, it was located in a bad area, didnt particularly feel safe with the kids.  We might as well stayed at a Motel 6.  The so called light continental breakfast would have been better served at 7-11.  The hotel smelled like bleach, the bedspreads were stained and uncomfortable.  The dishes in the kitchenette were dirty.  After going to the breakfast in the morning, we left a styrofoam cup of orange juice and a donut on the kitchen counter.  The housekeeper did not clean or throw away and we retured to a kitchen filled with ants. We were given a can of raid and told the house keeper doesnt do dishes..  Lastly, the walls are thin and the gaps

1) we had requested an extra roller bed upon checking in as we had 5 people and told them to put it in the room at their convenience as we were heading out for dinner. After coming back from dinner they told us there was no more extra beds and told us that we should've told them upon checking in which we did. They told us that they will give us back refund for the extra bed but that still did not solve it as we had 5 people. They told us can't do anything. In addition, it was around 10pm and we were all extremely tired after traveling for 8hours in the car. Terrible experience and extremely inconvenient. 2) TERRIBLY designed hotel flooring. Hotel tiles are extremely big and have spaces in between each tile which caused ALOT of noise just to roll the bag to the room.  3)hallway

Unhappy with hotel and services. Will not recommend to anyone. Hotel made unauthorized charges and continued to argue with me regarding the situation that was authorized by a member of staff. Will not recommend to anyone.

The hotel is very nice. They guy who checked us in, I THINK his name was Jesus, was very nice... he even helped myself and my son get transportation to Disneyland. He was probably the most helpful person at the Pepper Tree. The maintenance guy that came into my room when the toilet got back up, was also very nice and polite. The room was nice, very comfortable.. the kitchen could use a proper cleaning... it was clean but not as good as it could be. There were also some ants in the bath tub for some reason.. HOWEVER, when I mentioned it to Jesus, he I guess came and looked at it and I am not sure what they did.. but I didn't see them in there again. The bed was nice... the room was comfy, the layout is great.  The only real issue I had was with that restaurant out front, it was

need to focus on the cleaning the room and bathroom more .. The housekeeper just do the tasks so fast and the room still dirty even I paid tips to them nothing changed during all time my staying in hotel

This an older hotel but is in the process of being refurbished.  Our room was partially redone but could have used some work in the bathroom such as recaulking the tub.    Some of the room is outdated but, because of that, retained some old world character that we liked and everything worked well.  In general, the room was large, had a seating area with a couch and coffee table, a nice private patio and it was very clean.  Our room had a new heating/AC unit of the type we have seldom seen except in Europe.  It was very efficient and quiet unlike the noisy, temperamental under-window units that are common in many motels. There was a full kitchen with a few dishes, pots and pans, and utensils.  The hotel is about 4 miles from Disney and we found it easy to get there by car.  The

We love this place! this is the second time we are staying in this location.  This place is very close to Disneyland - just about 10 minute drive to Disney parking lot and very convenient to get back for my toddlers afternoon nap and go back for magical evening.

This was almost perfect!  The patio and spaces outside allowed for feeling at home. My only comment was the restaurant for breakfast needs attention. But if you eat in your own kitchen you won't notice.

This place was much better than we expected for the price. Rooms were clean, decor was a rustic theme, and we had great customer service. If you're looking for a great value hotel, this is it. We will definitely be returning.

awful experience.... at our arrival, the woman at the front desk didn't say hello ... the perfume in the corridor was terrible... the floor in the bathroom was dirty, the dishes in the kitchen were poor (forks for 4 persons for exemple); the hotel products in the bathroom were "counted"... the breakfast was disgusted (the butter smelt cheese for exemple)....

The walls are a little thin but apart from that this is a great place to stay. Close to disney without the disney prices and central to shopping and food outlets. Very helpful and friendly staff. Close to the freeway for easy travel options.

Everything was okay this trip. I usually stay here when I go to Disneyland. This year I found a spider in the bathroom, ants in the bathroom and a stain on the sheets. That's really disappointing.....
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. We value the comments from our repeat guests. We will look into your room immediately. We are so sorry for the issues you experienced.

Summary Heading: Comfort room with full kitchen at reasonable price.
Summary: Comfort room with full kitchen. Price is reasonable. Staffs are very helpful and hospitality. Close to Disneyland and can buy Disneyland ticket at the hotel which is same price as selling online by Disneyland.

This was a good trip for me and my family. We had a good stay and enjoyed the quality of service being provided. The people that work for your company were very professional and very helpful answering my questions

The rooms could have been cleaner and the conjoined rooms were disturbing. We were able to hear the other guests loud conversations through the shared door. It made mornings very unpleasant. Also, the breakfast needs improvement.

Very clean rooms, with great customer service. Disneyland is just minutes away and there are plenty of restaurants near by. Hotel is classy with friendly staff and the rooms and bed a very comfortable to relax in and chill out.

Rooms have been updated and are really nice! We will stay again when we come back to disneyland! would recommend to everyone for its value and location! Don't hesitant to plan your next family vacation at this great resort!

We loved the hotel. The staff were very helpful and attentive. The room was very spacious with a full kitchen. We will definitely stay there whenever going to Disneyland or knotts berry farm. You can't beat the price either.

Summary Heading: Great value, great location, wonderful employees
Summary: We truly enjoyed our stay here.  It's close to Knott's Berry Farm.  Staff were nice, helpful and friendly.  The kitchen was just right.  The beds were very comfortable and the room was clean, although the bathroom needs some updating.  The patio brought in a nice fresh breeze of air.  We would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Nice location, big rooms, badly maintained room
Summary: Booked 4 nights at this hotel based on internet ratings & location (proximity to Knotts & Disney). Facility was older, like many SoCal hotels, but looked very nice from outside. Once in our (large, first floor) room is where the trouble started. First thing we noticed was the drapes didn't close fully. Called the desk and someone came right down to address the issue. While he was there we noticed the TV remote wouldn't channel up. That too was quickly addressed. Then we noticed that the range was dirty and had visible rust on the bottom of the oven door, the microwave had rust inside and 3 of the cabinet doors didn't close properly. Not a good start. When we looked at the bathroom, we realized that it had been updated at some point in the past using an existing tub and a new

Planned a trip to see Disneyland before the big changes but wanted to stay reasonable with our price.  The Hotel Pepper Tree was just what we needed.  It is easy to find, not far from Disney so parking is accessible.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  The rooms are large with a seating area at the TV and a small kitchen to rewarm food or cook something simple.  The full size fridge is wonderful so you really have space to put your items.  The continental breakfast is like so many others, mostly cold and carbs.  When we went into the restaurant we were not even offered the hot alternative for the extra price.  Housekeeping carts rolling on Saltio tile is noisy but that is in the morning and we were gone most days before they started.   Those were our only two issues and they
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the helpful feedback. We love to hear that you will recommend us to your friends and family.

Summary: Great value for the price. I like staying here because it's an easy drive to and from Disneyland. Older place but well maintained. Easy to get to and lots of places around to eat or shop. We will be staying here in the future.
Manager Response: Love to hear that we are a great value! So glad you enjoyed your stay and will be back again. Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Stayed here for our trip to Disneyland
Summary: This place is pretty nice for a budget trip to disneyland. Kitchen in the room was a cool feature so we could make our own breakfast before our all day trips to Disneyland. Beds were firm but for me and my girlfriend that is our comfort zone. Room was clean. Patio was clean and cute. Bath could use a little tlc but was otherwise bathroom was clean all around. Had no sound issues from any other rooms or street that's a plus for me. Great stay will definitely be a return customer.
Manager Response: Love to hear that you will be a returning customer! Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Needs updating with bathroom toilet size. Update beddings. The place has a nice feel to it. needs phone by bed and alarm clock. They offer a 1 inch crappy analog clock from the 70s. lol. I really like the patio area look an the pool area.
Manager Response: Happy that you enjoyed your courtyard patio and the pool area. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: The staff was very friendly. Found hair in the bed on arrival. Also found hair on top of the wall on the shower. Plugs seemed to be giving some difficulty when charging our cell phones. The iron left marks on my shirt when used. The price was fair and the location was very good to my destination. Liked having the balcony and sitting area. But, the neighbors across the way had a continuously crying baby.

This little hotel is a great place to stay if you are going to Disneyland with your family. It's only 10 minutes away (local roads) the rooms were well keep and nice and the hotel staff were great. There are plenty of stores near by (Target etc). The family and I will be going here again!!!

This hotel is definitely a diamond in the rough! The decor is beautiful, the staff is very helpful, the rooms are spacious, clean, quiet, the beds are comfortable, the place even smells lovely! The neighborhood seems a bit shady, but it is just around the corner and up the street from Disneyland so it is very conveniently located (and quiet). With the full kitchen, I would consider this a perfect place to stay for a long trip! This was my second stay here and I hope to return again soon!!
Manager Response: So excited for your third visit! Thanks so much for the great review. Loved to be called a diamond in the rough.

Summary: My fiancé and I only stayed a couple of days but the service and staff was excellent. The front desk person was courteous and helpful. I love boutique hotels! If we come back to this area, we will most definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: So glad you will come again! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: The Hotel staff were very courteous, the room was GREAT, spacious and comfortable. One bad thing was you could hear a lot of noise from the rooms above (the tile floor echoed people coming and going. Worst part was the breakfast, not very good, and restaurant were not very nice. Good thing the room has a complete kitchen!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. So happy that you enjoyed your room and our staff! We will make sure to notify the restaurant of your comments. Thanks again for the helpful feedback.

Summary: all in all this hotel is very clean and my family feft safe I do recamend this hotel. I would stay here again when I come back to Anaheim.they gave us a didcount on the Disney land so that help out with the cost
Manager Response: So thankful to hear that you will be back. Glad you were able to use our save $15 on the Disneyland tickets. Please come again soon.

Summary: The hotel is in need of slight maintenance.  My room 204 needs a less noisy fan in the toilet area and the bottom of the bath needed clorox or some whitening agent.  I recommend a plug in nightlight since it is difficult to walk in the dark back to the bed.  The wash clothes were a bit too stiff and could use a replacement and the smell of "clorox" on the linens was a bit strong.  There was only one trash can and that one was under the kitchen sink.  I was woken up at 400 am and continued to be annoyed by guests in the adjacent room.  There was a foreign language spoken by a male who yelled for up to 45 min.  The front desk was contacted by me during the first 15 min but in reality it continued to occur.  I wish I could have gotten a slight discount in my bill for the
Manager Response: We are happy that you will come back and stay with us again. Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Awesome hotel. Great room and service. We stayed at other hotels in Anaheim but this one is reasonably priced. It's like 5 minutes to Disneyland and located close to shopping and restraunts in the area. Would recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recommendations! We hope you come back soon. Glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: breakfast food very poor,we plan going back next years.i don't think we will stay here anymore with the price of the room.everything too olds.some hotels at airport are the same price much new,clean,services
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. Most guests feel that we are a great value compared to other hotels in the area. We will use your feedback to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Based on this rate, the hotel is good.
Summary: Very close to Disneyland, and convienent to supermarket.The hotel staff were great, rooms were very clean and quiet. The price was awesome. Not too far from Disneyland, but still far enough away to avoid all the traffic. Having a kitchen in the room was amazing with a nine-month-old.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our hotel! Thanks for the great feedback. We love being able to serve families like yours.

Summary: The website sells this hotel as being very boutique, but it felt old and in need of some TLC. heaters are old school wall mounted which is fine, but we weren't told how it worked and froze our first night. AC unit was insanely loud and walls are paper thin... we heard every hallway conversation. :(
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that you didn't quite meet your expectations. We are updating our heating/cooling throughout the rooms. We are also making renovations throughout all our rooms. We do hope you come back again.

Summary: Overall, our stay was very good. Staff was friendly and accommodating, room and facility are clean. Kitchen is very nice, well stocked and convenient to have. The only complaints are the WiFi is terrible and sound proofing can be better (we hear everything from the hallway and room above).
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our hotel. It is great to hear that our staff is doing a great job. We are working on upgrading our WiFi. Come again to see the improved service.

Summary: Hotel was okay. The complimentary breakfast could be highly improved. It felt messy and not too clean. Recommend offering more food choices and have someone at least clean in between as things were left behind as we walked in.
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you enjoyed the hotel. We will make sure the restaurant sees your comments and works to improve their service.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel and rented 2 rooms that were able to join. We stayed for a week. The price was not worth what we got. The bathtub had peeling paint because they haven't updated anything in these rooms. The walls were peeling and the appliances are so old that I was awake most of the nights we were there because the refrigerator was screeching but of course we didn't notice until the middle of the night because we were at amusement parks all day. The curtain completely fell off hte bar to the sliding door because the right stops were not put in there. For the amount they charge it would be nice if they fixed the place back up. The staff was very nice and this could be a really nice hotel if they just reinvested part of their profit.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and that one of your rooms was not up to standard. We have since started renovations on that room. Again, we are sorry for the issues you found. We do appreciate the feedback and have used it to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: Awesome stay for our 9 month olds first Disney trip
Summary: The hotel staff were great, rooms were very clean and quiet. The price was awesome for six nights. Not too far from Disneyland, but still far enough away to avoid all the traffic. Having a kitchen in the room was amazing with a nine-month-old.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay! We love having our Disneyland families stay with us. Come back again soon! We make a great spot for a 1 year birthday party. :)

Summary: Only thing can be improved is the Wifi, in our room we can bearly connect to wifi . The kitchen and the room is great. Cause we check in after 9pm, so we don't use the facilities like swimming pool and BBQ.  We will still chose ur hotel next time!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So happy to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel Peppertree has the biggest rooms!
Summary: It was a nice stop,as usual! They let us come early, stay late, they were very obligingly, We slt in for the first time in 3 weeks.  it was a home away from home! We were just done with a cruise, it was great!
Manager Response: We love being your home-away-from-home! Thanks for the helpful feedback. We love to hear from our repeat guests.

Summary: Great value in the Anaheim area. Rooms are large and clean, contain kitchen area with a full sized refrigerator. Breakfast was at a restaurant across the parking lot, and was basically cereal and fruit and pastries. For the price though it was enough and we were glad to have stayed there, plan to stay again.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will stay again! Thanks for the helpful review.

Summary: Older, quaint, well-maintained, boutique-style hotel.  Great value.  Complimentary cereal, bagels, toast, juice, coffee for breakfast.  Easy access to Disney without having to get on interstate.  Rooms come with kitchenettes.  We didn't need to use ours, but very nice for families making the trip to Disney.  Our room faced main roadway and was a little noisy - could occasionally hear cars passing, horns honking.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Love to hear that you found our hotel to be of great value. Come back again soon!

Summary: I had stayed at this hotel a couple of years ago and returned with my husband. The staff is very nice and love the spacious room and the kitchen is very convenient. Loved the full size fridge. Easy access to the freeway and lots of stores and restaurants near by. It was a great value and plan on returning.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We love to hear from our repeat guests and are excited for you to come back again. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Nice hotel for the price. The kitchen and full size fridge are extremely valuable to me. Being able to cook helps so much since you needn't eat out all the time. The toilet was clogged but it was taken care of quickly. The tile floors had a sticky spot that never got cleaned, but we also didn't point it out to the staff. The neighboring Mexican restaurant has legit breakfast.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your full kitchen. Love to hear that the price is right for our hotel. Thanks for the review.

Summary: Its located approx 3 miles from Disney and close to eating options. Spacious rooms well decorated in mediterranean style with a decent kitchen. Breakfast spread is good Its really worth for the little price you pay. The only downside is the hotel has a "make no sound after 10 PM policy" Reason: rooms are not well insulated so conversations next room are very audible. Don't opt for higher floors if you are planning to return later in the night
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. So glad you found our hotel to be of a great value. Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Pretty hotel, would stay again if we return to Anaheim
Summary: I love the rustic, slightly hacienda feel of the decor of the hotel, and the disney posters were just a pleasant surprise! Room was more of a suite, large and comfy with a kitchen area. The furnishings were a little old, but not unclean. However, was a bit wary about using the kitchen appliances, they looked very worn. I love the balcony every room has, such a great place to sit and chill. The hotel staff were all great and helpful.   Breakfast is served at an adjacent restaurant. Food was fair, nothing wow. Cold, unfriendly place were the people running the joint barely looked at us.  There is some food like Subway etc next door, and the hotel is right across from a maxican(?) supermarket. With a car, a 5 minute drive takes you to a nearby Target and Walmart. The hotel is also
Manager Response: So glad you will be back again. Thanks so much for the thorough and helpful feedback. We will see you soon!

Summary: Fun place. I really liked the Mexican decor. I go to Disneyland a lot to go drinking and have stayed at every expensive hotel. This is my new favorite. Vallarta across the street and a bbq to use by the hotel pool. What could be better than that? And a full kitchen! Staff was great. No one seemed to mind me being drunk at 8:30 in the morning pounding beers on my way to the restaurant to get breakfast. On site restaurant is a Mexican fish place which was awesome. I skipped the free breakfast and got bacon and eggs that came with rice and beans. Yum!  7 dollar uber to Disneyland and I noticed several dispensaries in the neighborhood. Fun fun fun. I love this place and will stay here for all my Disney trips.

The staff at the front desk were very nice and helpful- they helped me with several trips for bags of groceries up to my 3rd floor room! The kitchen was nice to have since I was in from out of town and needed to still do some thanksgiving turkey roasting! Worked out great. I didn't get the advertized low rate and the on site restraunt was not that great- but the kitchen was a life-saver and was a very good value for the area. I would stay there again.

The room was great and the kitchen was great! Love the patio. But the continental breakfast was not good at all! The website said we can order omelet a and pancakes for extra $6 and the omelets have shrimp and sea food! And no pancakes! I had 2 little ones with the and all Tharp ate was cereal and some fruit! The "orange juice" was Tang mixed drink! For the other 3 mornings we where there we had to eat out so extra $$$ spent. The website said the restaurant had a variety of American and Mexican dishes it was mainly Mexican seafood and 3 of 5 of us got sick after eating there.  The maid service was poor! My little one made a mess with cookies on the carpet and I clean it the best I could with my hands since u know people don't lug around their own vaccumes on vacation!! We came

We enjoyed our stay at the Pepper Tree Hotel.  They have a super friendly staff, the rooms are clean and comfortable and a really good value for a room with a kitchenette.  Kids loved the pool and it's a 10 or so minute drive to Disneyland.

We chose to stay her for a family trip to Disneyland because it had everything we were looking for and we were not disappointed. The staff was very helpful and knowledgeable. Our room was clean and comfortable.

Summary Heading: Very spacious and clean room, loud AC
Summary: The service is exceptional - every single staff was very welcoming and warm - whether it was when we first met them or whenever we walked past them.  Upon arriving in our rooms, we received a call to enquire whether everything was fine.  The price we paid for the room was also reasonable, taking into account the fact that the room was spacious and very clean - it came with a kitchen area, a sofa and a tv. Toilet was clean. The only downside was that the aircon was very loud and it could be a problem for light sleepers.  Heavy sleepers will have no problems with the sound of the aircon.

my company makes the uniforms for Disney. I stay there 2 times a month. My last stay was about 2 wks ago. I did not have a good stay due to a noise in the exhaust fan in the kitchen. it was due to high winds but regardless it kept me up all night. I called front desk at 130 am my options were to pack up everything and move at 130am or tough it out. I regret not changing rooms   because it kept waking me up every 5 or 10 minutes . Sounded like someone jiggling my door lock.  I would appreciate a discount on my next stay which is this Sunday. I have stayed there about 14 days since JUne 2015 That noise thing was a fluke . I really like the hotel . Get HBO already!

We had a great stay. We had no idea that we could make our own food, that was awsome. Wasn't told about the continental breakfast. But overall we will be finite be back. We loved it! Thank you From the segura family

Loved everything you have a great place to stay one day or the hole week,  we will be back  next year  Thanks for your hospitality! Breakfast was good and the service to write appreciate your time and patience

The room was nice, large, and well equipped as a suite with a kitchen for eating in. The people at the front desk were very friendly and helpful.  It was an enjoyable stay and we will recommend it to our friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendations and great feedback. So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Good value for money, mediocre restaurant
Summary: Spent 3 nights as was visiting Disnelyland and Knotts. Room was big and clean. Hotel is located fairly close to the attractions but you will need a car. Good value for money. The onsite mexican restaurant is not good and the included continental breakfast upgrade to full breakfast was not good at all. Will return to the hotel next time in Anaheim but skip eating at the restaurant! Rooms on ground floor have verandahs with lights on all night which makes sleeping a bit difficult.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. We are so happy you enjoyed our hotel. We will make sure that the restaurant sees your comments.

Summary: I loved having a kitchen and there are a few grocery stores close by.  The room was nice and spacious.  The short drive to disneyland was convenient.  The patio was a nice to place to have breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: So happy to hear you enjoyed our Courtyard Studios! The private patios are the best. Thanks for the review. Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for a reasonable rate
Summary: I really like the rate for this hotel.  It is pretty good location, not the best but good for the price.  The rooms are large and good for families.  Breakfast is really nothing but you aren't there for that anyway.  Clean rooms and friendly staff, beds are kinda hard though.  Nice pool area.  You don't get a shuttle to the parks but the room rate is cheaper than most.  They also offer coupons for rooms and tickets.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback. Glad you found our hotel to be a great value. Come back again soon!

Summary: We had a good time. We stayed for 5 nights and the location is good for traveling to Disneyland Parks-5 to 10 mins drive. Free shuttle is not provided though.Breakfast was also good.Will recommend others.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations and helpful feedback. Glad to hear that you had a good time.

Summary: We had a good stay. We spent three days with teenage grandchildren, so we didn't spend much time in the hotel, though. Friendly people at the front desk and clean room.  I would come back to this facility.
Manager Response: Hope you do come back soon! Thanks for the review.

Summary: Everyone super helpful. Great place to get away and relax. Second time here and hope to return. Love having kitchen with full size refrigerator .  Wish I did not have to keep signing in for WiFi but that is a small thing.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will be back! Glad you enjoyed your full kitchen and room. Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: Very cute hotel! Came here for my anniversary and it was everything we needed. Room was quaint, although the cabinets in the kitchen didn't close fully, that was the only drawback for this room. Everything else was very functional.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your first time stay! Thanks for the review.

Summary: I was very pleased with the hotel. I also like that there's a grocery store right accross the street. I would say it was a little noisy or maybe I'm a light sleeper. And there is about an inch of space under the door so there was a little draft. We took 3 day trip to Disneyland and it was a 10 minute drive. I also requested a king bed with a couch in the room. They kindly upgrade the room to a king with twin bed.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your Courtyard Studio! Thanks for the helpful feedback. Come back again soon.

Summary: Sadly, we are not likely to return. Although we have stayed before, and thought the hotel to be decent price and convenient to the local attractions, both my husband and I were bitten by bugs (fleas?) while in bed. In addition. When packing up, we saw a cockroach scurry across the floor, ack!
Manager Response: We are so thankful for your feedback but so sorry to disappoint you during your last stay . We will look into the pest issue into your room immediately. You were in one of our courtyard studios which could have let some unwanted pests into your room. We are so sorry that we let you down during this stay and hope you will come back again.

Summary: This is our second trip to the USA and as a family, we highly recommend Hotel Pepper Tree. The facilities were comfortable, the beds were the most comfortable we have ever experienced in a hotel. The staff are incredibly helpful- they couldn't do enough to make our stay comfortable and wonderful. Having the staff available 24 hours at the front desk was also great. They were always friendly and happy to say hello. I could not recommend this hotel highly enough. Close by to Disneyland and all that we needed for our family vacation. The kitchen facilities in our room were great, bathroom clean and sparkly. A brilliant experience! Would definitely return to Hotel Peppertree
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the great review. So glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Requested maid service on my second day. After a long day at Disneyland it was disappointing my room was not cleaned, and I had to go and get clean towels. I am still waiting for a call from management.
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the disappointment with your room not being cleaned. According to our housekeeping staff, there was a do-not-disturb sign on the door to your room. We make sure to check this multiple times a day to not miss any rooms but are sorry that your room did not get the service you were expecting. We hate to hear that your stay was a disappointment and do hope you will come back again to experience the stay most of our guests have.

Summary Heading: Our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by the comfort and convience staying at the Pepper as it was only 10 min to Disneyland and 15 min to our car rental.  We would certainly book a room again here.  The staff was so helpful in directions.
Manager Response: Loved to hear that you enjoyed our comfort and convenience. Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: The front desk was super helpful and respectful at all hours. They even worked with me when I needed a super late checkout. I was so happy I left them a bottle of wine when I left, My only problem was how hard the bed was, but my best friend loved it, so it might have been just me.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed our helpful staff. Thanks for the review.

Summary: The hotel itself was very nice. Did not enjoy the breakfast at all. The AC in the room was too loud,I could hear the traffic noise from my room. I think it is too pricey for the rooms. The staff was wonderful.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Spanish style hotel a welcome respite from hectic L.A.
Summary: The service was excellent. Our room was spacious - more like a studio apartment than a hotel room with comfortable easy chairs, a balcony and a small fully equipped kitchen.  There is a convenient Mexican grocery across the street and good ethnic restaurants within walking distance.  My girls and I felt comfortable walking in the neighborhood at night.  The only drawback was the continental breakfast could have included some protein to fuel up for the day. This peaceful place was a welcoming home base for our Los Angeles trip.

We enjoyed a clean and comfortable stay at the hotel and would return if in the area again in the future.  Some of the décor appears to be getting a little dated but this did not affect our stay.  There seemed to be only basic clearing in the dining room at breakfast times, with some tables seemingly not wiped down promptly from other patrons.  This was possibly due in part to the minimal staff about of a morning.

Summary Heading: One Large Room, with All the Trimmings
Summary: The room was fantastic. Hey had the rollaway bed I requested waiting in there when we arrived, and when housekeeping did their thing they left our personal items untouched.  The room was large and had some decorations on the walls to give it some extra SoCal flair. For the cost, I didn't expect such a fleshed-out kitchen or such a nice couch/table in front of the TV. The bathroom was clean and had plenty of shampoo/conditioner to go around.  Something I could do here that more hotels need to allow is that I was able to plug my laptop and video game system into the back of the TV. For a 4-day stay, that was a godsend, and is something most hotels lock you out of.  Drawbacks are: Breakfast was pretty weak, and the internet was a bit spotty at times. But they were still both there,

Stayed 3 nights there, nice rooms, friendly service. warm-hearted furnished rooms whose years you have noticed, but clean and comfortable and above all with spacious balcony. Would come again. The only negative was the breakfast, we do not after the first sight,

Very cozy from the moment we parked our car! Hotel seems like a home away from home. The only thing I would change is having faster wifi and being able yo wash our dishes in our room. Coming back again!

Furnishings were older, but clean. Had a issue with the beds, though.  I reserved a room with 2 queen size beds, but was given on with two full size beds.  After talking to the front desk, they insisted that they were queens.  I know queens and they were not, however, stayed there anyway and it turned out OK.  Kitchen has full utensils and pans and was well equipted. .  Again only complaint was bed size..

While not the closest choice to the park (you'll need a vehicle), the interior of the hotel is appealing, pool very nice and the room we stayed in had space larger than most rooms in Anaheim, a nice balcony perch, and a very useful kitchen. Bathroom is a little small but we thoroughly enjoyed our stay, not having anyone knock on our door in the morning-we're exhausted!, and the very helpful front desk.  Recommended!

I have stayed here before and enjoyed my stay. Last time we were there the continental breakfast was nice (plenty of food) and the ability to upgrade the breakfast to a hot meal. This time I was very disappointed in the breakfast. It took a long time to get help to ask questions. Very limited selection on foods and drinks and no ability to upgrade to a hot breakfast. If you need a nice place to stay this is a nice location but don't count on the breakfast.

Summary Heading: Second time is as good as the first
Summary: This is my second time staying at the Hotel Pepper Tree and I will be returning.  The front desk staff is welcoming, the grounds are very well kept and clean and after sitting in traffic for over an hour from the airport it was nice to be made to feel immediately at ease.  The rooms are spacious and laid out so everyone can be comfortable.  It's nice having a kitchen in your room in case you need to fix a meal.  Will definitely recommend to others.

Nice quiet location not too far from Disneyland Resort. Friendly staff. Comfortable beds with plenty of pillows. Kitchen could use some maintenance/updating. The lower cabinet doors would not stay closed.

Friends were talking highly of a workshop in the area, but said Disneyland was celebrating a jubilee, and local hotels were booked solid. Not wanting to make an hour plus drive before and after the course, I was intent on finding boarding. Expedia led me to Hotel Pepper Tree, and alas there was availability. I found the staff to be knowledgeable and flexible, and the location quite ideal. The room itself was clean and adequate for my purposes on the stay. I would stay there again, or recommend it to others in the future.

Good location. Large room. Comfortable bed. Good wife . helpful stuff. Near to every thing. Good breakfast. Very good area to stay around. I recommend pepper tree to my friends. Free parking. Free wifi

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting the Mouse House or Knott's
Summary: Very close to many Orange County fun spots. The staff is great and I love that the rooms have this great feel, not a bland hotel feel like many others in the area. Rates are great and I love that they acknowledge me as a return guest with each return visit.

Not perfect by any means, but really, really good - especially for a small family on the move.  The staff were really friendly, the room was great with a full kitchen [more "full" than I've ever seen before!] Nice and clean, good facilities, great location, good shops, restaurants, fast food and services locally.  The pool was lovely and really well kept and clean[also empty and you could use the BBQ to!]

Had a great few days in Anaheim. Staff are friendly and always happy to help. I left some belongings in the hotel and they were very happy to help me retrieve them and send to San Francisco.  I thoroughly recommend this hotel if you are after a comfortable stay in Anaheim

The room was very comfortable and the staff very nice. Pretty quiet hotel. The only bad thing I could say is a burner on the stove and the oven did not work unless you use a lighter. I'm sure it will be fixed since I brought it to their attention.

This is a quaint and relaxing hotel; a good bang for our buck -- but you also get what you pay for. Pro's: close to Disneyland and across the street from the supermarket, full size kitchens and nice decor. We enjoyed the pool to ourselves with our 4 year old each day of our 8 day stay. Helpful and friendly staff. Cons: Terrible coffee maker and coffee (brews lukewarm and is tasteless), the shower pressure for our room was very weak and the continental breakfast was unappetizing-we went to it the first day and then skipped for the rest of our stay, opting to make eggs etc in our room. Overall, for the price, I would still recommend this hotel for those who are on a budget.

not a bad place. stayed there for our visit to Disneyland. the room was clean but Anaheim itself is just very dirty... we had a good time hotel was comfortable. Walls are thin though so we could sometimes hear other guests. I wouldn't hang around outside if I was alone doesn't feel very safe... Continental breakfast was awful. unless you consider mini donuts and cereal a continental breakfast. was expecting a bit better than this... oh well. not an awful trip pretty fun and since we had the kitchen we could make a real breakfast. no pool at our hotel. pretty big bummer...

Sound insulation was poor. Our room was right next to the elevator and we could hear it all night and it went very often in the morning. Service was good and prompt. Staff were very helpful. Good stay overall.

First time visitor to Anaheim. Great location, with local bus stop right outside and easy access to Knotts and Disney.  I was there for a week and found staff friendly, although I was surprised that many times when I arrived/left, reception didn't really acknowledge me - even a polite hello goes a long way. It might be because the reception desk is so recessed.  Breakfast was okay - cereals, danishes, yoghurt, bagels/toast - although the staff spent most of their time in the kitchen talking with each other, so I'm not sure how guests would upgrade to full breakfast if they wanted it!  The room was clean, tidy and just right for my stay - the only cleaning products for the kitchen were a dish towel and washing up liquid, so don't cook anything that might need to be scrubbed off,

Great hotel! Stay here everytime I come down south, love the improvements that have been made. Wifi could be a little better along with the breakfast but everything else is great! Slept like a  baby :)

Very comfortable facilities with gracious and helpful staff and a great location with restaurants and Disneyland nearby. We visited with our grandchildren and enjoyed the swimming pool and the Halloween decorations

Hotel Pepper is a very convenient location if you are going a trip to Disneyland. They are literally down the street. Definitely a great hotel and very affordable. The Decor during Halloween is very beautiful.

Great location, we were going to Disney and it was perfect. Very quiet at night, lots of space in the room and free parking. Wifi worked ok. We didn't try the pool, but looked ok. Breakfast was ok as well.

The Location is good, Easy to go to all major attractions in the area if you have a car. Free parking is a plus. The room was clean and spacious, more like a small studio with a well equipped kitchen. The closet is big. The place and furniture is a little old but well maintained and good enough. Great service, very friendly staff.   I would return and recommend for a visit to Disney or other close-by parks. Anyways you will spend most if not all of your day at the park.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with family
Summary: This was the second time we have stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree. We once again really enjoyed our stay here. Though it is a little ways away from Disneyland, it only takes a little over 5 minutes to drive to the parking garage from the hotel. A big plus for us is that you do not get the crowded, anxious feeling you get when staying at one of the hotels "near" the park. The Pepper Tree has a very relaxed, boutique hotel atmosphere that helps our family unwind after a long day at the park. Another big plus for us is the full kitchen in the rooms. We saved a lot of time and money by buying a few simple things to prepare (much like we would eat at home) before and after our visit to the park. It is so nice not to have to try to find a place to eat at when everyone is tired after a

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: Our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree was excellent.  Will return again and again.  Upon arriving the front desk employees were happy, friendly, smiling, professional, they made us feel comfortable. I would recommend Hotel Pepper Tree to anyone.  Rooms were clean. Bed was great.  Thank you Hotel Pepper Tree.

Great place! Will return! Great front desk staff. Good location, free parking. Full kitchen. Pool area seemed nice but didn't get to swim at all this trip. Exits in middle and both ends of hotel, food close by, vending machine. Cool place.

The hotel was awsome we loved it super spacious the closets are huge and its in perfect area there are plenty of restaurants around the area. The hotel was quiet so you get the perfect rest and the breakfast is good also even the hot meals they offer for and extra charge.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay with your family! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Hotel was so cute,  location was perfect.   We went to disneyland while we stayed at the hotel.  We bought all our Disney shirts, autograph books and lanyards at the Walmart a few miles from the hotel to save us money.  It was minutes from Disneyland Resort and the staff was very nice and helpful.   Room was perfect size for our family.  We have already recommend the hotel to many friends and family and will be staying there again
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the recommendations! So happy you had a great Disneyland visit!

Summary: Comfortable accommodations. Great price. Bed was comfortable but creaked and groaned getting in and out. Bedding a bit scratchy. Spacious bath but no outlet by vanity outside of bath so had to be in bathroom to dry hair. Staff was very nice. Great old building, wood elevator, popcorn ceilings.
Manager Response: Come again soon! Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary Heading: Not good for more than two nights staying
Summary: The wifi is bad, also dont expect your phone works in the room (we stayed ground level last rooms. The nieghrborhood is kinda scary but bearable, and there's nothing to do in Anaheim. You probably want to go to one disneyland hotels, which is better
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are in the process of upgrading our WiFi throughout the hotel. Thanks again for your helpful feedback.

Summary Heading: Conveniently location and great for the price!
Summary: I've stayed here several times when I visit the area.  For the price you can't beat it-very private and rooms have full kitchen.  Close enough to Disney and Knott's but far enough away to avoid traffic.
Manager Response: Thanks for another review! We love to hear from our repeat guests.

Summary: The location was perfect! Our group enjoyed being able to go to the supermarket across the street and enjoyed the distance from the hotel to our night outing location! Very comfortable and the front desk was helpful when we ran into a minor problem up front. All in all great trip!
Manager Response: So glad you had a great trip! Thanks for the review.

Summary: We loved our stay. Everything was clean and quiet and unique to any other hotels we've stayed in before. But please for the love of the Internet God Al Gore, update your wifi. It's so bad it's painful. And maybe expand the continental breakfast options. English muffins, other fruits, juices, or cereals would be nice. We will be back though!

I always enjoy staying here and would recommend it to everyone. Hotel staff are friendly. Did not encounter any issues checking in our out. Staff are readily available. The place is nicely quiet, great location from Disneyland, and parking is abundant.

We are repeat visitors, the hotel meets our family needs. Enjoy the kitchen aspect. This time wifi was slower, couple outlet in room didn't work, and couch was not fold out as expected. Overall good experience and value, not the Hylton, but not expecting that. Comfortable, affordable and meets our needs.

The hotel staff were very nice and accommodating and the room was perfect for us.  I will stay again. The breakfast was not great but you can upgrade. Pool was clean and nice size. The room was clean and someone was always at the front desk 24/7.

We stayed during our honeymoon in October 2015 and loved our experience!  The front desk staff were exceptionally helpful, room was clean, well kept and beautifully decorated! Great value for money.  A fantastic hotel!

We were so close to Disneyland & to a grocery store & target. The rooms were more then I expected. They're such a great value! My hubby and I have annual passes to disneyland we'll be staying here again

If you can get a hotel within walking distance and a reasonable price, book it !  Although loved the Hispanic grocery store directly across the road, great hot food counter and friendly service.  Tacos👌

Nice sized rooms. Older amenities but lots of charm. Not for the tech lover as the electrical outlets are few and far between but the ambience was lovely and the guest service felt personal and sincere.

Summary Heading: Nice, clean hotel. Good for families.
Summary: Our room was clean and spacious. The kitchen was quite old, but did the job. The kids loved the reliable wifi. Bathroom area was small, but clean. Loved the big wardrobe. The patio/balcony was lovely to relax in the evening.

We loved the size of our room. Fully equipped kitchen was brilliant. Hotel was kept clean.We would definitely return if in the area again..Thank you to the hotel reception staff who were very helpful.Very enjoyable stay.

excellent Services, Awesome staff and very nice complimentary breakfast. The amenities provide were adequate and the kitchen was well equipped with all supplies. Very nice for family with kids. Also the hotel was very clean and well maintained.

Nice clean & friendly hotel - the room was spacious & equipt with basic needs, shampoos, kitchen utensils, cooking equipment. Good location for shops - public transport was not ideal but I hired a car (to which the hotel organised free pickup and drop off to the dealer) Will definately stay there again! :)

As always we recived fast friendly service. The staff was Respectful and as always worth the stay every time. Already planing a return trip to Disneyland and know this is where we are staying. Can't wait!

Price and quality was in correct level. Easy and short connect to Convention Center of Anaheim. There was International Auto Show, which was not so "awesome" like I thought.... But I am pleased about Hotel Pepper Tree. I can recommend this hotel !!!

Great clean place to be at! Provides cooking utensils and pots and pans as well as a balcony and tv. Bed was comfy and sheets were pretty clean! Felt like a home! I wish i stayed longer to try out their pool area too, but the rooms were clean and had great decor and entrance way

super close to disney, close to really cool bars and places to dance. I got a complimentary upgrade and the room was awesome!! kitchen, big bathroom and closet. will totally recommend and come back too!

It was over priced, but the rooms are amazing. Would most likely come back. I liked the size and the full kitchen and balcony. The decor could be updated. Didn't go in the pool because it looked dirty

It was a nice hotel with very friendly employees. The only thing keeping me from giving it a better rating was the roach I had to kill in the kitchen. The location was ok, I thought it was closer to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: What a great place to stay!
Summary: By Randy, Oct.14,2015. We stayed here for 9 days. what a joy, real nice room, very colorfull and filled with personality. Kitchen is average, however it's very convenient to have a kitchen at all! We would recommend staying downstairs, for these rooms are a bit bigger and luxurieus. Clean also!! Matress was ok, np problems here! Location is super, next to a grocerry etc and very close to disney! Only thing is the free breakfast, not much choise. They should upgrade the range of available food. But that's the only thing! Nice hotel and nice people that work there!

The hotel was very much like a home- the service we received from the check in to check out was beyond fantastic- we truly recommend people to stay at this hotel. The beds were big enough for a two people comfortable sleeping, the location is fantastic- for us like 10 min to Disneyland- marvelous. Everything overall fantastic.

Clean rooms, friendly and helpful staff. Wifi could be better. The oven needs a baking tray. The pots and pans in the kitchen were all in excellent condition except for one frying pan that looked mangled and needs to be replaced. Other than that we had a great stay and will love to come back.

Wifi is not acceptable. Goes offline constantly.           And the mattress was really hard; not comfortable.   Staff is great and I always enjoy my stay. It's in a wonderful location. Natalie Aguirre is fabulous!
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback! We love hearing from our repeat guests. We are definitely working with our provider to better our WIFI service throughout the hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay. Come back again soon.

Summary: Great except for the hot water was turned off during my shower and we had to wait 2 hour's .The value for the hotel was great and we enjoyed the stay there.       This is all I have to say regarding ourtrip.
