Manager Response: We are honored that you stayed with us on your honeymoon. Thanks for the feedback. Sorry for the short interruption of hot water.

Summary: The staff at this hotel were very sweet, professional and made my birthday very special. But the air conditioning -wow!! So hot in the hotel and room. The tub did not drain properly and they were doing some maintenance work down the hall, overall the hotel was ok.
Manager Response: Thanks for your helpful feedback. Glad you had a special birthday! We are sorry for the issues you experienced in your room and will look into them immediately. We are working to update all of the ACs throughout the hotels.

Summary Heading: This is the place to stay!!!!
Summary: I love this hotel!!!  The front desk was very helpful in helping us find amazing food.  I love to how this hotel decorated for Halloween.  My only complaint would be is the breakfast was a little sad..... Over all I was  enjoyed staying at this hotel!!
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed your stay! Love to hear that our staff was friendly and helpful.

Summary: The room was a very good value, clean home feeling, cable was so so and WIFI slow but other then that very good deal, breakfast was ok had to go next door and could use a larger selection but lots of Hotels are cutting back on Breakfast
Manager Response: Love to hear that your stay was a good value! Glad the rooms was clean and comfortable for you.

Summary: Wonderful time. Great decorations for Halloween and great staff! Housekeeper was rude when I asked for towels I had declined cleaning room that day just towels she told me twice get them front desk didn't even look at me. They were towels on her cart! Still best place for a Disney stay!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: I chose this hotel because of the low price and the proximity to Disneyland.  Are usually stay right across from the main gate but in an effort to save some money I decided to check this place out.  Pros:  - Hotel staff was so friendly! (Upon check in and check out.) I dropped a huge box in the lobby and one of the employees came rushing out from behind the desk to help me.  - It has so much character. The lobby was decorated for Halloween and it was so appropriate.  - They rent DVD players for no charge upon check in.  - Having the stove is really convenient, however I thought I would use it a lot more than I actually did. (See below).  Cons:   - I brushed my teeth and washed my face in the kitchen sink to avoid the daddy long leg that was hanging out near the bathroom sink the

5 minute uber drive, very rustic and pretty! we took the queen suit, and it was awesome!!!! its clean, big and it has everything you need, only thing that would make it even better its since the restroom is next to the closet, it would be nice to have a sink there too, for us girls that can take advantage of that awesome ginormous mirror with more wall sockets.

A cute quaint alternative to cookie cutter motels!  Good value with kitchen and a balcony!  Close to Disney and a grocery store across the street!  Great place for a week long vacation as you can cook and eat in the room and have continental breakfast at the restaurant next door free - or full breakfast for an additional fee.

If your looking for a nice basic stay where you can be comfortable, independent and relax in a quiet setting, I would recommend this hotel. It's not overly luxurious  but it covers all the basics very well.

Loved our room. Thought because we were in the room next to desk it would be undesirable.  First step into room dispelled that worry. Cosy room. Great patio.  Like I said. We will be back. Thank you!!!!

My usual Disneyland hotels were sold out (ones across the street from the park) or over $200/night.  I found Hotel Pepper Tree on Travelocity and the reviews were spot one; great close location, wonderful staff, great kitchenette with full size refridgerator, tons of closet space, ample parking, and so quiet!  This is my new Disneyland hotel!

Summary Heading: Great place near Disneyland for a fraction of Disneyland hotel prices
Summary: Just a 5-min drive from Disneyland California, with a 24-hr Walmart at Anaheim Plaza at Euclid just a couple minutes drive away as well. Excellent location with free parking and lifts. Rooms were well-furnished with a microwave, water kettle, sink, HUGE fridge, counter top to prep snacks, cutlery, chopping board, knife, etc. Basically, well-equipped to prepare a quick snack/meal.

From the street this hotel doesn't look like much. In fact it's sort of not very visible to the passer by, the property itself isn't very big and the parking is not really enclosed with the hotel, almost has a public parking feel and leave at ur own risk. The hotel once your inside has aome character n charm. Love the hacienda feel of the old terra cotta look of the tile however the rest of the hotels decor needs a more cohesive look if adopting this hacienda feel, they totally need more Mexican paintings and newer furniture that complement decor. We found a dry buger on our bed sheet housekeeping inspected n resolved immediately giving us brand new sheets that had never been used. Seems like the hard bugger did not fall off with wash. Front desk people could be a lot more

Clean, great pool and good breakfast for children and adults.  Helpful staffing always at the front desk.  It has a very warm and charming California ambience. We had a great time with our son and the grandchildren.  They paid special attention to the fact that we were a family and arranged our rooms right next door to each other.  We will stay here again.

Summary Heading: Definitely would come back with family!
Summary: Great place. Family friendly and convenient to local attractions and restaurants. The staff was awesome. The breakfast could improve a bit but it doesn't matter. There's a kitchen in your room to cook it fresh if you want. Overall, my family with two toddlers loved the place. The pool was clean and the room was clean and spacious.

Hello!  I very much enjoyed the stay however would have liked to see more options for the continental breakfast such as different fruit, such as berries, toaster waffles, etc and the baked goods were stale tasting at 7am.  Also, we did not find a bible in our room nor a written directory of nearby services such as restaurants etc. We only found a delivery menu or room service menu and the TV guide.  The room size was perfect, the sitting area and TV was perfect. The kitchen was small but understandable that it was. Unfortunately due to the small size of the kitchen we had an accident with the cutting board - it melted while sitting next to the stove and we didn't realize its proximity to the burner. Completely our error however more prep space could have prevented this.  The bed

Summary Heading: Great location. Had just what we needed.
Summary: Satisfied our needs. We were on our honeymoon, wine and chocolate was left in the room for us. That was very nice of the hotel. We didn't like the continental breakfast, was in the restaurant and was not great.

Good sized room with decent kitchen and bathroom. Close to lot of grocery stores and restaurants.  Helpful service/reception.  Complementary breakfast could have been better. Close to Disneyland (less than 5 miles).

All was good for a family staying longer than a couple days, grocery across the street is a great offer to shop for cooking in the rooms! All the cooking utinsels are available, and plenty of space to feel comfortable.

Had a great time will be back next year.  Was close to Disneyland able to walk across the street to grocery shop.  Daughter was able to swim both nights we were there.  Hotel was quiet and free of gremlins.

Room is very nice and spacious enjoyed it . Itwas clean plenty of furniture to sit and just talk and hang out with your girlfriends . It came with the refrigerator and no kitchen that I know of. Spanish tile floor yeah the little hard to maneuver your luggage otherwise  nice and clean place to stay for the night

Summary Heading: Overall, a nice place to stay
Summary: A nice, solid hotel a few minutes' drive from Disneyland.  Loved the kitchen area and the large balcony.  Wifi worked ok.  Breakfast was basic (cereal, melon) but good; you can order (and pay) for eggs, bacon, etc.  The pool didn't feel heated (the water was cold on a 96 degree day).  The Spanish deco was nice, and they even had the lobby decorated for halloween.

There was construction going on in the room next to ours. We had small children trying to take naps. In the future I would recommend not renting out rooms next to rooms under construction.  I also would rather pay a bit more and have a higher quality breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks for the very helpful feedback. We are sorry for the construction noise. We will hopefully soon be done. We do hope you come back to see our new and improved rooms.

Summary: This was a great place for our family to stay. There was a grocery store right across the street. We stayed on the second floor and it was very quiet. We liked the kitchen and the little balcony in the morning to eat our breakfast.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that your enjoyed your stay! Come back again soon for a breakfast on your balcony!

Summary Heading: nice cosy hotel option at right price
Summary: the hotel is very cosy, room is very confortable, first floor ones are very private,  with nice and very private terrace/balcony. Good location in anaheim 5-10 min of everything llike convention ventre, shopping, restaurants, disney. the only cons where the air conditioning and the fountain at the balcony  were noisy and no safe box at room. Kitchen is complete, inpecably clean. I will be using this hotel again next year in anaheim.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will be back again next year. We do love our Courtyard Studios with the private patios.

Summary: I don't need much but I need to stay in a clean room. This one wasn't. Even the tableware were dirty, and there were dirtyness overall. I wouldn't stay in the hotel for another time. Anyhow, the service in front desk was ok and also the swimming pool was ok.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you found your room unclean. We work very hard to make sure our rooms are immaculate and most of our guests agree. We will look into the housekeeping staff responsible for your room immediately. We do hope you talked to the front desk manager during your stay. Thanks for the feedback.

Summary Heading: two nights stay for a family of four
Summary: it was a room with 2 queen beds on the ground floor at the corner of the hotel.We feel a little bit insecure because it has no balcony and it's directly accessible through the parking lot. it was newly renovated. wifi wasn't very stable and strong. Everything else was great!
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are working with our providers to greatly increase our WiFi speed. Glad you enjoyed everything else.

Summary: Nice, clean and quiet. Although we didn't make full use of it, the kitchen is fully equipped. Good air-conditioning which was a welcome after a day spent in the sun. The hotel is 5 mins away from Disneyland and about 1 hour away (minus traffic) from Six Flags, go it's a great location. Front desk is friendly and the ambiance of the place was great too. Breakfast is simple but good nonetheless.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So happy to hear your enjoyed the ambiance and convenience of our hotel. Come back again soon.

Summary: Good place ! I would definitely recommend this place to any couple traveling in the Anaheim /Buena Park area. Great for a nursing Mom since it has a full kitchen with refrigerator Freezer /stove /Microven.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Glad our hotel made your trip easier for you any your family.

Summary: Nice, quiet place. Clean. Fully equipped kitchen. Like the Spanish decor and grounds. Pretty pool area. Nice balconies to sit and relax after our long, exhausting days at Disneyland! Friendly front desk staff. Nice array of continental breakfast items at there restaurant. Great price for this little hidden Anaheim gem. We'll definitely be back to this hotel!            Terri and Family, Las Vegas, NV
Manager Response: Loved to be called a gem! Thanks for the great review.

Summary Heading: Will Probably Come Back, Few Things to Improve
Summary: Overall I would come back due to the great service (front desk and even housekeeping was very friendly), ambience (decorated for Halloween), continental breakfast, and kitchen. The room had plenty of room and the balcony was nice to relax on. Considering what the price was per night, this was an excellent value and will be a top consideration on my next visit.  A few things to improve: 1) Showers had no pressure and temperature fluctuated every few seconds between scorching hot to ice cold. It took forever to take a shower and we never felt fully clean. It seems the water usage of other rooms affected our shower. If the showers had been better we would have given 5/5 and turned the "probably" into a "definitely".  2) The complimentary wine was thoughtful and appreciated, however

This hotel has a great location and is a good value.  Front desk staff were very nice.  Disney tickets were available on site. Parking should be secure, as stated on the website. Do not eat at the adjacent restaurant.  The food was terrible.

Good value. Stayed one night in two adjoining rooms. Good option traveling with kinds. Lot of room and a kitchenette. Each room King bed with a twin. Staff was helpful and accommodating. The rustic Mexican decor is very nice, and should be extended to replace the movice/sports posters in the hotel halls. The tile work in the lobby and on the outside fountains is very nice. In the area, for the price, it is hard to beat.

We were very satisfied with this Hotel.  Spacious room, fully furnished kitchen.  Excellent service, friendly and professional.  Best value by far.  Close and convenient to Disneyland !!  We will return !!

Great place to stay with kids! Lots of space in the room, kitchen was invaluable and the pool was a nice way to end the day. A great home base, close to Disney and many beautiful beaches. We even went down to San Diago for a day! Overall a great place to stay! Would go back again in a heartbeat!

The Hotel and staff were great. I really liked the full kitchen and nice big comfortable room. The parking is free but not a lot of spaces and the food was not good. Breakfast is served in a dirty fish restaurant that smelled like the whole place was washed down in fish sauce.  I was really disappointed in the restaurant. I think they would do better without the association. Don't book for the restaurant. Book for the nice accommodations and buy food across the street at the store to cook in the rooms full kitchen.

Excellent service and location , arrived early,room was clean and ready so was able to get a few hours shut eye on an extremly clean and comfortable bed 5stars highly recommend vlose to disneyland , knotberry food malls excellent location

Breakfast are terrible, there was no place to park your car. Bad WiFi, one day the waitress did not make the room. The only good thing it that not to far from Disneyland. Consider to try other options.

far from Disneyland. adding the drive time and parking makes no sense to stay there. it is not like it looks in the pictures. they are misleading. no shuttle to Disneyland even it is written that there is.

I was very surprised and pleased with pepper tree. Especially the spacious bathroom. The bed was comfortable and the kitchen had everything we needed. Overall I would stay here again and do recommend it for others interested.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! So happy you found us and that you enjoyed your stay. Come back again soon.

Summary: Very quaint hotel for a great price. It was my first time in California visiting a friend who worked near this area. The convenience of the kitchen and fridge was very nice and the room was very spacious. The room was very clean when we arrived and it was nice to come back in the early evening to a made bed and clean towels. It was a convenient location between Knott's Berry and Disneyland with quick access to the freeway to get elsewhere. The front desk was very helpful. I had trouble with my room keycard several times. The blankets were a little uncomfortable, but overall I slept pretty well. If in the area again I would definitely stay here.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will stay with us again! Thanks for the helpful feedback.

Summary: During my semi-annual week-long visits to Disneyland (annual pass holder), I have normally stayed at places closer to the park, but when I read that Hotel Pepper Tree had a kitchen, I read many pages of reviews and decided this could be a good change. And it was. I really enjoyed my stay. Front desk employees were very helpful to all inquiries.  The hallways are decorated in film posters and everything is kept very clean. Plenty of parking, including handicapped spots. Second-floor balcony was especially welcome (for smoke breaks).  Big double sliding-door closet with a dresser was used also. Neighborhood has many amenities - grocery, Wells Fargo Bank, Mexican Restaurant (Perihuete) in front of hotel, Subway across the street, 6 minutes driving to Disneyland. Small complaints:
Manager Response: Thanks for staying at Hotel Pepper Tree! We so appreciate the feedback from an annual pass-holder who visits Anaheim often. We will make sure the front desk sees your kind comments. Come back again soon!

Summary: It was just ok, a bit run down and the food at the restaurant was absolutely horrible...reeked of fish. Beds were comfy enough.  There are not couches in the rooms like advertised, just chairs.  No ice machines
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure to let the restaurant know about your comments.

Summary: We've stayed here multiple times.  It is very good for the price.  However our recent visit wasn't so well.  It was extremely hot and muggy, more so in the hotel.  The room was hot too (but if you crank the air on it cools down, but took a long time to do so!).  We found out that the air was broken inside the hotel lobby and hallways.  I feel bad for the workers.  It also did not smell well.  Again, if you don't mind these few things, the price is fantastic.  The rooms are spacious.  So if you have a larger group, and staying for quite a few nights, the price tops anything else!
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We really appreciate the suggestions and recommendations - especially from our repeat guests. We are currently doing some renovations throughout the hotel (including new A/Cs in our rooms) which may have caused some smell issues in the hallways. We do hope you come back again.

Summary Heading: Not in walking distance of Disney
Summary: Booked this hotel through Hotwire. First, this hotel is not for families wanting to walk to DisneyLand. It's around 5 miles away. 2nd the hotel was beautiful with a vintage touch, but the SMELL inside our room was terrible. The room was clean, but the bathroom could use some updating. The pool is beautiful and the layout outside is nice with palm trees and beautiful landscaping. The Free breakfast was not good. Would not stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad you found the hotel, pool, and landscaping beautiful. Booking through a third party can make things a bit confusing regarding distance to Disneyland - we always recommend driving to the park. We are sorry for the smell issue in the room and hope you talked to the front desk about it so we could switch your rooms immediately.

Summary: Went into the restaurant for complimentary breakfast and the smell of fish was so strong I gotten stay to eat.  Their breakfast compared to other local hotels is below average.    This is the first time after many trips to the Peppertree that there was dirt on the AC, Stovetop, mirrors, sheets and drapery.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback, Charlotte. We will look into the reason for the housekeeping issues immediately. We are so happy that you are a loyal guest and are so sorry that the room was not up to our normal standards. Also, we will continue working with the restaurant to improve the continental breakfast issues.

Summary: Nice little hotel at a nice little price, we stayed for 4 night, room were alwas clean, bed confortable, nice decoration, the area is not a s crowded, easy acces to parks, disney beaches, good place!!
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: I always look to stay near or south of Disneyland. I never think to look to the north. The location is good. The room was very comfortable and clean. The layout is nice. The detail to decor is impressive. The kitchenette is really nice. It's fully stocked with dishes and utensils if needed. There's a stove, oven and microwave. I appreciated the refrigerator and sink to rinse my dishes from the trip; and the dish soap and sponge. I didn't get 2 queens as desired so I got a king. My daughter and I were pleasantly surprised to find an additional single bed for her own space. Only one con was the small bathroom and very large closet. I prefer more space to move around in the bathroom.
Manager Response: Glad you found us! Thanks for the helpful feedback. Hope you will stay with us again on your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary: We booked a room at this hotel based on the TripAdvisor reviews and to say the least we were very disappointed. I ask for third floor quiet room and I did get the 3rd floor but they put us right above the restaurant and on the busy street. They were redoing the room next door and the sawing and noise  started at 0800 every morning. The bathroom was dated and worn - the toilet seat was so worn that in places   the paint was gone, the tub had no finish left on it and there was mold on in the tiles. The continental breakfast was so limited and they were constantly running out of food. All in all very poor I would never recommend this place
Manager Response: We are very sorry that we did not meet your expectations and that you did not have the pleasant experience that most of our guests with us have during their stay. We are sorry the noise from the renovations in the room next store. We will also look into your room immediately to make sure all maintenance needs are addressed. Again, we are sorry that you did enjoy your stay.

Summary: We found it to be comfortable while away from home and it was nice to have a kitchen when we needed it and it was a very comfortable and safe stay. Neither of us cared for the breakfast but then again most continental breakfasts aren't that great anyway. If you don't like outdoor floor inside you probably wouldn't like it very much but we enjoyed it.

Summary Heading: dog lover good place for pets
Summary: our room was newly remodeled and say new look , was better than last stay. found large bug in room first day , and next night found one on the bed. front desk person said we where on fist floor and come in from slider . so we didn't open for our dogs to go out. more walks for me. large bugs won't tell type as it is not in may opinion good for the hotel.and found out at time we checked in that if we left dogs in room we would be charged another $200.00. we had a golf tournament one day it was 91 that day and caused us a problem as my wife had to leave to take dogs back to hotel , this means we will not stay again will find other hotel for dogs. they put our dogs in danger, and our dogs are great travelers and are not loud.

We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights for a Tradeshow at Anaheim Convention Center. We were 6 employees for a business trip and rooms, hotel, pool, staff, everything was great. Would recommend and return!

Not flash, but good enough for a night between Disney and continuing travel. Could be good if you needed to stay a few nights and wanted to save money on food - the kitchen  was decent. Not much nearby, but that's OK if you have a car.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Happy to hear that were just what you needed during your quick trip. Hope you can stay again longer to enjoy our full kitchens.

Summary: We recently had a holiday to Los Angeles and Anaheim area and stayed in a few different motels/hotels and pepper tree had the best service by far. The staff where so helpful and friendly they make the stay very Pleasant
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for kind comments. We will make sure our staff sees your review!

Summary: Repeat customer... will be back ! Nice room, great bed, helpful front desk and courteous housekeepers, didn't do the pool or breakfast but looked good, Room was quite except for the occasional kid running around making noise but that's par for the course for hotels....
Manager Response: Love to hear from our repeat guests! Thanks for the great review and feedback. Keep coming back!

Summary: I got switched rooms from 1 king bed to two queen beds because of construction first night Beds are hard pillows we're the best part second night I got to my room at 1030 from Disneyland and got a knock at my door saying we were too loud it was puzzling because I was n the shower and my daughter was asleep at 7 am we were woken up by construction sounds.... The very same reason we got moved... Breakfast was terrible just fruit and pastires yes they have a upgrade options is wasn't worth it... The room was clean the patio was beautiful... Only wish the pool was open later then 9 after being on our feet all day it would have been nice to swim a little
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are sorry for the inconveniences you experienced due to the renovation of some of our rooms. We will look into why the noise was started that early. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our private patios and room.

Summary Heading: A good staging ground for the weekend
Summary: Needed a place to launch for a weekend convention and a trip to California Adventure. This hotel was well placed in the middle of it all. Staff was great, the room was spacious. Loved the Arnold posters.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed our boutique hotel! Hopefully, you'll "be back"! ;)

Summary: we have stayed here several times over the years.  The fella who checked us in was very professional and pleasant.  Our room was nice, as always.   Took advantage of the fridge and the coffee maker, but didn't do any real cooking...but you could if you wanted to.  Love the balcony access as we sat there to drink our coffee in the morning.  Over our 4 night stay we never had an issue with parking.  We were on the second floor and have good water pressure for showering.  Always enjoy staying here when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review and great feedback! We love to hear from our repeat guests.

Summary Heading: Pepper Tree Gave us a Great time @ Disneyland
Summary: The Hotel Pepper Tree Staff was super; they spent over 1/2 hour helping us with Directions to the property. Housekeeping was great. Having the kitchen and The BBQ by the pool, I was able to get steaks and dinner fixings across street. What a deal!!! Remember Just drive your car to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great tips! So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Quiet and convenient for people driving to area attractions
Summary: We loved the private patio. After a busy day at Disneyland it was really nice to be able to sit out in the evening and have some peace. My husband went to the driving range up the street and found it a bonus to be able to do so in the morning. The staff were great. Driving was easy to Disneyland but I would not recommend taking ART even though the stop is only about a quarter mile away. The street was poorly lit and the evening we walked back from the bus stop was very dark. I wouldn't do that again. My only complaint was the very poor WiFi and a weak cell phone signal. If that isn't an issue for people this is a great family hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback! So glad you enjoyed our private patios and the golf course nearby. We do always recommend driving to Disneyland. We are currently working with our WiFi provide to better our service throughout the hotel. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: Was very happy with my choice of this hotel. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. Would highly recommend this hotel. Room was very spacious. Location was great, handy to have grocery store across the street.
Manager Response: So thankful for your recommendations! Come back again soon.

Summary: Nice place for the price.  Close to Disneyland and other great areas.  The rooms were good size, but the beds were uncomfortable. The kitchen was nice and a good size. during the night a lot of light came into the room which made it tough to sleep. Overall it was a nice stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to look into the beds in your rooms - most of our guests really enjoy our beds. Glad you found value in our property.

Summary: i stayed at peppertree for the first time with my family ...it was a pleasant stay i was happy and would recommend to others :) you have a great friendly supermarket across the road the people there are really nice ..
Manager Response: So glad you found us! Thanks for recommending us to others.

Summary: overall good experience very nice location and area, it would need an update to the facilities and the wifi must improved it was pretty bad. Bathroom towels need to be replaced the breakfeast could be much better
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are currently renovating our rooms and making many other upgrades throughout the hotel. We are also working with our WiFi provider to better our service. We will use your comments to help better our hotel. Thanks again for the review.

Summary: This hotel is reasonably priced.  Our room had a kitchen and the hotel is a short distance from Disneyland.  A continental breakfast is also provided.  You can start your day at the Magic Kingdom as soon as the gates open.
Manager Response: Love to hear that you found our hotel convenient! Thanks for the comments.

Summary: We decided to make a last minute trip to Disneyland and of course decided to stay at our favorite hotel in the area. We really enjoy staying here because of it's location to the Disneyland Park. It is not too close, where you are dealing with the crowds, but it is close enough where it is only a ten minute drive. The front desk is always so helpful and we look forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: We look forward for your coming back again soon too! Thanks for the review. We love to hear from our repeat guests. Thank you for always choosing Hotel Pepper Tree.

Summary: We enjoyed staying at Hotel Peppertree with our 2 young children, using this comfortable hotel and convenient location as a base for trips to Disney and the beaches.  Lovely staff, comfortable room and a great pool to cool off in at the end of a long day!

Summary Heading: Nice stay, descent hotel and ok price
Summary: Spent 3 nights due to close proximity of Disneyland Drive (5min by car). Breakfast, across the hotel, is very basic but at least it's available. We had a patio room on the ground floor, although there is no view in the area, just a regular intersection, i think i would have prefered a terras room above... we didn't use the patio and no light was coming thru in the morning. Quiet area, not much traffic after 10pm, Interstate 5 less than 1,5 miles away. Spacious room, bathroom needs a refreshment, very comfy beds and nice little kitchen in case you need it. Free parking and internet access (slow). Supermarket across the street. Price average 80$/night. Would stay here again on a high floor room.

The hotel has nice size rooms, roomy kitchen, comfortable beds, free parking, ten minutes away from Disney ( driving). The only thing we did not enjoy was the continental breakfast. Definitely go somewhere else to eat. Over all, price is right for a hotel.

We picked this hotel as it was close to LAX after landing late and also that it's 15mins from Disney. We spent the first 4 days of our trip here and it's just awesome. Friendly staff with a wealth of local knowledge, lovely sized room with everything you need, fridge, microwave, kettle, oven and TV. The bed was huge and so comfy!! With a Spanish ease feel it is highly recommended.lovSpanish feel to iti
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you loved our hotel and found it in a convenient location. Thanks for the positive feedback!

Summary: We chose this hotel because it wasn't too far from LA and it included a kitchen - completely stocked with dishes and flatware!  They also offered a continental breakfast which after the first try, we passed on.  As this was close to Disneyland I was concerned about the noise of children but the hotel has a policy that requests quiet after 10:30 pm and the guests were very respectful of this.  While it is located at an intersection, I didn't feel it was noisy (though admittedly the windows stayed closed and we used the A/C.)   I would stay here again.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you will come back! We love to hear that you thought we were a good value. Thanks for the review.

Summary: From the reviews, I got the impression, it is set off in a quiet corner of Anaheim. But it is actually on a stop light corner. With traffic on two sides. The terms mentioned 'so peaceful' is most likely referring to the ambiance. It is a curious place and my feelings after, we're that I enjoyed the stay. Despite some dodgy air conditioning (fortunately not needed much in my two day stay). Some of the fittings need modernisation, the pool area looks huge in the picture (it is not) The pool is 30 x 15 feet with a 10 ft border around and no lay out loungers. Breakfast is in the restaurant outside and was a joy to have pottery plates, bowls and duos with metal cutlery! Sound enough but limited unless one wanted to upgrade with around six dollars.  The 'private patio' king room I
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback, David. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are in the process of renovating our rooms and will use your helpful comments.

Summary: I loved it here and I will be back! The rooms were very comfortable as well as the bed. It was perfect for our stay and the price was good. I will definitely recommend this to my friends and family!!!
Manager Response: We love to hear that you will be back! Thanks for the great review and recommendations.

Summary: The room was very cozy and quaint. It was quite spacious as well. Whenever I come next I would definitely stay here. The Breakfast at the nearby restaurant was ok..Cereal, Cake, Fruits , Coffee, Milk and Juices, enough to satisfy a hungry tummy in the morning but not really great. The Wi-fi is a bit slow.  However my overall experience and stay was superb!
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you loved your stay! Thank you for the helpful feedback. Come back soon.

Summary: We had a great room. Hotel was great swimming pool awesome. Loved the little patio area. Overall it was great and would go back. Will recommend to family and friends. Wish the restaurant would have been open later.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your getaway. Thanks so much for the review. Will make sure the restaurant see yours comments about their hours of operation.

Summary Heading: Well located, regular room service and useless WIFI
Summary: The room is very comfortable with good space and all what you need for a long stay.  The attention in the front desk is also excellent, people are very nice, try to solve any problem you could have promptly. Also, you have everything you need very closed.  However, there are three elements that need to be improved: -  Room service is not so good.  Even when the it was a daily service and everything was clean, some days you feel like it was not a complete service.  One day I found a cleaning bottle in my room and some towels were withdrew without been substituted.  -  I have the feeling that the building lacks maintenance.  Some elements in the bathroom and the kitchen had signals of deterioration. -  WIFI.  You can´t use it.  The signal and the quality of it from all the hotel
Manager Response: Thanks for your thorough feedback. So happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and our friendly staff. We will look immediately into the housekeeping staff issues you mentioned. We are in the process of updating and renovating all of our rooms. We are always making sure to improve our property and staff. Thanks again for the helpful review.

Summary: The room was fantastic. The bedding was great, the kitchenette served us well. There were a few downsides though. The first was our stove burner wouldn't light and the lady up front brought a lighter to use until the next day so maintenance could come and fix it however there was no effort on her part the next day to make sure this actually happened, I didn't feel like a valued guest. The surrounding location was terrible and the sewage smell stemming from the restaurant was nauseating and unappetizing. The breakfast was nothing more than diced up front, bite sized pastries and cereal. Surely enough money is being made to at least provide a decent continental breakfast. I've paid less for hotels and received better breakfast.   My advice? Work on teaching your front crew staff
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad that you enjoyed your room, bedding and full kitchen. We have looked into your complaint about the smell around the restaurant and cannot find any smell like you were describing. We have mentioned it to the restaurant and will make sure to monitor the area more. We will also work with our front desk staff and their customer service. We usually receive great reviews of our staff going above and beyond in the care for our guests. Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: I assign to this hotel a great value, the only problem was the Wi-Fi, it was absolutely bad. Moving out from my room the signal was better, so you should ask for a room close to the reception if you need to use internet. For the rest I really enjoy the location and the hotel amenities. Ciao.
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed our hotel. We have since fixed the WiFi issue that you experienced during your stay. Hope you come back soon.

Summary: Loved this hotel, would happily say again. The staff were helpful, comfortable bed and having the supermarket across the road was wonderful. Close enough to get to Disneyland but far enough away to enjoy the quite at night.
Manager Response: Thanks for such a glowing review! We are happy that you will be back.

Summary: Great value. Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable. Everything was perfect until my final night when a large cockroach appeared on the wall. No big deal since I wasn't using the kitchen to serve food. Aside from that little incident I was pretty satisfied with my stay. I was stay there again but not sure if I would recommend to those who are afraid of bugs.

My husband and I are Texas Rangers fans.  We decided to go to a baseball game against the Anaheim Angels.   The staff are super friendly and professional.  Easy check in.  Love the decor. Pleasant environment. The room very clean and had everything we needed. Refrigerator, stove, microwave, toaster, cooking pans, microwave, dishes, and utensils.   My husband said Pepper Tree will be our go to place for Anaheim.  Its close to the theme parks, there is a grocery store across the street, and he can use the grill located in the pool area.

Hotel Pepper Tree was a great hotel. We really enjoy our stay. The Kitchen was very convenient since we were trying to avoid eating at the Disneyland Resort while we were there. We also enjoyed the pool area too.

Silence, nice area, comfortable hotel, old fashion style.  It just misses  a laundry. We would recommend this hotel. The continental breakfast, probably, could be improved but there is fruit which is very good.

Summary Heading: A nice place to stay in LA
Summary: Very good adress, we enjoyed really much this hotel very well located near by Disneyland LA. Room is spacious well equiped with a fridge and microwave and patio was a good area to relax after a day at Disney. People at front desk are very he,pful and frendly. Also enjoyed "mexican" supermarket located at 5 minutes walk to the hotel to buy food and drinks!!! If we have to come back to LA we will surely book again a room at Pepper Tree hotel!

Summary Heading: A lovely stay in a lovely hotel
Summary: We are a family of 4 with 2 young children, travelling from the UK to Anaheim for the first time.  The Hotel Pepper Tree staff were wonderful and extremely helpful.  The kids enjoyed the pool and it was never too busy, and the BBQ area was a great idea.  It could do with some sun beds round the pool rather than just chairs.   The room was clean and satisfactory for us, although having somewhere for us all to eat would have been useful, we ended up balancing plates on the beds, so a small table and chairs would have been great. The only problem for us was the very noisy aircon unit which meant that we couldn't use it overnight and so the room did get quite hot. Overall, we'd recommend the hotel to families looking for a quiet and relaxed hotel.

Summary Heading: Great spot to stay in Anaheim
Summary: The property is well maintained and the customer service is great. The cleaning staff is exceptional. Its close to all the major attractions and shopping. The front desk staff are friendly and curtious.

Very nice older hotel, it was clean and comfortable. The breakfast had a nice assortment with a nice option to get a hot meal made for you. Staff was very friendly and welcoming. We enjoyed our private balcony and sliding door for a nice evening breeze.

Summary Heading: Rustic boutique family owned property in Disney's backyard
Summary: Stayed here just for a night and instantly wished that i could have stayed longer. What i liked the most is that this is a small property with rustic decor and the rooms felt like home. The staff was very friendly too and rooms reasonably priced. The rooms were clean, hallways well lit and parking was free. We selected this place due to its proximity to Disneyland. The pool was small, but good enough to have fun. Lots of dining options nearby too. Cant go wrong staying here. I cannot rate the housekeeping services as my stay was just for a night, but i am hoping it was good  Breakfast was disappointing, would have given a 5 star rating but for this. the restaurant could be a lot cleaner and a couple of hot items on the breakfast menu wouldn't hurt.  Thanks, Kalpesh

We are a family of 4 and we got a 2 queen bed with full kitchen, amazing deal the price includes parking,wifi and breakfast!!! Excellent staff, we just had the bed experience at the best price. Great.

Everything was great except for the breakfast was not good at all the bathroom needs to be remodled a bit and kitchen cabinet. The WiFi was a bit slow. I loved that we could buy the Disneyland tickets ahead of time and get a discount.

Great find. fantastic grocery store across the street, Easy to find. Close to Disney but Disney so hard to get into by car and that would be my only down point is it is easier on foot to get into Disney-took us over an hour to get off street into lot.. No fault of hotel. Nice light breakfast.. Nice refreshing pool. I would come back..

We've stayed here many times before an love having a kitchen.  Being able to have the fridge and stove really help. There is even a grocery store across the street for stocking up.  This place is in the middle of Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm.  Cheaper price and with a kitchen make the parking at or near DL very reasonable.  I love the Spanish style flooring and decor in every room and around the grounds.  The breakfast is Lacking but has your minimal basics-but you always have your own fridge.  I always look at this place first when comparing prices for the Anaheim area.

Good value for money, if one wants to explore LA surroundings (not necessarily Disneyland). Close to freeway. Safe neighborhood. Cozy, clean, big studio, comfortable bed. Bathroom too small. Average breakfast. Free wifi sometimes slow.

Located close to grocery store and Disney. Loved little court yard and kitchen. Room was clean when we came back from park in middle of day. Never ate breakfast can't rate. We will definitely be back.

Toilet overflowed the first night, they said it was a problem with the main line and moved me, then toilet overflowed in that room too! Gross. Also, never replaced towels or washcloths, had to ask for more. Clock didn't work in room (but a friggin battery in it!) and hair everywhere. Won't return.

We were very pleased with our stay at this hotel. Big and clean room, the accomodations were perfect for 3 people (we had the King Courtyard room). Easy and fast route to Disneyland by car.  Front desk staff were friendly.  The only complaint would be that housekeeping took our wash cloths but then did not replace them so we had to get them from the front desk at night after returning from a long day at disneyland. We did not try the continental breakfast.  The wifi was very slow.  But for the value we would definitely stay here again.

Nice & clean room Hotel very close to shops and parcs (disneyland !). Air conditioning system very noisy Noisy environment because of terrible phonic insulation Continental breakfast average (sorry for my english...)

Summary Heading: Great Spot for a Great Price
Summary: Came here with my girlfriend to stay for four nights. Staff was friendly and the place was clean. Would definitely come back again! The only gripe I would have is that the free provided wifi is almost unusable because it's super slow!

Our experience at the Hotel Pepper Tree was very nice. The rooms were clean and well maintained as well as the entire property. It is boutique hotel in Anaheim and away from all the tourist traps. The staff was fantastic. We enjoyed all aspects of the hotel.

Overall the facilities were excellent.  Unfortunately, we can confirm the WiFi was terrible, s others have noted.  It's time to upgrade the system, speed, and bandwidth.  The continental breakfast was average.  We don't mind busing our own tables, but the tables should be cleaned frequently.

good value.  ok parking.  good breakfast.  Richard L 09/01/2015 easy to find, back off busy street, not too much traffic noise,  Close to Disneyland and downtown Anaheim.  Not a fancy place, but it is clean.

Summary Heading: Good value but needs some updating.
Summary: Hotel was older but had a lot of charm. Staff were great!! Loved the size of our room and the kitchen. Bathrooms need to be updated. Easy to drive to Disneyland and other area attractions. Free breakfast could have used more options. Overall our stay was enjoyable and a good value for the price, we would definitely stay again.

Cute place and great for the money...Went for my grandsons birthday at Disneyland and Medieval Times show....centrally located The staff was great and very helpful. It is an older property but very clean... didn't have breakfast there. Would consider returning.

Every thing were good, love rooms, location, breakfast quality it will be good to little improve, also note to administration when kitchen's staff are happy and love their job so this will reflecting on their service .

They painted the room next to us while we were out for the day, and came back to get ready for our anniversary dinner to a horrendous stench of fumes in our room. They did not notify us that they were painting the room beforehand. I have severe allergies so this gave me an instant headache, and then we had to move all of our things to another room, and in result, we were late for our dinner reservations for our anniversary. They also would not give us $20 off our stay with the coupons they sent to us, because they said they couldn't use them because we booked through booking.com. Very unaccomodating, considering the annoying and rude inconveniences.

Bathroom are in terrible condition, need to upgrade to old condition and to be clean up kitchen need upgrades too. Continental breakfast cuold be better. Better service and food...need more parking sp

Lovely place, great staff, impeccable cleanliness...overall great value for the rate. Thank you to all the staff, we loved it. Pool was clean just wish it was bigger since it was so popular, other than that amazing experience.

BBQ area and pool was fantastic, good spacious rooms with home from home facilities we really enjoyed our stay. Great value for money. Nice Mexican themed hotel with helpful friendly staff. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Bowling alley within walking distance, and excellent supermarket right across the street.

Pleasant experience, rooms were clean and spacious and convenient parking. Location was not too far from main attractions and area is close to  many other services (food and shopping). Quiet and private. Staff was friendly and very helpful in giving directions.

Love the room with kitchenette; very comfortable and clean.  Pool area was also clean and had a gas grill in the area so you could have a little barbecue while in the pool.  Kids did not want to leave the pool as they were having so much fun.  Felt safe in neighborhood, lots of stores and restaurants nearby with easy access to Disney.

I am very impressed with my stay at Pepper Tree, I was provided with outstanding service by the Front Desk agents they were very friendly, professional and went out of their way to solve any issues. Thank you for making my stay pleasant and memorable. I will definitely be returning to Pepper Tree and will recommend this hotel to my friends and family that visit frequently.

The employees were friendly but the hotel was not as nice as pictured on the website.  The room was rundown and not as up to date as I anticipated.  I have no complaints against the staff but I would not chose this hotel as a place to stay again.

We booked 8 rooms for a family reunion.  We had an amazing time rooms were very comfortable ample parking space.  Location was very convenient to the kids and close by the main attraction in Los Angeles. Area full of all other services.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I've stayed at!
Summary: For the price, the rooms are excellent! Clean, spacious, comfortable and decorated beautifully. Hotel Pepper Tree is soooo cute! The patio was huge for a hotel. It was completely private with ivy and bamboo. The staff was great. This hotel actually looks like the pictures on the website. Very affordable. Definitely staying here again.

Enjoyed our one day stay at Pepper Tree ... the staff is SUPER (very friendly, and willing go that one step beyond what is expected to make you happy that you chose this hotel).    The rooms are very clean and nicely decorated ... the beds are comfortable, plus we had a small, but nice patio area.    I especially like the fact that PT is close to all of the major attractions, yet is set back in a very quiet location away from tourist!

Excellent location, kitchen full equiped and friendly staff. Good breakfast, supermarket and laundry in front of the hotel. 10 minutes from Disney Parks. The only thing that didn't work was the internet

We had a great stay there. Our whole family enjoyed out stay. The place was Clean and bright, staff was really nice. The only draw back was the WIFI. It was terrible and most of the time non existent.

I thought my room was amazing, all of the staff was very friendly. Although the wifi was poor, I will definitely stay here again. I will recommend this hotel to any one that wants a great room that very comfy.

The hotel was very nice. It was located in an area where we could get around and hit the interstate quickly. Plenty of parking. The room was clean and enjoyed having a kitchen. The staff was always polite and helpful with any questions we had about visiting the area.

Our stay was really nice! I loved the Tuscan theme in the whole hotel. Our room was really nice and I wish we could have stayed longer just to take advantage of using the pool and kitchen. The only cons were- No carpeting in foyer by elevators so between 8-2 you can hear housekeeping's carts rolling extremely loud.  The continental breakfast is in the resturaunt in the parking lot so it's a little inconvenient if you want to just run down and grab a couple things for the room. The pool is really small so if anyone is in it, it's a little awkward to join. Pros- awesome location! Awesome service! Best hotel for the price. I felt really at home.

Very comfortable, nicely decorated room, my husband ugraded his breakfast for $5.99, it was terrible,soupy refried beans looked nasty, I thought the ham and cheese omelet was pancakes, because they were burnt.

Hotel is a good place to relax and cool off after a long day at the park. I am still waiting for the refund on my ATM card that was charged when I checked in. I am not sure why they charge an extra fee for people using ATM cards.

Loved everything about this place! Will definitely stay here again especially since we have annual passes to Disneyland. It was very roomy and not too far from the park. The location was in a decent part of town too.

Summary Heading: Quite nice, especially for the price
Summary: The room and area are very nice. Lots of places to eat nearby, and extremely close to Disneyland. Room decor and size are superb for the price, and the kitchen makes meals cheaper to boot. My only complaint is that the bed wasn't as comfortable as I'd like. For the money, though, this is by far one of the best hotel values I've had in a long time. Highly recommended.

My family and I loved it here! Room was good, love the huge mirror! The kitchen was good, patio was a good size! Close to alot of things! The front desk was very friendly and helpful. Good quiet place where you can relax and rest!

very nice hotel nice and big room, big bed, nice kitchen and bathroom,free wifi and swimming pool, very close to Diseney !这个宾馆的位置很好，力迪斯尼乐园只有7-8分钟车程。对面有超市，还有一家中餐馆，旁边还有几家餐馆。旅馆房间很大，床很大很舒服，还带有厨房和各种厨具，非常方便。另外有免费wifi和游泳池，房间很干净，是此次美国之行最好的宾馆。另外，这个宾馆的价格很实惠，前台可以代购迪斯尼乐园门票，也有很多中国客人，非常推荐。

Summary Heading: The most helpful reception staff of our trip
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights whilst visiting Disney etc. Rooms well equipped, pool ok for location, and good value. What made our stay here really great were the extremely helpful staff who were a font of advice and always happy to help with arranging transport, luggage and itineraries. Well done guys!

The place was old looking and the furnitures/furnishings were ancient, making the room very cramped. The room has an antiseptic smell that hits you every time you enter the room but you stop noticing it in a few minutes. Asked for extra hangers but were not delivered. Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. We are sorry that we failed to help your request for hangers. We will make sure to look into this with our front desk staff.

Summary: great for extended stays, where you need a kitchen , LG. Fridge & such. bathroom is small but private, bed is nice and clean ! location to disneyland is only about 10 min. away, I like the rooms facing the pool area...

If I ever visit Anaheim again I will be staying at this hotel. I was very pleased with the room feeling like a small home. Everyone was very friendly and it is so close to Disneyland! I hope to visit again

The hotel was very well kept. I enjoyed my stay. I would have perferred a little better contiential breakfast since I stayed 6 days there. The coffee was cold. No flavored creamer and only bread and fruit.

My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights. Overall hotel was good, the bed was super comfy, room clean (although our dishes weren't done), staff friendly. But the breakfast was terrible, we ended up popping across to the supermarket to get our own food to cook. Great location for Disneyland, we used Uber to get us there and back as taxis were over double the price! Would go back.

Never heard of this hotel before even when made the bookings so was a little confused. But really happy to continue with the decision and make bookings. Rooms were very spacious and hygienic. They had small kitchens also available in room with required utensils and appliances like microwave and refrigerator. The staff was really good and well mannered. They also gave us a welcome kit on arrival which contained small goodies which came in as a surprise to me. Definitely I will consider this hotel on my next visit.

Although the hotel is very outdated, it was very clean and well maintained.  I read other other reviews and chose this hotel over the others because of them.  The lighting in the bathroom and dressing area needs to be updated as it was very poor for us women that put on makeup but overall we were very happy.  The continental breakfast "ok", I have had better and I have had worse so this ranked right in the middle.   Love that it has a full working kitchen, saved us a ton of time and money being able to cook our own food instead of always eating out.  Overall we were very happy and would highly recommend.

I love Disneyland and as such I travel to southern California to visit the park. Hotel pepper tree is my favorite place to stay! The rooms are large and comfortable and the pool is always clean and a good temperature. The continental breakfast is what you would expect. Font desk is always friendly.

My husband and I spent a couple days here while visiting the Disneyland parks. We loved it. Everything was clean and professional. Just a short drive to Disneyland and a great value. We will definitely staying here again.

Found this Hotel on Booking.com and saw the good reviews and I was not dissapointed. The service at the desk was great and the room with the kitchenette very enjoyable. Plenty of room. I will come back to this hotel

Hotel Pepper Tree is located just minutes away from Knott's Berry Farm, which was one of the places we visited. We were given a room that had a kitchen, a king bed, and a twin bed for our granddaughter. There were sliding doors that led to a beautiful bricked in patio that I loved. A free continental breakfast was provided every morning in the restaurant in front of the hotel.  I enjoyed the Mexican tilework on the floors and walls. Although we were too busy to take advantage of the pool, it looked clean and inviting. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it highly.

Went to Disneyland hotel was nice and had good service didn't like how there were not many options for breakfast. It needed more proteins eggs or meat maybe? Only protein I found was milk and yogurt. Overall had a very nice stay.

I have now stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree on two occassions for visits to the LA area.  The location is ideal, with easy access to "the 5".  Major attractions such as Disneyland and Angels stadium are easily accessible. The hotel has a unique charm, and quiet surroundings.  The rooms were comfortable and clean. Its older hotel so not a lot bells and whistles, but a full kitchen, comfortable beds, big rooms.. AC was a litle loud but eveything worked. we were comfortable, and rested well in this relaxing environment.  Highly Recommend for vacation travellers..

This hotel gets my business from now on when I go to Anahiem....I'm no royal but it suited all my hotel needs...great value. It is priced perfectly. Disneyland is less than 10mins away & Hunnington Beach Pier is amount 25mins...so easy!
Manager Response: Love to hear that we are your Anaheim hotel! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Area did not seem unsafe. Not far from Disney. Front desk were polite and helpful in every interaction. Room very spacious and did not seem dirty. Good water pressure in shower with consistent water temperature. A/C was very loud. Bed was old. Room smelled old. Not nearly enough electrical outlets. Ironing board old and very stained. No alarm clock.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed our customer service and found the room clean and spacious. We will make sure to look into the items you mentioned immediately.

Summary: Hotel had nice ambiance, friendly staff and great location to major attractions. Hotel fails with main fault, slow drainage in tub and sink. Cleanliness, very dusty. Subpar breakfast buffet. Hotel was very hot!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel. We are happy to hear you receive great customer service and enjoyed the ambiance of our hotel. We will make sure to look into your room issues immediately.

Summary: Special ambience with the spanish/mexican decoration. Front desk staff very helpful and flexible regarding room switch. Good location for family with kids :-) Bed and blanket seemed old and worn out. Bathroom needs some maintenance regarding faucet and floor not very clean. I would suggest to put a screen door at the balcony . We had mosquitos or some other bugs coming in when trying to keep the door open to freshen the air.

Nice hotel with spacious room and kitchen. Room is very clean and comfortable. We also like the styling of the hotel. It would be better to improve the breakfast, which was actually downgrade the hotel offered. Wifi connection is not smooth as well

The rooms are spacious and comfortable. Location is great with a supermarket and cvs right across the street as well as a nice Sushi/Sashimi place. But they need renovation. Everything is beat down, rusty and grimy. The aircon sounds like a jet engine.

Very friendly and helpful staff! Nice family size room with kitchenette. Close to everything!  Very helpful when on a budget. ;-) if ever go back to Anaheim will definitely stay there again! :-) Great stay!

The room was spacious and having a kitchen was an added bonus. Towels were skimpy, only one hand towel! Bed was comfortable, wifi good. Breakfast was surprisingly plentiful for a free breakfast. Close to Disney, but need to drive, came back in afternoon to avoid the heat, take a nap, then went back after 5pm. No problem since Disney lots allow in and out privileges. Would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you would stay with us again. Thanks for the review. We will make sure housekeeping sees your comments about the towels.

Summary: Nice to have a small kitchen in the room. Rooms were very spacious and clean. Staff were well informed and helpful. Wifi a bit slow for my Youtube surfing teenager and the pool can be noisy until closing time, but otherwise OK.
Manager Response: Love to hear that you thought we were a great value! Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: On average a good place to stay if your are going to Disney.   Nice staff, big comfortable family rooms.  Breakfast was average.  Fountains outside the room were a pleasant and relaxing touch.   Didn't use the pool but looked nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Glad you enjoyed your Courtyard Studio with the fountain - we love them too!

Summary: This is a very quaint nice hotel- helpful & friendly staff but there is nothing around the area. The area actually made me very uncomfortable. You are not close to good restaurants or shops. It would be great if closer to the Anaheim Gardenwalk area.

Summary Heading: The website pics better than actual room
Summary: I felt the website was very deceiving on how the rooms look.  maybe I was supposed to get the suite.  not sure.  The room was kinda cheesy but I guess worth the price.  I suppose if you want a kitchen in your room than this is a pretty good deal

room was good and well appointed, wi-fi worked fine. A few notes - desk clerk kept my credit card for 20 minutes "by accident" after check in; trash and dust on top of vending machines not cleaned for two days after front desk made aware; the patio light did not "go out automatically" at night as the front desk stated.

the staff at the front desk was very friendly and helpful. They answered all of our questions and did what they could to help when my friend and I got locked out our car. The hotel is in a great location, very close to Disneyland. We had a wonderful stay!

His place was great. The only issue we had was plumbing, the bathtub faucet wouldn't turn off but maintenance fixed it within minutes. Great location and hotel staff was very courteous and quick to help! Also there is a grocery store and laundromat right across the street.

The hotel was average at best. not many places around to grab a decent sit down meal. hotel pool filled the halls with pool smell and humidity. floors are tiled and kids would track water throughout making it slippery. maintenance is sub-par, should hire a professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We are looking into a better way to control the wet floors. We will make sure to use your review to better our hotel

Summary Heading: Nice, clean, reasonable hotel in Anaheim
Summary: Rooms are spacious, including balcony. Kitchen nice to have. All was clean. Pool was warm & relaxing.  Housekeeping did not wash our dirty dishes. That was a surprise and very disappointing. Any condo I've ever stayed in, housekeeping does the dishes daily.  Rent a car. Hotel is a few miles from Disneyland.  Great value, but clean & nice!
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you enjoyed our large rooms and the value of our hotel. We are sorry for the disappointment with the dishes. To make sure our housekeeping staff can accommodate all guest rooms and requests, we are unable to wash everyone's dishes. Thanks for the feedback. Hope you will come back again.

Summary: I have been coming to this hotel for years.  Spacious rooms. The kitchen is a plus for a large family. Very friendly staff. Only complaint is the breakfast is in a restaurant that is not owned by the hotel. The breakfast was very poor quality and the restaurant staff was not very polite. I did being this to the managers attention and he addressed the issue.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We love hearing from our repeat guests! We are so happy you talked with us during your stay about the breakfast. We are working hard to make adjustments and changes to improve the breakfast for our guests. Please come back again soon.

Summary: I was surprised as to how nice the hotel was. They area had me skeptical about how it would be but it worked out well. The hotel itself was great. Service and amenities were more than I expected and my family had a nice little getaway here.
Manager Response: So happy you loved your stay! We are excited that we were above and beyond your expectations. Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: It was very darling , it felt welcoming
Summary: The staff was helpful and and kind , everyone made you feel welcome ! I will tell friends and family , thanks so much for the hospitality. It is not a new hotel ,but everyone made you feel at home ! Great for families. Clean !
Manager Response: So happy you felt welcomed! We love being a home away from home of our guests. Thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Nice facility with a few problems.
Summary: The gas from the stove came on twice by accident and filled the room. This, of course was very dangerous and potentially deadly. I told the front desk but to my knowledge nothing was done during our stay. We removed the control knobs so that it didn't happen a third time. There was no working light in the pool making night swimming for the kids difficult. The pool recirculating water was just flowing out onto the pool deck until we told the office and they found someone to correct it. The rooms were nice and I appreciated the fact that they were able to put all 16 in my party in the same area of the building in 5 rooms. Im certain that the problems I experienced were not typical. Everyone else in my party had no problems. I enjoyed the stay and would probably return here. Great

This room was perfect. You have room to live, enjoy your evenings and a cute little patio for dinner. We loved staying here. This would be a great place to go with a significant other, family, friends or even alone.

Summary Heading: Had a great time at the Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: Overall one of the best places that I have stayed within the last two years.  The kitchen was a plus!  The Hotel Staff were extremely helpful with meeting my needs during my stay.  I will be staying in the hotel in the future.

Awesome location; near Huntington Beach, Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland.  Great Staff, rooms were quiet and clean.  Loved the refrigerator and stove.  Front desk was friendly and efficient.  Maids did not clean the dishes in the kitchen when we left for the day..found that a little odd, but would definately return to this very cute and convenient hotel.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you found us cute and convenient! Thanks so much for the helpful review.

Summary: We spent one week on this hotel. The room was nice, the beds was very good. The pool area is small and we did not use it so much. The wi-fi is slow and falls out all the time. The staff is friendly...

Good option in Anaheim, to families Whith children and close de atractions. Price -- quality is Good . To visit Los Ángeles The distance is 1 hour , and theme Parks knotts berry farm and Disneyland are 10 minutes.

Nice hotel in the middle of community. If you stay here request the backside of hotel away from restaurant and main road. It was too noisy in the front side.  Overall a nice small hotel close to many attractions.

Excellent for family weekend trip to Disney Land and California Adventure. Large room (exact to pics online), nice patio, quiet area, nice bathroom, everything was really clean, nice kitchen with everything you need (untensils,dishes, cups, pots & pans, paper towels, dish soap, etc.), very attentative/helpfull staff (yet XBOX 1 hard to connect to WIFI & IPAD I think due to room location had to stand in hallway to get hooked up), nice pool (yet no hot tub...personal request...would've be nice after 12 hour day of walking), continental breakfast was ok (average), 7-9 minutes from Disney Land, and overall I would definitely return had amazing time.

Summary Heading: Disappointed. Worst boutique hotel I've ever stayed in.
Summary: Found an opened condom package under the bed.  Room had a dirty feeling overall.   Breakfast was horrible. Presentation was bad. Items not being replenished fast.  Bad coffee. Had to go out and get our own breakfast for the rest of our trip. Went to a nice breakfast place every day that we got to know the owner.

I was here a week ago. I spend a day in Disneyland and the next day I went to California Adventure. This hotel It's a nice place to stay, very clean, spacious and comfortable, The service is great.I enjoy the breakfast a lot and I got a really nice service from the people who work here. Highly recommended!

Large rooms beautiful landscaping parking both front and back. Breakfast so so but the rolls were soft not dried out as you sometimes get. Mostly really quiet which is hard to find around Anaheim   I would stay again. Nice sized rooms for families

This was great for the family. Close proximity to Disney Land. Although missing a hot tub, which could been useful after a long day of walking (personal preference). I would definitely be a returning customer.

Summary Heading: Business & Relax at the Pepper Tree
Summary: Amazing boutique hotel with very large and comfortable room: clean kitchen, private patio, free wiFi and a relaxing super bed! On the ground: lovely pool and restaurant for breakfast.  One of the most beautiful place ever stayed. A little expensive but in average with the Anaheim prices. If I will return in Anaheim, I will return to the Pepper Tree.

Everything was spot on. Staff and facilities first rate. Could not ask for a friendlier, helpful staff. Convienent location, easy access to conferences and disney. Close to stores. Family friendly. Recommended.

I had to go to Anaheim for work for six days and decided to take along my wife kids. Because of this we looked for a hotel with larger rooms, a kitchen and a nice pool. Based on the information we found on the internet we selected Pepper Tree hotel and we were not disappointed. The pool is not very large, but large enough to cool down and have some fun with your kids. The pool area is surrounded by palm trees which gives it a tropical atmosphere. The rooms are comportable, we had a small patio. Continental breakfast always included fresh cut melon, pineapple and grapes, which We never had in the five consecutive hotels. All this, together with the very reasonable price made this a great choice for our stay in Anaheim.

we stayed twice at Pepper Tre hotel.  Our second stay was better : we got the renovated rooms and we can see the difference. location is perfect, staff friendly and the pool perfect for kids. just the breakfast is a bite disappointing. We will come back here for sure

A lot of noise They don't really clean the room Horrible breakfast pls do not try it I wish they take more money and give us Better breakfast  Every time we try to have breakfast we don't find plates to use We have to wait for other people to finish eating and then they clean the plates and give it to us to use it Very strange

I stayed here with a friend to travel to LA for the few days I was here from AZ. I picked it for the low price and was surprised with how happy I was with this hotel! It's a cute, Spanish style hotel. It's in a very nice area, a couple minutes away(driving) from Disney. We got a room including 2 queen beds and kitchen. It had a very nice little decorated patio space. There's a flat screen TV with basic cable. The kitchen has everything you need for your everyday cooking. The bathroom area was roomy with a big closet. I wish the shower water was warmer, but maybe I'm spoiled back home. Staff was very friendly and helpful. And room was clean and stocked with plenty of towels when we got back each night! (I always use a lot of towels). Overall, you feel at home and I would come

Summary Heading: Room smelled to much like paint
Summary: Overall the hotel is great I've stayed there before that time was perfect. This time from the moment walked in room strong smell of paint after sitting in there for a while I went outside n sat in balcony to get air came back in I got a headache from smell  went to take care of my work stuff returned still smelled had headache over night next day woke up late to appointments due to not sleeping right over night cause of smell  I will consider next time but I will have to check room first just was not happy at all with smell

Good this hotel. We're like . Because good location . We like to go everywhere  easy. Near the Disney Land. If we have plane next time we stay in this hotel . Room is big and to enough 3 person.We love it.
Manager Response: Happy to hear your enjoyed the size of our rooms and the location of our hotel. Thanks for the review!

Summary: everything was great in the hotel love to stay there again my whole family like the hotel staff was very nice rooms were clean kids enjoyed in the pool close to all places where ever we wanted to go great!!
Manager Response: So happy you loved your stay! Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: Our stay was very comfortable, quiet, easy access to Theme parks. Reasonable rates. Quick response to needs.We really enjoyed our stay here. Will book again in the future. It was very clean. Loved it!
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will come again! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Nice concept, private courtyard with patio set & fountain was a nice touch. The old, antique feel misses the mark though; interior just looked and felt old and run down. Full kitchen useful but not attractive.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. I'm glad you liked our boutique charm. We are currently renovating rooms and hope you come back this fall to see our new look!

Summary: Hotel was great. Elevator a big help in getting luggage to and from upper floors. Pool are is very nice.  Continental breakfast was poor - nothing but sugar in various forms. I would stay there again but eat a real breakfast elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. So happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel. We will make sure to show the restaurant your comments about breakfast. We are working with them to improve their service and selection.

Summary: We had a great experience at Pepper tree, the grounds are nice and the room spacious. The only complaint was with the beds, very uncomfortable. Our stay was very enjoyable as we were there on a family vacation. We would stay again.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the feedback. So happy to hear that you will be back. We will make sure to check the bed in your room immediately. Most guests enjoy our beds. Thanks.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, cheap Uber to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel was very nice and different than staying at a more corporate hotel, which is what we were going for. We stayed 4 nights. The uber ride to Disney runs about $7.00 and there are a lot of drivers in the area.  The breakfast was ok, pastries, cereal and fruit. Enough to keep the kids full until lunch.  We'd stay again for sure!
Manager Response: Love to hear that you will be back! Thanks for the review.

Summary: The floors have terra cotta tiles in the rooms and hallways which are not flat but have a slight curve to them. Very uncomfortable to walk on in bear feet. Because of this I would not recommend the hotel or stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are sorry that you didn't enjoy our Spanish style and floors. This is the first time we have heard of anyone having this issue.

Summary: I did not get to stay very long. Had to leave very early in the morning. Price was a little high for a quick. overnight. I did not get to view the pool area. I did get interupted as soon as I got my room by maintenance checking the bathtub. The air conditioning was great cooled the room down very quickly.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review the hotel. We hope you can come back again and enjoy your room a little more.

Summary: I stayed here for three days. The hotel staff called me before I checked in, they said gave me a free upgrade, which turned out it's a lie!! How could cheat me that you changed my room from a king-size room to a queen size room is an upgrade! And you said it's an free upgrade! I found that you charged me $9.8 after I got home! How could you do this to your consumers??? I booked two Queens beds, you give me a Queen bed and a sofa!! Unbelievable!!! I'm so disappointed on your hotel! Never change sheet!! There's hair on bed!
Manager Response: We are sorry that you did not have a good experience at our hotel. We have already spoken with you and refunded you accordingly. Again, we are sorry that the room change was not a good fit for your group even though you thought it would be the better option for your group.
