Summary: This hotel is super close to a lot of attractions including Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. The staff was very nice, and the decor was beautiful. Free breakfast, but it is at the restaurant next door. We slept in and missed it though. We were only here for one night, but in all we had a great stay.
Manager Response: Happy to hear you enjoyed your quick trip! Come back again for a longer stay.

Summary: Very close to Disneyland however if you are looking to go to Hollywood and do not have a car I would suggest somewhere else. Overall nice hotel with good facilities at a reasonable price. Enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland. We do recommend having a car to visit Hollywood - it is about a 45 minute drive from Anaheim. Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: older hotel but great for staying close to disney and knotts. not the typical cookie cutter hotel with personality. doesnt habe a ton of amenities and is a bit off the beating path but still worth it.
Manager Response: Love when people find us to be a hidden gem. Please come back soon!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay and will return again. I love the prices and roomy rooms especially the kitchen. Being able to cook saves money and makes it all feel like home away from home. The pool is heated felt great to go for a swim so relaxing.
Manager Response: Love to be called a "home away from home"! Thanks for the helpful review.

Summary: I really wanted to like this place because it got a lot of great review. However, I am not sure how. My family and I spent three nights here and the only reason we stayed after the first night was because almost all of the hotels in the area were booked up. As soon as we walked into the room, it smelled like mildew and cigarettes. So, we opened the sliding glass door to let it air out. That night we went to take a shower and the drain was clogged along with the toilet having difficulties going down. I went downstairs and spoke with one of the ladies at the front desk. I explained what was going on and she apologized and told me to request a different room in the morning with Angel. We didn't sleep very well that night and had issues with the very loud air conditioner. For some

Close to Disney and knots berry farm! Room and staff were great. The breakfast was not very good and across the parking lot. Was told there was additional breakfast items available to purchase but when I was given the menu, there weren't any breakfasts. Needs a little more choices. But other than breakfast I would rate the hotel, staff, room and pool a 10!

We stayed at this hotel based on price and reviews. The hotel itself was a bit warm when we walked in, and I mean temperature. Broke a bit of a sweat checking into the place. AC unit does have a bit of noise with it but it wasn't bothersome to us. The room was very nice in size, full size fridge, and nice kitchenette. Friendly staff and the place felt comfortable. Overall it was a very nice stay and great location for where we were trying to go. We will stay there again if we travel to that area in the future.

I loved! the Hotel Pepper Tree. Reminded me of hotels in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico that I've stayed in. I loved the room, especially the balcony. Pool was nice and my niece enjoyed it. I would definitely recommend this hotel and plan to stay here again!

Family of 5 fit very comfortably in this room.  Roomy enough to put a small cot for my 3 year old.  Loved the kitchen and small balcony. Very short drive to Disneyland.  Friendly staff.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will be back! Thanks for the review.

Summary: This hotel is everything you could ever want. Large rooms, friendly staff, close to Disneyland, grocery stores, restaurants and pharmacies. The property was quiet for the most part, even with it being a family style hotel, and it was very welcoming.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel.

Summary: This location was a great stay to rest after long days at Disney! Just a few minutes drive. Family friendly, older, nicely kept, quaint, clean and quiet. GREAT deal/discount on Disney tickets. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: So happy you will stay with us again! Glad you used our special offer on the Disneyland tickets.

Summary Heading: Nice, clean but old and shows it
Summary: The Pepper tree is nice and clean - surprisingly clean given the age of the establishment and the lack of upgrades.  The staff is really nice and the customer service is great.  The breakfast is really poor and actually would be better to do onsite versus the cheap food and service of the diner sharing the parking lot.  It has potential to be so much more if the owners would upgrade and  take its location as advantage.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your feedback. We are very happy that you found our hotel nice and clean.  We are currently renovating all of our rooms and hope you will come back to see them this fall. We are also working with the restaurant on improving the breakfast options. We will definitely use your comments to improve our hotel.

Summary: Absolutely loved our room! Clean, spacious, personal touches, comfy. Everyone was friendly and helpful. Stayed in two other spots on our trip for locations sake and Peppertree was far superior! Loved it!
Manager Response: So happy you loved your stay! Come back soon.

Summary: Overall a comfortable place to stay.   The breakfast was lacking  and wasnt kept up with demand.  Otherwise the Staff was great and made sure we enjoyed our stay.  We will definitely stay here again. Great.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed our customer service. Thanks for choosing our hotel and we hope you come back soon.

Summary: We came for two nights this past week while we were visiting.  When we got to our room, we thought it was just ok.  The furniture was beaten up a bit and its very dated. I wouldn't take a bath in the tub.  It was in poor condition.  The bath tub was old and peeling inside.  The next morning when we woke up we went down for breakfast before heading to Disneyland.  For people who have kids, the breakfast would have been sufficient.  Little Debbie donuts, juice, two cereals, and some breads.  For a price of $5.99, I believe, you can order pancakes and eggs. Extra charge.  We decided to go somewhere else for breakfast both mornings we stayed there.  On Friday July 10th, we went to Disneyland and got back to the hotel at approximately 1 a.m.  We came back to our door OPENED!  Not
Manager Response: Thank you taking the time to review our hotel. We are so sorry that you did not receive our best service during your stay.  We have used your comments and situation to work with our housekeeping staff and will continue to monitor their performance. We have tried to contact you and the manager did leave a message. We hope you take the time to call us back. Thanks again for your feedback and we apologize for any inconvenience we have caused.

Summary: My mom, sister and I took a tour of California and our first stop was Anaheim- We stayed in this hotel for 3 nights. We loved having access to a kitchen area in our room and always came back to a clean room. We had an issue the first night getting into our room (our room key wouldn't work and it was 11pm) the front office associate was more than accommodating and got us into our room ASAP. We loves the hospitality and location. Having our own terrace separate from all the rooms was a definite plus!  Even had a small bistro table to enjoy breakfast They also offered free continental breakfast at the restaurant in from of the hotel. --Would for sure come back here if I ever come back to Cali
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed your stay, room, and full kitchen. Hope you can make it back to So Cal soon.

Summary: This hotel probably could use a little upgrading. Bed linens might have been clean but stained. Floors were dirty - wore white socks that were black after a couple of hours of walking on the floor. Love the ambience of the hotel just needs a facelift.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed the ambiance of our boutique hotel. We are currently renovating all of our rooms and hope you can see the finished product this fall. We appreciate you helpful feedback and make sure to investigate your room immediately.

Summary: We loved staying at Hotel Pepper Tree! All the amenities were great and it's close to Disneyland. The patio was my favorite! It was a home away from home. We will definitely be staying here on our next visit.
Manager Response: Loved to be called a home-away-from-home!! So happy we can be that for you. Thanks for the great review.

Summary: We loved staying at pepper tree. Angel at the front desk went out of his way during our stay. When we decided to stay a extra day Angel looked high and low to gind us a room. He was polite and professional. Angel saved our family vacation and made our kids so happy we were able to stay another day. When we left back to San Diego my daughter left her purse at the hotels restaurant and again Angel saved the day found it and is going to ship it to us. Thank you so much  Brenes family
Manager Response: We love Angel too! We will make sure he sees your comments. Love to hear stories like this. Come back soon!

Summary: We had a family of 5 and the full kitchen was excellent to make our stay comfortable and economical. This is a really great boutique hotel. Affordable and with everything you would need.   Service was great.  My daughter went wandering while we were staying there and the front desk staff dropped everything until she was found. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Great location. Clean. Wonderful service.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review! We love to have families stay with us. Glad you enjoyed the kitchen.

Summary: The kitchen was nice with some kitchen utensils but the bed sheets need to be replaced immediately. They are really old and need to be replaced with new ones. The ac is loud too. It would be great if you guys installed ac overall in the building  instead of separate  ones in each room which are quite loud. And the rolling laundry bins that the cleaners use are very loud near the doors
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. We will make sure to look into and improve all the things you mentioned. We appreciate your comments.

Summary: Our party of 5 (2 Seniors, 1 Adult,2 children aged 10 &11) found the Hotel and amenities fabulous and good location to go to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland .with good variety of eateries nearby and supermarket just across from the Hotel.The only let down was breakfast as some people were having "take aways" which limited the variety for others. Cafetteria needs supervision! to stop this happening. One morning we had no bread/ bagels/danish pastries/doughnuts only cereal and fruit.
Manager Response: So happy your family enjoyed your room and our hotel! We will make sure the restaurant sees you comments and will work with them to improve their service. Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: Stayed one night when visiting someone in the area.  Hotel Pepper Tree met my expectations in terms of comfort, friendly staff, and a nice restaurant for dinner and their continental breakfast in the morning.  There was a more than adequate amount of choices on the breakfast.  Kitchen in my particular unit was very outdated, but sufficient in terms of amenities.  The bathroom was quite spacious with a delightful goodie bag provided; however, it too could use a makeover.  However, the place was clean, bed comfortable and price middle of the line for services received.  I'd recommend it if you need a spacious place at a decent price.
Manager Response: So happy we were a good fit for you during your stay. We are in the process of renovating all of our rooms. We hope that you return again soon to see the new rooms. Thanks for the review.

Summary: It was the best 4th of july weekend ever the hotel is like home away from home the rooms are spacious you can cook all you want the tv is hugh and so is the bed other than that the spanish style design of the hotel was very relaxing as well as the water fountains and patios outside to rest!!
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for the great review. Glad you had such a fun and relaxing holiday weekend!

Summary: The rooms are big but the hotel looks old. There is some really old furniture in the room.They have enough utensils in the room for a family to cook. The staff is friendly & accommodating. Breakfast is pretty good   Overall value for money
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Glad that you enjoyed our customer service. We are currently renovating rooms throughout the hotel. We hope you come back for the new look this fall.

Summary: Usually when go to Disneyland stay at one of the disneyland hotels but last time had a bad experience and also this was spur of the moment trip so almost all rooms were booked only had suites available so used Expedia and the cost was like half of any disneyland hotel and was more comfortable..
Manager Response: Wow! So happy to hear that you prefer us over one of the Disneyland hotels. Thanks so much for the great review.

Summary: Overall a pleasant stay, we would stay again + Good location between Disney and Knott's Berry; good value compared to other locations in Anaheim; staff was extremely helpful and responsive; kitchen was good though could have used some more items (additioanal plates and silverware) - hotel rooms could use some updating, though the decor was nice; WiFi is below average; and the bed was pretty hard but we got used to it
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will stay again. Thanks so much for the helpful feedback!

Summary: Our shower was going down real slow so when we showered it would fill up and not drain the bedding was just real hard to pull the cover up over you and the style just kind of blah like needs be more up to date
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We will make sure to look into your shower immediately. We are currently renovating all of our rooms. We hope that you will come back to see our new look this fall.

Summary: Nice place, internal decoration is amazing! Will recommend friends, and will choose to stay again if I want to ever visit Anaheim. If this was a chain and in this quality I would stay in my all trips.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the positive feedback! We are happy you enjoyed our boutique charm and value. Come back soon!

Summary: I wish there were more to do right around the hotel but the accommodations were really quite nice for the price. We were going to Disneyland and it was an easy drive. I was impressed with the cleanliness and the overall feel of the place.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you were impressed with our hotel! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: The bathroom/shower was not clean when we arrived, and the location isn't near anything. It's not a terrible hotel but i felt it was overpriced. Everything is outdated and they don't even have the air on in the lobby..
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are sorry that you felt we are overpriced. Most of our guests tell us we are a great value for the price. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations.

Summary: Hot summer night and like to turn on air conditioner but it is almost impossible to sleep due to loud fan sound. It is out of date model and very dirty (filter ever changed?). Bed mattress was also too soft and caused back pain. WIFI was fast and O.K. LCD TV was nice.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback regarding you room. We are happy the you enjoyed the WiFI, but we are sorry for any issues you experienced with the air conditioner. We hope that you did contact the front desk so we could fix the problem immediately.

Summary: We lover he pepper tree hotel and will definitely be back however on our last stay we had two issues. First, the wifi was basically non-existent . I needed to do a little bit of work and I couldn't use the wifi at all. Second, the noise from other guests' children on our floor was ridiculous. I tried to take a nap and also at night for sleeping two other guests had their doors open with their misbehaved kids screaming and slamming doors. Not cool!
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We really appreciate the comments from our repeat guests! We will look into why there was WiFi issues in your room -We hope you contacted the front desk during your stay. We are also sorry for the noisy families you encountered. Thanks again for the helpful review.

Summary: The front desk personnel and the cleaning staff were very friendly. My daughter-in-law was ill and got sick in the room. The above personnel were very kind about the situation. They were also very friendly during check in and out.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that our staff was friendly and accommodating! Thanks!

Summary: Really appreciated the email with directions that we received.  Hotel was beautiful and quiet.  Loved the balcony.  Had a problem with the toilet, called the desk and they had someone up within 5 minutes to fix it.  Great service.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: Nothing bad to say except we couldn't check in a little early, and after driving for fourteen hours we were exhausted. The receptionist was a bit rude,and the maids didn't sweep the floor or hall of the bedroom, even though there was sand. Even after that the hotel is a very decent price, freeways are easily accessible, plenty of stores and restaurants near by, close to disneyland. We loved the private patio, and ambience of the room/hotel! Overall the hotel was awesome and comforting even after staying for six days. Will definitely be going back to this hotel on our next vacation to california!
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed your 6 day stay and that you will come back and stay with us again. Thanks for the helpful comments and feedback. We will use them to better our hotel.

Summary: Outlets in kitchen did not work, no matches to lite gas stove, tub drain broken, sliding glass door not connected to wall, blankets on bed falling apart.  There were only two places to sit for a four person studio room.
Manager Response: We are very sorry that we did not meet your expectations and that you experience issues with your room. We do hope you were able to talk to the hotel manager during your stay to resolve your issues.

Summary Heading: Perfect Place to Stay for Anaheim Trip
Summary: Several people had said to not stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree and to stay at one of the hotels closer to Disneyland, but my husband and I liked it just fine. It was a great price and they call it a "boutique" hotel because it's not very big, which I liked.  We liked the Spanish ranch style (my husband is a big Zorro fan, so it was perfect for him) and loved the little kitchenette in the room. We stocked the fridge with bottled water and fresh fruit from the Anaheim Target, which we took with us into Disney (good way to save money!). I also appreciated the A/C unit in the wall that you can control - it worked very well! We never got around to using the pool, but we liked the free continental breakfast at the Mexican restaurant next door. It's from 7am-10am only (which is perfect
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for such a great review. So happy you enjoyed our boutique charm. Hope you can enjoy our hotel again in the future.

Summary: This hotel is amazing. You look at the pictures and expect that youll get less than what they show but is was exactly the same! Beautiful and si much better than your average hotel room! Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. Please come again soon.

Summary: I chose this hotel with no information of the surrounding area and was trying to get the closest hotel to a particular friend I was visiting. As a result, I didn't know that Anaheim is particularly unsafe and I also didn't realize DisneyLand was nearby. Overall, this place was great as a place to sleep and keep my things during the day but it wasn't a place I wanted to linger. As soon as you left the hotel building you felt that "unsafe" description I mentioned, any time of day. (Caveat: I hadn't been to California prior to this trip so that might affect this review). Don't plan to walk anywhere, except maybe the grocery store across the street. On the plusses, the room had a full kitchen and there was a grocery store across the street. If you have a rental car or a shuttle to
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed the convenience of your room and our helpful staff. We are in a typical Anaheim/Southern California neighborhood right between Knott's Berry Farm and the Disneyland Resort. We hope you enjoyed the visit with your friend.

Summary: So, it was my first ever trip to Disneyland......I'm 48..... My friend Karen and I searched long and hard for a hotel.....we didn't want to stay too close to DL but not far away. We thought the pepper tree would be ideal. We thought there would not be enough shops around DL, not enough dining etc. turns out there was plenty right around DL. The PT was gross, very old, very worn but the staff were just wonderful.  The good things, wonderful staff, clean rooms, serviced everyday, about 10 miles from DL, a few shops around, not many, supermarket directly across the road. Beautiful pool. Bad things, too far away from DL, we got ripped off by the taxis no end.....12 night stay and we paid about $1000 U.S. Between us getting around. The hotel used uber, what a rip off....yellow taxi
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the hotel. We are sorry that you had such a poor experience with the local taxi service. We do always recommend and even post on our website to rent a car while visiting the Southern California area. We will definitely use your feedback to improve our hotel. We have improved the breakfast selection but will keep trying to make it better. Thanks again for the feedback.

Summary: Nice room with kitchen possibilities. Very helpful staff. Breakfast was ok. Calm area, supermarket across the street. Kitchen could be upgraded a bit. ************************************* Good parking, no disturbing noices.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful review. So glad your enjoyed our friendly and calm atmosphere. Come back again soon!

Summary: Hotel is awesome. I would come back here again. Sheets were full of holes and bath tub was slippery for kids. I addressed issue to staff but management didn't want to provide with a rubber mat for the tub for liability reasons. I used a floor towel in the tub to bathe kids to prevent slipping.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. Glad you enjoyed your stay! We do have extra mats for the shower at the front desk. We are sorry that the front desk did not make these available for your.

Summary: The bedding was worn.  Kitchen was adequate but microwave smelled bad inside, and housekeeper did not clean the dishes.  Bathtub had an uneven bottom and water temperature was not consistent.  Shampoo was low quality.  We were in room 201.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will look into the room your room immediately. We are working on renovating all of our rooms and kitchens. Thanks for the feedback - we will use it to better our hotel.

Summary: We have been staying here for years and plan to keep coming back. Great family feel instead of chain hotel, and the kitchen is a big plus !! Quick drive to many California destinations. Service is always great.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We LOVE hearing from our returning guests! Hope we keep seeing for many more years.

Summary: I stayed here for a trip to Disneyland. It is just a short drive away and the price was much more affordable than the nearer options. The hotel was clean and we'll maintained. Had a complete kitchen and a nice terrace to chill out after the parks.
Manager Response: Thanks for the helpful feedback. So glad you had a relaxing and enjoyable time at our hotel.

Summary: Great stay!  The front desk staff was very helpful and courteous.  Room was comfortable and spacious.  Bathroom could have been cleaner though.  We did not enjoy the restaurant though and would have preferred room service of some type.
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed your stay and room. The restaurant does provide room service on weekdays but not on the weekends unfortunately. We are looking into other companies to help us provide this service. Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: Second time staying here and my kids love this hotel. It's right by everything. They are very accommodating for everything I needed. I will recommend this hotel to any one staying in the Anaheim area. Definitely be back next year.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you had  a great birthday trip with your family! Will be happy to have you back next year.

Summary: my first time in Anaheim and this hotel lived up to its value  it had everything in the room starting from a big modular kitchen and a giant fridge along with all the necessary utensils and a very spacious room
Manager Response: Thanks so much for a great review! Happy to hear you enjoyed our boutique charm.

Summary: We wery satisfied with our stay at Hotel Pepper Tree (two adults, one 5-year-old). I loved the layout of the room (ground floor king with twin bed). It was very cozy, and pretty much everything I needed was in the kitchen. The continental breakfast was lovely and having Vallarta's grocery across the street was perfect. If we ever need a hotel in the area again, it will be the first place we look. Excellent price for what we received.
Manager Response: We love to hear that you found us to be a great value! We love serving families on their Disneyland trips. Thanks for the review.

Summary: very clean and affordable. with the full kitchen cant ask for anything more. grocery store is just in front away. near bank also. the only thing that is lacking a bit is maybe the parking lot. but everything else is fine.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the feedback! So glad you loved your stay.

Summary: This is was our third time staying and it was better than the last two times! The people at the front desk were very nice and always had a smile on their face. Even when you are not at the front desk and a staff member sees you, they always have a pleasant greeting. The room we stayed in was newly renovated. The rooms never let us down, but the new renovations made the room even better.
Manager Response: Wow! Love to hear that we keep getting better. We do love our newly renovated rooms. We will be working hard this fall to complete all of the rooms. Thanks for the review.

Summary: Really well located hotel for families visiting the Anaheim area. Central to all of the major attractions. Great pool, excellent front office staff in particular I must mention Angel. I would definitely stay there again. Very happy.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. We love Angel too! We will make sure that he sees your comments.

Summary Heading: This hotel is so far so good
Summary: This hotel is so far so good... it's ok..... i have no other commend room ok Bath room Ok        But they have resort charge 3 dollor a day ( parking and WIFI) that is not free. that is different as the web said ... those are free.

Very very close to disneyland close to alot of restaurants rooms are very big staff is frendly will come back again when i head to disneyland so check out the hotel its worth the money and only one exit away to disneyland
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will stay again! Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: As with other reviews I've read , this place is amazing value for money , with terrific staff who are very helpful and organised . The rooms are clean , beds are very comfortable and have good kitchens. The rooms are spacious and you have a balcony to sit on and relax. Plenty of shops and amenities are all close by . Car parking and access is all very easy .
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We love to hear that we are an excellent value. Thank you for choosing us, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel was nice and very convenient for Disneyland, everyone was very helpful, nice heated pool. The bed was  comfortable , I loved the outdoor  private patio with a little  water feature. We had a great stay. We will come again!
Manager Response: Please do come again! The Courtyard Studios are a great and private getaway.

Summary: Area was not all that great, a guest had her window busted out in the parking lot. The breakfast was not good. My charger apple charger came up missing after cleaning. The kitchen was outdated and stove sucked.
Manager Response: We are sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. Did you mention to the front desk that your phone charger was missing? Unfortunately, phone chargers are easily missed placed or lost. As for the area, our hotel is in a more neighborly quiet area in Anaheim. There was a broken window but not from any theft. Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We do hope that you will come back again and see the newly renovated rooms and kitchens.

Summary: This hotel was amazing! I was a bit worried being my first tone booking a hotel but the online stuff was super easy to navigate! The hotel exceeded my expectations when I got to the room! I felt like the pictures didn't do the room justice
Manager Response: Wow! Thanks for such a great review. We love to exceed people's expectations. Thanks!

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel in June 2015.  This is a nice average, clean hotel.  As previous reviewers mentioned the breakfast included is minimal and mostly sweet danish's and cereal.  The rooms are clean and nice size as you get a full fridge, microwave and eating utensils in your room, along with a couch and space to move around.  Beds were very comfortable and even the pillows were comfortable as you can choose between feather or foam.  Great place for families due to the size of the rooms.  The location is good, as there is a small grocery store directly across the street, 10 minute drive to Disneyland, less to Knott's Berry Farm and close to the I5 freeway.  If you are looking for a clean, average hotel with good staff then you will like this spot. If you are looking
Manager Response: Thanks for such a great and thorough review. We apologize for your WiFi issues and will make sure to figure out why you received a poor WiFi signal in your room.

Summary: The hotel is a little gem in the city of Anaheim. The staff is very nice and always willing to help. It is a fun and great place to stay that is highly affordable. We will be coming back very soon!!!.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Do come back soon.

Summary: What a surprise! Just searched hotels by Disneyland. It's always risky but this time we hit the jackpot. Beautiful room, colorful and clean. Quick 10 minute drive to Disney.Good housekeeping friendly service. We'll be back.
Manager Response: So glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and will be back! Thanks for the review.

Summary: Terrible breakfast but a Denny's close by Loud neighbors Weird and outdated decor Looks very cheap Itchy beds Dusty furniture  Bathroom amenities were of obvious cheap quality  Friendly and courteous staff; knowledgeable about a lot of tourist attractions  Convenient location with a car; Disney is about 10 minutes away Can buy Disney tickets at front desk Good wifi
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that we did not meet your expecations. We will use your feedback to better our hotel.

Summary: This was a nice, clean place to stay at.  Above all we are very pleased with the honesty of the staff.  My husband forgot his wedding ring at the hotel and within a couple of hours they called us to inform us that we had left something behind.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are so happy we were able to find your wedding ring. Come back again soon.

Summary: Absolutely fantastic hotel, friendly and helpful staff. The room was much more than we expected, heaps of storage space with drawers and closet space. Loads of restaurants and groceries nearby. Awesome
Manager Response: So happy that we exceeded your expectations. Come back soon!

Summary: The staff and facility were exceptional. Our only regret is not checking out other restaurants nearby, since the one next door was loud and odd. Appreciated the room's cleanliness and privacy most....
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your room. Thank you for choosing Hotel Pepper Tree!

Summary: I will say at first we were skeptical as we were driving to the hotel.  The neighborhood was not what we expected at all, But when we got there it turned out to to be great! We will be back. Perfect stay.
Manager Response: So happy that you will be back! Thanks for choosing our hotel.

Summary: Wonderful rooms at great price!    Location was excellent near to many attractions.  My family could stretch out and " unpack".  Large suite and loved the private balcony.  Many small stores near by.  Great pool!
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you enjoyed our boutique charm and that we were a great fit for your family! Come back soon.

Summary: Quaint Hacienda style hotel. Very family oriented. Quick to take care of any issues that might arise with the room. Front desk very accommodating and open 24 hours. Hotel is off the main roads, so is quiet. We stay here often. Pet friendly.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the positive feedback. We love to hear from our repeat guests.

Summary: This is a nice hotel. In this area with features I needed (pets, and kitchen) I was pleasantly surprised at how nice it was (the Spanish style building is really pretty).  The General Manager was a huge jerk, though.  I don't know if there was a (baseless) complaint from a neighbor, or what, but one early morning, he insisted on "inspecting the room" under the premise that they need to see it every three days.  I accepted, stating my protest, because I didn't want to get kicked out.  I stayed there for three weeks, and no such inspection was ever done before or since.  I was told that "they should" and that "it was improper" for them not to have done so, but I strongly suspect that he was lying.  Esp. since I was there another 6 days, and no such inspection occurred.  I felt
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel and giving us feedback from your stay. We are sorry for the inconvenience of checking your room. Since you did not report your pet at check-in, we were just taking the necessary precautions to make sure our rooms are adequately maintained and that the routine housekeeping services are done. Again, we are sorry to have bothered you.

Summary: Room was small kitchen look old n filthy we request to hv a room on 1 floor coz we hv a dog when arrive thy didn't hv the room promise also ask $10.00 charge more if we wanto move to the room promise but 2 day after we arrive
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel. We are sorry that we were unable to accommodate your special request for the ground floor Courtyard Studio. You did not notify us beforehand that you were bringing a pet, and the room type you booked was not of our premium Courtyard Studios. We love to help with special requests but were sold out of those room types. Thanks again for the feedback. We will use it to help better our hotel.

Summary: My girlfriend and I are Disneyland annual passholders from Phoenix, AZ. We drive out to Anaheim maybe 5 times a year to visit the park for a few days. We've stayed at all kinds of hotels from Hilton, to Ménage, to Castle. Close to park, and far. This is by the far the greatest deal we've come across.   For the price, this hotel gives you the absolute comfort of your own home. The kitchen is great, the closet space is amazing! The bathroom is just right. The bed was a TAD stiff but we got used to it. There's a balcony! Wow! The TV was nice! Free BREAKFAST?! For how cheap the room was?! There were touches to this hotel that felt very personal.   Don't get it twisted, though. This hotel is very laid back. They're not in your face. They're not going to offer to shine your shoes on
Manager Response: Thanks for such an amazing review! Very excited to have you back soon.

Summary: this hotel has a friendly staff and they go out of their way to help and accommodate the guests. The rooms are decent size but it's hit or miss if it has been updated. There are new windows so the street noise isn't to bad but the furniture needs to be replaced. Beds are ok for sleeping and rooms come with a fridge, coffee pot and microwave. I stayed in a room near the front desk and it was very noisy, he doors have large gaps allowing the noise to come in my room. The internet speed is great but not in every room. The breakfast is just ok and very continental. Cereal, toast, Danish and fruit.

Summary Heading: Clean, a bit of a drive from Disneyland, but comfortable and afordable
Summary: I liked having the kitchen. Had I stayed a few extra days I would have made better use of the fully-stocked kitchen. There's a grocery store across the street, you can easily grab some food for breakfast or something.  The property is very clear, the entrance is very inviting, and the pool is lovely. The rooms were comfortable and fit our family well. I like that it had a closet for all of our luggage, it was great for organizing the place. The free wifi was ok, but we hardly needed it.   Overall it was a great stay and I would stay again.

Positives  +our room was in the center of the hallway so we didn't have to deal with a lot of foot traffic or hear doors being slammed.   +good value hotel  Negatives  -the kitchen cabinets in our room 108 were unsightly unless they were a design, they still looked bad.   -toilet was slow for the first couple days. Even told the front desk a couple times before it was looked at.   -tile floor doesn't look like its mopped often. I work my slippers the entire time I was in the room.

This hotel was still  very charming.  The staff was very accommodating I need we had been driving all day,  it was nice we were  able to check in half an hour early. The hotel has some just a few minutes from a mall and a Walmart.

The location of the hotel is great. The reception staff is amazing. Only concerns are around the cleanliness of the hotel. When the staff cleaned the room, no towels were replaced and used towels (that were not on the ground) were placed in the tub with no alternative to use. The trash was not taken out, which leads me to believe the staff was in a hurry or does not pay much attention to detail. There was also a power outage  during our stay, with no recognition from staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the location of our hotel and our front desk staff. We are sorry for the issues you experienced with our housekeeping staff. We are currently making sure all of the housekeeping staff is providing the standard of service we expect from them. We will use your feedback to better our hotel.

Summary Heading: We really enjoyed the feel of the hotel
Summary: Everything was great  and will be staying at Hotel Pepper Tree again. The only downside noticed was the water coming out of the facet, being very foamy and cloudy when we allowed it to collect on the sink. Thank you for having such a great place.

Had a great stay with my girlfriend. The service was always friendly and effective. Great spacios rooms. Pool was a little small but cozy. Don't have a bad thing to say abaut this Hotel, a great lovely place to relax

We got there pretty late after Disneyland closed and were dying to take a shower. There were hairs all over it ( I stopped counting after 8) and it was clear no one wiped it down or they'd have noticed them. Big smudges on the light switches from makeup fingerprints and toothpaste on the faucet. In addition, our cable didn't work and we had to have the guy come in at 1am to try and fix it after we were in our pjs.   I have to say the guy at the front desk was really friendly and helpful but we were to exhausted to complain about the bathroom cleanliness.

Upon check-in, we surprisingly received a free room upgrade. Pros: very close to the mall, parking was good, room was nice, and it had a kitchen with a full fridge Cons: hated the floors (had to wear socks), plumbing needs fixing, dark lighting

Very satisfied with the hotel overall.We stayed for a couple nights. The service was very good at every request I did.  My girls enjoyed as well. Maybe needs more variety for the continental breakfast.

This hotel was better than I expected overall. I was a bit worried because some recent TA reviews had stated that roaches were found in the room. I did not see this during my stay. I did not care for their policy concerning VISA debit cards, as I was required to pay in full days in advance AND leave another deposit upon arrival. I have experienced either one or the other but not both at the same time, but then maybe this hotel has had issues with not getting paid in the past. The hotel is older, but was kept up well. It is a boutique style hotel, with balconies in every room, which is a nice touch. We had issues with the air conditioner not working when we checked in, but maintenance showed up quickly. They were unable to fix the a/c but told us they were going to switch it with

I was very pleased with my stay, the rooms were great, loved the kitchen, loved the patio,  happy they had a great A/C system, kids loved the pool, breakfast was very nice and loved that it wasn't crammed in a conference room, it is a actual restaurant setting! Very close to all the main attractions, the staff was super friendly, we will definitely stay here again when we are visiting!

WE found the Hotel Peppertree through Booking.com.  It is a lovely little hotel and we enjoyed our time there.  Our room had everything that we needed and the beds and pillows were super comfortable.   The only negative that I would have to say is that property needs to have a little more attention to the maintenance levels.  There were several cracks and staining on our ceiling and they were not small cracks - one almost the full length of the room.  We did bring this to the attention of the front desk at the end of our stay and they said it would be addressed.  Overall we had a great stay at Hotel Peppertree and would happily recommend them and the service we received!!!

Unusual hotel with kitchen, more like an apartment. Breakfast could be improved and you can hear your neighbor´s making noise .... But these are the two only things to moan about. So, if you´re looking for a spot to stay for Disney, go here.

Pros: Bed was pretty comfy. Patio was huge and our room looked over the pool and could see our car. Close to most places we went to. Seems like a safe area.   Cons: Wi-fi never worked. The tub made a lot of noise whenever you'd step anywhere. Could probably use a new shower head. There were some stains on the couch but it didn't bother us too much. Also a big thing is to maybe do something about the flooring. Slipped a few times in the bathroom and almost going up the stairs.  Overall we liked were we stayed! Would definately stay there again if we were in the area! And would reccomend.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will be staying with us again and that your enjoyed our large rooms. We appreciate your helpful feedback and will look into the bathroom in your room immediately.

Summary: Very nice hotel with good value for money, especially if coming for extended stay. The rooms were relatively clean and quiet. The front desk and room service very friendly. Grocery shops and laundry just 5 minutes walk from the hotel. The continental breakfast good but a bit modest. All in all, this place is highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thanks for your the great review! Hope you come back soon.

Summary: We stayed here because they allow dogs. We had 2 little ones and they had a small outside patio for them to hang out in which was very nice for them.  The hotel is filled with families going to Dusneyland. Sometimes quite loud!!
Manager Response: Glad that you and your pets enjoyed your stay and our Courtyard patios. Thanks for the review.

Summary: I think it is great that Hotel Pepper Tree is doing a disney sweepstakes. Every time me and my SO come to anahiem/disneyland we ALWAYS stay at HPT. Vincent does a great job with his customer service. Give praise where praise is due!! I'm pretty sure he knows me and my so by first name basis now. One thing, could add a shower cap to the bathroom amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being such a loyal guest! We will make sure that Vincent see your comments. We so appreciate your feedback.  Come back soon!

Summary: I would really appreciate if you change your continental breakfast.There wasn't much to eat just few pastries.And also the front desk wasn't friendly at all.But the room is Good.And also the bed linens and windowscreens were old and had like cigarette burn holes.Shower curtain has no linens.

There was 18 of us that stayed at the Hotel Pepper Tree. We all love the rooms with the kitchens. It work out very well for all of us. And was so close to Disneyland,about a 10 minute drive. We will be back and will recommend Hotel Pepper Tree.

Good location from Disneyland. Only needed it to sleep and make breakfast d/t my dietary needs. Bathroom small but everything worked. Only issue was that it was difficult to find the check in as the entrance is slightly covered by a tree.

If you clean up the grounds out front it'd be absolutely perfect. I really enjoyed my stay just think a quick power wash out front would do some good. And maybe get one of those waffle makers for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback! Please come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel front desk needs training
Summary: Clean room but kitchen was sad. Cabinets wouldn't close wood warped. Old everything. Balcony view of a man in your over full dumpster on top of trash getting cans. I went to front desk to see if I could check out at eleven am instead of 10:00 am and I said, I never seen a checkout at ten am. and he told me, "there is always a first time for everything". I couldn't believe someone could say that to a customer. Place of breakfast was terrible. Sorry but the guy really did it for me (Last straw)!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to review the hotel. We apologize for the rude comment made by the front desk staff. We will look into this immediately and make sure correct the poor customer service. We have just changed our check-out time to 11am (started June 1st) to better accommodate our guests. We are also renovating all of our rooms. We again are sorry that we did not give you our best service but will use your comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Older property was comfortable. Breakfast was a little sparse on variety. No hot items or waffles etc the interiors were cute with character. Hard to get into parking. It was a little hard to figure out the entrance
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. We will use these comments to better our hotel.

Summary: Spacious. Comfortable. But the linens were a bit irritating to my skin and every time the toilet was flushed a loud sound came from the pipes! It needs a little work, but, overall it served its purpose.

Summary Heading: Good room for an affordable price
Summary: Large room. Full kitchen and a nice big refrigerator and utensils such as toaster, coffee maker, microwave and stove. It is like a basic apartment. Bathroom is average. The hotel has a very classic looking. If you prefer the newer modern hotels than this would not the one. Price is affordable. Big room for a good price.
Manager Response: Happy to hear that you found our hotel to be a great deal! Glad you enjoyed your full kitchen and the large room. Thanks for the review.

Summary: The location was convenient, it was not more than 10 minutes away from Disneyland. Lots of food places near by too. The hotel room was clean and it had a nice kitchen. The bathroom was kind of small but I think that's just personal preference. The staff was really nice and friendly. The parking lot seemed a little small, at night it was 90% full and I didn't go during a busy time. Other than that I really liked the ambiance of the whole place.
Manager Response: So happy that you will be back! We really appreciate our repeat guests because we know that there are so many hotels to choose from. We have been almost sold out everyday the last few weeks so our packing lost was probably almost full. We do have plenty of free parking though on both sides of the hotel. Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: There was construction going on in the room next to us and workers kept banging the doors.  Too much noise in the hallway all day and night, walls are paper thin. Rooms were clean but wont return to this location.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review the hotel. We are happy that you found your room very clean and our sorry for the construction noise during the day. We have been renovating all of our rooms throughout the property.

Summary: They shut our key card off a day early so at 11 at night we had to request a new card because we were locked out of our room. The beds are hard, not comfortable.  The Wi-Fi was horrible. The bathroom tub drained slow

I come to Cape Town often for work and ever since I've made an arrangement that this hotel will be my preferred accommodation I have not been disappointed. The service, the professionalism from the Door, Conceirge, Food and Bev Solly and oh the bubbly Chantal, the Boss lady. She goes an extra mile to make sure that you get the impossible. Eg. Creating a room when the hotel is fully booked. She's amazing I hope the front desk can take a leaf out of her personality book. Thanks Pepperclub Keep up the good work. This has become a home away from home.

I booked a standard room with a King bed for a night. I booked the room to attend a concert at the Honda Center. The distance from the hotel to the Honda Center was convenient. The room was cozy and larger than I expected. I was surprised to find a balcony too. There were two things that bothered us. One, the room smelled of paint. I appreciate the renovation, but it did hit us a little too strong. Two, we found 3 cockroaches in our room when we came back from the concert. There was one in the kitchen sink and two near our bed. It creeped us out, but we adapted. Overall, we found the hotel perfect for our occasion.

Summary Heading: Great Stay At Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: If you are looking for a great little hotel with extended stay possibilities I really liked this Hotel ! the Kitchen  & full size refrigerator were a nice surprise ! everyone there is very helpful and friendly!

We took a trip to Disneyland and stayed here because it was reasonable priced and has a kitchenette.  The place is very comfortable.  Had some issues with the toilet plumbing, but when we brought it to the desks attention, the maintenance man was there within 30 minutes to fix it.  There is so shuttle service to Disneyland however.  We were disappointed with this.  We accommodated by driving to the parking garage at Disneyland.

Loved the bedding and private courtyard. SUPER cozy with lots of character and the front desk boys were cute!  Will definitely return.  Just needed a hottub!  Stayed here after seeing the one and only Bette Midler in concert.  Perfect place to relax!

The Hotel was surprisingly nice. We booked it on line and sometimes that is a mistake. However in this case it worked out Great. We loved the location, the Hotel staff were all very nice and friendly. The room was large and opened on to an enclosed patio. Nice kitchen area even though we didn't use it. The beds  were comfortable. Breakfast was weak, but all in all a great stay.

We've been coming to the Peppertree for 2 years.  Over the past 2 years I've notice improvements to the rooms and grounds; however, the breakfast isn't worth the time.  Other local hotels have a variety or Danishes, make your own waffles.  The coffee cake offer is dry and like saw dust.  Most places offer bananas, apples and oranges.  The fruit at your breakfast is made into a salad.  The breakfast bar you served in the hotel was better than the one in the restaurant.  It's a shame you keep improving in other areas but neglected your breakfast bar.

Stayed here many times , and will again, but housekeeping was very slack this time. Not cleaning, not refilling coffee etc, forgetting towels etc. Kitchen utensils getting old and worn and need replacing. A quick easy fix for not much money. But will stay again no question

Although my review is based on two previous trips due to the fact that we had to cancel the reservation this year, my opinion about Hotel Pepper Tree is very positive.  On the two previous trips my granddaughters used the pool which was very nicely maintained.

Staff were very helpful and friendly that accommodated us and the room was nice with a kitchen. The beds were very comfortable. Location was centrally located and close to freeway. We are definately coming back here.

We had no issues during our stay here. The place was old but clean & quaint. Perfect location for where we were vacationing. Breakfast was typical continental style. We liked to apartment style rooms.

We stayed two nights. Booked online. We don't have credit cards, so when they wanted $300 Cash for a deposit, that put a major dent in our vacation. $300 was a third of our budget.  So Disneyland consisted of a bare bone$ trip. Room was okay. Some stains on the walls and some holes in the comforter from cigarettes. Parking lot was not very secure with homeless folk pushing their carts around. "Continental breakfast" consisted of water, milk, orange juice, small donuts, cookies, sweet bread, toast, cereal, yogurt, watermelon, and cantaloupe.

We loved our room and private patio! There were guests that were being  obnoxiously loud with their children at the pool and I had to call up to the front desk. They took care of it immediately!   My only concern was with the wifi because you would be in the middle of using it and it would kick you off and the shower didn't have amazing pressure. I would of like a fluffier bed.   Really I'm being picky about those things because we never had an issue sleeping and we weren't in the hotel for long periods of time.   Will stay again!

This hotel is kind of hidden and you can miss it if you don't pay attention. We loved the location and how quiet it was. There was a full stocked kitchen with anything you need even dish soap! Loved it

The hotel itself is pretty on the outside and in. The quality of the items within not so great. Our oven did not work. The heater ran no matter what we did. Had to run the AC to counter it. Lots of homeless people in the parking lot. Had to yell at them a few times to get say from our car. Check out is the worse! 10am check out! Seriously? We got a 12pm checkout, but when we were about 5 mins behind. They got super nasty with us. Too many other choices to deal with poor customer service at the end. Restaurant switched to Mexican while we were there. Terrible decision. There are already 30 others in a 2 mile radius. Skip this place and go for one that will appreciate your business.

For the price, do not hesitate to rent a room there ! Good neighberhood, good location and big room.  The staff at check in and check out are professional and efficient and very kind. We arrived earlier than check in time and they found an available room for our family. Warm welcome always good ! Feel almost like home ! Thank you !

Summary Heading: All that and a box of crackers!
Summary: I stayed 3 nights this past weekend over Memorial Day. I wanted some place comfortable and clean for my husband and I. We were greeted with a spacious room, lovely patio, awesome SEPARATED bathroom, kitchen with full size appliances, and on the dresser was a goodie bag full of samples along with a box of cheese crackers...all compliments of Hotel Pepper Tree! And since I found out they take doggies, my furbabies are coming with me next time!
Manager Response: Come back soon! So happy you enjoyed the room and the little goodie bags!

Summary: I liked the decor of this hotel.  What upset me was that there was a cigarette burn on our comforter and a nail clipping on the floor near our bed.  For pictures please see my yelp review.  I would have returned to this hotel but when I saw a nail clipping there was no coming back from that.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We usually receive great comments regarding our cleanliness and housekeeping staff but are using your comments to better our service. We are sorry that you did not receive our best. Thanks for taking the time to review our hotel.

Summary: Loved this location right across from a little market easy to buy stuff to cook and make use of the kitchen. Provided plates cups pots pans and cooking utensils. Comfy beds and seats to watch tv while eating dinner. Nice big closet clean bathroom. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Only con was the breakfast was less than average but the market across the st made it easy for us to cook something ourselves or pick something up which was nice. Over all loved this place. Will definitely come back here on our next trip.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you will be back! Glad you enjoyed our hotel and the conveniences of the grocery store next store. We are working to improve the continental breakfast with the new restaurant.

Summary: We checked in, then checked out...need I say more? Room smelled, bathrooms were dirty, everything was old and in need of serious remodeling. Front desk staff was very helpful though and refunded my entire deposit without penalty. Ended up staying at a Holiday Inn Express.
Manager Response: We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. Most of our guests do enjoy their stays but we were happy to refund you if you were not satisfied with our hotel. We are currently going through and renovating all of our rooms. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Overall I enjoyed the stay. They bed was comfy but a little to hard for me. In the morning you could hear everything. From the people next to you or above and everything outside. but would stay again.
Manager Response: So glad you will stay again. Thanks for the review.

Summary: The hotel Pepper Tree is a great place to stay. This is the second time we've stayed. Two complaints though, our sink water smelled like sewer and they failed to help us stay where we wanted to after our request
Manager Response: Thanks for being a repeat guest! We are happy that you came back. We are sorry that we were not able to accommodate your specific room request during the busy holiday weekend. We hope you come back again soon.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotels, very nice rooms, great service
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights and loved the hotel decoration style. Staff was very friendly and assisted us with important information. The room was super appealing, big and comfortable, besides very clean.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. So happy you enjoyed our hotel!

Summary: Checked in around 11 pm, there were 2 people at front desk, and it was quick/easy. Our room on the 3rd floor was clean and tidy. Signs of typical wear on cabinets, furniture and kitchen.The arm chairs were heavily stained though. Shower very clean and well draining. No sign of bugs yay!  Wifi was fine, but we were using it at midnight.  Things I really disliked: the area surrounding hotel was questionable but my car was safe overnight in the parking lot. I could see it from my balcony. No towel rack in bathroom. If you forget to grab one before shower, you'll be doing a wet naked stretch to the rack on the wall outside the bathroom door.  The light on the balcony has no on/off switch so the light seeps under and around the blackout curtains. The continental breakfast is a joke.

The hotel wasn't what we expected it was more and the value for your money was great next time we hopefully will be able to take advantage of other amenities. If we were able to use more of the hotel it would have been better but we didn't have a chance we went to the 24 hour event at Disneyland.

II used a debit card at check in so I got charged a deposit if $200.  Its been over a week and haven't received it back.  The pool isnt as big as pics indicate, I had to wait 2 days for my sliding door to get fixed, the breakfast was awful.  Cereal, donut or toast.  The good side was the rooms were clean and hotel were clean and located within driving to anywhere easily
Manager Response: Thanks for reviewing our hotel. We are very sorry for not refunding your deposit immediately. We are happy that you found the hotel clean and in a convenient location to the local attractions.

Summary: I recommend pepper tree hotel & I wanna thank Mr. Rick for his support and honesty and his staff as well. In addition, it was a nice stay and the front desk team were friendly. Moreover, I will be back one day. Cheers, Slyron

The continental breakfast had no meat, or eggs and they charged if you wanted the items. They cut the donuts in pieces, really who cut glaze donuts. My name is spelled De Wayne Coleman not dewane. I like the place fix the breakfast
Manager Response: We are happy you like the hotel but are sorry that you had such a poor experience at the restaurant. We are working with the new management to improve the continental breakfast. Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: I liked it here very much. Only complaints were AC not being cold enough and also the continental breakfast not having enough variety. The bed was comfy, the room was nice and clean, the shower was nice as well. I liked it here and if and when I do go back to Anaheim and stay in a hotel I would pick Hotel Pepper Tree.

Excellent guest service. Enjoyable stay, would stay again. Very close to many attractions (Disneyland),etc. Good value for a room with kitchenette. Safe area in Anaheim. Room was clean, although a little outdated. Our son loved the Australian themed room.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review. So happy to hear that you received such good customer service.

Summary: This is our third stay at the Pepper Tree, and we've enjoyed it every time. The staff is always friendly and responsive, and it's clear that the hotel is well managed. We enjoyed having a full kitchen and a balcony, the bed was comfortable, and the price was reasonable.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our repeat guests! Cant' wait for your fourth visit. Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: Motel type faicilty, overpriced, dirty, in a not so good neighborhood. extra charge for "resort fee"!!!!. Terrible breakfast. Cheap manager at the restaurant. In summary, waste of money to get this nasty motel.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We do apologize for any issues with the restaurant. We have just changed the management and both service and breakfast has been improved. Most of our guests are very happy with our hotel, but we will use your review to better our service.

Summary: We always stay here when we're in the Anaheim area, great location, great value. Not a five star hotel, but you can't expect that for the price. The staff is nice, the hotel is clean, and my family and i feel safe when we stay there. Couldn't ask for more, has  been our hotel of choice for a few years now.
Manager Response: Love to hear that we are your preferred hotel! Thanks for the great feedback.

Summary: Our stay at the hotel went pretty well. Staff was very nice and helpful except for restaurant staff. Other then that the hotel was in great condition and well maintained. The prices are very affordable.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. So happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel. We love to hear that people see the value in our property.

Summary: The room was very big with a balcony, a kitchen, a bath tub But it is not new - which makes you feel as if it isn't very clean, that's why I didn't liked it.  breakfast was very basic (no eggs, no vegetables, no cheese)    The decorations give a nice atmosphere
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review the hotel. You will be happy to hear that we are doing many renovation throughout our rooms this summer. We do hope you come back again to see our new look.

Summary: Decent r0om, furniture a bit outdated and worn.   Decent part of Anaheim and not too far from stuff to do, hallways can be a bit noisy    Overall good value though.  Convenient parking, did a good job in accomodating continental breakfast during transition
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. Glad you enjoyed your stay and the value of our hotel.

Summary: Enjoyable stay, would stay again on my next trip to Anaheim. Room was clean and quiet.   Conveniently located to all the major attractions in Anaheim.  Only complaint was room service was not available during this last stay.

We stayed here one night on our way to Disneyland. It was very easy to find, close enough to disney that we could've travelled there each day if needed. Room was spacious, good to have a little kitchen available too. Great to have working wifi too. The cafe across the parking lot was great - such warm welcome and great with kids too. Would stay there again if we were ever back in the area.

This hotel was incredibly accommodating with last minute travel plans. They willing adjusted. It is an easy drive to Knotts Berry Farms and medieval times. Very charming decor and incredibly comfortable room. Would happily return. Only change I would like to see is the continental breakfast needed some help.

I really enjoyed my stay at the Pepper Tree. The front desk associates as well as the hotel room attendants/housekeeping employees went above and beyond to make sure I had everything I needed. I will definitely stay here again.

Great hotel and customer service. Beautiful property and so close to everything we needed. We wish we could have stayed longer but we plan to return on our next trip to Disneyland. Great value. Thanks

Family of 5 travelling to Disney and other attractions in L.A. On arrival I found the room spotless clean and well appointed ,The hotel had a nice atmosphere and all the staff from the front desk to the ladies who did the room as well as the ladies in the resteraunt where breakfast was served were excellent .I am looking forward to coming back.

We enjoyed our stay at the hotel on our Disneyland vacation. Location was close enough and service was friendly! The beds were wonderfully comfortable. The kitchen was nice. We would definitely stay here again.

Good rooms,Lots of space Great Supermarket across the street, would stay there again! We all had a great time very nice area The mananger was a great help for us help;s us with almoust everything,hope to get back there soon

The hotel was nice and the staff was friendly. Only down side was the wifi. Loved the full size fridge and the stove in the kitchen and the convience of continental breakfast. Definitely would stay here again.

I was very pleased with the room, everything was perfect.  I stayed here with my family on my latest trip to Disneyland. Room was nice, clean and close to Disneyland. The only small thing I would request is to put a recycling can in the room.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you found the room perfect! Hope you can come back soon.

Summary: There were a few times in the middle of the night that I woke up due to loud, meddlesome neighbors but otherwise may stay was great! This was definitely a great hotel. I enjoyed the rooms, the service, and the full kitchen. Plus, the location was very close to Disneyland which was convenient for the purpose of our stay.
Manager Response: So happy to hear you enjoyed your room and full kitchen. Sorry for the noisy neighbors. We do our best to keep our hotel quiet past 10pm.

Summary: I want to start by saying that the front desk people, all of them!, were great to deal with. They sorted out my gas problem (stove hobs weren't working) and even printed my Angels ticket for me which i had purchased from Stubhub. But apart from them it was very average. The place is old but they are still charging a high price. I paid $95 per night for two nights. While it is handy to everything it is still a drive or taxi to get to any of the major venues or shopping. I did walk to Anaheim Plaza but it is 3.5 kilometers away and not a particularly nice walk. Buena Park and the associated Mall are not too far but further than most people would walk. The room itself, 325, was large but dated (see photos). Initially the Gas didn't work but this was fixed quickly for me. The bed
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. Glad to hear you enjoyed the room, bed, and WiFi. We always do recommend renting a car for traveling in Southern California - so much to see but all spread out. We are in the process of updating all our rooms throughout the hotel. Thanks again for the helpful review.

Summary Heading: Our whole family absolutely loved Hotel Pepper Tree
Summary: We picked the Hotel Pepper Tree because the website made it look really warm and comfortable with beautiful flowers and a nice pool.  I am so happy we did.  It exceeded our expectations.  This place is a gem.  The young men working at the front desk were super helpful and friendly.  My 3 and 5 year daughters loved the entry way with little ponds and tiny fish.  The room was spacious, clean and colorful.  It wasn't a hot day by any means but the outdoor pool was a good temperature and really cute.  If we come back to Anaheim, we will definitely stay here and I've already recommended it to friends and family.  Can't go wrong and not a single bad thing to say about this place.  Disneyland tip-  it is not walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We love to hear that we exceeded your expectations! Thanks for recommended us to your family and friends.

Summary: Very happy with our stay and decided to stay one extra night. Room was spacious and grounds/pool area very pleasant. One thing we found a bit unusual was that our room was not made up when we returned in the evening. Except for this all else was fine except for the pancakes at breakfast which were quite doughy and undercooked. Good value stay and a short drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: So happy you stayed an extra night! We are sorry for the issue with housekeeping, and we hope you contacted the front desk immediately. The restaurant has just changed management and there will huge improvements made to our continental breakfast! Thanks again for the feedback.

Summary: I stay at this hotel every time I come to southern California because I love the staff and the rooms are usually wonderful and clean. This past stay, however, I had to change rooms because my initial room smelled of cigarettes and my new room's shower had random dark hairs in the tub and on the walls and there were some kind of green stuff on the pillows after the room had been cleaned.  I will continue visiting this hotel because these were very unusual experiences, especially considering I am there quite often.

I was ok with the hotel. It was not to for from Disneyland. But what I did not like was that the shower head was covered in calcium, there was also poor water pressure and the hot water worked but if you used more than a smidge of cold it all went cold. My sister had a cup of tea and said it tasted nasty and old. The main thing I like was that it was only 10 minutes from Disney.

This hotel was very quiet, our room was clean and beds were very comfortable Lots of room with a sitting area and kitchen full size fridge. Cons if you don't have a car it will cost if you are planning on going to Disneyland $20 cab ride one way. We were on the second floor, and the door to the balcony had a wide gap on either side, definitely in need of fixing. Breakfast was weak, but you could upgrade for $5.00. WiFi was terrible.

Summary Heading: An experience I wish I didn't have
Summary: Door key didn't work, had to return to desk for another ( they wouldn't bring one up). OVERPOWERING bug spray odor. NO ICE MACHINES. Dirty cabinets- I kept socks on & kept eye out for roaches. Yuu uuk.

This hotel was really great. I stayed here with friends on my latest trip to Disneyland. Room was nice, clean and close to Disneyland. The only small thing I would request is to put a recycling can in the room :)

I was very pleased with how big the rooms were. I enjoyed my stay except I had a cockroach in my bathroom which made me second guess my stay here. He front desk was nice and explained everything clearly.

We looked at a lot of hotels as we were planning our trip to Disney.  We had a lot of great surprises on our trip and the Hotel Pepper Tree was one of them.  Our family loved how close this hotel was to everything.  Disney was less than a five min trip and we did not have to get on the interstate to get back so we were never battling traffic.  We loved the convenience of the kitchen and the balcony with a big window to let in a lot of light.  The front desk was great and helpful in any request we had.  We will definitely be staying here if given the chance again.

I like this hotel this is where I usually stay at. There is just a problem with phone connection when one is inside the hotel. There is no service at all. If that could be change I would truly love that.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel for staying in Anaheim
Summary: While it's an older hotel, they try to keep it up. The room was clean and had a small kitchen. If you have a family or are staying for several days, this is a great home base. The free breakfast is just OK, cold cereal, and some pastries that were less than hostess quality. For $5 you could upgrade to a hot breakfast. This was well worth the money as the food was very good.  It's a bit of a drive to Disneyland and no shuttle, so this might not be the place to stay if your only stop is Disneyland. All in All, I would stay here again.

We've stayed at Hotel Pepper Tree several times and would recommend it! It's in a great location with just a short drive to Disneyland and other area attractions, and is reasonably priced. The staff is helpful and friendly, and the hotel itself is kept clean and in good condition.

We loved this hotel and our stay. Everything was simply wonderful. I would definitely stay here again and refer others to stay here as well. Our favorite part was the balcony over looking the pool. The pool was nice too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! We love to be referred to friends and family.

Summary: I stayed here with my mom and grandma for a short Disneyland trip. The hotel was wonderful, very nicely decorated (not generic like all the others). I'd call it "Native/Hollywood Chic." The kitchen and room, bathroom and large closet area were very nice. The space was perfect for us three but might be a bit cramped for more than 4 people. And it was less than 10 minutes from Dland! Very convenient. I gave the staff an average rating because I arrived late in the evening and did not have much interaction with the staff. They were kind and quick to get us in and quick to get us checked out.
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed our boutique charm! Thanks for the feedback.

Summary: This hotel has a wonderful atmosphere. We only stayed for one night but it is conveniently located to Disneyland. The room and bathroom were clean and although we didn't use the kitchen everything was in order. I would definitely stay here again.

It was a pleasure stay, very helpful. the service was very good. Close to the parks, shopping, and easy to get on the Highway. the breakfast was ok.The staff were very friendly, were very trust worthy.
Manager Response: So happy you will return. Thanks for the great feedback!

Summary: This is the best place to stay in Anaheim!! makes a great homebase for exploring southern California. Great staff, great Rooms, great experiences everytime! Its scary affordable which is great for couples like us starting out. Its easy to book. And checking in is always a breeze. Checking out however is so hard, inly because we never want to leave!

A wonderful hotel especially for the price!! It is very charming and the staff was very friendly! The bed was very comfortable and the enclosed patio was a nice touch. The breakfast was nice, nothing special but tasty.I would stay at the Hotel Pepper Tree again in a heartbeat!

The breakfast is very simple and facility is poor. Others are good. My daughter had very good time with the swiming pool. We found a nice asian food restraunt near this hotel. Parking is also convenient.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feed back! You will be glad to hear that the restaurant in changing ownership very soon and changes to the continental breakfast will be made. We would love to have you back again for you to try out our new breakfast.

Summary: hotel was great and truly enjoyed our stay the only concern i have was the restaurant for continental breakfast was horrible...i'm sorry but the food was cold and greasy, the staff was ok but when my husband went to go get us at least coffee they said we couldn't take to our room had to buy coffee for $2.88 a cup, very sad.  Coffee should at least be complimentary.  unfortunately will not go back due to restaurant concerns.
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you had such a poor experience at the restaurant. In the next few weeks, huge changes will be made at the restaurant and the continental breakfast. We are so happy that you enjoyed the hotel and do hope that you will come back again. Thanks for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great price!
Summary: Full kitchen and spacious rooms. Quiet area and curious staff. Great for couples and affordable price for families. We found a great deal for last minute plans. It has a rustic Mexican feel to it. However the free continental breakfast could have been better. Otherwise great hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review! So happy you enjoyed your stay and saw such value in our hotel. Major changes come to the continental breakfast. We will make sure to keep everyone posted.

Summary Heading: Nice end to a long day ay Disneyland
Summary: Everything was very nice. The only exceptions were the bed and bath tub. The tub was quite aged and scarred. Also, the drain in the tub was very slow draining. The wooden bed frame was slightly larger than the mattress so I hit my knee on it twice.... Ouch!
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback! We will make sure to check into your room immediately. We are going through and making huge updates throughout all the rooms these next two months.

Summary: Great custermer service, they let me change my room when I wanted one on the top floor with no hesitation. Kitchen was clean and bathroom was just right! Great closet space and the beds out me right to sleep! Coming back again.
